lyrics.en.value:
Let's get together for a while, if you please
This song's a bit (?) negative
Yesterday's me in the mirror, looks an awful lot like today's me

It's been sad, it's been distressing, it's been painful, but nobody ever listens to me,
so my only friend is my face buried in my knees

Tears stream down my face, and they reach someone, wherever they are
"Hey, don't you know? The heart is something that only others can see"

Now, as I head toward tomorrow,
hands wave, yelling "see you later",
at my back comes a, "good luck",
all in voices I've heard before
And then I'm off, running on the asphalt,
soaked in warm tears
So I say bye bye to the "once upon a time me of today"
Let's continue getting together, if you please
Now that I'm being a bit more positive,
Can you see my heart glittering?

Was it sad? Was it distressing? It was painful, but don't ever say nobody's listening, my friend

Tears stream down a face, and they fall on the ears of today's me
“Hey, it's all right! I'm always watching after your heart."

Now, as you head toward tomorrow,
Hands wave, yelling, "see you later!",
At your back comes a, "good luck",
shouted in voices you've heard before
And then you're running off,
with a heart gleaming bright
So I say bye bye to the "once upon a time me of today"

Let's get together for a little while longer, if you please
When I looked like I might cry a little, everyone supported me.
So this time, I'll encourage them

It was sad, it was distressing, it was painful,
but you were always watching, you were always listening, and now it's my turn

Tears stream down your face, and drowning in a sea of them, you splash and flail, so, for you,
I'll chant the magic words, a buoy for the heart, an "it's all right"

Now, as I head toward tomorrow with you,
Toward tomorrow holding hands,
I'm hugged from behind, as I hear countless voices
And then we burst into tears, you and me,
but show each other warm smiles
So I say bye bye to the "once upon a time me of today"

title: 【初音ミクKAITO】サンドリヨン（Cendrillon）【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image depicts a romantic scene between two people, a man and a woman, who are embracing each other and kissing. They are dressed in formal attire, with the man wearing a suit and the woman wearing a dress. The scene is set in a garden, with a tree in the background, and a bench nearby. The mood of the image is romantic and intimate, with the couple expressing their love and affection for each other. The output of the image is a black and white photograph, which adds a timeless and classic touch to the scene.
introduction_ja: 男女2人が抱き合い、キスをしているロマンチックなシーンが描かれている。二人は正装しており、男性はスーツ、女性はドレスを着ている。背景には木があり、近くにはベンチがある。イメージの雰囲気はロマンチックで親密で、カップルがお互いに愛と愛情を表現している。画像の出力はモノクロ写真で、このシーンに時代を超越したクラシックなタッチを加えている。
artistString: Dios/シグナルP feat. 初音ミク, KAITO
lyrics.ja.value:
朝まで踊る夢だけ見せて 
時計の鐘が解く魔法 
曖昧な指誘う階段 
三段飛ばしに跳ねていく

馬車の中で震えてた 
みじめな古着　めくり廻れ夜の舞踏

見知らぬ顔探す　囁くあの声が 
握り締めた刃衝きたて　すべてを奪えと 
孤児 (みなしご) 集う城　笑み仮面に描いて 
偽りの慈しみさえ　羽で包む熾天使 (セラフ)

灰の中で赤く溶けて混じる硝子の靴

今更帰る震えているの　 
あなたが目をやる時計 
靴脱ぎ踊るスロープ抜けて 
喉まで伸びる指の先で

すくう雫口付けて 
走る衝動　背骨抜けていく刹那

鐘は鳴らさないで　あなたにひざまずき 
まだダメと叫んだ右手が　突き刺すサヨナラ 
消せない硝煙を香水にまとう姫 
強い瞳僕の凍った　仮面ごと撃ち抜く

今も耳にあなたの吐息が 
突き刺さるの遠い夢 
ステンドグラスごし光る月が 
君にかぶせたベール

ドレス膝で裂いて　ティアラは投げ捨てて 
見つめあう瞳と瞳が　火花を放つ 
孤独な魂が炎あげ惹かれあう 
その涙すくえないなら　まるで一人遊び

時よ止まれ今は　あなたに酔いしれて 
揺れる鼓動一つ一つを　刻み付けてたい 
とどまれ熱く濡れ　打ち付ける昂まりに 
これ以上は動けないよ　まるで御伽噺 (フェアリィテイル)
lyrics.en.value:
Let me dream of dancing till the dawn
The bells of the clock would break the magic
Vaguely, those fingers beckon me to the stairs
I leap them up taking three at a time

In the carriage, you were shivering
Flick up the miserable rags and dance in the ball at night

I look for the one I do not know, that voice whispers me
"Thrust the edge you hold and take away everything"
In the castle, orphans get together, drawing smiles on the masks
The seraph would take even a false mercy under the wings

In the ashes the glass slippers are ruddily melting and merging

Knowing too late, I get shivers and wish to go back, at the clock you glance
I take off the slippers and dance through a slope
By the tips of your fingers reached for my neck
I brush a tear and give it a kiss
At that moment an impulse runs down the spine

Do not ring the bells, as I fall on my knees to you
And cry "not yet", my right hand thrusts "farewell"
You are the princess with indelible perfume of gunshot residue
Your strong eyes penetrate me right through my icy mask

Still, your breath pierces the ears of mine
It would be a faraway dream
The moon shining through a stained glass window is the veil I put on you

At the knee, I tear the dress and throw away the tiara
We gaze into each other's eyes and sparks fly
Burning in flames, the lonely souls feel drawn to each other
If I cannot blush away your tears, as if it were a solitary play

May the time stop now!
Intoxicated by you
I wish to engrave every swaying throb on my mind

May it stay!
Stricken by a hotly wet surge
I cannot move any more, as if it were a fairy tale

title: 【初音ミク】魔法少女幸福論【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features a pink background with a black and white design of a heart shape. The heart shape is made up of various letters, such as "O" and "X," which are arranged in a unique and artistic way. The heart shape is positioned in the center of the image, creating a visually appealing and eye-catching design. The mood of the image is playful and creative, with a touch of romance, as the heart shape is a symbol of love and affection. The output of this image would be a digital or printed design, such as a poster, wall art, or a t-shirt, that showcases the unique and artistic heart shape design.
introduction_ja: ピンクの背景に黒と白でハート型がデザインされている。ハートの形は「O」や「X」など様々な文字で構成されており、ユニークで芸術的な配置になっています。ハート型は画像の中央に配置され、視覚に訴える、目を引くデザインとなっています。ハート型は愛と愛情のシンボルであるため、画像のムードは遊び心と創造性に富み、ロマンスを感じさせる。このイメージのアウトプットは、ユニークでアーティスティックなハート型のデザインを紹介するポスター、ウォールアート、Tシャツなどのデジタルまたはプリントデザインになるでしょう。
artistString: トーマ feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
いつだって一人で マルベリカ 
大概ひと振り　退屈な奇跡だ 
助けのキッカケも悪戯も 
何だって叶う マギスペリカ

地味だって避けられ ソリタリカ 
どうして隠さなきゃって　悲惨なオキテだって 
妄念も束縛　そんなのって!
毎日、平均点はもう懲り懲りでさ

テレビも週刊誌も、そう。 
未来、期待もゼンブ揺れるけど 
答えが振り向かなきゃ 意味がないの 
今日くらい 約束破って 
身勝手 変わった 幸福戦

例えば一夜で 世界が終わるとか 
ちょっとした魔法が 使えたりだとか 
そんな冗談で 騙せないって 
わかっているけれど 
生まれ変わらせて

いつだって子供で マルベリカ 
鉄骨剥き出し 廃園午前3時 
大人になるのが 怖いって 
長い夜が 途切れるのも　怖いって

まるで魔法みたい！って 
没入感で 欲しがってみても 
人形遊びだって　知ってるって

だけど罪を負ってさえも 求めたい未来を 
大嫌いだって 投げ捨てたり　土に埋めるはずもない 
今日を忘れさせないって　縛ることで知らしめても 
今夜だけ酷く変わって 
妬けて　焦げた　心拍数

満たされないことを 責め立てて 
そこに崇高な 愛などないんだ 
そんな私を 赦して欲しいって 
守れない約束を 
信じ続けてる

相も変わらず 心情さえも醜く 
大事に育った 盲信少女の幻想は 
きっと気付かないまま 削げ落ちた 
もう奇跡は 降り注がれないんだ

例え地球を 掻き乱す 魔法でさえも 
壊せない 想いの結晶 
欲の渦に巻かれ 沈んでく宇宙で 
自分を失くした、愛の侵略者よ!

ほんの一夜で　世界が終わるとか 
ちょっとした魔法が　使えたりだとか 
そんな冗談で　愛してみたいんだ 
この世の全てを　 
君に聞いてみたい
lyrics.en.value:
By myself, I always Marberica
Taking a swing in general, a boring miracle
Chances to save people and do mischief,
Anything will be granted, Magisperica

Avoiding even plainness, Soliterica
Why do I need to hide it? a tragic law, flawed convictions and restraints
Things like that!
Everyday, I'm sick of getting average grades

TV and weekly magazines, yes
The future, my expectations, are all shaking
But if I don't change my answer, there's no meaning to it
Just for today, it's fine if I break my promise
selfishly changed happiness wars

For example, if the world ended overnight,
and I could use a little bit of magic
I know I shouldn't be able to be tricked by such jokes, but let me be reborn

Always, as a child, Malberica
Bare steel frames, a garden neglected at 3am
I'm scared of becoming an adult
and I'm scared this long night will be interrupted

Saying, "it's like magic!"
Immersed in this sensation, even if I try wishing for it,
I know it's nothing but playing with dolls

However, even if I bear the burden of sin,
I won't, even if I hate it, throw away and bury the future I want
Even if you say you won't let me forget about this day, even if you make me known it'll bind me
Only this night, my pulse is cruelly changed
scorched with envy

Urging that this satisfaction will never be filled
There's nothing like noble love there
Saying I want to forgive that kind of me,
I continue to believe in
the promise I couldn't keep

Like always, even my emotions are unsightly
The illusions of the blindly believing girl brought up with care
will certainly splinter off without her realizing
that miracles no longer rain down from the sky

For example, if even magic that disturbed the earth
Couldn't break the crystallization of my feelings
Someone who lost themself in a universe
wrapped and sinking in a maelstrom of desire, an invader of love!

The world ending just overnight, among other things,
Being able to use just a bit of magic, among other things
In wanting to try loving within that kind of joke,
I want to hear this world's everything within you

title: フィクサー / flower - ぬゆり
introduction: The image is a black and white photograph of a stage with a curtain, a red carpet, and a cityscape in the background. The stage is empty, with no visible performers or props. The cityscape in the background is dark and appears to be a nighttime scene. The overall mood of the image is one of anticipation and mystery, as the empty stage and the dark cityscape create a sense of expectation and intrigue.
introduction_ja: 画像はモノクロ写真で、背景にはカーテン、赤いカーペット、街並みが写っている。舞台には何もなく、出演者も小道具も見えない。背景の街並みは暗く、夜景のように見える。空っぽの舞台と暗い街並みが期待感と陰謀感を醸し出し、画像全体のムードは期待と謎めいたものである。
artistString: ぬゆり feat. v flower
lyrics.ja.value:
今日までの記憶の全部を消してしまう時まで眠れない

あしたから生きていく自分の身代わりが欲しくて堪らない

大丈夫と言わせて 後から君のせいにさせてはくれないか

今更意味ないから後から君のせいにさせてはくれないか


出来ない約束を

とうとうと溢れる一言一言ばかりに脳を奪われるくらい

意味を成せない 何も出来ない

見えない 逃げたい 飛びたい やめたい 逸らせない



だから

沈め

這い上がれないほどまで 
飽きるまで
落とせ

救い垂らす時まで



嘘味の粒々を喉から締め出した悲鳴ごと嚙み砕く

笑顔が下手なばっかで 知ったような口ぶりに沿ってやり過ごす

なりたくなかった



今日役立つ眠たい眠たい理想で救われることを待つ

一番目は「い」の口で言う

力強く強く強く噛み締めて



死んでしまえ

この先も過去も知らず 嫌いなら

壊せ

どうせなら加害者になればいい



食べきれない苛立ちも何も生まない悲しみも

味気なくて吐き出す前にもう次を歌え



どうせなら
踊り踊れ

灰色になり切る前に 打ち鳴らせ

変われ

眠り落ちる時まで


どうせなら
奪え

飼い慣らした嘘暴いて

煮え滾る頭に過ぎった虚像を見ていた


自分を見ていた
lyrics.en.value:
I can’t sleep until I’ve erased all of my memory up until today.
It’s unbearable, how much I wish for a substitute to live my life for me from tomorrow on.
Let me say that everything’ll be okay. And then, won’t you let me blame it all on you later?
Since everything’s meaningless now, won’t you let me blame it all on you later?

I can’t make any sense, can’t do anything
about the promises I can’t fulfill, at the expense of letting my brain be taken over
by each and every single of the words that are flooding my mind.
I can’t see. I want to flee. I want to jump. I want to quit. I can’t avoid it.

That’s why
just let me sink, let me sink,
until I can’t crawl up anymore.
Until you’re sick of it,
just drop me, drop me,
until you dangle salvation before me.

I crush to bits the drops tasting of lies, altogether with the screams blocked out of my throat.
Having a hard time keeping a smile, I’m just whiling away my time as I go along with this know-it-all pretense.
I didn’t want to turn out like this.

Today, I’m holding on to my sleepy, sleepy ideal of becoming useful for once, while waiting to be saved.
For the first one, say it with my mouth stretched to the ears.
Biting my lips with all the strength I find in me.

Just die, just do it,
without a care for the future or past.
If I hate it,
just destroy everything, destroy everything.
Might as well just turn into a perpetrator.

Just sing the next one already, before I have to spit out
this flavorless irritation that’s more than I can eat and sadness from which nothing ever comes.

I might as well
just dance the dance.
Let it ring out, before I completely turn an ashen color.
Just change, just change,
until I can fall asleep.

I might as well
just snatch it away, snatch it away,
exposing all the lies I’ve tamed.
I’ve been looking at a false image that flitted through my feverish mind.

I’ve been looking at my own self.

title: 【GUMI】拝啓ドッペルゲンガー【KEMU VOXX】
introduction: The image features two young women with purple hair, sitting on a couch and looking at each other. They are dressed in black and appear to be enjoying each other's company. The background of the image is a black and white photo, which adds a sense of nostalgia and timelessness to the scene. The mood of the image is warm and friendly, as the two women appear to be engaged in a positive and intimate conversation. The overall atmosphere of the image is one of companionship and connection.
introduction_ja: 画像は、紫色の髪をした2人の若い女性がソファに座り、見つめ合っている。二人は黒い服を着ており、互いに楽しんでいるように見える。背景はモノクロ写真で、このシーンにノスタルジーと時代性を加えている。2人の女性が前向きで親密な会話をしているように見えるので、画像の雰囲気は温かくフレンドリーだ。画像全体の雰囲気は、仲間意識とつながりのひとつである。

lyrics.en.value:
“Hello there, I’m your doppelganger”
I rub my eyes, wondering what kind of joke this is
There are two of my shadows,
and thus the curtain rises once more

“You said you wish there were another one of you,”
“and that fervent wish has called me into existence”
Well, you could say I wished for it
I was just bearing my cross, an agent for everything

I don’t care about the method, just give me results
Such a meaningless, worthless price to pay
Say, rather than that,
I gotta tell you about something important
All right?
“Yes, I’ll do it, I’ll do it, I’ll do anything
I’m your doppelganger,”
the messiah says with a chuckle

Dear doppelganger, who, oh who are you?
Ah, everything is intersecting with chaos
Who am I?
You know, the zero and one don’t exist
There’s absolutely no basis for a proof of any kind
Dear doppelganger, who, oh who is you?
The world wouldn’t pay any notice
to a devoured existence
The sound won’t stop ringing
The frenzy won’t die down
The miraculous cycle of endless rebirths
dyes the deranged answer with its color
Runpappa

Things somehow seem strange on Monday
As the story starts falling apart, one piece at a time, it’s suspicious of me
“Who the hell are you?”, it seems to ask

Hold on a minute
I’m not aware of what happened yesterday, nor of any of the words I said
Before I knew it, my shadow is dissolving
What exactly am I?
Please, give me back my existence

“I’m terribly sorry, but it feels quite good to be here, in its own way”
“You’re already well aware that there’s no longer any place for you here, right?”
“You know, if you’ve got something robbed from you, you just got to rob it back, right?”
“It’s your turn this time,” the invader says with a chuckle

Dear doppelganger, who, oh who are you?
Ah, everything is intersecting with chaos
Who am I?
Well, I suppose that’s the way it is, of course
There’s only one seat of life
Dear doppelganger, who, oh who is you?
Before the single drop that spilled
completely dries away
I don’t care who it is or what it is, just give me a vessel
The deranged answer dyes everything with its color
Runpappa

Pray, that is the chain of human karma that continues on forever
Pain, they yield to each other, forgive each other,
and become satisfied with that
Pray, the missing piece, aworthless pain
Hope, as well as love
Pain, they entrust in each other and are reborn
Initiation, pray
“I can live your life much better than you”
Pain
“It’s your turn to save someone next”
Pray
“You already know what you’re supposed to do, right?”
Pain
Someone, please give me a miracle

Dear doppelganger,
who, oh who are you?
Ah, everything is intersecting with chaos
Who am I?
It can’t be stopped, there’s no going back
Hello there, I am your

Dear doppelganger, that, oh that is me
Even if the world were to pay any notice
to a devoured existence,
the sound won’t stop ringing out now
The frenzy won’t die down
The miraculous cycle of endless rebirths
is going to dye the deranged answer with its color
Do your best, okay?
Runpappa

“Hello there, I’m your doppelganger”

title: 【初音ミク】　ホワイトハッピー　【オリジナル】
introduction: The image is a black and white photograph of a heart-shaped hole in a wall, with a series of arrows pointing towards it. The background of the image is a brick wall, which adds a sense of depth and texture to the scene. The heart-shaped hole in the wall creates a unique and visually striking composition, drawing attention to the arrows pointing towards it. The overall mood of the image is mysterious and intriguing, with the arrows suggesting a sense of direction or guidance towards the heart-shaped hole. The black and white color palette adds a timeless and classic feel to the image, emphasizing the simplicity and focus on the heart-shaped hole and the arrows.
introduction_ja: 画像は、壁に空いたハート型の穴と、その穴を指す一連の矢印の白黒写真。画像の背景はレンガの壁で、シーンに奥行きと質感を与えている。壁に空いたハート型の穴は、ユニークで視覚的に印象的な構図を作り出し、そこに向けられた矢印に注意を引いている。画像全体の雰囲気はミステリアスで興味をそそるもので、矢印はハート型の穴に向かって進む方向や道しるべを示唆している。黒と白の色調は、この画像に時代を超越したクラシックな雰囲気を加え、シンプルさとハート型の穴と矢印への集中を強調している。

introduction: The image features a young girl with long black hair, wearing a black dress and standing in front of a black background. She is holding a cell phone in her hand, possibly taking a selfie or capturing a moment. The background is dark and has a futuristic feel, which adds to the overall mood of the image. The girl's pose and the dark background create a sense of mystery and intrigue, making the image visually appealing and captivating.
introduction_ja: 黒い背景の前に、黒いドレスを着た長い黒髪の少女が立っている。手には携帯電話を持っており、自撮りをしているか、瞬間をとらえているのだろう。背景は暗く、未来的な雰囲気があり、それが画像全体のムードを高めている。少女のポーズと暗い背景が謎と陰謀の感覚を生み出し、この画像を視覚的に魅力的で魅惑的なものにしている。

title: 【ＩＡ】ヘッドフォンアクター【オリジナルＰＶ】
introduction: The image features a woman wearing a purple wig and holding a cell phone. She is standing in a room, possibly a living room or a bedroom, with a TV in the background. The room appears to be well-lit, and the woman is looking at the cell phone. The mood of the image is casual and relaxed, as the woman is engaged in a leisurely activity, possibly watching a video or browsing the internet on her cell phone. The presence of the TV in the background suggests that she might be watching a show or movie, or simply enjoying some entertainment.
introduction_ja: 紫のかつらをかぶり、携帯電話を持っている女性。彼女は、おそらくリビングルームか寝室と思われる部屋に立っており、背景にはテレビがある。部屋は明るいようで、女性は携帯電話を見ている。画像の雰囲気はカジュアルでリラックスしており、女性はゆったりとした活動、おそらく携帯電話でビデオを見ているか、インターネットを見ているのだろう。背景にテレビがあることから、彼女は番組や映画を見ているのかもしれないし、単に娯楽を楽しんでいるのかもしれない。
songTitle: ヘッドフォンアクター
artistString: じん feat. IA
lyrics.ja.value:
その日は随分と平凡で 
当たり障り無い一日だった 
暇つぶしに聞いてたラジオから 
あの話が流れ出すまでは 

「非常に残念なことですが、 
本日地球は終わります」と 
どこかの国の大統領が 
泣きながら話をするまでは。 

窓の外は大きな鳥たちが 
空覆い尽くしてく渋滞中 
三日月を飲み込んで 
どこかへと向かってる 

やりかけてたゲームはノーセーブ 
机にほぼ手つかず参考書 
震える身体をいなす様に 
すぐにヘッドフォンをした 

不明なアーティスト項目の 
タイトル不明のナンバーが 
途端に耳元流れ出した 
「生き残りたいでしょう?」 

蠢きだす世界会場を 
波打つように揺れる摩天楼 
紛れもないこの声はどう聞いても 
聞き飽きた自分の声だ 

「あの丘を越えたら20秒で 
その意味を嫌でも知ることになるよ。 
疑わないで、耳を澄ませたら20秒先へ」 

交差点は当然大渋滞 
もう老若男女は関係ない 
怒号やら赤ん坊の泣き声で埋まっていく 

暴れだす人　泣き出す少女 
祈りだした神父を追い抜いて 
ただ一人目指すのは逆方向 
あの丘の向こうへと 

ヘッドフォンから依然声がして 
「あと12分だよ」と告げる 
このまま全て消え去ってしまうなら 
もう術は無いだろう 

ざわめき出す悲鳴合唱を 
涙目になってかすめる10秒 
疑いたいけど誰がどうやっても 
終わらない人類賛歌 

「駆け抜けろ,もう残り１分だ。」 
その言葉ももう聞こえない位に 
ただ目指していた丘の向こうは 
すぐ目の前に 

息も絶え絶えたどり着いたんだ 
空を映し出す壁の前に 
その向こう白衣の科学者たちは 
「素晴らしい」と手を打った 

疑うよ。 

そこから見る街の風景は 
まるで実験施設の様でさ 
「もう不必要だ。」 
科学者は片手間に爆弾を投げた 

箱の中の小さな世界で 
今までずっと生きてきたんだなと 

燃え尽きていく街だったモノを 
ただ、呆然と見る耳元で 
ヘッドフォンの向こうから 
「ごめんね」と声がした
lyrics.en.value:
It was an extremely average day, without a single obstacle in my path 
Until I was bored, listening to the radio, and I heard this said

"It's very unfortunate I have to say this, but the world is going to end today" 
So said some country's president, in tears as he spoke

Out the window was a huge flock of birds, congesting to cover up the sky 
Swallowing up the crescent moon, headed some unknown direction

I had a half-finished game with no save, a scarcely touched textbook lay on my desk 
And to stop my body from trembling, I promptly put on my headphones 

Just as I was listening to an obscure artist, a number they did with an unknown title, 
Just as it came to my ears, I heard, "you want to survive, yes?" 

Waving over the wriggling world, the skyscrapers seemed to tremble 
This voice seemed unmistakable, it was my own, which I tired of hearing 

"If you cross that hill, then in twenty seconds, you'll know what I mean, for better or worse 
Don't doubt, just listen close, go twenty seconds ahead" 

The intersection was crowded, of course
Man, woman, child, it didn't matter, I was buried under people yelling and babies' cries 

Rioting people, a sobbing girl, a priest praying, I passed them all by 
One single person headed the other way, toward what was beyond that hill

The voice from the headphones persisted "Twelve minutes left," it told me 
If everything was going to up and vanish, then I had no other way

The chorus of shrieks and screams turned to tearful eyes in ten seconds 
I had my doubts, but no matter who did what, there was no ending humanity's song 

"Run, run, there's one minute left," 
But I couldn't even hear it by then, the hill which I sought to cross was right before me

My breath faint, I finally arrived before a wall which projected the sky 
Behind it, scientists in white applauded
"Magnificent," they said, doubt

From there, I saw the town was some kind of experimental facility
"No longer necessary," a scientist said, and calmly tossed a bomb 

I was told I had been living my whole life in a little world in a box 
So I could only stare, dumbfounded, at the burnt wreckage that had been the town 
And from the headphones at my ear, I heard a faint "sorry”

title: magnet【初音ミク・巡音ルカオリジナル】
introduction: The image features two anime characters, a girl and a boy, who are kissing each other. They are wearing headphones, which suggests that they might be listening to music or enjoying a shared audio experience. The background of the image is a black and white checkered pattern, which adds a unique and artistic touch to the scene.The mood of the image is romantic and intimate, as the two characters are sharing a passionate kiss. The black and white checkered background adds a sense of nostalgia and timelessness to the scene, making it feel like a classic or vintage photograph. The overall atmosphere of the image is one of love and affection, capturing the essence of a romantic moment between the two characters.
introduction_ja: 少女と少年の2人のアニメキャラクターがキスを交わしている。二人はヘッドホンをしており、音楽を聴いているか、共有のオーディオ体験を楽しんでいるのかもしれない。画像の背景は黒と白の市松模様で、シーンにユニークで芸術的なタッチを加えています。2人のキャラクターが情熱的なキスを共有しているので、画像のムードはロマンチックで親密です。黒と白のチェック柄の背景が、このシーンにノスタルジーと時代を超越した感覚を加え、クラシック写真やヴィンテージ写真のような雰囲気を醸し出している。画像全体の雰囲気は、愛と愛情のひとつであり、2人の登場人物のロマンチックな瞬間の本質をとらえている。
artistString: minato feat. 初音ミク, 巡音ルカ
lyrics.ja.value:
か細い火が　心の端に灯る
いつの間にか燃え広がる熱情
私の蝶　不規則に飛び回り
あなたの手に鱗粉を付けた

絡み合う指ほどいて
唇から舌へと
許されない事ならば　尚更燃え上がるの

抱き寄せて欲しい　確かめて欲しい
間違いなど無いんだと　思わせて
キスをして　塗り替えて欲しい
魅惑の時に酔いしれ溺れていたいの

束縛して　もっと必要として
愛しいなら執着を見せつけて
「おかしい」のが　たまらなく好きになる
行けるトコまで行けばいいよ

迷い込んだ心なら
簡単に融けてゆく
優しさなんて感じる暇など　無い位に

繰り返したのは　あの夢じゃなくて
紛れも無い現実の私達
触れてから　戻れないと知る　それでいいの…
誰よりも大切なあなた

夜明けが来ると不安で　泣いてしまう私に
「大丈夫」と囁いたあなたも　泣いていたの？

抱き寄せて欲しい　確かめて欲しい
間違いなど無いんだと　思わせて
キスをして　塗り替えて欲しい　魅惑の時に
酔いしれ溺れたい

引き寄せて　マグネットのように
例えいつか離れても巡り会う
触れていて　戻れなくていい　それでいいの
誰よりも大切なあなた
lyrics.en.value:
A feeble fire is lit at the edge of my heart; 
without my knowing, it spreads into burning passion. 
My butterfly flapped about aimlessly, 
leaving behind some powder on your hand.

Pulling apart our intertwined fingers, 
moving from our lips to our tongues, 
what we're doing might be unforgivable, 
and that's precisely why we're so fired up.

I want you to embrace me closely and gauge my limit. 
Please make me believe that this is not a sin. 
I want you to kiss me and repaint my body. 
I want to be intoxicated and drowned in your charm.

It might be necessary for you to tied me up; 
if you love me, then show me some fidelity. 
I can't help but like "weird" things, 
so let's just go as far as we can go.

With a heart that has gone astray, 
we will melt so easily, 
that there's no free time for us 
even to feel each other's tenderness.

What has been repeating is not our dream, 
but the unmistakably realistic "we." 
I know as soon as we touch, we can't turn back, 
but that's fine, for you're my one and only love.

As dawn breaks, I become uneasy, 
and end up crying in tears. 
You whispered "It's okay" to me, 
but were you also crying?

I want you to embrace me closely and gauge my limit. 
Please make me believe that this is not a sin. 
I want you to kiss me and repaint my body. 
I want to be intoxicated and drowned in your charm.

Draw me closer, as if we are two magnets, 
that even if we separate, we will reunite again. 
Let's become one; it's okay not to able to turn back. 
That's fine, for you're my one and only love.

title: 【ルカ ミク グミ IA リン】威風堂々【オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a woman wearing a black and purple dress, standing in front of a mirror. She is wearing a black bra and panties, which are visible through the dress. The background of the image is a black wall, which adds a sense of depth and contrast to the scene. The woman appears to be posing for a photo, possibly for a fashion shoot or a personal photo album. The mood of the image is elegant and sophisticated, with the woman's attire and the black and purple color scheme creating a stylish and fashionable atmosphere.
introduction_ja: 黒と紫のドレスを着た女性が鏡の前に立っている。黒いブラとショーツを身に着けており、ドレスから透けて見える。背景は黒い壁で、このシーンに奥行きとコントラストを与えている。この女性は写真撮影のためにポーズをとっているように見えるが、おそらくファッション撮影か個人的な写真集のためのものだろう。画像の雰囲気はエレガントで洗練されており、女性の服装と黒と紫の配色がスタイリッシュでファッショナブルな雰囲気を醸し出している。
artistString: 梅とら feat. various
lyrics.ja.value:
時には噛んだりして　痛みを覚えさせて
溢れるエキタイで汚してよ　全部
足の先からずっと　這わせたその神経はもう
感触に溺れる　身体ココロを連れて

指くわえた我慢の中　欲してんのが理想？

いらない　全てはいらない　磨き上げてる邪魔なPRIDE
無意味な世界のルールくらい　無駄としか言い様がない
隠しているあなたのSTYLE　剥き出しにあるがままDIVE
そこに生まれるのは期待　外れなんかじゃない　頂のSMILE

吐息を合わせた相性　耳に吹きかける感情
破裂しそうな胸　騒ぎだす細胞
脱ぎかけてるシャツ　優しく裂いてよ　まず　かまわず
get フライングも有り　躊躇（ためら）わないで　darlin'

自由な世界のど真ん中　夢見てんのが本性？

いらない　全てはいらない　怖気（おじけ）づいた野望のTRY
満足なんてそこにない　目に見える哀れな未来
思い通りにできるLIFE　手にできるかはあなた次第
隠したりなんかはしない　誰よりも誇らしげにできるMIND

ホラこの世界の中 　 他にはない
確かなもの　自分以外は皆無

小さくなってる場合じゃない　いつだってNo Time! ALL RIGHT
上限値超え　エンジン全開でいっちゃえ　BURN BURN BURN
欲しがってんのはそう　気持ちいいの　more...
あるがままの想いでDANCE! 　 イイナリでGET DOWN!

いらない　全てはいらない　磨き上げてる邪魔なPRIDE
無意味な世界のルールくらい　無駄としか言い様がない
隠しているあなたのSTYLE　剥き出しにあるがままDIVE
そこに生まれるのは期待　外れなんかじゃない　頂のSMILE

ホラこの世界で今 　 解き放って
鋭くギラつかせた希望　もっと本気出していいよ
lyrics.en.value:
Bite down from time to time, let me remember what pain feels like
Stain my entirely with overflowing fluid
Drowning in the sensations made to run up from
the tips of my toes, my body and heart lead 

Having bitten down on a finger trying to bear it, what is desired is an ideal?

I do not need it, do not need it at all, a shined-up obtrusive PRIDE 
As for the rules of this meaningless world, it's pointless to describe them 
Your STYLE is hidden away, but you should DIVE in with it all laid bare
What hope is born, it's not a mistake, the smile and the peak 

Matching the pace of our breathing, feeling your breath on my ear 
A chest on the verge of exploding, going berserk cells 
First you should kindly rip off this shirt I'm taking off, no worries 
It's time to get flying, do not you dare hesitate DARLIN ' 

In the midst of doing as you please, what you're dreaming of, is it your true nature? 

I do not need it, do not need it at all, it's time to TRY that which you were scared to do 
Satisfaction is surely not there, in that clearly miserable future 
LIFE live as you please, making it your own depends on you 
Do not waste time hiding it, do what's on your mind more proudly than anyone 

In this world there's nothing else,
the only thing certain is yourself 

There's NO TIME to become small, ALL RIGHT? 
Cross your upper limits, engines full throttle and GO!  BURN BURN BURN 
What you want, yes it's to get more of that great feeling ... 
So DANCE like the way you feel right now, do as you're told and GET DOWN! 

I do not need it, do not need it at all, a shined-up obtrusive PRIDE 
As for the rules of this meaningless world, it's pointless to describe them 
Your STYLE is hidden away, but you should DIVE in with it all laid bare 
What hope is born, it's not a mistake, the smile and the peak 

Right now in this world let them out, your sharp, dazzling hopes 
You gotta let out your determination even more!

title: 【初音ミク＋IA】コノハの世界事情【オリジナルPV】
introduction: The background of the image is a green wall, which is the main focus of the image. The wall is covered with a large, green, graffiti-like text that reads "I love you." The text is written in a bold, black font, which contrasts with the green background. The overall mood of the image is one of love and affection, as the message "I love you" is displayed prominently on the wall. The image is likely meant to evoke emotions of love and appreciation, as the text is written in a large, visible manner.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景は緑色の壁。壁には、"I love you "と書かれた緑色の落書きのような大きな文字が書かれている。テキストは太字の黒いフォントで書かれており、背景の緑色とは対照的である。I love you "というメッセージが壁に大きく掲げられていることから、画像全体の雰囲気は愛と愛情に満ちている。この画像は、文字が大きく目に見えるように書かれていることから、愛と感謝の感情を呼び起こすことを意図しているのだろう。
artistString: じん feat. 初音ミク, IA
lyrics.ja.value:
意味と夢と命を集めて　作られてしまった身体は
終わった命を蒸し返す機械らしい
【これは彼の昔のお話】
人一人は涙を流して　また会いたいと呟いた

ハリボテの街の　終末実験は
昨日時点で予想通り　グダグダ過ぎて
その時点でもう諦めた方が良いでしょう？
次の二人は　街の隙間で　そんな水色の　夢見てた

期待ハズレの車線の先で
小さな身体はまた飛び散った
泣き叫ぶ少女を
目醒めない僕は見ていた

秒針は進みだすのを止めて
世界もろとも眩 (くら) みだそうとする
この夢は終わらない

意味と夢と事態を合わせて　ただただ考えてく頭
「この世界はどうやら少しヤバイらしい」
【これは彼と彼女のお話】
作られてしまった心では　もう言葉も届かない

枯れる太陽の音　蒸せる炎天下の目
夏バテした世間に　はじき出された様な
蝉の声がもう鳴り響き始めても
ユラユラ揺れる　透ける身体じゃ　伸ばした手も届かなくて

期待ハズレの視界の先で
秒針はふざけて立ち止まって
踏み潰される未来を
反対車線で見ていた

機械仕掛けの世界を抜けて
木の葉の落ちる未来の風景へと
君の目で

嗤 (わら) う日差しはどこかに消えて
8月は何度でも過ぎ去って
「また来年だね」と笑いあう
そんな未来なら？

期待ハズレの世界の隙間
予報外れの雨が降ってきた
その時に　その時に

例え未来が書き換わっていても
あの目は
lyrics.en.value:
This body, that was made by gathering up meaning and dreams and life, is like a machine that’s reanimating a life long gone

“This is the story of his past”
Each and every one of them shed tears
Murmuring, “I want to see you again”

The final experiment of this papier-mache town
Is continuing tediously, as predicted yesterday
Maybe I should’ve just given up at that point?
The next two people were dreaming a pale blue dream, seen through the gaps in the city

Where a traffic lane ended unexpectedly, his small body was sent flying again
I, who won’t wake up, was looking at the girl as she cried and screamed
As the second hand comes to a stop, the whole world is dazzled, this dream won’t end

Bringing together meaning and dreams and circumstances,
This head does nothing but think
“Seems like this world is kind of dangerous”

“This is the story of that boy and that girl”
With my artificially created heart, my words won’t reach them anymore

The sound of the withering sun and the gaze of the steaming, blazing heat seem to have pushed me out among the heat-fatigued populace
The voices of the cicadas start to ring out
But with this wavering, transparent body, my outstretched hand won’t reach them, either

Where my field of vision ended unexpectedly, someone messed with the second hand to make it stop
I saw the future get run over in the opposite lane
I’ll escape from this mechanical world, into a future scene where leaves fall with your eyes

Is there a future where the mocking rays of the sun go away and August ends again and again
And they can smile at each other and say, “see you next year?”
Where there was an unexpected gap in the world
It started to rain, though the forecast hadn’t predicted it
At that time, at that time

Even if the future could be rewritten
Those eyes

title: 命ばっかり / Flower･結月ゆかり - ぬゆり,アボガド6
introduction: The image depicts a scene of three people standing in a hallway, with two men standing on either side of a doorway, and a woman standing in the middle. The hallway is empty, and the atmosphere is somewhat eerie. The presence of the three people in the hallway, with the two men standing on either side of the doorway, creates a sense of anticipation or uncertainty. The mood of the image is somewhat mysterious and unsettling, as the viewer is left wondering what is happening or about to happen in the scene.
introduction_ja: 画像は廊下に3人が立っている場面を描いており、出入り口の両側に2人の男性、真ん中に女性が立っている。廊下には誰もおらず、どこか不気味な雰囲気が漂っている。廊下に3人がいること、出入り口の両側に2人の男性が立っていることが、期待感や不安感を生み出している。見る者は、このシーンで何が起こっているのか、あるいは起ころうとしているのか、不思議に思う。
artistString: ぬゆり feat. v flower
lyrics.ja.value:
日々を磨り潰していく貴方との時間は
　
簡単なことじゃ許せないくらいに

おかしくなってしまった　安心したいだけの

口先だけじゃ　いや



どこまでも単純だ　ここまでと悟った　
座り込んでもう歩けなくなる

最初だけじゃないなら　際限もないならば
どこへだって行けるはずさ




遠くへ 遠くへ 水の味を覚え

街路に目が眩み夜を越えてしまう

遠くへ 遠くへ 動けない僕のことを忘れて




知らないを知りたかった
　知り得ることはなかった

水圧で動けなくなっていく　また蝶の夢を見る

好きになりたかったんだ　好きになれなかったんだ

「正しい」を理想としていたら
　置いて行かれた
追いつけなくなったんだ




当たり前に過ぎていくはずだった時間は

何十年とも感じるほど長く

眠りすぎた頭痛で這い出してきた僕は

どこにももう行けやしないから



どこまでも純情だ　それでしかなかった

飾らないで　分かち合いたいから

貴方の影が眩む　見失ってしまった

また眠れない夜になっていく




「どうしたいの」なんて問えば「どうもしない」なんて返す

貴方はもう何も教えてくれないの

今日食べた食事も　行きたい場所さえもう

何にも　どれをとってもわからないだけだ



遠くへ 遠くへ 水の味を覚え

街路に目が眩み夜を越えてしまう

遠くへ 遠くへ 動けない僕のことを忘れて



貴方の横顔を見て引け目を感じてしまった

救われたいとだけ喚く僕はきっともう我楽多だ



思想犯はもう止めた
　「分かれない」を悟っていた

とりとめのない言葉だけでは
薄紙を剥がせない


普通に固執することが
　怖くてもう泣きそうだ

自堕落を鏡で見ていたら

薄っぺらだ

薄っぺらな僕だった



ぼくだ

僕だけだったんだ
lyrics.en.value:
The time I spend with you, grinding days to nothing
is such an easy thing to do, it became weird
to the point it’s unforgivable, I just want some peace of mind
empty words aren’t enough, no, no

I’m simple in every respect, I’ve realized that so far
I sit down and become unable to walk anymore

If it’s not only the beginning, if there are no limits
I should be able to go anywhere

Going far, far away, remembering the taste of water
On the streets, I feel dizzy and end up passing through the night
Going far, far away, forgetting about the me who’s stuck in place

I wanted to know about what I don’t know
But there was nothing to know

The pressure of water renders me unable to move, I dream of a butterfly once again
I wanted to like it, but I couldn’t like it

When I made “what is right” my ideal
I got left behind
and became unable to catch up to it

The time that was supposed to pass ordinarily
feels as long as decades
This is because I can’t go anywhere anymore
Me, who crawled out with a headache from sleeping too much

I’m pure-hearted in every respect, it’s all I could be
since I want to share my plain self
But your shadow is obscured and I ended up losing sight of it
This is going to be a sleepless night once again

When I ask “what do you want to do”, you retort “nothing at all”
You won’t tell me anything anymore
Today’s meal, even the place where I’d like to go
Anything, no matter what I choose, I just don’t know anymore

Going far, far away, remembering the taste of water
On the streets, I feel dizzy and end up passing through the night
Going far, far away, forgetting about the me who’s stuck in place

Looking at your profile, I felt so very small
I’m surely garbage now, me, who cries out that all I want is to be saved

I’ve given up on thought crimes
I’ve understood that “I can't understand”

I can’t tear off the thin paper
with only ramblings and meaningless words

Sticking to what’s considered normal
is so scary, I’m on the verge of crying

When I’m looking at my own depravity in the mirror
it’s shallow,
shallow,
so shallow,
That was the shallow me

That’s me
It’s me
It was me and only me

title: 【ＩＡ】想像フォレスト【オリジナルPV】
introduction: The image is a black and white photograph of a woman standing in a doorway, with a window visible behind her. The woman is wearing a white dress, which contrasts with the black and white color scheme. The scene appears to be a quiet and serene moment, with the woman standing still and looking out the window. The mood of the image is contemplative and peaceful, as the woman seems to be reflecting on something or simply enjoying the view from the window. The black and white color palette adds to the overall atmosphere of the image, creating a timeless and classic feel.
introduction_ja: 画像は、戸口に立つ女性のモノクロ写真で、背後には窓が見える。女性は白いドレスを着ており、黒と白の配色と対照的である。シーンは静かで穏やかな瞬間のように見え、女性はじっと立って窓の外を見ている。瞑想的で穏やかなムードで、女性は何かを思い返しているか、単に窓からの眺めを楽しんでいるように見える。黒と白の色調が画像全体の雰囲気を高め、時代を超越したクラシックな雰囲気を醸し出している。
artistString: じん feat. IA
lyrics.ja.value:
夏風がノックする
窓を開けてみると
何処からか　迷い込んだ鳥の声

読みかけの本を置き
「どこから来たんだい」と笑う
目隠ししたままの　午後三時です

世界は案外シンプルで
複雑に怪奇した
私なんて誰に理解もされないまま

街外れ、森の中、人目につかないこの家を
訪れる人など居ない訳で。

目を合わせないで！
固まった心、一人ぼっちで諦めて
目に映った　無機物（もの）に　安堵する日々は
物語の中でしか知らない
世界に少し憧れることくらい
許してくれますか？

淡々と流れ出した
生まれてしまった理不尽でも
案外人生なんで。
私の中じゃ。

ねぇねぇ、突飛な未来を
想像して膨らむ世界は
今日か明日でも
ノックしてくれないですか？

なんて妄想なんかして
外を眺めていると
突然に聴こえてきたのは喋り声

飲みかけのハーブティーを
机中に撒き散らし
「どうしよう…」
とドアの向こうを見つめました。

「目を合わせると石になってしまう」
それは両親に聞いたこと
私の目もそうなっている様で

物語の中なんかじゃいつも
怖がられる役ばかりで。
そんな事知ってる訳で。

トントン、と響きだした
ノックの音は初めてで
緊張なんてものじゃ
足りないくらいで。

ねぇねぇ、突飛な世界は
想像してるよりも
実に簡単にドアを
開けてしまうものでした。

目を塞ぎうずくまる姿に
その人は驚いて
「目を見ると石になってしまう」
と言うとただ笑った

「僕だって石になってしまうと
怯えて暮らしてた
でも世界はさ、案外怯えなくて
良いんだよ？」

タンタン、と鳴り響いた
心の奥に溢れてた
想像は世界に少し鳴り出して

ねぇねぇ、突飛な未来を
教えてくれたあなたが
また迷った時は
ここで待っているから。

夏風が今日もまた　あなたがくれた服の
フードを少しだけ　揺らしてみせた。
lyrics.en.value:
The summer breeze knocks,
And when I open up the window,
I hear the chirps of birds wandering from afar

I put a half-read book aside,
And say with a smile, "Where did you come from?"
With my blindfold still on, three in the afternoon...

The world is surprisingly simple,
But it's me who's bizarre,
With complication which no one ever understands...

Outside the town, in the forest, in this house beyond people's notice...
Yes, that's why none ever come to visit.

Don't make eye contact!
With a hardened heart, I resign to loneliness,
Living out my days seeing only "things"...
All I know are what's in stories,
And if I long for the world, just a bit,
Will you forgive me for it?

It faintly flowed along;
Even in this irrationality I was born into,
Surprisingly, there was life.
Somewhere inside me.

Tell me, won't that wide world
In which I imagine a wild future,
Whether it be today or tomorrow...
Won't it knock on my door?

As I was having such fantasies,
And gazing outside,
I suddenly heard someone speaking...

I knocked over my half-drunk herb tea,
Spilling it all over the desk
"What am I to do...?"
I thought, staring past the door.

"Look anyone in the eyes, and they'll turn to stone..."
That's what my parents had heard,
And it seemed my eyes were the same...

And the way that always goes in stories...
Well, such people are to be feared.
I knew that, and that's why.

A thumping sound echoed out,
The first knock I'd ever heard
And to say I was nervous...
It wouldn't be quite enough.

Let me say, that wild world
That I had imagined to knock...
In reality, it opened the door
Much more easily than I expected.

Finding me cowering, covering my eyes,
The person was surprised;
"If I look you in the eye... turn to stone..."
I stammered, but they just smiled

"I've been living afraid as well,
Afraid I'd turn to stone...
But wouldn't the world be so much better
Without that fear?"

Reverberating peacefully,
My heart overflowed with imagination,
And a bit of it rang out into the world...

And tell me, you who came to me
To teach me about a wild future...
That if I'm ever lost again,
You'll be here waiting for me.

The summer breeze comes again and blows the hood you gave me,
And I let it oh-so-gently sway in the wind.

title: 【めぐっぽいどオリジナル曲】ぼくらの１６ｂｉｔ戦争【ＰＶ】
introduction: The image features a young man wearing a yellow shirt and glasses, sitting in a chair and holding a cell phone. He is surrounded by a variety of objects, including a book, a cup, a bottle, and a remote control. The scene appears to be a casual setting, possibly in a living room or a similar environment. The man is likely engaged in a leisurely activity, such as watching a movie or browsing the internet, while holding the cell phone. The presence of the book and the cup suggests that he might be enjoying a drink or a snack while using his phone. The overall mood of the image is relaxed and comfortable, with the man seemingly content in his surroundings.
introduction_ja: 黄色いシャツに眼鏡をかけ、椅子に座って携帯電話を持っている青年。彼の周りには、本、コップ、ボトル、リモコンなど、さまざまなものが置かれている。このシーンは、おそらくリビングルームかそれに類する環境での、カジュアルなセッティングのように見える。男性は携帯電話を持ちながら、映画を見たり、インターネットを見たりしているようだ。本とカップがあることから、携帯電話を使いながら飲み物やスナックを楽しんでいるのかもしれない。画像の全体的な雰囲気はリラックスして心地よく、男性は周囲に満足しているように見える。

The text is surrounded by a grid-like pattern, which adds a geometric and abstract element to the scene. The overall mood of the image is minimalistic and modern, with a focus on the bold, white text and the grid-like pattern. The image could be interpreted as a statement or a creative expression, possibly related to the consumption of dairy products or the environment.

title: 【初音ミク】 サイハテ 【アニメ風PV・オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features a black and white cartoon character, possibly a girl, standing in a room. She is wearing a black shirt and a black tie, which gives her a formal appearance. The room appears to be empty, with no other visible objects or people. The character's pose and attire suggest a formal or professional setting, which could be a workplace, a business meeting, or a social event. The mood of the image is somewhat serious and formal, as the character is dressed in a formal attire and is standing alone in the room.
introduction_ja: 白黒の漫画のキャラクター（おそらく少女）が部屋に立っている。彼女は黒いシャツに黒いネクタイをしており、フォーマルな印象を与える。部屋には誰もおらず、他に見える物も人もいないように見える。この人物のポーズと服装は、職場、商談、社交的なイベントなど、フォーマルかプロフェッショナルな場を暗示している。キャラクターはフォーマルな服装で、部屋に一人で立っているので、画像の雰囲気はやや深刻でフォーマルです。
artistString: 小林オニキス feat. 初音ミク

title: 初音ミクオリジナル曲 「from Y to Y」
introduction: The image shows a close-up of a silver ring with a black stone in the center. The ring is placed on a white surface, which could be a table or a counter. The ring appears to be a simple and elegant piece of jewelry, with a black stone as its centerpiece. The mood of the image is serene and peaceful, as the ring is placed on a white surface, which suggests a calm and clean environment. The ring itself is a simple and elegant design, which adds to the overall mood of the image.
introduction_ja: 画像は、中央に黒い石のついたシルバーリングのクローズアップ。リングはテーブルかカウンターと思われる白い面に置かれている。リングはシンプルでエレガントなジュエリーのように見え、黒い石がその中心になっている。リングが白い表面に置かれていることから、画像の雰囲気は静謐で穏やかである。リング自体もシンプルでエレガントなデザインで、それが画像全体のムードを高めている。

With your back turned to me, you’re walking away
without a single word between us.
Inside my tumultuous heart, I cried out like a little child—
don’t go, don’t go, please…

With my back turned to you, I’m walking away.
I’ve got to get out of here before my tears threaten to fall.
I don’t want too much happiness—or so I pretended,
and in my stubbornness, I’ve let go of the future I idealized.
It is now but an impossibly hopeless dream.

This cramped studio apartment now feels a little too big,
it only serves to widen up the hollow in my heart.
A mere minute, or even second, now feels a little too long.

If only I could be with you, within this dilated time…

Or is this such a cruel world that I may not even wish for that?
Just a small, little lie is all it takes
to make tears fill your eyes.
Many indeed are the sins I’ve committed,
touching your hand with mine,
hoping to live on, quietly, by your side.

With each new memory we make in the present, we must give up one from the past,
for there’s only so much time in one’s life, and only so many memories we can hold.
Thus, seeing as I was but a stagnant presence in your life,
I’m sure I’m going to vanish from your memory someday.

Can we no longer go back to the way we were?
Is this a new beginning? Or is it simply the end?

The night seems to go on forever as I sleep in this bed that’s become too large,
and alone, I shall dream again—
a dream where I follow the course of your memory.
Many indeed are the sins I’ve committed,
touching your hand with mine,
hoping to live on, quietly, by your side.

I shall atone for them all with the agony of my solitude,
so please, allow me to live a quiet existence in your memory.

How wonderful it would be if we could come across each other again, with our feelings unchanged,
and then let’s hold hands;
but until the time comes,
“See you again.”

title: 【初音ミク】Nyanyanyanyanyanyanya!【オリジナループ】
introduction: The image is a simple drawing of a cat with a bow on its head, drawn in a minimalistic style. The background is a plain, yellow color, which creates a simple and minimalistic atmosphere. The mood of the image is playful and lighthearted, as the cat's bow adds a touch of cuteness and charm to the drawing. The output of the image is a black and white sketch, which emphasizes the simplicity and focus on the cat's design.
introduction_ja: ミニマルなスタイルで描かれた、頭にリボンをつけた猫のシンプルな絵です。背景は黄色の無地で、シンプルでミニマルな雰囲気を醸し出しています。猫のリボンがかわいらしさと愛らしさを添えているので、画像の雰囲気は遊び心のある明るいものになっています。画像の出力は白黒のスケッチで、シンプルさと猫のデザインへの集中を強調している。
artistString: daniwell feat. 初音ミク

title: 【VY1】サイバーサンダーサイダー【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The background of this image is a black and white photo of a large, empty room with a black and white pattern on the floor. The room appears to be a large, open space with no furniture or other objects. The mood of the image is somewhat eerie and mysterious, as the empty room and the black and white pattern on the floor create a sense of emptiness and solitude. The output of this image is a black and white photo of the empty room with the black and white pattern on the floor.
introduction_ja: この画像の背景は、床に黒と白の模様が描かれた、広くて何もない部屋の白黒写真である。部屋は家具も何もない広々とした空間に見える。空の部屋と床の白黒模様が虚無感と孤独感を醸し出しているため、画像の雰囲気はやや不気味でミステリアスである。この画像の出力は、何もない部屋と床の白黒模様の白黒写真である。

title: 【GUMI】十面相【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The background of the image is a blue sky, which creates a serene and peaceful atmosphere. The main focus of the image is a large, colorful, and cartoon-like building with a smiling face. The building is made of various shapes and colors, including a blue roof, a yellow door, and a red window. The building appears to be a playful and cheerful structure, which adds a sense of joy and playfulness to the scene. The overall mood of the image is lighthearted and inviting, making it a visually appealing and enjoyable view for the viewer.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景は青空で、穏やかで平和な雰囲気を醸し出している。画像の主役は、笑顔の大きなカラフルな漫画のような建物である。この建物は、青い屋根、黄色いドア、赤い窓など、さまざまな形と色でできている。この建物は遊び心にあふれた陽気な建造物に見え、シーンに喜びと遊び心を添えている。画像の全体的な雰囲気は明るく魅力的で、見る者に視覚的な魅力と楽しさを与えている。
artistString: YM feat. GUMI

title: 【鏡音レン】聖槍爆裂ボーイ【オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a black and white photo of a boy sitting on a chair in a room. The room appears to be a living room, as there is a couch in the background. The boy is sitting on the chair, which is placed in front of a television. The room is dimly lit, creating a somewhat gloomy atmosphere. The boy appears to be watching the television, possibly engaging in a leisure activity or simply waiting for something to happen. The mood of the image is somewhat melancholic, as the dim lighting and the boy's solitary presence in the room create a sense of loneliness or contemplation.
introduction_ja: 画像は、部屋の中で椅子に座る少年のモノクロ写真。背景にソファがあることから、部屋はリビングルームのようだ。少年はテレビの前に置かれた椅子に座っている。部屋は薄暗く、どこか陰鬱な雰囲気を醸し出している。少年はテレビを見ているように見えるが、おそらく余暇活動をしているか、単に何かが起こるのを待っているのだろう。薄暗い照明と少年が部屋に一人でいることで、孤独感や思索が醸し出され、画像の雰囲気はややメランコリックである。

The overall mood of the image is dark and eerie, with the woman's glowing eyes and the presence of the knife creating a sense of tension and unease. The background color and the woman's attire contribute to the mysterious and unsettling atmosphere of the scene.

I-I-I hate you, what is wrong?
 
So much I-I-I hate you, w-w-w-w-what is wrong?
You’re still frivolous, while I’m noble
I drag you across the dry floor
 
Without you, I would be a goddess now!
 
Top secret, an urge running in my lungs burns my throat
Secret, secret, before long, aaaaaaaaa
Don’t come out!
 
I-I-I hate you, w-w-w-w-what is wrong?
Your existence gives me pain, pain!
Right, right, I agree, it’s exactly as you said
I overcome the peak and fall back down
 
I-I-I hate you, w-w-w-w-what is wrong?
Those who pin no-no hopes on me, w-w-w-w-what is wrong?
 
‘Twill get nowhere!
I-I-I hate you, w-w-w-w-what is wrong?
Without you, I’d be no more
Right, right, I agree, it’s exactly as you said
If it passes through the throat, it is the truth!
 
A-a-a-a, a place where I belong
A-a-a-a, I’m being led there
A-a-a-a, at the pit of the abyss,
I-I-I hate you, w-w-w-w-what is wrong?!

title: 【初音ミク】オレンジ【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image is a black and white photograph of an old train car sitting on a dirt road. The train car is positioned on the left side of the image, with a small building visible in the background. The overall mood of the image is nostalgic and evokes a sense of history and simplicity. The black and white color scheme adds to the timeless and classic feel of the image, while the train car and the building create a sense of a bygone era. The image is likely to evoke emotions of curiosity, longing, and a connection to the past.
introduction_ja: 画像は、未舗装の道路に置かれた古い鉄道車両のモノクロ写真。車両は画像の左側に位置し、背景には小さな建物が見える。画像全体の雰囲気はノスタルジックで、歴史と素朴さを感じさせる。黒と白の配色が時代を超越したクラシックな雰囲気を醸し出し、車両と建物が過ぎ去った時代の雰囲気を醸し出している。このイメージは、好奇心、憧れ、過去とのつながりといった感情を呼び起こすだろう。
artistString: トーマ feat. 初音ミク Append (Sweet)
lyrics.ja.value:
君のいる世界で笑ったこと、 
君の見る未来を恨んだこと、 
君の声、温もり、態度、愛のすべてが

海街、赤錆びた線路沿い 
二人、「幸せだ」って嘘ついて 
くしゃくしゃに笑う顔、繋いだ手 
遠くの島、朝焼け

愛しきれない君のこと、 
つられて泣く私も弱いこと、 
代わりなんてないって、特別だって 
許し合えた日も

もう二人に明日がないことも 
ただ、ずっと。そう、ずっと 
隠してしまおう。 
残される君に届く　ただひとつを 
今でも、探してる。

「元気でいますか。」 
「笑顔は枯れてませんか。」 
「他の誰かを深く深く、愛せていますか。」 
ずっと来るはずない君との日を願ったこと 
鍵かけて。

三日月島、陰る渚鳥 
ツタに飾られた教会裏で 
また子供じみた約束しては 
逃げ出す話をしよう。

誰も満たされないよりも 
望んだ最後だけを温める 
怖い夢を見ただけの私に 
そうであったように。

許すだけでも、耐え抜くだけでも 
ただ、きっと。そう、きっと 
誰も変われないこと。 
傷付けない弱さが生きられないほど 
大きく育ったの。

覚えていますか、 
初めて会ったことも、 
君の嘘も、甘えも、弱さも、流してゆくような 
この朝焼けで　あの日のように君はまた 
素敵に変わってゆく

愛を歌った　大地を蹴った 
今、「最低だ」って殺した最後も 
不完全だって不確かになって 
ほら蹴っ飛ばして、ないや。 
歳月が巡って　声を辿って 
また生まれ変わったら 
真っ先に君に会いに行こう。

愛していました。 
最後まで、この日まで。 
それでも終わりにするのは私なのですか、 
君の幸せな未来を、ただ、願ってる。

君のいる世界で笑ったこと、 
君の見る未来を恨んだこと、 
君の声、温もり、態度、愛のすべてに

さよなら。
lyrics.en.value:
The fact that I laughed in the world in which you lived is,
The fact that I cursed the future which you saw is,
Your voice, warmth, behavior and all of your love is

In the streets by the sea, we stepped along the railroad rusted red and
the two of us lied to each other, “we’re happy”
You smiled gloomily, and we fastened our hands together,
watching the faraway island, a brilliant sky with morning glow

The fact that I cannot love you enough,
the fact that the weak I cried along with you
these things won’t ever be replaced, they’re special.
The day we could forgive each other is too

And the fact that the two of us cannot meet as tomorrow comes,
let’s hide these facts forever, yes, forever,
let’s hide them away forever
Even now, I’m still searching for the one thing
that will reach the you who will be left behind

“Are you doing well?”
“Has your smile withered off your face yet?”
“Are now you able to fall deeply, deeply in love with someone?”
I locked away my wish to spend my days together with you who will never come with a key

Crescent moon island, and clouded birds by the water’s edge,
Behind the church decorated with ivy,
let’s again make a childish promise to run away

More than both of us being unsatisfied,
I’ll only warm up the conclusion which we wished for
To the me who only saw nightmares, that was how it seemed

Even just forgiving, even just sticking it out ‘till the end is, surely, yes, surely, is certainly what no one can change
My fear of hurting you grew so strong that I cannot live any longer

Do you still remember?
When we first met, your lies, your dependency on others and your weakness were as if they were being washed away
In this morning glow, you are once again, just like that day, becoming lovely

We sang of love and we kicked the earth
While saying, “this is the worst,” even the ending by suicide was incomplete and became unreliable
Hey, kick it hard and it’ll be gone

A year will pass, follow a voice if you are ever reborn, then let me go meet you immediately
I loved you
Until the end, until this day
Even so, am I the one who shall end everything?
I only wish that you’ll, one day, be happy

To the fact that I laughed in the world in which you lived,
To the fact that I cursed the future which you saw,
To your voice, warmth, behavior and all of your love

Goodbye to it all

title: 【オリジナル曲】リンネ【初音ミク】
introduction: The image features a woman with a red background, wearing a black shirt and holding her hand to her mouth. She appears to be in a contemplative or thoughtful state, possibly expressing a sense of sadness or concern. The red background adds a vibrant and energetic touch to the scene, contrasting with the woman's emotional state. The overall mood of the image is one of introspection and emotional depth, with the woman's facial expression and body language conveying a sense of introspection and contemplation.
introduction_ja: 赤い背景、黒いシャツを着て口に手を当てている女性が描かれている。彼女は瞑想的か思慮深い状態にあるように見え、おそらく悲しみや心配の気持ちを表現しているのだろう。背景の赤がシーンに活気とエネルギッシュなタッチを加え、女性の感情状態とは対照的である。画像全体の雰囲気は、内省的で感情的な深みのあるもので、女性の表情と身振りが内省と熟考の感覚を伝えている。
artistString: ハチ feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
黒い山羊が呟いた
「白線よりお下がりよ
鈍色電車通り去って」

隣りで猫が問い掛けた
「アナタは何処に向かうんだい
ここらも直に死んじまって」

赤の手首携えて
私一人　ふわり根無し草
錆びた水を飲み込んで
次の駅

またどうか　どうか愛を
帰りの電車は何処にも無いわ
教えてダアリン　ダアリン　ねえダアリン
声が聞こえたような気がした

枯れた花は呟いた
「感情がない、感情がない、
心は憂い夕を吐いて」

蝉の泣いて墜ちる頃
電線が裂いた赤の下
立入禁止　蹴っ飛ばして
猛り影がドロドロと零れ出す

「見えない」と泣いて泣いて
私の想いを探しているわ
教えてダアリン　ダアリン　ねえダアリン
鳴らぬ電話の命は何処へ

茹る茹る環状線
ここには無い　ここに終点は無い
左　左　右で鳴る
踏切りの音　カンカラリンドウ

カラスは言う　カラスは言う
「あの頃にはきっと戻れないぜ」
「君はもう大人になってしまった」

またどうか　どうか愛を
終わらない輪廻を
千切っておくれ

さよならダアリン　ダアリン　ねえダアリン
あの日私は大人になった

絶えず想う　二人一人
暮れ落ちた言葉は取り返せずに
さよならダアリン　ダアリン　ねえダアリン
クルクル回る環状線を
「一人憐れに歩めや少女」
lyrics.en.value:
A black goat whispered, 
"It's lowlier than the white line
Catch the dark gray train!"

A cat beside asked, 
"Where are you headed? 
You're soon to die around here!"

Holding my red wrist, 
I'm alone, wandering, a rootless weed 
I drink down stale water 
For the next station

Once again, love me, however you can 
There's no train back anywhere to be found 
Tell me, darlin', darlynne, darlin' 
I felt I heard a voice, or so I thought

A wilted flower whispered, 
"No feeling, no feeling, 
Heart speaking of gloomy evenings"

When the cicadas' cries went away, 
The line split, red and downward 
No entry, kicked away

The wild shadows slowly come 
Spilling out

"I can't see," I cry, I cry 
I'm just searching for my thoughts 
Tell me, darlin', darlynne, darlin' 
Where does the life of an unringing phone go?

The boiling, seething belt line 
There's nothing here, there's no last stop 
Sounding on the left, the left, the right 
The sound of a railway crossing, kan-kara-rindo

The crows speak, the crows speak, 
"You know you can't ever go back to then!" 
"You've already become an adult"

Once again, love me, however you can 
Take this never-ending lifelynne, and cut it into pieces 
Goodbye, darlin', darlynne, darlin' 
On that day, I became an adult

I constantly think, together, alone, 
Never being able to take back the words I've lost 
Goodbye, darlin', darlynne, darlin' 
And 'round and 'round the belt line I go
"Have pity, and go on foot, girl”

Whispering in my ear, a black goat approached 
"This one's lowly, not the white line! 
Make sure you're able to catch the gray train!"

Afterward, from beside, a cat questioned me
"Where on earth do you think you're headed, girl? 
Stick around too long, you're sure to die soon!"

Clenching my red wrist, finding little support, 
I'm alone, wandering, a weed that's been robbed of its roots 
I drink down tasteless water to quench my thirst 
Come next terminal

I beg your love, once more, any way, 
For the only train going back is forever delayed 
Can't you tell me, darlin', darlynne, darlin'? 
I could swear I heard you say, naught, to my dismay

Wilted and colorless, a flower whispered, 
"Feelings are gone, feelings are gone, 
And the heart speaks sadly of gloomy evenings"

When the cicadas' cries' time came to fade, 
Then the line split, was running down red 
Dead end, no entry, and I'm just kicked away

The raging shadows looming, slowly but sure, 
They come spilling out

"I can't see a thing," I sob, I cry 
Searching desperate for my own thoughts, to know what to live by 
Can't you tell me, darlin', darlynne, darlin'? 
When your phone will never ring, down what track does your life head?

The boiling, the seething, the looping belt line 
Here there is nothing, most surely, there's no last stop in sight
The left side, the left side, sounding on the right 
The sound when railways cross, kan-kara-rindo

The crows caw out, the crows caw out, 
"You know, as much as you wish, you just can't go back to then!" 
"The time has passed, it's too late now; now, you're an adult”

I beg your love, once more, anyway, 
This lifelynne may not have an end, but divide it, day by day 
Time for farewell, darlin', darlynne, darlin' 
As that day's fateful result, you grew me to an adult

And I constantly think, together or just me, 
Although words that I've already lost, they will forever be 
Time for farewell, darlin', darlynne, darlin' 
'Round and 'round I'll have to ride, down the belt line I go
"Just have mercy on yourself, and go onward on foot, girl”

title: Alice in 冷凍庫 / feat.IA
introduction: The image depicts a woman in a white dress walking through a city street, surrounded by a large number of buildings. The buildings are made of various colors, creating a visually striking and vibrant scene. The woman appears to be walking towards the camera, and her presence adds a sense of movement and life to the scene. The overall mood of the image is energetic and lively, as the woman's presence and the colorful buildings create a dynamic atmosphere.

lyrics.ja.value:

だぁ だぁ

朝靄を空に裂いた 君のその柔い手が

The woman's pose and the sword in her hand suggest a strong and powerful presence. The background adds a sense of depth and intrigue to the scene, making it visually appealing and engaging. The mood of the image is intense and dramatic, with the woman's fierce expression and the sword in her hand creating a strong visual impact.
introduction_ja: 赤いドレスを着て剣を持つ女性。彼女は赤い背景の前に立っており、ドラマチックで強烈な雰囲気を醸し出している。女性のポーズと手にした剣が、強く力強い存在感を示している。背景がこのシーンに奥行きと陰謀感を与え、視覚的に魅力的で魅力的なものにしている。女性の激しい表情と手にした剣が強い視覚的インパクトを与え、画像のムードは激しくドラマチックである。

The image has a dark and mysterious mood, with the girls' poses and the red background creating a sense of intrigue and drama. title: 【初音ミク】エンヴィキャットウォーク【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features a black and white cartoon-like drawing of a girl with a cat's head and a cat's tail. The girl is standing in a cityscape, which includes a tall building and a few other buildings in the background. The scene is set in a nighttime atmosphere, with the city lights illuminating the buildings and the sky. The overall mood of the image is playful and whimsical, with the girl's unique appearance and the urban setting creating an interesting and imaginative atmosphere.
introduction_ja: この画像は、猫の頭と猫のしっぽを持った少女の白黒の漫画のような絵が特徴である。少女は街並みの中に佇んでおり、背景には高いビルと他のいくつかのビルがある。シーンは夜の雰囲気で、街の明かりがビルと空を照らしている。画像全体の雰囲気は、遊び心と気まぐれさがあり、少女のユニークな外見と都会的な設定が、興味深く想像力豊かな雰囲気を作り出している。
songTitle: エンヴィキャットウォーク

lyrics.en.value:
Avenue 3 in a formerly neon city. The hidden part of the alley, a cat, logic and craving  
I want the paranoia to look over its shoulder to me, decorated nightly with a nail  
Style, good looks, a dream, scrambling. The bandit song of tender passion  
High-handed and falling. Come, with a tail, it's the beauty of allure  

Similar fates, instinct, differences. Flattery with scales, a favor for sale  
"Stay with me?" A worthless vow. I'm offering you a revelation.  
Gimme a disguise-like feeling, aphrodisiacs blended in gloss, a masquerade  
Learn of the honeyed lies, lula-lila  

Pay me, an uneasy twinkle, Venus  
Dance with the captivating flow  
I'll buy up your weekend night and test you out with the string of fate. Again, again, again  

To the reason for love, it's a cat dance, baby. Wisely and obediently, to love,  
beckon in the misery, passion's guilty mystery  
Confrontation, hysteria, the unconditionality built up by sympathy  
Blind irony  

A disguised car horn, surrounded by brainwashing, A fanfare in a rain of perfume  
Dishonest expectation in the dead of night, An overflowing incentive  
A lollipop that won't bloom, a night light, The truth of love  
 "This scenario that struck anesthetic... come on already."  

Twins, mutual love, selfish greed, potentiality, adaptation Smoke&Love&Love  
A habit of credulity, pleasure, a contagious illness  
Somehow, with happiness.  

How many? Blackout envy. To the lies of the moon that returned and left again  
Life-sized feelings that yearn without you  
The fruits of life slashed away on a pure-hearted stage  
Why not just put it to an end?  

If the world disappeared, I disappeared,  
And your right of ownership vanished as well,  
then after I thoroughly loved you, I'd throw you away.  
It began with Adam and Eve, and it ends here  
Now, come on, it's the forbidden fruit.  

It's a cat dance, baby. Wisely and obediently, to love,  
beckon in the misery, passion's guilty mystery  
Having depended on romantic love, together in this room,  
let's welcome morning.

The overall mood of the image is playful and lighthearted, with the girl enjoying her time on the chair and interacting with her phone.
