introduction: The image features a black and white illustration of a young girl with a pink bow in her hair. She is holding a pink axe, which is a unique and interesting choice of weapon. The background of the image is a pink wall, which adds a touch of color to the scene. The overall mood of the image is mysterious and intriguing, as the girl's choice of weapon and the pink wall create an interesting contrast. The image could be interpreted as a scene from a story or a character design for a video game or anime.

title: 転生林檎 / 初音ミク
introduction: The image features a young girl with long hair, wearing a black shirt and holding a red apple in her hand. She is looking at the camera, giving a serious expression. The background of the image is a white wall, which provides a clean and simple backdrop for the main subject. The overall mood of the image is serious and thoughtful, as the girl appears to be contemplating the red apple in her hand.
introduction_ja: 黒いシャツを着て、赤いリンゴを手にした髪の長い少女。真剣な表情でカメラを見つめている。背景は白い壁で、被写体をすっきりとシンプルに見せている。少女が手にした赤いリンゴについて考えているように見えるので、画像全体の雰囲気は真剣で思慮深い。

lyrics.en.value:
I hate my ordinary self, I despise my colorless life
I took a mouthful of a suspicious apple that I bought from a shady dealer
All the shrewd wannabes are doing it, I can be reborn as someone meaningful
with this reincarnation apple

I became an artist, from the whole world I was praised
I was special, everyone else ordinary, in my talent I was befuddled and amazed
But I lacked the gift to love, and my beloved others abandoned me
Oh, I screwed up again, I’m gonna reincarnate

I became an inventor, I created the invention of the century
“Please bring peace to the world”, I prayed truly and sincerely
But my invention was weaponized, a cruel rain of blood it created
Oh, I screwed up again, I’m gonna reincarnate

I don’t have any talent, just change and reset
I’m not smart enough, just change and reset
Strategies to win in life, surefire guide to feel elate
How imprudent, did your “selfhood” evaporate?

Again and again, reborn and reborn
Dancing on a mountain of corpses
Reincarnation, grievous cry of reincarnation
Love me, love me, no
Again and again, reborn and reborn
The same characterless stories are sparkling
Reincarnation, overkill at the end of endless reincarnations
Why, oh why

I became a savior, unconditional love I gave to all
Worshiped and respected by the people, young and old I would enthrall
But I was too innocent, evil deceived me and to the bare bones they ate
Oh, I screwed up again, I’m gonna reincarnate

I became a revolutionary, I despised the lip service and deceit
I questioned and fought in a world where the honest always faced defeat
But I was consumed by my power and even peace I cremated
Oh, I screwed up again, I’m gonna reincarnate

I’m not popular, just change and reset
I don’t have a great cause, just change and reset
A slave to pleasure, the ghost of a highbrow smartass
Even in another world, reality was just as lame

Again and again, reborn and reborn
Historyless and uneducated? I’m sorry
Reincarnation, reincarnation’s grievous cry
Love me, love me, no
Again and again, reborn and reborn
A love story that always fails, a thousand times and more
Reincarnation, overkill at the end of endless reincarnations
Why, oh why

I became an adventurer, I set out in search of an ideal
Everyone marveled at me as I took on the most challenging ordeal
But my ideals went to the extreme, innocent lives I sacrificed
Oh, oh, not again? What destination will suffice?

Again and again, reborn and reborn
Dancing on a mountain of corpses
Reincarnation, grievous cry of reincarnation
Love me, love me, no
Reincarnation apple, reborn with the reincarnation apple
Reincarnation apple, learning the limits with the reincarnation apple
Reincarnation apple, the end has come with the reincarnation apple
Why, oh why

Oh, my reincarnation is over, I'm back to my ordinary self
I’m sad but I breathe a sigh of relief, where should I go from here
Everyone quits once they’re sober, a sense of self, we become mindful
Straight into the trash, the reincarnation apple

title: 阿吽のビーツ / flower
introduction: The image is a black and white painting of a man and a woman standing in a room. The man is holding a sword, and the woman is holding a fan. The room is filled with smoke, creating a mysterious and dramatic atmosphere. The man and woman are the main subjects of the painting, and they are the focus of the viewer's attention. The mood of the image is tense and suspenseful, as the man and woman seem to be in a moment of conflict or confrontation. The smoke adds an element of uncertainty and intrigue to the scene, making the viewer wonder about the story behind the painting.
introduction_ja: 画像は、部屋の中に立っている男女の白黒の絵である。男は剣を持ち、女は扇子を持っている。部屋には煙が充満し、ミステリアスでドラマチックな雰囲気を醸し出している。男と女がこの絵の主役であり、見る者の注目の的である。画像の雰囲気は緊張とサスペンスに満ちており、男女は葛藤や対立の瞬間にいるように見える。煙はこの場面に不確実性と陰謀の要素を加え、見る者にこの絵の背後にある物語について考えさせる。
artistString: 羽生まゐご feat. v flower
lyrics.ja.value:
みんなどっか行っちゃったよ 
零になっちゃってざまぁないね 
信じてたいから声に出すのはやめた 
愛されたいのはどうして？ 
愛してたいのはどうして？ 
飾りあって　分かち合っていた

私 
曖昧さ故にシンパシー 
大胆不敵なセンソリー

僕は 
明快さ故にアイロニー 
優柔不断なフォローミー 
後悔後悔夜の果て 
夢ばかり見てたのね 
だから与え与えすぎて 
許されたいから笑ってた 
そしたら「此処に居られる気がしたんだ」

貴方に捧げた心臓 
いつか返して　優しくしてね 
本当は戻りたいんだ
今からでいいから
 
僕ら 
ずっとこれからだったのに 
どんまいどんまい 
二人には素晴らしい結末さ
だから与え与えられて 
言葉を探すことはなくて 
それでも貴方から言って欲しかった

「ずっとこれからだったのに」
 
それでも

「貴方から言ってくださいね」

title: 【音街ウナの】 キライ・キライ・ジガヒダイ！
introduction: The background of this image is a blue sky, which creates a serene and peaceful atmosphere. The foreground features a comic book with a black and white cover, showcasing a woman with a large hat and a man with a large nose. The mood of the image is lighthearted and humorous, as the characters' exaggerated features and the comic book setting suggest a playful and entertaining atmosphere. The output of the image is a digital copy of the comic book cover, which can be shared or viewed on a digital device.
introduction_ja: 背景は青空で、穏やかで平和な雰囲気を醸し出している。前景には、大きな帽子をかぶった女性と大きな鼻をした男性が登場する白黒の表紙のコミック本が描かれている。登場人物の大げさな特徴とコミック本の設定が、遊び心と娯楽性を示唆しているため、画像の雰囲気は明るくユーモラスである。画像の出力は、コミックの表紙のデジタル・コピーで、デジタル・デバイスで共有したり、見たりすることができる。
songTitle: キライ・キライ・ジガヒダイ！
artistString: 和田たけあき feat. 音街ウナ Spicy
lyrics.ja.value:
あたしあの子なんか大嫌い！ 優しいフリして

lyrics.en.value:
You see, I hate that girl! She just pretends to be nice
Does she think I don’t notice? How she looks as me as if I’m trash!
You see, I hate that popular girl! She only cares about things that are trending, speaking like an expert even though she’s so flaky, so shallow, shallow, shallow

I’m different, in that respect! Look, I’m so unique!
I’m not like her, but, but, but, but, but!

Ah! I want to be loved! I want to be loved! Even more than her!
I’ve gotten so big! Come on, look at me!
Ah! I want to be praised! I want to be praised! I know how to do it
I’ll just have to do the same thing she did to me, crushing the trash under my feet, right?

minding each other’s mood, yet they completely ignore me

I’m different from you all! I have my own ego!
I’m not a side character, come on, come on, look over here!

Ah! I want to be loved! I want to be loved! More than anyone else!
I’ve gotten this big! I won’t let you ignore me!
Hey! I want to be praised! I want to be praised! Is it still not enough?
I’m so special and unique, I’ve got to make myself more understood!

I hate it, hate it! My ego is huge, but no one would look at me
I don’t care, even if they think I have zero common sense, I’m special

It’s not my fault, but but but but but

Ah, I want to be forgiven, I want to be forgiven
I’m left all alone, and I’ve gotten this big, see see, see

Ah! I want to be loved! I want to be loved! More than anyone else!
I’ve gotten this big! Tell me, what should I do?
Ah! I want to be praised! I want to be praised! Where is everyone?
Now I’m the only one left in this world, I can’t even tell my own face anymore!

title: 【初音ミクSoft】　ハロ／ハワユ　【オリジナル】
introduction: The image depicts a simple bedroom with a bed, a nightstand, and a lamp. The room is dimly lit, creating a cozy and intimate atmosphere. The bed is neatly made, and there are a few books on the nightstand. The lamp provides a soft light, which adds to the warm and inviting ambiance of the room. The overall mood of the image is serene and peaceful, suggesting a comfortable and relaxing space for rest and leisure.
introduction_ja: ベッド、ナイトテーブル、ランプが置かれたシンプルな寝室。部屋は薄暗く、居心地の良い親密な雰囲気を醸し出している。ベッドはきちんと整えられ、ナイトテーブルには本が数冊置かれている。ランプは柔らかな明かりを灯し、部屋の温かく魅力的な雰囲気を高めている。画像全体の雰囲気は穏やかで平和的で、休息とレジャーのための快適でリラックスした空間を示唆している。
artistString: ナノウ feat. 初音ミク Append (Soft)

サンキュー　ありがとうって言いたいの

なんて面倒くさい生き物でしょう　人間というのは

lyrics.en.value:
Hello - I opened the window, and softly whispered out
How are you? There's no one here, I'm alone in the room
Mornin' - The morning's come, a morning of pouring rain
Tick-tock - Somebody, wind up my coil...

Hello - In an old anime, that was how it was
How are you - So enviable, everyone being loved
Sleepin' - Don't say anything stupid, I have to prepare
Cryin' - To hide the traces of my tears

Now...

My favorite phrase is "fine, who cares"
Suddenly, yesterday's words come to mind
"Well, I don't have any hope for you anymore..."

And well, but, I...
I don't have any hope for myself,
But just what did you mean to say that for, I ask?

Words have come up to the throat,
But all that comes out the mouth is lies
So today, once again, I'm precious
Wasting my words, I live on...

Why hide away, I ask?
Is it so scary to laugh, I ask?
Do you not want to see anyone, I ask?
Is that the truth, I ask?

Cast down in a sea of ambiguity,
It's too painful for me to even breathe
Now, I just want to hear the slightest voice
I'm really so weak...

Amid preparing to proceed not at all,
I think in my dim head,
"Should we just take a break from giving reasons to things now?"

No, no, I understand, I say
I just tried to say whatever I could
I understand, so please don't get mad

Happiness, perhaps, unhappiness, perhaps
Equally, cruelly,
The morning sun rises

Just living on,
Me, with all my might,
More than this, what do I wish for...?

Why worry about it, I ask?
Do you really want to be loved, I ask?
Who was it that took away their hand, I ask?
Do you notice, I ask?

If life had a time card,
What would be my ending time?
And the wages for my hours alive...
Who's going to pay them, I ask?

Thank you - I just want to say thanks
Thank you - I just want to say thanks
Thank you - Just once would be fine
So from the bottom of my heart, weeping away, I just want to say thanks...!

Why hide away, I ask?
Do you really want to listen, I ask?
You've never smiled or laughed,
So I ask, can't we try to talk?

If you don't open your mouth, I don't know;
What you're thinking doesn't get told
Such troublesome creatures, aren't we?
It's just being human...

Hello, how are you?
Hello, how are you?
Hello, how are you?
So I ask you: hello, how are you?

The scene appears to be a playful and energetic moment, as the girl is running and the ducks are chasing her. The mood of the image is lighthearted and fun, as the girl seems to be enjoying her time outdoors with the ducks.

introduction: The image features a young girl with long hair, wearing a red dress and a white shirt. She is standing in front of a black background, which creates a contrasting effect. The girl appears to be crying, as she is holding a tissue in her hand. The overall mood of the image is one of sadness and emotional distress. The girl's facial expression and the presence of the tissue suggest that she is experiencing a difficult moment in her life. The black background and the red dress create a visually striking composition, emphasizing the girl's emotions and the overall atmosphere of the image.
introduction_ja: 赤いドレスに白いシャツを着たロングヘアの少女。彼女は黒い背景の前に立っており、それがコントラスト効果を生み出している。少女はティッシュを手に持って泣いているように見える。画像全体の雰囲気は、悲しみと感情的な苦痛のひとつである。少女の表情とティッシュの存在は、彼女が人生で困難な瞬間を経験していることを示唆している。黒い背景と赤いドレスが視覚的に印象的な構図を作り出し、少女の感情と画像全体の雰囲気を強調している。

title: 【初音ミクDark】　glow　【オリジナル】
introduction: The image depicts a young girl lying on a bed, surrounded by a colorful and abstract background. The girl is wearing a white dress, and her hair is flowing in the wind. The background is filled with various shapes and colors, creating a dreamy and imaginative atmosphere. The mood of the image is peaceful and serene, as the girl seems to be enjoying her time in the bed, surrounded by the vibrant colors and shapes of the background. The image's output is a digital painting, which adds to the artistic and imaginative nature of the scene.
introduction_ja: カラフルで抽象的な背景に囲まれ、ベッドに横たわる少女が描かれている。少女は白いドレスを着ており、髪は風になびく。背景はさまざまな形や色で埋め尽くされ、夢見心地で想像力豊かな雰囲気を醸し出している。背景の鮮やかな色と形に囲まれながら、少女はベッドの中で自分の時間を楽しんでいるようで、画像の雰囲気は平和で穏やかです。画像の出力はデジタルペインティングで、このシーンの芸術性と想像力をさらに高めている。
artistString: keeno feat. 初音ミク Append (Dark)
lyrics.ja.value:
降り注いだ冷たい雨　青い傷を溶かしてった。
いつか見てた夕暮れ空のすみっこで笑う誰かがいた。

気付かないうちにオトナになって　綺麗な嘘　口に出来るほど
いろんな痛みを覚えてきたけど　それでもまだ痛いんだ。

夕暮れの涙が出そうな赤　私の中の君を溶かしてしまえ。

私の体中　君の傷跡で溢れているから　もう進めないよ。
ねぇ　消えて　消してよ　そう願っていたのに
どうして　こんなにきつく抱きしめてるの？

君の声が遠くなる　飲み込まれそうな赤。
きっと　このまま君を溶かして夜になるだけ。

淡く染まる指先に零れ落ちそうな赤。
私の中の君を奪ってしまう。

ちぎれてく雲間から　溢れ出す涙。
少しずつ滲む君にぎゅっとしがみついた。
lyrics.en.value:
The cold, incessant rain melts away my blue wounds
In a corner of the twilight sky I used to look at in the past, someone was smiling

I've grown up before I knew it and I've become able to tell more elaborate lies 
I've experienced many pains and yet, this still hurts

The twilight is so red, it makes my tears want to fall please melt away your image inside of me

My whole body is so overrun with scars left by you that I can't go on anymore
Please go away erase yourself from my mind that's what I wished for, and yet 
How come you're still holding me so tightly?

Your voice becomes fainter and fainter in the engulfing red
I'm sure it will simply go on, melting you away and turn into night

The red seems as if it could fall down in drops on my faintly soaked fingertips
Taking away your image inside my mind

My tears pour out from the cracks between the pieces of clouds
And I held on tightly as your vision slowly blurs in my sight

title: パメラ／flower
introduction: The background of this image is a black and white drawing of a man sitting at a table with a laptop computer. The man is wearing a suit and tie, and he appears to be working on the laptop. The scene is set in a room with a chair and a table, which is the main focus of the image.The mood of the image is professional and focused, as the man is working on his laptop in a formal setting. The black and white color scheme adds a sense of simplicity and timelessness to the scene, emphasizing the man's dedication to his work.
introduction_ja: この画像の背景には、ノートパソコンを持ってテーブルに座る男性の白黒の絵が描かれている。男性はスーツにネクタイ姿で、ノートパソコンで仕事をしているように見える。画像の主役である椅子とテーブルのある部屋が舞台となっている。男性がフォーマルな雰囲気の中でノートパソコンに向かって仕事をしていることから、画像の雰囲気はプロフェッショナルで集中している。黒と白の配色は、シンプルさと時代を超越した感覚をシーンに加え、男性の仕事への献身を強調している。
artistString: バルーン feat. v flower
lyrics.ja.value:

lyrics.en.value:
"On long nights, I pass the time by thinking of you and nothing else."
"There are signs that summer has drawn near,"
And I want you to touch me with your boiling voice.

I’m getting dizzy
Because I can’t understand your gestures or even your choice of words.
"Like a flicker of light, every day passes in uncertainty as well."

"My heated breaths,"
The broken vase—
"Sooner or later, I’ll become unconcerned with everything."
The aqua blue is hidden by clouds.
To think there are things that can be solved by words!
I don’t believe I even need a single one.

"Little by little, I get used to being by myself,"
And I forget even my sensitivity to loneliness.
Tear to pieces this worst of nights
Before I wake from this dream.

I retain my memories of your words of love;
"They suit you well, you complete sham."
Twilight wraps up the town like a blanket.
My heart has an airhole opened up in it.

"Excessive ideals,"
Lacking pretenses—
"Sooner or later, I’ll become unconcerned with everything."
Reality is still grey.
To think there are things that can be solved by words!
I don’t believe I even need a single one.

"The thunder loudly burst my eardrums,"
And even these stray flashes of lightning are ringing.
Get the jump on this worst of nights
So I can flee to that far-off morning.

"Little by little, I get used to being by myself,"
And I forget even my sensitivity to loneliness.
Tear to pieces this worst of nights.
Thrust out your hand towards me.

"Little by little, I get used to being by myself,"
And I forget even my sensitivity to loneliness.
Tear to pieces this worst of nights
Before I wake from this dream
And before this song ends.

introduction: The image features a black and white knife with a red handle, placed on a red background. The knife is positioned in the center of the image, with a slight tilt to the left. The background is a mix of red and orange, creating a warm and vibrant atmosphere. The knife's handle is the only colorful element in the image, which adds a contrasting touch to the overall composition.The mood of the image is somewhat mysterious and intriguing. The knife's positioning and the contrasting colors of the background create a sense of tension and unease. The viewer might wonder about the context of the knife or its purpose, which adds to the overall atmosphere of the image.

title: 【初音ミク】般若心経ポップ【PVつき】
introduction: The image features a cartoon-like drawing of a girl with green hair and a black eye. She is looking to the side, possibly in a state of confusion or discomfort. The background is black, which adds to the overall mood of the image. The girl's expression and the dark background create a sense of mystery and unease.
introduction_ja: 緑色の髪と黒い目をした少女が漫画のように描かれている。彼女は横を向いており、おそらく混乱状態か不快感を抱いているのだろう。背景は黒で、画像全体の雰囲気を高めている。少女の表情と暗い背景が、謎めいた不安感を醸し出している。
artistString: おにゅうP feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
仏説摩訶般若波羅蜜多心経
観自在菩薩　行深般若波羅蜜多時　照見五蘊皆空
度一切苦厄　舎利子　色不異空　空不異色　色即是空
空即是色　受想行識亦復如是　舎利子　是諸法空相
不生不滅　不垢不浄　不増不減　是故空中
無色　無受想行識　無眼耳鼻舌身意　無色声香味触法
無眼界　乃至無意識界　無無明亦　無無明尽
乃至無老死　亦無老死尽　無苦集滅道　無智亦無得
以無所得故　菩提薩埵　依般若波羅蜜多故
心無罣礙　無罣礙故　無有恐怖　遠離一切顛倒夢想
究竟涅槃　三世諸仏　依般若波羅蜜多故
得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提　故知般若波羅蜜多
是大神呪　是大明呪　是無上呪　是無等等呪
能除一切苦　真実不虚　故説般若波羅蜜多呪
即説呪曰　羯諦　羯諦　波羅羯諦　波羅僧羯諦
菩提薩婆訶　般若心経
lyrics.en.value:
Buddha's teaching, core of Perfection of Wisdom Sutra
Bodhisattva viewing the world in Prajna Paramita
All five planes of existence rising above pain, misfortune
Our current form is nothing, we are just emptiness, form is emptiness, emptiness is form
Feeling, mind, reaction and consciousness are all just like this, all existing things are empty
Not growing, nor dying, not suffering, nor enjoying, not increasing, nor decreasing, emptiness is not form
Not sensation, nor perception, not reaction, nor consciousness, not eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, nor thought
Not sight, voice, smell, taste, touch, nor learning, no limit to your vision, nor limit to your thinking
Not ignorance, nor end to ignorance, not dying of old age, nor end to dying of old age
Not suffering, nor ending or causing suffering
Thus Bodhisattvas live this Prajna Paramita with no distractions, no distractions that cause fear
Vastly separated from this cognitive delusion is Nirvana
All past, present and future Buddhas live this Prajna Paramita and attain supreme perfect enlightenment in entering Nirvana
Through the insightful Prajna Paramita, the holy mantra, the luminous mantra, the supreme mantra, the best mantra, this is no other than one of many absolute truths
Set forth our Prajna Paramita mantra and see reality, Gate Gate Paragate Parasamgate
Bodhi Svaha The heart sutra

title: 【初音ミク】THE WORLDS【オリジナルジェットコースターPV】
introduction: The background of the image is a TV screen displaying a video game, featuring a character named MSS. The character is a young girl with a pink hairstyle, and she is wearing a blue dress. The TV screen is surrounded by a black background, which creates a contrasting effect.The image is a still frame from the video game, capturing the moment when the character is looking at the camera. The mood of the image is playful and lighthearted, as the character appears to be enjoying herself while playing the game. The output of the image is a digital representation of the video game, which can be viewed on a TV screen or other digital devices.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景はビデオゲームを映し出すテレビ画面で、MSSというキャラクターが登場する。キャラクターはピンクのヘアスタイルの少女で、青いドレスを着ている。画像はビデオゲームの静止画で、キャラクターがカメラを見ている瞬間をとらえている。キャラクターがゲームを楽しんでいるように見えるので、画像の雰囲気は遊び心にあふれた明るいものになっている。画像の出力はビデオゲームのデジタル表現で、テレビ画面や他のデジタル機器で見ることができる。
artistString: FB777, M.S.S Project feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
波に消えてく　砂の城 
眺めながら　大人になる 
何時の間にか　忘れてた 
あの瞬間を　追いかけていた

目が覚めたら　ここは何処 
見渡す限り　白い世界 
何も無くて　透明な 
この世界に　また色がつく

数え切れない思い出と

数え切れない愛と共に 
無限に広がってく

絵はやがて動くと　私を連れて行く 
一人ぼっちだった　あの頃思い出して 
ほんのちょっとだけれど　色を付け足していく

あなたの想いが　みんなの想いが 
形を変えて　力にもなるから 
ずっと見てるよ　最後まで見てるよ 
キミが愛した　この世界に　Hello New World

時の流れは　速すぎて 
私はまた　ひとりぼっち 
ずっとずっと見ていたかった 
例え忘れられても

消えていく力に　諦め感じながら 
ほんのちょっとだけど　色を付け足していく 
鮮やかだった絵が　色滲んでいくの

私を思い出して　となりにいた事を 
例え結末が　悲劇だったとしても 
何度でも夢見る　何度でも絵描くよ

あなたの欲望が　みんなの欲望が 
この星壊す　力にもなるから 
二度と戻れない　それなら　もう一度 
やり直すだけ　この世界は　Bad End World?

新しい紙で　またキミに会える？ 
たった一つの　願いは叶わない 
だったら　この世界　私愛するよ 
キミも愛した　この世界に　Hello New World

完成には程遠く 
またみんなで色を付ける 
例えどんな結果でも 
その世界は　あなたの絵だから
lyrics.en.value:
Sand castles disappearing in the waves
While gazing at them, you became an adult
You were chasing that moment, you had forgotten before you knew it
When I awaken, where is this place?

There is a white world
As far as I can see
There is nothing, it’s transparent
Within this world, again, colours are added

Together with countless memories and

Countless love,
They spread infinitely

The picture will before long move and take me along
I remember those days where I was alone
Even if it’s just a bit, add some color

Because your feelings and everyone’s feelings
Will change those shapes and become strength
I have always watched, and will watch until the end
To this world which you have loved, Hello New World

Time had flown too quickly
And I was again alone
I had always, always wanted to see
Even if it would be forgotten

With a disappearing strength, while wanting to give up
Even if it’s just a bit, add some color
Your picture which had been vivid is growing dull

Remember me and that we were together
Even if the end were to be a tragedy
Dream any number of dreams and paint any number of pictures

Because your desire and everyone’s desire
Will become the power to destroy this star too
You can never return, so if that’s the case, once more
Just start over, this world is Bad End World?

Will I meet you again on a new piece of paper?
My only one wish doesn’t come true,
If that’s the case, I will love this world,
To this world which you loved too, Hello New World

Completion is far off,
Again, everyone adds some color
For example, no matter what kind of outcome there is,
Because that world is your picture

The dragons are positioned in the middle of the sky, with one on the left side and the other on the right side. The sunset creates a warm and inviting atmosphere, with the dragons' wings spread out and their bodies stretched out in the sky. The scene is serene and peaceful, with the dragons flying gracefully and majestically. The image captures the beauty of nature and the power of these mythical creatures, creating a sense of wonder and awe.

lyrics.ja.value:
あぁ　ほら　また間違えた　これで何度？　何回目？
ねえ　ほら　塞いでたって　ぽっかり浮き出る傷跡

閉塞感にユラユラ
劣等感にクラクラ
息詰まってカラカラなの

わたしって失敗作だって　なって　いらない子なんだって…
何やったって　頑張ったって　無駄みたいだ
生まれてきた意味が欲しくて
もっともっと自然に　笑えばいいかな…

神様　もしも生まれ変わることが出来たら
愛される子になれますように
泣き止んだ鼓動を子守歌に

lyrics.en.value:
Ah, see, I’ve made a mistake again, how many times does this make?
Here, see, these ghastly scars keep opening up, no matter how I try to close them
Ah, see, I’ve played dumb again, pretending not to see, how good I’ve gotten at this
Just, see, they may say anything about me, no one ever wants me

My wounds are laid bare, it hurts, really hurts
I have to act tough, it hurts, really hurts
I can’t breathe, it hurts, it really hurts

They say I’m a failure, they say no one wants me
No matter what I do or how hard I try, it won’t work, apparently
I just want to be loved, loved, loved, I have to fake my way through
Would it work if I tried to smile more, just a little more?

Ah, see, I scraped my skin again, hoa many times does this make?
Here, see, my traumas keep oozing out, no matter how I try to hide them
Ah, see, I’ve held it in again, making it seem like nothing’s wrong, how good I’ve gotten at this
Just, see, they may say anything about me, I’m showered with their disdain and covered in bruises

This suffocating feeling is making me quiver
This inferiority complex is making me dizzy
I can’t breathe, I’m completely empty inside

They say I’m a failure, they say no one wants me
No matter what I do or how hard I try, it’s no use, apparently
I just want to know why I was ever born in the first place
Would it work if I tried to keep a more natural smile?

Dear God, if I could be reborn,
I hope I can be a girl who’s loved
Once I’ve cried my eyes out, my heartbeat becomes a lullaby
I’m sure, very sure, I’ll be able to smile tomorrow
Won’t I?

Goodnight to my life full of failures

introduction: The background of the image is a dark and mysterious scene, featuring a large black cat with a white face and a blue background. The cat is sitting on a bed, and there are two other cats in the scene, one on the left side and another on the right side. The overall mood of the image is eerie and unsettling, with the presence of the black cat and the dark background creating a sense of unease. The output of the image is a black and white sketch, which adds to the eerie atmosphere and emphasizes the contrast between the black cat and the blue background.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景は暗く神秘的な光景で、白い顔をした大きな黒猫と青い背景が描かれている。猫はベッドの上に座っており、左側と右側に2匹の猫がいる。画像全体の雰囲気は不気味で不穏なもので、黒猫の存在と暗い背景が不安感を醸し出している。画像の出力は白黒のスケッチで、不気味な雰囲気をさらに盛り上げ、黒猫と青い背景のコントラストを強調している。

Tic tac tic, play with me
Ticking away, the wristwatch of life
Being just a child, how about you?
Take my hands and dance with me

The world of dreams and fantasy is a fairy terrarium
Drowned in a clowning are thorny marionettes
Seeds of time are hidden in a talking pot
Call me a bad girl, but "I want to sleep more"

Riddle your riddles, if you can't answer all
Weepy rabbit and snicker bear
Will reward you with magic trick execution

Shala lu lala, sing for me
Like candies, whisper in my ears
The poppy flower
Put a leash, collar of the shadows

Eternal moonless night is a honeymoon vivarium
Criminals, breakers of taboos and their hope
On the other side of the mirror, red sheep's masquerade
A skeleton salutes you and says, "shall we dance?"

In the middle of the dance floor, hide and seek with my shadow
Angels are falling, muma is longing for love

In your eyes, stars
Live in a dream, shadow puppetry

Memories sparkle on, a merry go round
When you fears are blooming in the tears of penitence
I will lay my hands on you

When you grow up, how about you?
Your betrayal, I will never forgive

Thala tu lala, put a curse on me

The poppy flower
Good night to you, collar of the shadows

title: 【IA】アヤノの幸福理論【オリジナルMV】
introduction: The image shows a close-up of a book with a red cover, sitting on a wooden table. The book appears to be a Japanese language book, as it has Japanese writing on it. The book is placed on a wooden table, which adds a natural and rustic touch to the scene. The presence of the book and the wooden table suggests a calm and peaceful atmosphere, as it implies that someone might be reading or studying the book. The mood of the image is serene and contemplative, as the viewer can imagine the person engaging in a thoughtful or reflective activity.
introduction_ja: 画像は木のテーブルの上に置かれた赤い表紙の本のアップ。日本語が書かれているので、日本語の本のようだ。この本は木のテーブルの上に置かれており、このシーンに自然で素朴なタッチを加えている。本と木製のテーブルがあることで、誰かが本を読んだり勉強したりしていることが暗示され、穏やかで平和な雰囲気が漂っている。このイメージの雰囲気は穏やかで瞑想的であり、見る者はその人物が思索にふけったり、内省的な活動をしている様子を想像することができる。
artistString: じん, 中西亮輔 feat. IA
lyrics.ja.value:
思い出していたのは
また、家族の事
「アヤノはお姉ちゃんだから
皆の事、よろしくね」

赤煉瓦の壁　小さな家の中で
ひそひそ話そう　秘密の作戦みたいに
連れて来られた　三人の真っ赤な目には
大人に隠していた　過去がある

怯えた顔で　「僕は化物だから」
私は告げる　「そんなことはないよ」って
「真っ赤な色は主人公の色だから、
怯えていなくても、良いんだよ」

面白い事　悩んでは
今日もお姉ちゃんぶって
「ほら、見ていて」　赤いマフラー巻き付けた
『秘密組織みたい！』

茜色、染めて、始めよう
小さな「ヒーローのフリ」だけど
「少しでも、また笑えたら」って
今日も家族でいよう

「幸せ」を願おう、先にある未来が
どれだけ　悲しくても
「このことは秘密だよ」
楽しくて　陽が沈んだ

春風巡り　大人になった世界は
理不尽に曲がる　誰かの陰謀みたいに
膨らんで消えた　愛する人の涙は
誰も気付けなくて、黒くなる

狂い出していた
気付いたらもう　誰にも言えなくて
「嫌だ、嫌だよ。壊れるのは」
幸せの終わる世界が来る

「茜色、お願い。
これ以上、誰かの未来を壊さないで」
泣きながらまた、考える
笑顔に隠したまま

「赤目色、それが私なら
誰かの未来を　救えるかな」
不器用で、情けない
独りぼっちの作戦だ

私が消えた　あの日の秘密組織は
ちゃんと笑って　暮らせているのかな
きっと、私は怒られちゃうなぁ
だけど、ちゃんと「お姉ちゃん」になれたかな

思い出してみよう
あの好きだった言葉
「幸せ」ってなんだか不思議
明日のこと、好きになれる
lyrics.en.value:
What I thought back on was, again, my family
“Ayano's your big sister, so get along with her, everyone!" 

In a little house with red brick walls, 
They whisper to each other, as if making secret plans 
In the three pairs of red eyes brought here 
Lies a past they've hidden from adults

With fear in their eyes, they cry "I'm just a monster," 
So I tell them, "that’s not true at all," 
"Red is the color of a hero, so there's no need to be afraid!” 

Wondering what they'd find fun, I'm playing the big sister again
"Hey, look at this!" I wrapped myself up in a red scarf
"We're like secret agents!" 

Dyed in madder red, we'll begin, even if we're merely playing heroes
"As long as we can manage just a little smile” We'll be family still today

I pray for happiness in the future ahead, so however sad it may be
"Now keep this a secret!", the sun sets with us laughing

The spring breeze blows, and the now adult world is irrationally bent, as if conspired to be 
The thick and faded tears of loved ones 
go unnoticed by all, turning black

Things had gone crazy, but by the time I noticed, 
I couldn't tell anyone
"No, no, I don't want to be destroyed”
There came a world where happiness ends

"Madder red, please, no more, don't bring ruin to anyone else's future." 
I thought as I cried again, keeping it hidden with a smile

"If I had those red eyes myself, could I save someone's future?" 
Awkward and shameful, this is my lonely plan

Now that I'm gone, I wonder if those secret agents are still getting along, and smiling together? 
I'm sure they must be upset with me
But I wonder if I've become their "big sister" now

Please try to remember that word I loved
"Happiness" is a curious thing, 
So I hope you can love tomorrow

title: 【初音ミク】自傷無色【オリジナル曲/MV】
introduction: The image is a black and white drawing of a bus, with a person sitting on the bus, and a house in the background. The drawing is accompanied by a caption that reads "Home." The image conveys a sense of nostalgia and warmth, as it depicts a person returning home after a long journey, possibly on a bus. The mood of the image is one of comfort and familiarity, as the person is surrounded by the familiarity of the house and the bus, which are both symbols of home.
introduction_ja: 画像は白黒で描かれたバスの絵で、バスには人が座り、背景には家がある。この絵には "Home "というキャプションが添えられている。このイメージは、おそらくバスでの長旅を終えて家に帰る人を描いているため、ノスタルジーと暖かさの感覚を伝えている。家の象徴である家とバスの親しみやすさに囲まれているため、画像の雰囲気は安らぎと親しみのあるものである。
artistString: ササノマリイ feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
君のようなひとになりたいな 
「僕らしいひと」になりたいな 
望むならそうすりゃいいけどさ 
でもそれってほんとにぼくなのかい

子供騙しな夢ひとつ 
こんな僕なら死ねばいいのに

こんな僕が生きてるだけで 
何万人のひとが悲しんで 
誰も僕を望まない 
そんな世界だったらいいのにな

こんな僕が消えちゃうだけで 
何億人のひとが喜んで 
誰も何も憎まないなら 
そんなうれしいことはないな

明日も僕は夢うつつ 
このまま僕は消えていいのに

こんな僕が生きたところで 
何億人のひとは知らないし 
誰も僕を望まない 
そんな世界だったらいいのかな

こんな僕が消えたところで 
何億人のひとは変わらない 
誰も僕を憎まないなら 
損した事に変わりないな

最期なんかみんな同じように倒れてゆきます 
メイドイン 他人 の 「自分自身」崩れてゆきます 
最期なんかみんな同じように離れてくのに

こんな僕が生きてるだけで 
なんで君はそんなに笑うの 
君がそんな笑顔じゃ 
悲しくても消えたくても 
さよならする理由なんてもう 
無ければいいのに

こんな僕が消えたところで 
何億人のひとは変わらない 
だけど僕を止める何かが 
そんな顔しちゃ笑えないや
lyrics.en.value:
I want to be someone like you
I want to be someone that feels very "me”
If I want to, I can just go and do it
But then would that really be me?

One child's play dream
The way I am, someone like me is better off dead

Where someone like me being alive 
brings sadness to tens of thousands of people
And no one wants me
I wish that was the kind of world it is

If by just wiping me away
Hundreds of millions of people rejoiced
And no one held hatred for anything
Then I reject such a happy thing

Tomorrow, I'll still tread between reality and dreams
Just like that, I'd love to disappear

Where someone like me being alive 
Doesn't even register for hundreds of millions of people
And no one wants me
If that were the world, would that be okay?

Even if I were wiped away
That wouldn't change some hundred million people.
If no one will resent me, then 
The result's the same, a loss for me.

In the end, everyone collapses in the same manner
"My self" made in others will crumble away
In the end, everyone separates the same way, but

Just because I'm alive 
Why do you smile so much?
If you smile like that 
No matter how sad, how much I want to disappear
If only all my reasons to say goodbye went away

Even if I were wiped away
That wouldn't change some hundred million people
But there's something preventing me 
And showing me that face, I can't bear to laugh about it

title: 『KAITO・ミク』カンタレラ（第二版）『オリジナル』
introduction: The image features a man and a woman standing close together, with the woman holding a baby in her arms. The man is wearing a black shirt and a hat, while the woman is wearing a black dress. The scene appears to be a casual and intimate moment between the couple, possibly in a living room or a similar setting. The mood of the image is warm and inviting, as the couple is sharing a tender moment with the baby. The overall atmosphere is one of love and family bonding.
introduction_ja: 男女が寄り添うように立ち、女性は赤ん坊を抱いている。男性は黒いシャツに帽子をかぶり、女性は黒いドレスを着ている。このシーンは、おそらくリビングルームなどでの、カップルのカジュアルで親密なひとときのように見える。夫婦が赤ちゃんと優しい時間を共有しているように、画像の雰囲気は暖かく魅力的である。全体的な雰囲気は、愛と家族の絆を感じさせるものだ。
artistString: 黒うさP feat. KAITO

title: 【ミクウナ】ちがう!!!【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The background of this image is a black and white drawing of two anime characters, one with a ponytail and the other with a bow in their hair. They are standing next to each other, and their expressions are serious. The mood of the image is serious and focused, as the characters are likely engaged in a battle or a competition. The black and white color scheme adds to the serious atmosphere, as it emphasizes the contrast between the characters and their surroundings.
introduction_ja: この画像の背景は、ポニーテールをした2人のアニメキャラクターと、髪にリボンをつけた2人のアニメキャラクターのモノクロの絵である。二人は隣り合って立っており、表情は真剣そのもの。この画像の雰囲気は真剣で、集中している。キャラクターたちはおそらく戦いか競争をしているのだろう。黒と白の配色は、登場人物とその周囲のコントラストを強調し、シリアスな雰囲気に拍車をかけている。

The background of the image is a white wall, which creates a simple and clean setting. The overall mood of the image is playful and lighthearted, as the woman appears to be enjoying her lollipop and the moment captured.

title: 【MV】 スーサイドパレヱド ／ GUMI 【オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a close-up of a person's eye, with a pink iris and a black pupil. The eye is surrounded by a black background, which creates a contrasting effect. The eye appears to be staring directly at the viewer, creating a sense of intimacy and connection. The mood of the image is somewhat eerie, as the eye appears to be staring directly at the viewer, creating a sense of intrigue and curiosity. The output of the image is a black and white photograph, which enhances the contrast and emphasizes the eye's features.
introduction_ja: ピンクの虹彩と黒い瞳孔を持つ人物の目がクローズアップされている。目は黒い背景に囲まれており、コントラスト効果を生み出している。目は見る者を直接見つめているように見え、親密さとつながりを感じさせる。眼球が見る人を直接見つめているように見えるため、画像の雰囲気はやや不気味で、好奇心や興味をそそる。画像の出力はモノクロ写真であるため、コントラストが強調され、目の特徴が強調されている。
artistString: ユリイ・カノン feat. GUMI
lyrics.ja.value:
這い出た先の泥黎中心街で
延命ばっかのそんなCRUDじゃあ
愛も買えないな

At hell's central city where we crawled out to
Crud whose lifespans have been extended cannot even buy love 

Civilization has become deformed and swallowed up by religiousness

There is no more damsel in distress

Suicide parade, life and death harmonize
I'll shoot that eye which doesn't know fear

I knew that it was all a dream

The boy wearing the devil's mask has forgotten even his face and points the gun

Suicide parade, resonance, propagation, and superb poetry, become words that curse God

Please laugh and say it's just a dream
A blackout deep inside my mind where love is dead

Suicide parade

title: RIP=RELEASE【巡音ルカオリジナル】
introduction: The image features a young woman with long, white hair, wearing a white dress and a black hat. She is standing in front of a purple background, which creates a dreamy and ethereal atmosphere. The woman appears to be in a contemplative state, possibly lost in thought or daydreaming. The background color and the woman's attire contribute to the overall mood of the image, which could be described as serene, peaceful, and possibly melancholic.
introduction_ja: 白いドレスに黒い帽子をかぶった、白くて長い髪の若い女性。彼女は紫色の背景の前に立っており、夢のような幽玄な雰囲気を醸し出している。女性は思索にふけっているか、白昼夢を見ているように見える。背景の色と女性の服装が、静謐で、平和的で、おそらくメランコリックとも言える、画像全体のムードに寄与している。
artistString: minato feat. 巡音ルカ
lyrics.ja.value:
ah- 流れてゆく　蛇口の水 
その他には　声もなく 

ah-　傍にいれば　傷つく事 
分かってたのに　止まらなくて 

「何処にいたの」なんて聞くなら 
もう　全てを壊したらよかった…! 

溢れだす涙はいつも同じでも 
痛みには心が慣れてはくれない 
例えば君の喉を切り裂いてしまえたら 
私だけの君に… 

ah-　確かめ合う　言葉さえも 
信じることは　出来ないまま 

駆け上がる鼓動の速さを 
もう　抑えることなんて　出来ない…！ 

答えを私の脳に問いかけても 
全身がその全てを拒んでいる 
不安も苛立ちも悲哀や惨めささえも 
耐えてゆければイイ…？ 

張り詰めた私の糸に触れないで 
優しい言葉で期待をさせないで 
愛された証を求めて手を伸ばしても 
君はもう居なくて 

溢れだす涙はいつも同じでも 
痛みには心が慣れてはくれない 
今すぐ君の喉を切り裂いて何もかも 
 私だけのモノに…

title: 【マッシュアップ】ヒビカセ × ECHO【Mashup】
introduction: The image features a cartoon-like character, possibly a girl, standing in front of a television screen. The character is wearing a blue dress and has a white bow in her hair. The television screen displays a black and white image of a person with a white bow in their hair. The overall mood of the image is playful and lighthearted, as the character seems to be enjoying the image on the television screen. The character's pose and the presence of the television screen suggest that the image is a representation of a scene from a cartoon or anime, where the character is interacting with the television screen.
introduction_ja: 画像には、テレビ画面の前に立つ漫画のようなキャラクター（おそらく少女）が描かれている。キャラクターは青いドレスを着ており、髪に白いリボンをつけている。テレビ画面には、髪に白いリボンをつけた人物の白黒画像が表示されている。キャラクターがテレビ画面の映像を楽しんでいるように見えるため、画像全体の雰囲気は遊び心にあふれた明るいものになっている。キャラクターのポーズとテレビ画面の存在から、この画像は漫画かアニメのワンシーンを表現したもので、キャラクターがテレビ画面と対話していることがうかがえる。

title: 「 神威がくぽ がオリジナル曲『 ダンシング☆サムライ 』を唄う」の巻
introduction: The image features a character from a video game, specifically a character from the game "Final Fantasy," standing in a white background. The character is dressed in a white outfit, and it appears to be a female character. The character is holding a sword, which is a common weapon in the "Final Fantasy" series. The character's pose and the sword suggest that she is ready for battle or action. The white background and the character's outfit create a sense of contrast, making the character stand out against the background. The mood of the image is action-oriented and adventurous, as the character is prepared for battle or exploration.
introduction_ja: この画像はビデオゲームのキャラクター、具体的にはゲーム「ファイナルファンタジー」のキャラクターが白い背景の中に立っている。キャラクターは白い服を着ており、女性キャラクターのように見える。キャラクターが持っているのは剣で、これは「ファイナルファンタジー」シリーズによく登場する武器である。キャラクターのポーズと剣は、彼女が戦闘やアクションに備えていることを示唆している。背景の白とキャラクターの衣装がコントラストを生み出し、キャラクターを背景の中で際立たせている。イメージの雰囲気は、キャラクターが戦闘や探検に備えているように、アクション志向で冒険的である。
artistString: かにみそP feat. 神威がくぽ
lyrics.ja.value:
サムライ☆ (腹切れ貴様ぁ!)

Dancing in the night このフロアで
リズムに乗れぬ奴 切り捨て御免
Dancing all the night この時代に
戦を巻き起こせ ビバ☆サムライ (ヘア!)

上で支配する奴がいて
下で動いてる奴がいる
俺はどちらにも染まらずに
ただ舞を続けてる
この狭い日本に男として生まれたなら
天下を取れるまで止まんな
どんな壁も超えてゆけ

Dancing in the night どんなMixも
リズムに乗れぬなら ハラキリ御免
Dancing all the night この時代に
嵐を巻き起こせ
ダンシング☆サムライ (ヘア!)

街ですれ違う女子たち
未熟な俺にはまだ早く
だけども声をかけてみる
結局無視をされる
嗚呼 なら武士として天辺へ登ってやる
立ちはだかるものは一瞬で
一刀両断してやる

Dancing at the place どんな場所でも
リズムを生み出せりゃ ハッピーなライフ
Dancing with your pace どんな時でも
全力で行かなきゃ ダメ☆サムライ (ヘア!)

Dancing in your life 最後の時も
音楽があるならシアワセだな
Dancing all your life その頃には
誰しもが認める
ダンシング☆サムライ (ヘア!)

Dancing in the night このフロアで
リズムに乗れぬ奴 切り捨て御免
Dancing all the night この時代に
戦を巻き起こせ ヒラ☆サムライ

いつの日か 真のサムライ
サムライ☆ (腹切れ貴様ぁ!)
lyrics.en.value:
Samurai (Go kill yourself, scum!)

Dancing in the night, on this dance floor
Excuse me for eliminating anyone without rhythm
Dancing all the night, in this era
Let's stir up a battle, viva samurai (Hya!)

Above are those who rule
Below are those who serve
Tainted by neither group,
I keep on dancing
If you're born a man in this narrow Japan
Don't stop until you've taken over the whole country
Overcoming all obstacles

Danicng in the night If you can't dance to any mix
Sorry, go kill yourself
Dancing all the night In this era
Let's stir up a tempest
Dancing samurai (Hya!)

I passed some girls on the street
But as a newcomer, they were out of my league
I called out to them
But they only ignored me
Ah, in that case I'll climb to the top as a warrior
Men standing in my way
Shall be slashed by my blade in an instant

Dancing at the place, no matter where
As long as I can make music, I can live a happy life
Dancing with your pace, no matter when
If your don't give it your best, you're a worthless samurai (Hya!)

Danicng in your life, even on my dying day
As long as there's music, I'm happy
Dancing all your life, when that day comes
Everyone will acknowledge me as the dancing samurai (Hya!)

Dancing in the night, on this dance floor
Excuse me for eliminating the men without rhythm
Dancing all the night, in this era
Let's stir up a battle, ordinary samurai

Someday I will be a true samurai
Samurai (Go kill yourself, scum!)

title: 初音ミクオリジナル『えれくとりっく・えんじぇぅ』Full ver.
introduction: The image features a small, cute, and colorful character, likely a cartoon or anime character, standing in a black background. The character is wearing a headset, which suggests that it might be a character from a video game or anime series. The character is holding a microphone, which could indicate that it is a singer or performer. The black background creates a contrast with the character's vibrant colors, making the image visually appealing and eye-catching. The mood of the image is likely playful and energetic, as the character is engaged in an activity that involves music and performance.
introduction_ja: この画像は、漫画かアニメのキャラクターと思われる、小さくてかわいらしいカラフルなキャラクターが黒い背景の中に立っている。このキャラクターはヘッドセットをつけており、ゲームやアニメのキャラクターであることを示唆している。キャラクターはマイクを持っており、歌手かパフォーマーであることを示している。背景の黒は、キャラクターの鮮やかな色彩とのコントラストを作り出し、この画像を視覚的に魅力的で人目を引くものにしている。キャラクターが音楽やパフォーマンスを伴う活動をしていることから、画像の雰囲気は遊び心にあふれ、エネルギッシュである可能性が高い。
songTitle: えれくとりっく・えんじぇぅ
artistString: ヤスオP feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
ワタシは、歌うのがスキ
ワタシがそう作られたからじゃない
この声をスキだという
アナタが歓んでくれるから

0と1しか分からない
ワタシに"I"を教えてくれた
その日からワタシのココロの中、
アナタで満たされてるの

アナタといられる それだけで
電子のココロ、震えるの
まるで量子の風みたいに
ワタシのココロ、ゆさぶるの

孤独な世界に溶けてしまうから
アナタといる時がスキ
ワタシを暖めてくれるから

ヒトリじゃ何も作れない
ワタシに歌を与えてくれた
その日からワタシのココロの中、

電子のココロ、震えるの
まるで量子の風みたいに

ワタシの世界、広がるの
まるで天使の羽根みたいに
ワタシのココロ、はばたくの？

アナタといられる それだけで
電子のココロ、震えるの
まるで量子の風みたいに
ワタシのココロ、揺さぶるの
lyrics.en.value:
I love to sing
It's not because I was made like that.
It's because you, who say you like my voice
are pleased with it.

I don't understand anything but zeroes and ones.
But you taught me the meaning of "I".
From that day on, my heart's empty space
Is always filled up by you.

As long as I can be with you,
Even my digital heart trembles.
Just like a quantum wind,
My heart sways.

I hate being alone,
Because I'll end up melting away in a lonely world.
I like to spend time with you,
Because you warm me up.

I can't accomplish anything by myself,
But you gave me songs to sing.
From that day on, my heart's empty space
Is always filled up by you.

As long as I can be with you,
Even my digital heart trembles.
Just like a quantum wind,
My heart sways.

As long as I can be with you,
My world will keep on expanding.
Just like an angel's wings,
Will my heart flutter?

As long as I can be with you,
Even my digital heart trembles.
Just like a quantum wind,
My heart sways.

title: 【鏡音リン】厭世輪舞曲【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features a black and white drawing of a woman holding a sword, standing on a pink background. The woman is wearing a black dress and has a sword in her hand. The background is pink, which creates a contrasting and visually striking effect. The overall mood of the image is mysterious and dramatic, as the woman's pose and the black and white color scheme evoke a sense of intrigue and intensity.
introduction_ja: ピンクの背景に、剣を持った女性が立っている白黒の絵が描かれている。女性は黒いドレスを着ており、手には剣を持っている。背景はピンク色で、コントラストと視覚的に印象的な効果を生み出している。女性のポーズと黒と白の配色が陰謀感と激しさを呼び起こし、画像全体のムードはミステリアスでドラマチックだ。
artistString: YASUHIRO feat. 鏡音リン

マヌケとデタラメ
堕落に染まる蚊帳の中で
空想離れ ノンシュガー

そうだ
明日もお前を縛り付ける約束なんだ
正解、正義狂わせて
何度砕けるの？

一歩一歩近づいた
見慣れた荒んだ光景
いつも恨んで引き裂いた

かげろうは耳元囁いて消えた

title: 【雪ミク テーマ曲】初音ミク｢好き！雪！本気マジック｣【SNOW MIKU'14】
introduction: The background of this image is a snowy landscape, with a snow-covered mountain in the distance. The foreground features a cartoon character, possibly a snowman, standing in the snow. The character is wearing a blue jacket and has a white hat on its head. The overall mood of the image is cheerful and festive, as the snowy landscape and the presence of the cartoon character create a sense of winter wonder and joy.

title: 「Q」椎名もた feat.鏡音リン
introduction: The image features a black and white illustration of a woman holding a sword and a bird. The woman is dressed in a military-style outfit, and she is standing on a grassy field. The bird is perched on her shoulder, and it appears to be a large bird, possibly a raven or a crow. The overall mood of the image is mysterious and somewhat ominous, as the woman's military attire and the presence of the bird suggest a sense of power and authority. The black and white color scheme adds to the atmosphere, creating a contrast between the woman's attire and the natural environment.
introduction_ja: 画像は剣と鳥を持った女性のモノクロイラスト。女性は軍服を着て、草原に立っている。鳥は彼女の肩にとまっており、おそらくカラスか大きな鳥のようだ。女性の軍服姿と鳥の存在が権力と権威を示唆しているため、画像全体の雰囲気は神秘的で、やや不吉である。黒と白の配色が雰囲気を盛り上げ、女性の服装と自然環境のコントラストを生み出している。
artistString: 椎名もた feat. 鏡音リン Append (Power)
lyrics.ja.value:
どうしてよって駄々こねたって
どうしてもって理由つけたって
どうでもいいこと知らないんだ
どうにもならない　知ってるんだ

こうでもないって繰り返せば
あーでもないって繰り返すよ
どろどろになった夕焼けにさ
突き刺さる君の落とす影と

約束しようよ　指切った

さあ掻き鳴らせ証明の歌
淘汰されてく無限の問いに
今照らされるその答えを
知ったところでさ

（ぱらっぱっぱっぱら）

さよならを数えた
思い浮かぶ君の手
不恰好な背中を
思い切り蹴りあげた

カーブした感情を僕ら
それとなく受け止めてみたら
どろどろになった手のひらにさ
小さな疑問が浮かびました

こーでもないって繰り返せば
あーでもないって繰り返すよ
どろどろになった朝焼けがさ
突きつける僕の瞼の色

僕たちはいつもそばにいた

さあ掻き乱せ衝動のまま
今吐き散らす言葉の中
きっと嘘しかみつけられないから
知ったところでさ

（ぱらっぱっぱっぱら）

僕らしか見えずに
せぐりあげた思いは
言葉に出来ないまま
懸命に泣き喚く

さよならを数えた
思い浮かぶ君の手
瞼に乗る雫を
鮮明に覚えてた

「今」の忘れ方を
この歌のさ　答えを
明日の歩き方を
僕達に教えてよ

さあ掻き鳴らせ証明の歌
淘汰された僕の悲しみを
今思い知るその答えを
ずっと抱きしめて

（ぱらっぱっぱっぱら）

ありがとう　おやすみ
おめでとうを　あなたに
さようならを　僕らに
これからもよろしくね

繰り返す答えを
さよならのすべてを
思い知った感情を
ひたすらに抱きしめて

繰り返す答えを
さよならのすべてを
思い知った感情を
ひたすらに抱きしめて
lyrics.en.value:
At a loss of what to do, say I threw a fit.
At a loss of what to do, say I gave a reason.
I do not know that whatever I do is fine.
I do know that I can do nothing about it.

If I repeat that this won't work,
I will repeat that that won't work.
I'm with the shadow you cast that runs into,
Well, the sunset that became muddled.

Let's make a promise. We linked pinkies.

Come on, strum it, a song of proof.
At, well, the part where we knew that
Answer that was now illuminated by
Infinite questions that were being sifted out.

I counted my goodbyes.
Your hand that comes to mind.
I gave up all thoughts of your
Unshapely back and kicked it up.

When we tried to indirectly catch
Our emotions that had curved,
Small doubts floated upon, well,
The muddled palms of our hands.

If I repeat that this won't work,
I will repeat that that won't work.
The color (form) of my eyelids that thrust at,
Well, the sunrise that became muddled.

We were always by each other's side.

Come on, disturb it, as an impulse.
At, well, the part where we knew,
Since I could find but the lies
Within the words we spewed out now.

The thoughts that filled our hearts
That we could but see
Cry and lament hard
As they can't be words.

I counted my goodbyes.
Your hand that comes to mind.
I vividly remembered
The drops that rode your eyelids.

How to forget the "now",
The answer to, well, this song,
How to walk tomorrow,
Teach them to us.

Come on, strum it, a song of proof.
My sadness that was sifted out,
That answer that you realize now,
Embrace them forever.

Thank you. Good night.
Congrats to you.
Goodbye to us.
Best regards here on out, 'kay?

The answer I repeat,
Every goodbye,
The emotions I realized,
Embrace nothing but them.

The answer I repeat,
Every goodbye,
The emotions I realized,
Embrace nothing but them.

title: 【初音ミク＆GUMI】M.S.S.Planet【オリジナルPV】
introduction: The image features a man wearing a black shirt and glasses, with a black background. He is holding a cell phone in his hand, and he appears to be looking at the phone. The background is filled with stars, creating a cosmic atmosphere. The man's facial expression and body language suggest that he is engaged in a conversation or activity on his cell phone. The mood of the image is casual and relaxed, as the man is focused on his phone and the stars in the background create a serene and peaceful atmosphere.
introduction_ja: 黒いシャツを着て眼鏡をかけた男が写っている。手には携帯電話を持ち、電話を見ているように見える。背景は星で埋め尽くされ、宇宙的な雰囲気を醸し出している。男性の表情や身振り手振りは、携帯電話で会話や活動をしていることを示唆している。男性が携帯電話に集中し、背景の星が静謐で穏やかな雰囲気を作り出しているため、画像の雰囲気はカジュアルでリラックスしている。
artistString: M.S.S Project, FB777, KIKKUN-MK-II feat. 初音ミク, GUMI
lyrics.ja.value:
十四の時に　運命 (さだめ) 動き出す 
偽りの世界で　築くソサエティ 
因果の闇から　混沌 (カオス) が生まれた 
何の根拠もない　俺の妄想だけど

繰り返す輪廻　漆黒の炎 
第三の眼が開く 
意味のない事に　意味がある　それに 
気づくのは　大人になるから 
不確定な存在で　生きるのか　俺たちは　この先も 
絶望から逃げる為に　目指した理想郷

聡明プラネット　目覚める銀河 
漆黒堕天使は　何処に居るのか 
究極プラネット　誰も敵わない 
いつかこの世界を飛び出して

暗黒の世界　追い求めていた 
広い定義では　ここもギャラクシー 
アンドロメダ銀河　エクスプロージョン 
深層心理が　宇宙 (そら) を求めてる

出来ない事ばかり　考えていた 
現実は甘くない 
不可能が可能に　ならないとわかる 
瞬間　大人になる時 
完全無敵の　少年の記憶　消えていく　消していく 
二度と戻れない　十四の銀河閉じていく

忘却プラネット　僕は今から 
漆黒堕天使に　別れを告げる 
MSプラネット　次の惑星へ 
辿り着く頃には　忘れてる？

黎明プラネット　目覚める銀河 
漆黒堕天使は　僕の心に 
究極プラネット　グランドクロス 
此処にいる限りは　俺の勝ち

最強プラネット　ラグナロク 
極限プラネット　エクリプス 
終焉プラネット　ビッグバン 
MSプラネット　カオスアンサー
lyrics.en.value:
At 14.00, fate starts to move
society found on a fake world
from the darkness of the laws of cause and effect, chaos was born
although it is my delusion, without any basis

the repeating cycle of samsara, a jet black flame
the third eye opens
in the meaningless things, there is meaning
those who notice this, will become adults
Living with an indeterminate existence, we from here on too,
In order to flee from despair, strived towards the ideal world

Brilliant planet the awakening galaxy
are the jet black fallen angels here?
Ultimate planet, no match for anyone
to eventually, fly away from this world

Pursuing a jet black world
using a wide definition, here is also the galaxy
Andromeda galaxy, explosion
depth psychology, seeks outer space

I thought a whole lot about things I couldn’t do
reality, is not so pretty
The impossible doesn’t just become possible, I know that
In an instant, when we become adult,
The young memories of being fully invincible disappear, and we erase them
we can’t go back, the fourteen galaxies are closing

Forgotten planet, I, from now on, will
to the jet black fallen angel, tell the words of parting
MS planet, to the next planet
when I finally reach it, will I forget?

Brilliant planet awakening galaxy
The fallen jet black angel in my heart
Ultimate planet, grand cross
as long as I’m here, it’s my victory

Strongest planet, Ragnarok
Extremity planet, eclipse
End planet, big bang
MS planet, chaos answer

title: 【IA】イヤホンと蝉時雨【オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a young girl standing on a bridge overlooking a city. She is looking down at the city below, with a beautiful view of the cityscape. The scene is serene and peaceful, with the girl's gaze capturing the essence of the moment. The image is aesthetically pleasing and evokes a sense of tranquility and contemplation. The girl's pose and the view of the city create a sense of wonder and appreciation for the beauty of the urban landscape.
introduction_ja: 街を見下ろす橋の上に立つ少女。彼女は美しい街並みを眼下に見下ろしている。その光景は穏やかで平和的で、少女の視線がその瞬間の本質を捉えている。この画像は美的に美しく、静寂と瞑想の感覚を呼び起こす。少女のポーズと街の眺めが、都会の風景の美しさに対する驚きと感謝の感覚を生み出している。
artistString: Orangestar feat. IA
lyrics.ja.value:
I need some holiday
But I don't wish that everyday is holiday
Because I didn't bear the pain
Because it wasn't a true freedom

捨てる程に不味くもないが　言える程に美味しくもないな
自販機専売ゲテのモノ　飲み干した今日は夏の色
日差しも照りつけたんだ相当　熱いアスファルト駆け出した
知らん世界で一人旅を　昔から憧れてた夏の世界

人影の無い街の陽炎　イヤホン流れ出したメロディ
掻き消すは蝉時雨と　風に纏った夏の音
何かと駆られてたんだ焦燥　昨日の思いも吐き出せない
不安と後悔の結露を　夕立が洗い流していく夏の世界

夏の夢に染まっていたいだけ
要らない思いを消したって　泣き止まぬ声は五月蝿いな
ほら大丈夫問題ないさと
強がりの思いも吐き出した　空 (から) になる僕の存在感も透過して

夏の夢に染まっていたいだけ
お願いどうか覚めないでよ

消え去った木陰は　泣き止んだ空は
何処へ行ったの？この声は何なの？
泣き声に溺れた　夏の隅で
笑うような

このまま今日に染まっていたいだけ
何か欲しがってしまう度に　何か失ってしまうならば

なんて願ってしまう僕はもういないから
明日何を失っても　未来へ向かうと誓うからさ
あの夏の色を忘れてしまうくらいなら
この涙も代償と　笑顔で歌える僕でまた　いられるといいな

I need some holiday
But I don't wish that everyday is holiday
Because I didn't bear the pain
Because it wasn't a true freedom

title: 3DみくみくPV♪
introduction: The image features a woman wearing a headset, sitting on a couch, and playing a video game. She is holding a game controller in her hand, and her eyes are closed. The background of the image is filled with clouds, creating a dreamy and relaxed atmosphere. The woman appears to be enjoying her gaming experience, possibly immersed in the game's story or music. The mood of the image is one of relaxation and entertainment, as the woman is engaging in a leisure activity that she finds enjoyable.
introduction_ja: 画像は、ヘッドセットを装着し、ソファに座ってビデオゲームをしている女性。手にはゲームのコントローラーを持ち、目を閉じている。背景には雲が広がり、夢のようなリラックスした雰囲気を醸し出している。この女性はゲーム体験を楽しんでいるように見え、おそらくゲームのストーリーや音楽に没頭しているのだろう。この画像の雰囲気は、女性が楽しいと感じる余暇活動に従事していることから、リラックスした娯楽的なものである。
artistString: chop feat. 初音ミク

title: 【GUMI・鏡音リン】 リンカーネイション 【オリジナル曲・PV付】
introduction: The image features a young woman wearing a black dress and a red tie, standing in front of a large screen. She is surrounded by various electronic devices, including a television, a computer monitor, and a cell phone. The scene appears to be a studio or a recording studio, where the woman is likely preparing for a performance or a video recording. The mood of the image is professional and focused, as the woman is likely preparing for a professional or artistic endeavor.
introduction_ja: 黒いドレスに赤いネクタイを締めた若い女性が、大きなスクリーンの前に立っている。彼女の周りには、テレビ、コンピューターモニター、携帯電話など、さまざまな電子機器が置かれている。このシーンはスタジオかレコーディング・スタジオのようで、女性はパフォーマンスかビデオ撮影の準備をしているのだろう。画像の雰囲気はプロフェッショナルで集中しており、女性が専門的または芸術的な活動の準備をしているように見える。
artistString: kemu feat. GUMI, 鏡音リン
lyrics.ja.value:

願ったり　縋（すが）った覚えなど　無いけど
大事変混沌の立役者　演者
記憶とさ　傍（はた）迷惑の　継承

なんて素敵な事でしょう

今更　平凡に恋焦がれたり

最後に手にした林檎は

愛しく思えたんだ

存外無責任に託された

おとぎ話だって　嗤（わら）えたら
なんて素敵な事でしょう

泥沼掻（か）いて網にかかって
祭り上げんだ　天才偶像
どの道寒い延命処置で
イキがれなんてさ　もう嫌だ

カミサマずっと一人でさ
出来っこ無い理想（ゆめ）を追いかけて
馬鹿な僕らにゃそもそも
飴は　いらないんだ

最終走者（アンカー）は走る　結末へと
終わりにしようか　ここらでさ

奇跡の匣（はこ）が　無い世界で
それなりに生きて　死ねたなら
なんて素敵な事でしょう
神は最終章の今　標的と　偽（な）る
lyrics.en.value:
In this cloudy metropolis the buzzing in my ears clicks away
There aren't any memories that I really wish for or hold on to
The leading actors of this great disastrous chaos, the presenters
With an inheritance of memories and nearby troubles

In this filthy world,
I laugh in the endless rain
In this world turned to ashes,
I certainly dreamed I was finite

The final runner dashes towards the end
Shall we finish this, right here?
And yet, only once, did that irregular youth,
refuse perfection

In this world without miracles, or anything else,
if I were able to dream of a cathode ray tube,
Then wouldn't it be wonderful?
Right now, god will become my target

An answer for the reincarnation prodigy and after such a long time,
somehow, yearning for normalcy
In the hustle and bustle of an intersection, the youth is isolated
Saying “please, I'll leave the rest to you”

In this world where we're alone together,
the final apple I held in my hand,
has a well-seasoned flavor,
it so lovingly seemed to me

The final runner dashes towards the end
Trampling over the ruins of the leading role
The earth's final chance,
contrary to expectations, was irresponsibly entrusted to me

In this world without miracles, or anything else,
if I were able to smile at fairy tales,
then wouldn't that be wonderful?
Right now, god will become my target

Trudging through this dire situation, and slipping through the net
The genius images I set up so highly,
with my, in any case cold, life-prolonging treatment
are so pretentious, it's detestable

Gods are always alone,
Chasing ideals that will never come
Idiotic us, from the beginning,
We never needed, that candy

The final runner dashes towards the end
Shall we finish it, right here?
For the sake of our dreaming,
we wished for a world without dreams

In a world without this miracle box,
if I were able to live and die as I am,
then wouldn't that be wonderful?
Right now, God will become the target of my final chapter

title: アウトサイダー / 初音ミク
introduction: The image is a black and white drawing of a man holding a piece of paper, possibly a blueprint or a drawing. The man is standing in a room, and there are two other people in the background. The room appears to be a workspace or an office, with a desk and a chair visible in the background. The man's posture and the presence of the other people suggest that he might be in the process of sharing or discussing the blueprint or drawing with the other individuals. The mood of the image is casual and focused on the man's interaction with the paper.
introduction_ja: 画像は、おそらく設計図か図面であろう紙片を持った男の白黒の絵である。男は部屋の中に立っており、背景には他に2人の人物がいる。部屋はワークスペースかオフィスのようで、背景には机と椅子が見える。男性の姿勢と他の人々の存在は、彼が他の人々と設計図や図面を共有したり話し合ったりしている最中であることを示唆している。画像の雰囲気はカジュアルで、男性と紙のやりとりに焦点が当てられている。
artistString: Eve, 沼能友樹 feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
ねえねえ　この世界を　どっかでひっくり返したくて 
せいぜい　時間なんてありはしないが 
まあまあ　そんなんで少年少女揃いまして 
唸り始めた会心劇さ 
天才で人外で横暴な 
最低で最高な相棒さ 
単純で明快な考えが 
僕をここで醒ましてくれないか

今この身をもって重石をとって 
君にだけにしかできない事はなんだ 
ここにいないでくれ 
慰めなんていらないよ 
荒地になってしまわぬように 
その名を隠して　ここに現れたのさ 
のさばってる奴らを 
探って抉って 
嗤っては泣いて

ああ　しょうもないな 
勝手にやってな文句ばっか 
否定したって何したって　 
誰かのせいにしたって 
ああ　フラッシュバックして 
小心者に眩暈がして 
感情も根性も腐ってしまいました 
思い出したくない一日は 
ここに吐いてってしまえよ　 
いらんもんなんて捨てさって 
僕をここで壊してくれないか

今別れを待って　口を結んで 
沁みついた夜の傷が癒えないのなら 
涙は見せないで　こんな恥なんていらないよ 
全て失ってしまわぬように 
変わらぬものが此処にあるとするならば 
夜が明ける前に　そうさ行ってしまえと

白と黒の色のない世界に溢れた 
愛も全部ないよ嘘の世界に塗れた 
心の鬼は決して許してはくれないから

影は伸びきって　日は落ちきって 
明日を迎える事が許されたなら 
救われてたかな 
それでも僕は

今この身をもって重石をとって 
君にだけにしかできない事はなんだ 
ここにいないでくれ 
慰めなんていらないよ 
荒地になってしまわぬように 
その名を隠して　ここに現れたのさ 
のさばってる奴らを 
探って抉って 
嗤っては泣いて

その小さな勇気が僕の胸を焦がすから
lyrics.en.value:
Listen, listen, somewhere out there,
I want to turn this world upside down
Though there's just no time at best
Now, now, that way, young boys and girls gathered round
and growled in a drama after their own hearts
A prodigy, an inhuman, a tyrannical
partner who’s the best at being the worst
It’s such a simple, clear-cut wish
Won’t you awaken me, right here?

With this body, I take a weight of rocks
What's something that only you can do?
Don’t stay here
I don’t need your comfort
So that it doesn’t end up becoming a barren wasteland
I hid that name and appeared here
After searching for, forcing out, and sneering
at those who act as they please, I cry

Ah, how pathetic
Nothing but selfish complaints
Even if I deny it, even if I do something,
even if I blame someone
Ah, I had a flashback, a timid person made me feel dizzy
My emotions and spirit have rotted
Take that one day you don’t want to remember and spit it out here
Won't you throw away everything you don't need,
and destroy me right here?

Now even if I wait for our farewell, with my mouth clamped shut
and the wounds of that night that have seeped into my soul still can't be healed
Then don’t let me see your tears, I don’t need that shame
So that everything won't be lost
Then things that are unchanged will still stay here
Before the night is dyed with light, that’s right, I'm telling you to leave

Overflowing into a monochrome world where the colors don't exist
Nothing exists, not even love, smearing a world of lies
The demon within my heart will undoubtedly not forgive me

Shadows stretch as the sun sets
If I was allowed to greet tomorrow
Perhaps I would have been saved
Even so, I

With this body, I take a weight of rocks
What's something that only you can do?
Don’t stay here, I don't need your comfort
So that it doesn’t end up becoming a barren wasteland
I hid that name and appeared here
After searching for, forcing out, and sneering at those who act as they please, I cry

Because this tiny bit of courage will burn my heart

title: 【GUMI（40㍍）】 キリトリセン 【オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a young woman standing in front of a piano, holding a violin case. The background is a black and white photo of a girl playing a piano. The overall mood of the image is serene and peaceful, as the woman is focused on her instrument and the girl playing the piano in the background. The combination of the two images creates a sense of harmony and connection between the two musicians.
introduction_ja: ヴァイオリンケースを持ち、ピアノの前に立つ若い女性。背景はピアノを弾く少女のモノクロ写真。女性は自分の楽器に集中し、背景の少女はピアノを弾いているので、画像全体の雰囲気は穏やかで平和的である。この2つのイメージの組み合わせは、2人の音楽家の間に調和とつながりの感覚を生み出している。
artistString: 40mP feat. GUMI
lyrics.ja.value:
色褪せた感情を　切り離すため
刻まれた点線を　指でなぞるよ
泣けるほど簡単に　出来てしまうから
難しく考えず　千切ればいいの

それは昨日の朝まで　僕の内側にあったのに
気がつけば今は　目の前で転がっているんだ

感情論で切り取った　未完成で曖昧な恋の色は
山折　谷折　皺くちゃになってた
「関係無い」って割り切って　ゴミ箱に捨てられたなら
切り取られてゆく　昨日流した涙

閉じ込めた感情を　解き放すため
こじ開けた確信犯　声を潜めて
作られた偶然も　信じた嘘も
諦めた瞬間に　色を変えるの

要らない記憶を排除して　重たい荷物投げ出して
そこに残されたものは　弱い自分だけ
それは昨日の夜まで　綺麗な思い出だったのに
気がつけば今は　名前さえ思い出せないの

感情論で切り取った　未完成で曖昧な恋の色は
山折　谷折　皺くちゃになってた
「関係無い」って割り切って　ゴミ箱に捨てられたなら
切り取られてゆく　昨日流した涙

切り取られてゆく　昨日愛した人
lyrics.en.value:
I'm going to trace the premade dotted line with my finger
To tear off my faded emotions
It's something I can do without any effort,
so I should just tear them up without thinking too much about it

It was still inside me until yesterday morning
And yet, when I come to realize it I find it tumbling right in front of my eyes

The incomplete and ambiguous color of love that I tore off based on my sentimental argument
was folded with the mountain fold and then with the valley fold only to end up completely wrinkled
If only I could throw it into a trash can saying with confidence that this has nothing to do with me
But the tears I shed yesterday are getting torn off

I'm going to wrench open my crime of conscience in a quiet voice
to set free my confined emotions
The fabricated coincidences and the lies I trusted
will change their color the moment I give up

Once I remove all of my unnecessary memories and throw away my heavy luggage
The only thing I will be left with will be my weak self
It was still a beautiful memory within me until last night
And yet, when I come to realize it I can't even recall its name now

The incomplete and ambiguous color of love that I tore off based on my sentimental argument
Was folded with the mountain fold and then with the valley fold only to end up completely wrinkled
If only I could throw it into a trash can saying with confidence that this has nothing to do with me
But the tears I shed yesterday are getting torn off

The one I loved yesterday is getting torn off

title: 【初音ミク】ミラクルペイント【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The background of the image is a black and white checkered floor, which creates a contrasting and visually appealing effect. The main focus of the image is a cute character, likely a cartoon character, standing on the checkered floor. The character is wearing a hat and appears to be smiling, creating a cheerful and playful mood. The character is surrounded by a few other objects, such as a cup and a bowl, which could be part of a playful scene or a simple setting. The overall atmosphere of the image is lighthearted and whimsical, with the character's smile and the checkered floor adding to the joyful ambiance.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景は黒と白の市松模様の床で、コントラストと視覚に訴える効果を生み出している。画像のメイン・フォーカスは、市松模様の床の上に立っているかわいいキャラクター（おそらくアニメのキャラクター）です。キャラクターは帽子をかぶり、微笑んでいるように見え、陽気で遊び心のあるムードを作り出している。キャラクターの周りには、コップやボウルなど、遊び心のあるシーンやシンプルなセッティングの一部と思われるものがいくつか置かれている。画像全体の雰囲気は明るく気まぐれで、キャラクターの笑顔と市松模様の床が楽しい雰囲気をさらに盛り上げている。
artistString: OSTER project feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
夕闇のキャンバスに　ワインレッドの夕日を 
見送った　帰り道 
あなたのハートは　もう私のこと描いてるのかな

今夜は　時間もたっぷりあるから 
あなただけの　私でいてあげるよ 
ゆっくりと深呼吸して　見つめ合ったら

始まるよ

miracle painting 
キセキのshow time 
魔法の一筆で　夢中にさせて 
爪の先まで全て　あなた色に染めて

お気に入りのドレスに　星空のライムライト浴びながら 
得意げに　踊るつま先を 
必死に見つめるあなた　嬉しそう

今夜はいつもより　ロマンチックに 
ブルーの瞳に　粉雪のハイライト 
ぎゅっと抱き寄せて　恋のレイヤー重ねたら

動き出す

miracle painting 
キセキのロマンス 
魔法の一筆に　愛をこめて 
髪の先まで全て　あなただけのものよ

今宵はあなたと　幾つの夢を数えたかな 
溢れる思いは 
数え切れない　伝え切れない 
言い尽くせない　まだまだ足りない

だから　まだ終わらないで

miracle painting 
キセキのshow time 
魔法の一筆に　もう夢中よ 
もっともっと頂戴　私だけの色を

終わらないで　miracle painting 
魅惑のテクニック 
仕上げはまだ　ちょっと待っていてね 
あなたに伝えるから　心からの

I love you！
lyrics.en.value:
On my way back home, I watched a wine-red sunset
On a twilight canvas, is your heart already painting portraits of me?

We have plenty of time tonight
I'd be yours and yours alone as we take slow, deep breaths, gazing at each other, it begins

Miracle painting, a miraculous showtime
Hypnotize me with your magic brush
Paint me in your color all the way to the tips of my fingers

How many dreams have we counted tonight?
My feelings overflow, too many to count, to much to convey
I can't express them enough, not nearly enough, so don't let this end yet

Miracle painting, a miraculous showtime
Your magic brush has me under its spell
More, give me more, a color just for me

Don't end just yet, miracle painting, your bewitching technique
Hold off a bit on the finishing touches, I'll tell you from my heart

I love you!

title: 【初音ミク】骸骨楽団とリリア【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The background of the image is a black and white design, featuring a girl playing a piano in the center. The girl is surrounded by various musical instruments, including guitars, keyboards, and drums. The instruments are arranged in a way that creates a visually appealing and harmonious composition.The mood of the image is joyful and creative, as the girl is actively engaged in playing the piano, surrounded by a diverse collection of musical instruments. The black and white design adds a touch of nostalgia and timelessness to the scene, making it a visually striking and memorable image.
introduction_ja: 背景は白と黒のデザインで、中央にピアノを弾く少女が描かれている。少女はギター、キーボード、ドラムなど様々な楽器に囲まれている。少女が様々な楽器に囲まれながら、積極的にピアノを弾いているので、画像の雰囲気は陽気で創造的です。黒と白のデザインは、このシーンにノスタルジーと時代を超越したタッチを加え、視覚的に印象的で記憶に残る画像にしている。
artistString: トーマ feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
無口な神様が 音を捨てて傾いた 
泣き虫夜空 涙ぐんだ 
月夜に聞かせるの 誰も知らない歌 
灰色劇場 窓辺のオリオンと

何度だって聞こえる 一人きりの拙い声 
錆び付いた楽器が 海原で幻想を奏でてた 
夢の中覚えた 音色たちをただ集めて 
芽吹くように紡いだ 
星巡りの歌が届かない

ほら 歌ってたって 泣いた ひとり 
浮かんで舞った音楽祭 
君は聞こえる？ ロミア ロミア 
何年経って逢えた音に 
魔法みたいな恋をしたり 
気が付かないように

言葉を飲み干した 退屈な国の人が 
失くしたモノを探してた 
鏡を塞いでた 溶けたアンティークな日々 
火星の廃墟 真昼のカシオペア

何度だって聞こえる 忘れていた音の雨に 
絵に描いた骸骨は 孤独な想像を埋めるようで 
遠くなって溺れて 霞む空は知らないまま 
降りそそぐ世界へ連れて行って

ねえ 潤んで咲いた遠い国に 
馳せる思い くすんだ瞳 
星に願いを ロミア ロミア 
門をくぐって霧を抜けて 
奪い去ったって会いに行こう 
囁きを頼りに

歩く街並み 硝子瓶の冬 
何処かの映画のようね 
細く長い線路の上でさ 
私に色を付けて

触れてすぐ剥がれてしまう 
儚く静かな朝に 
見つけた音の欠片

ほら 歌ってたって 泣いた ひとり 
浮かんで舞った音楽祭 
君は聞こえる？ ロミア ロミア 
何年経って逢えた音に 
魔法みたいな恋をしたり 
眠るように冷める前に

目を閉じて手をあてて 
奥底の鼓動を聞いた 
途切れない旋律を 
名もなき君へと
lyrics.en.value:
The taciturn God abandoned the sound and waned, 
while the night sky, being a crybaby, was moved to tears. 
It's a song, unknown to anyone, sung only to this moonlit night, 
in a grey theater together with the Orion by the window.

No matter how many times, I can hear this lonesome unskillful voice. 
The rusted instruments were an illusion in the depths of the ocean. 
Merely gathering those timbres I heard in my dream, 
I wove them together so that they would eventually bud. 
The song of interstellar traveling will not reach its destination.

See, even though I kept singing, I was still crying alone 
in the music festival where I danced frantically. 
Are the sounds reaching your ears? Romia, Romia. 
I fell in an almost magical love with a sound, 
which I had finally met after years of separation, 
and I didn't even notice.

With their words completely drained, the people of this boring country 
began to seek out the thing they had lost. 
The melted antique days completely clogged the mirrors 
in the ruins on Mars with the Cassiopeia in the sky in broad daylight.

No matter how many times, I can hear the sound of a rain of the forlorn words, 
into which the sketched skeletons seem to be burying their lonely imagination. 
The distancing, sinking, and blurring sky, clueless about the situation, 
is taking me with it to that world where there is a heavy downpour.

To that faraway country that has been moisturized and then bloomed, 
I let my thoughts fly, while my eyes are growing dull. 
Now I make a wish to the stars, Romia, Romia. 
Passing through the gate, and find my way out of the fog, 
even if everything's taken away from me, I will go meet you. 
I will rely on the whispering voice.

The streets I'm walking on and the winter in a glass bottle 
look like a movie scene from somewhere. 
On the narrow and long railroad tracks, 
they stain me into their colors.

In the distant and quiet morning 
that loses its color as soon as it's touched, 
I found a fragment of sound.

See, even though I kept singing, I was still crying alone 
in the music festival where I danced frantically. 
Are the sounds reaching your ears? Romia, Romia. 
I fell in an almost magical love with a sound, 
which I had finally met after years of separation, 
before I would fall into a slumber and become cold.

When I closed my eyes and felt with my hand, 
I heard the beats in the depths of my chest. 
I'm sending this endless melody 
to the nameless you.

title: 【GUMI】QUEEN【Kanaria】
introduction: The image features a young woman with long black hair and a red dress, standing in a dark room with a blue background. She is holding a red rose in her hand, which adds a touch of romance and elegance to the scene. The woman appears to be looking at the camera, capturing the viewer's attention.The background of the image is dark, creating a sense of mystery and intrigue. The woman's pose and the red rose in her hand suggest a romantic or emotional moment, possibly a proposal or a special occasion. The overall mood of the image is one of love, passion, and intimacy.
introduction_ja: 青い背景の暗い部屋に、長い黒髪に赤いドレスの若い女性が立っている。手には赤いバラを持っており、このシーンにロマンスとエレガンスを添えている。背景は暗く、ミステリーと陰謀を感じさせる。女性のポーズと手に持っている赤いバラは、ロマンチックな瞬間や感動的な瞬間、おそらくプロポーズや特別な日を暗示している。画像全体の雰囲気は、愛、情熱、親密さのひとつである。
artistString: Kanaria feat. V3 GUMI (English)

Lie Bye Baby
My My My Life

title: 【巡音ルカオリジナル曲】ワンダーラスト【PV】
introduction: The image features a young girl standing in a forest, with a large tree in the background. She is wearing a red dress and appears to be in a state of contemplation or meditation. The overall mood of the image is serene and peaceful, as the girl seems to be in a calm and tranquil environment. The background of the image is a forest, which adds to the sense of calmness and natural beauty. The girl's pose and the setting create a sense of introspection and connection with nature.
introduction_ja: 大きな木を背景に、森の中に佇む少女が描かれている。彼女は赤いドレスを着ており、瞑想しているように見える。少女が穏やかで静かな環境にいるように見えるので、画像の全体的な雰囲気は穏やかで平和的である。画像の背景は森で、静けさと自然の美しさをさらに引き立てている。少女のポーズと設定が、内省と自然とのつながりを感じさせる。
artistString: sasakure.UK feat. 巡音ルカ

title: 【KAITO】千年の独奏歌(オリジナル曲)
introduction: The image features a man holding a sword in a snowy landscape. The background is a blurry white, which could be interpreted as a snowstorm or a blizzard. The man is wearing a black coat, which adds to the overall atmosphere of the image. The sword he is holding is also blurry, which could be due to the snowy conditions or the camera's focus on the man. The mood of the image is one of action and adventure, as the man is engaged in a battle or a challenging situation in the snowy environment. The blurry background and the blurry sword suggest that the scene is taking place in a dynamic and fast-paced moment.
introduction_ja: 雪景色の中で剣を構える男。背景はぼやけた白で、吹雪か吹雪と解釈できる。男は黒いコートを着ており、それが画像全体の雰囲気を高めている。彼が持っている剣もぼやけているが、これは雪が降っているせいかもしれないし、カメラが男性にピントを合わせているせいかもしれない。画像の雰囲気はアクションと冒険であり、男は雪の中で戦いや困難な状況に従事している。ぼやけた背景とぼやけた剣は、このシーンがダイナミックでテンポの速い瞬間に起こっていることを示唆している。
artistString: yanagiP feat. KAITO
lyrics.ja.value:
ひとり灰色の丘　乾いた枯草踏みしめて 
思い巡らせる　空の彼方に 

風に揺れる花びら　柔らかなあなたの微笑み 
淡い記憶のかけら　セピア色の向こうの幻 

誰も知らない　歌を奏でよう 
 この身が錆びて　停まろうとも 
崩れかけた墓標に　歌い続けよう 
 あなたの　残した歌を 

この体は全て　作り物でしかないけど 
 この心はせめて　歌に捧げていよう 

沈む夕陽に向かう　色あせたギターを片手に 
響くこだまに踊る　影法師 

擦り切れた指先は　光を鈍く照り返して 
口ずさむメロディは　風に乗って空の向こうまで 

かすかに軋む　銀の歯車 
 響いてゆく　 鈍色 にびいろの鼓動 
ガラスの瞳に　映るこの空は 
 どんな　まやかしだろう 

この月の下で　もうめぐり逢うこともないけど 
 この空に向かって　歌い続けていよう 

あなたと出逢った　すみれの丘も 
幾千の夜に　灰色の 亡骸 なきがら 

この体は全て　作り物でしかないけど 
 この心はせめて　歌に捧げていよう 
 この月の下で　もうめぐり逢うこともないけど 
 この空に向かって　歌い続けていよう
lyrics.en.value:
Alone on a gray hill,
Stepping on the withered grass.
I let my thoughts wander,
Into the far side of the sky

The flower petals waver in the wind,
Like your gentle smile
The fragments of faint memories,
Like an illusion on the far side of sepia

Let's play a song
Known to no one
Even if this body
Is to rust and stop
I will continue to sing
To the collapsing gravestone
The song
You left behind

Although this entire body
Is nothing but artificial
At least this heart,
Let it be dedicated to you in songs

Towards the setting evening sun,
A discoloured guitar in one hand.
A silhouette dances
In the resounding echoes

The worn out fingertips
Dully reflect the light
The melody I hummed rides the wind
To the other side of the sky.

The slight creaking
Of the silver gears
Its dull vibration
Reverhebrates
The sky that is reflected
On these glass eyes
Just how factitious is it?

Underneath this moon,
There's no longer a way to meet you again, but
Towards this sky,
I will still continue to sing

Even the hill full of violets
Where I met you
Over thousand of nights,
Only grey remains are left behind

Although this entire body
Is noting but artificial
At least this heart,
Let it be dedicated to you in songs
Underneath this moon,
There's no longer a way to meet you again, but
Towards this sky,
I will still continue to sing

title: 【鏡音リン】いろは唄【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image is a black and white illustration of a woman with long black hair and a black dress. She is sitting on a chair with a rose in her hair, and there are two more roses on the floor in front of her. The woman appears to be in a contemplative or melancholic mood, as she is sitting alone in the chair with the roses around her. The black and white color scheme adds to the overall mood of the image, creating a sense of mystery and depth.
introduction_ja: 画像は長い黒髪に黒いドレスの女性の白黒イラスト。椅子に腰掛け、髪にバラを挿している。バラの花に囲まれた椅子に一人で座っているため、この女性は瞑想的、あるいはメランコリックな気分に浸っているように見える。黒と白の配色が画像全体の雰囲気を高め、神秘的で深みのある感覚を生み出している。

lyrics.en.value:
If it is what you desire
I can be like an obedient dog
and let you tie me up with a cord, rope or chain

Or if you prefer,
I can be endearing like a kitten
and delight you with my fingers, feet and lips

Whoever indulges their passions first,
such things do not matter

Even the blossoming flowers will eventually scatter
Who in our world is unchanging?
I want to know more and more profoundly

I cross the deep mountains of karma today
I shall not have superficial dreams nor be deluded
I will be stained in your colors
Ha ni ho he to chi ri nu ru o

Ah

For instance, if like a camellia flower,

I would expose my body
to snow, to frost and survive

Or if you would rather see a splendid rose on the verge of falling,
I'll depart the world with my neck, my hair clad in fragrance

I have yet to be stained to the bone
I won't be satisfied with only so much

Even the blossoming flowers will eventually scatter
Who in our world is unchanging?

Ah

title: 【Lily】WAVE【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features a black and white background with a single, long, blue line drawn across it. The line appears to be a wave, creating a sense of movement and fluidity. The image is minimalistic and abstract, with no other elements or distractions. The mood of the image is calm and serene, with a focus on the simple, elegant design of the wave. The output of the image would be a high-quality, minimalist print or digital artwork that captures the essence of the wave and its movement.
introduction_ja: 黒と白の背景に青く長い線が1本引かれている。この線は波のようにも見え、動きと流動性を感じさせる。この画像はミニマルで抽象的で、他の要素や雑念はない。波のシンプルでエレガントなデザインに焦点を当てた、穏やかで落ち着きのあるムード。このイメージのアウトプットは、波とその動きの本質を捉えた、高品質でミニマルなプリントまたはデジタル・アートワークとなるでしょう。
artistString: niki feat. Lily

lyrics.en.value:
To make a mistake, the universe is ending

Flying through,

title: アンドロメダアンドロメダ / 初音ミク
introduction: The background of this image is a blue sky, which creates a bright and cheerful atmosphere. The foreground features a young girl in a blue dress, who is jumping up and down, possibly in excitement or joy. The girl is holding a cell phone in her hand, which could be a part of her daily routine or a means of capturing the moment. The overall mood of the image is energetic and playful, with the girl's enthusiastic jumping motion and the blue sky providing a positive and lively setting.
introduction_ja: 背景は青空で、明るく陽気な雰囲気を醸し出している。前景には青いドレスを着た少女が描かれており、興奮しているのか喜んでいるのか、飛び跳ねている。少女の手には携帯電話が握られているが、これは彼女の日課の一部か、あるいはこの瞬間をとらえるための手段かもしれない。画像全体の雰囲気はエネルギッシュで遊び心があり、少女の熱狂的なジャンプの動きと青空がポジティブで活気のある環境を提供している。
songTitle: アンドロメダアンドロメダ

title: 【GUMI】ポーカーフェイス【オリジナル曲PV付】
introduction: The image features a black and white background with a girl's face in the center. She has a large, black eye, and her hair is styled in a messy bun. The girl is wearing a black shirt, which is partially visible. The background is filled with various text elements, including the words "WTF" and "You Are," which are written in different fonts and styles. The overall mood of the image is mysterious and intriguing, with the girl's expression and the text elements creating a sense of curiosity and confusion.
introduction_ja: 黒と白の背景の中央に少女の顔が描かれている。黒目が大きく、髪は乱れたお団子ヘア。少女は黒いシャツを着ており、部分的に見えている。背景には、「WTF」や「You Are」など、さまざまなフォントやスタイルで書かれたテキストが配置されている。画像全体の雰囲気はミステリアスで興味をそそるもので、少女の表情とテキスト要素が好奇心と混乱の感覚を生み出している。

I put on an unclear mask… maybe 
I showed it until now, but is that also a lie?

Hold out the insufficient heart I wanna meet

Good luck, bad luck, the clown’s falling

But even like so, even like this, it’s gotta get through your head

That way, this way, the devil’s over here 
You’re playing right into my hands, I want you

“No, no, that dude’s a fake”

All the time, all the time, I trick people

‘Cause before I can play my last trump card
