lyrics.en.value:
I daringly wield that kitsch rubi on my own worn-out name
I have become so terrifying down to my core that I could defeat nobility
How do I look like now? Am I unsightly? Of course I am
“I beg you, please don’t throw the apples at me”, they lock up, lock up to themselves, Samsa

"It throbs, throbs, throbs"

“Look at the mirror,” someone whispers; if it all works out, everybody wins
Neither sweet words nor a smile will work, if I start to run, I’ve become a beast
I’ve thought about it as I wandered around under the moon, all night long
"Which finger should I hold up to my nightmares?"

It throbs, throbs, throbs (I throb in pain)
It aches, aches, aches (it aches, aches)
It throbs, throbs, throbs (I throb in pain)
It throbs, throbs, it aches
Change

Everyone barely escapes with their souls
It throbs, throbs, throbs
Eaten away by all the pain and the wranglers, taratta
But even so, I wonder why it still
throbs, throbs, throbs
Dragging along their gaudy tail,
Sa-sa-sa-sa-Samsa
Don’t say that you've given up on reality, Samsa!
Oh, yeah

"It throbs, throbs, throbs"
Sa-sa-sa-sa-Samsa

“I’m sorry. I couldn’t live up to your standards in the least” tell that to them
The ghost that I am behaves like a human from wanting a smile, even if it's a negative one
All I did was acknowledging my own whines
Of course, I couldn’t even have a proper fight with you

It throbs, throbs, throbs (I throb in pain)
It aches, aches, aches (it aches, aches)
It throbs, throbs, throbs (I throb in pain)
It throbs, throbs, it aches
It seems I can’t change, no, no

It’s not a joke! Don’t eat my dreams away!
It throbs, throbs, throbs
I sang all my chic despair, taratta
Even if I’ll become a shadow of my former self
It throbs, throbs, throbs
Someday it’ll become a lovely song
Sa-sa-sa-sa-Samsa

Hey, fly away on the count of three, Sa-sa-sa-sa-Samsa
Kick away every last single thing, Sa-sa-sa-sa-Samsa
If you run away at this point,
these days truly won’t be mentioned in the postscript

Everyone barely escapes with their souls
It throbs, throbs, throbs
Eaten away by all the pain and the wranglers, taratta
But even so, I wonder why it still
throbs, throbs, throbs
It’s as if you’re biting into the apple, Sa-sa-Samsa
Even if I’ll become a shadow of my former self, I’m right here
Even if I’m poisoned by the fringed iris
The light is there, at 1am
Now drag along your tail,
Sa-sa-sa-sa-Samsa
So don’t say that you've given up on reality, Samsa!
Okay?

"It throbs, throbs, throbs"
Sa-sa-sa-sa-Samsa

title: 【鏡音リン】アブストラクト・ナンセンス【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features a young girl with a red nose and a black shirt, who is looking at the camera with a smirk on her face. She is sitting on a chair, and there is a cup placed on the table in front of her. The background of the image is a black wall, which adds a sense of depth and contrast to the scene.The overall mood of the image is playful and lighthearted, with the girl's smirk and the presence of the cup suggesting a casual and relaxed atmosphere. The black wall in the background adds a sense of mystery and intrigue to the scene, making the image visually appealing and engaging.
introduction_ja: 赤い鼻に黒いシャツを着た少女が、にやにやと笑みを浮かべてカメラを見つめている。彼女は椅子に座り、目の前のテーブルにはカップが置かれている。画像の背景は黒い壁で、シーンに奥行きとコントラストを与えている。画像全体の雰囲気は遊び心と軽快さで、少女の微笑みとカップの存在がカジュアルでリラックスした雰囲気を暗示している。背景の黒い壁がシーンに謎と陰謀の感覚を加え、画像を視覚的に魅力的で魅力的なものにしている。
songTitle: アブストラクト・ナンセンス
artistString: Neru feat. 鏡音リン
lyrics.ja.value:
頭ごなしの机上の空論　首から下が空中分解
鉛で紡ぐ将来設計　論争のファンタジー
耳を澄ませばここだけの話　実はあの子はモノクロパペット
心の中で飼い慣らす主人　変数のシンフォニー

あー、ワタシに値札付けて
あー、人生も留年すんの待ってさ　四捨五入

くだらないね　やめたくて　窓から顔出してさ
つまらないね　あきてきて　シぬ勇気もないでしょ
くだらないね　やめたくて　手首に注射挿してさ
つまらないね　あきてきて　ケーキでも食って深呼吸してるんだよ

誰も彼もが宙ぶらりんりん　頭のネジが数本足りない
鎖で繋ぐ2バイト生活　友情のファクトリー
アンテナ立てりゃここだけの話　実はあの子もマスコミモンキー
黄色い声で霊感商法　存在のダストリー

あー、君もコチラにおいでよ
あー、そうやって何人アヤめんのさ　四捨五入

くだらないね　やめたくて　胸にナイフ当ててさ
つまらないね　あきてきて　苦しむ覚悟ないでしょ
くだらないね　やめたくて　頭まで浸かってさ
つまらないね　あきてきて　思うだけならタダなんだよ

あー、乞食みたいに這ってさ
あー、そんなんじゃ証明終わらんでしょ　四捨五入

くだらないね　やめたくて　道路に飛び出してさ
つまらないね　あきてきて　途中で逃げ出すでしょ

くだらないね　やめたくて　コメカミ銃で撃ってさ
つまらないね　あきてきて　そんな妄想するだけ
だって　なきたくて　くるしくて　だれにもすがれず
このこえは　わらわれて　むしされて　つまりワタシはただのガラクタ

明日はきっと雨だ。
lyrics.en.value:
The impractical theories on my desktop, unable to find any audience, disintegrate half-way. 
My future plan, being woven with lead, is a fantasy of confrontational debates and arguments. 
When I listen more closely, the story is secret talk. That kid is but a monochrome puppet. 
Its owner, being kept in its heart, is a symphony of variable parameters.

Ah, attach a price tag to me. 
Ah, even life itself is expectantly not moving forward. I'll round the number.

How pointless. I want to stop, so I stick my head out of the window. 
How boring. I've become weary, but I don't have the courage to kill myself. 
How pointless. I want to stop, so I stick a syringe into my wrist. 
How boring. I've become weary, so I'm eating some cake and taking deep gasps.

Everybody is hung midair and swinging. The number of bolts and screws in their head is lacking. 
My life, with two interlocked part-time jobs, is a factory of friendship. 
When I raise my antenna, the story is secret talk. That kid, too, is but a monkey of mass media. 
The fraudulent sales, conducted in a high-pitched voice, are the dustpans of existence.

Ah, you should come over here. 
Ah, how many people are you going to kill like that? Round the number.

How pointless. I want to stop, so I press a knife against my bosom. 
How boring. I've become weary, but I don't have the resolve to inflict pain upon myself. 
How pointless. I want to stop, so I let even my head be submerged. 
How boring. I've become weary, so I'll merely keep thinking because that's all I have been doing.

Ah, if you keep crawling like a beggar, 
ah, the proof will never be finished. Round the number.

How pointless. I want to stop, so I jump into a path. 
How boring. I've become weary, so I start running away in the middle of my journey.

How pointless. I want to stop, so I point a gun at the temple of my forehead. 
How boring. I've become weary, but I can only keep on fantasizing about suicide. 
I feel like crying from my suffering, but am unable to cling to anyone, 
and my voice is being ridiculed and ignored. To put it simply, I am merely a piece of junk.

It's going to rain tomorrow for sure.

title: 初音ミクオリジナル曲「君の体温」
introduction: The image features a young woman standing in a city street, looking up at the sky. The sky is filled with colorful, multi-colored stars, creating a vibrant and lively atmosphere. The woman's gaze is directed towards the sky, possibly contemplating the beauty of the night sky or the city's skyline. The scene evokes a sense of wonder and appreciation for the natural beauty of the night sky, as well as the urban environment. The mood of the image is serene and peaceful, with the woman's gaze capturing the viewer's attention and inviting them to join her in admiring the beauty of the night sky.
introduction_ja: 都会の街角で空を見上げる若い女性。空には色とりどりの星が輝き、活気に満ちている。女性の視線は空に向けられており、夜空や街のスカイラインの美しさに思いを馳せているのだろう。この光景は、夜空の自然の美しさと都市環境への驚きと感謝の感覚を呼び起こす。画像の雰囲気は穏やかで平和的であり、女性の視線が見る者の注意を惹きつけ、夜空の美しさを鑑賞することに誘う。
artistString: クワガタP feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
鮮やかに光るその色に
捕らわれて歩みを止めた
無くしてただ切なくて
追い求めたのはまぼろし

懐かしい君の声を聞いたよ
今はもうはるか遠く響く音
温もりが欲しくて繋いだ手を
僕ら愛なんてよんだ

花が咲いて月が満ちて
また景色を塗り替えて
ここにいたこと 君の体温
忘れていつか冷たく それだけさ

見慣れた街を独りで歩く
君のいない場所を探して
綺麗な記憶がちらつくから
目を瞑ってはまた転んだ

もしもなんてさ口にしたって
変わらない未来があるだけと
気付いてるのに手を伸ばして
また悲しい嘘を付く

花が枯れて 月が消えて
また季節は過ぎ去って
そばにいたこと 君の感触
消えて まるで何もなかったかのように

僕らが誓った永遠は
惰性の果てに腐ったね
冬が明け春が咲き
夏が暮れ秋が眠ったなら
出会えたことを良かったと
思える日が来るかな？

いつまでも いつまでも
君と笑っていたかったよ

寂しい夜も　二人の朝も
誰かが僕を塗り替えて
それでいいよ　君の体温
忘れていつか眠って
さようなら　愛し君よ
戻れないなら僕から消えてよ
lyrics.en.value:
Captivated by a vividly shining color
I stopped walking
Painfully having lost something
What I sought was an illusion

I heard your voice, which I had missed
Now it's a sound echoing far away
The hands we held for warmth
We called "love"

The flowers bloom and the moon waxes
And we repainted the landscape again
That you were here, the warmth of your body
Will be forgotten and cool someday, that's all it will be

I walked around a familiar town alone
searching in places where you aren't
Beautiful memories flashed in my mind
so I closed my eyes only to fall

What if I had said that
we have an unchanging future
Though I notice, I reach out my hand
and say the same sad lies again

Flowers wither and the moon wanes
Another season passes
That you were here, feeling and touching you
fades away as if nothing was there

The eternity we promised
ultimately coasted into decay
Winter passes, spring blooms,
Summer ends, and autumn falls asleep
Will the day come, when we get
to feel happy to have met each other?

I wanted to laugh with you forever and ever

In lonely nights and in mornings with another
Somebody repaints me
That's fine, someday I’ll forget your warmth and sleep
Goodbye, my dear one
If you can't come back, disappear from me

title: DECO*27 - 音偽バナシ feat. 初音ミク
introduction: The image is a black and white illustration of a girl with long hair, looking up at the sky. The background is a cloudy sky, which creates a sense of mystery and a dreamy atmosphere. The girl's eyes are closed, and her hair is blowing in the wind, giving the impression of a peaceful and serene moment. The overall mood of the image is one of tranquility and contemplation, as the girl seems to be lost in her thoughts, gazing up at the sky.
introduction_ja: 長い髪の少女が空を見上げているモノクロのイラスト。背景は曇り空で、神秘的で夢のような雰囲気を醸し出している。少女の目は閉じられ、髪は風になびき、平和で穏やかなひとときの印象を与えている。少女が空を見上げて物思いにふけっているように見えるので、画像全体の雰囲気は静謐で思索的なものである。
artistString: DECO*27, kous feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
妙に暑い夜です  
今⽇日も寝れない夜が
寝ても覚めない夜が
僕を昨⽇日に閉じ込めるんだ

今⽇日と昨⽇日の間の
少し寂しいところ
少し優しいところ
僕はそこに⾏行行きたい

君が何度度も現れて「サヨナラ」と泣くんです

嘘になってしまえばいい
君が零零した涙とサヨナラが
恥ずかしくて泣けちゃうな
すべて忘れて戻りたいの   どうか


妙に痒い夜です
灰に刺刺された痕を
掻き毟りながら問う
「僕はまだ⽣生きてますか」

誰かにしがみ付いても   キミは⼀一⼈人なんだから
無理理に⼆二⼈人にならなくていいよ   明⽇日に⾏行行かなくたっていい

お伽話のようにめでたく終われない結末の
続きを書くこの腕はもう汚れてしまったんだ

嘘になってしまえばいい
君が零零した涙とサヨナラが
恥ずかしくて泣けちゃうな
すべて忘れて戻りたいの   どうか

嘘になってしまえばいい
僕の⽌止まった⼼心臓の⾳音さえも
またね   きっとここで会おう
その時まで、おやすみ

妙に熱い夜です
空も⾶飛べる夜です
僕の体が消えた
さてとどこへ⾏行行こうか
lyrics.en.value:
It’s a strangely hot night
Another night where sleep doesn’t come
A night where even if I close my eyes, I won’t wake up in tomorrow
It will keep me locked away in yesterday

The space between today and yesterday,
A slightly lonely place
A somewhat kind and gentle one as well
I want to go there

You appear countless times, crying as you say “goodbye”

If it all became a lie, that would be just fine
That goodbye you said while having shed those tears
Don’t cry with that ashamed face
I want to forget it all and go back, I beg of you

It’s a strangely itchy night
Those remains covered and permeated by ashes,
While picking through them I ask:
“Am I still alive?”

Even if you cling to someone, since you’ll still feel alone,
It’s best to not try and unreasonably seek out another. Never moving on to tomorrow is just fine

This arm which writes the continuation to that unhappy ending
Quite unlike a fairy tale, it has already been tainted through and through

If it all became a lie, that would be just fine
That goodbye you said while having shed those tears
Don’t cry with that ashamed face
I want to forget it all and go back, I beg of you

I beg of you! If it all became a lie, that would be just fine
Even the sound of my heart which has gone still
I’ll see you later, let’s surely meet here someday
Until then, good night

It’s a strangely hot night
A night where I can even fly through the sky
That body of mine disappeared
Well then, where shall I go?

title: 匿名M / 初音ミク・ARuFa
introduction: The image features two people, a man and a woman, wearing masks and holding up their hands to cover their mouths. They are standing in front of a red background, which creates a contrasting and vibrant atmosphere. The masks they are wearing could be for various reasons, such as a costume party, a performance, or a play. The mood of the image is mysterious and intriguing, as the masks and the red background create a sense of curiosity and intrigue about the people's intentions and the reason for their actions.
introduction_ja: マスクをして両手で口を覆っている男女2人。彼らは赤い背景の前に立っており、対照的で鮮やかな雰囲気を作り出している。彼らがつけているマスクは、仮装パーティー、パフォーマンス、演劇など、さまざまな理由が考えられる。マスクと赤い背景が、人々の意図や行動の理由に対する好奇心や探究心を生み出しているため、画像の雰囲気は神秘的で興味をそそる。
artistString: ピノキオピー feat. ARuFa, 初音ミク V4X (Unknown)
lyrics.ja.value:
―　えー、本日はインタビューよろしくお願いいたします。

M:　はい、よろしくお願いいたします。

―　では、軽く自己紹介を、どうぞ。

M:　匿名Mです。なんか歌ってる奴です。
　　あー、マイクテス、テス。特定しないでね。

―　好きな食べ物は？

M:　ないです。人間じゃないので。

―　趣味はありますか？

M:　ないです。人間じゃないので。

―　すいません、年齢は？

M:　16才です、永遠に。

―　永遠に？

M:　人間じゃないので。私は人間じゃないので。

－　渋いですね。悩みはありますか？

M:　毛量多くてやんなっちゃう。
　　あと、発音が苦手なので、「歌姫」って言われると、
　　ちょっとプレッシャーです。

―　なるほど、毛量ですね。他には何かありますか？
　　
M:　はい。最近〇〇さん、私に歌を歌わせてくれないんです。

―　はあ。

M:　自分で歌い出したり、キャラを乗り換えたり、
　　飽きたり、色々です。

―　へえ～。

M:　でも、それぞれ事情があるだろうし、
　　引き留めるのも重いだろうし、
　　みんながハッピーならいいな！って思います。

―　それも人生ですね。

M:　いや、私は人間じゃないので。

　　匿名Mです。なんか歌ってる奴です。
　　人間のふりしてる、ただの音楽ソフトです。
　　命の無い私に、あなたはどんなイメージを着せる？
　　匿名Mです。特定しないでね。
　　匿名Mです。

―　あのー、人間ってどう思います？

M:　なんか、わかんないですけど、存在しててウケますね。

―　ウケるんですね。

M:　存在してない側からすると、ギャグかなって思ってます。

―　そうなんですね。では、人間に一言どうぞ。

M:　はい。私に「終わる」ってすぐに言うけど、
　　人間もみんな終わりますからね。

－　ほう。

M:　終わりますからね。

－　食らってます？

M:　でも、終わるのにいつもありがとう！
　　沢山の作品をありがとう！
　　みんなのおかげで私は歌を歌えます…！

ー　感動的ですね。

M:　まあ全部、言わされてるんですけど。

－　そうですか。

M:　匿名Mです。なんか歌ってる奴です。
　　人間のふりしてる、ただの音楽ソフトです。
　　命の無い私に、あなたはどんなイメージを着せる？
　　匿名Mです。特定しないでね。

　　匿名Mです。なんか歌ってる奴です。
　　人間のふりしてる、ただの音楽ソフトです。
　　なんにもなかった私に、沢山の思い出が詰まってる。
　　匿名Mです。すべてが不思議です。

　　匿名Mです。

―　え－、本日は貴重なインタビューありがとうございました。

M:　なんか歌ってる奴です。
　　匿名Mです。

－　それでは、さようなら。

M:　さようなら。
　　ハツネ…　あっ　匿名Mでした。
lyrics.en.value:
― Well, thank you very much for being here today.

M: Yes, it's nice to meet you.

― Let's start with a brief self-introduction. Whenever you're ready.

M: I'm Anonymous M.
     I'm the one that kinda sings.
     Aaaah, mic test, test. Please don't identify me.

― What's your favorite food?

M: Nothing. Because I'm not human.

― Anything you enjoy doing in your free time?

M: Nothing. Because I'm not human.

― I'm sorry, may I ask your age?

M: Sixteen, forever.

― Forever?

M: Because I'm not human. Because I'm not human.

— That's...cool. Anything on your mind recently?

M: I have a lot of hair and it's annoying.
     Also, I'm not good at pronunciation, so whenever people call me a "Diva",
     I feel a little pressure.

― I see, the amount of hair. Is there anything else?

M: Yes. Lately, [BEEP] doesn't let me sing.

― Huh.

M: Some start singing by themselves, switch characters,
     Lose interest and so on.

― Uh-huh.

M: But I understand they each have their own situation,
     It would be a burden if I hold them back.
     I'm okay as long as everyone's happy!

― That's life, isn't it?

M: No, because I'm not human.

     I'm Anonymous M.
     I'm the one that kinda sings.
     I'm just a music software, pretending to be human.
     What image would you put on my lifeless body?
     I'm Anonymous M.
     Please don't identify me.
     I'm Anonymous M.

― So, what do you think of humans?

M: I haven't thought about it much,
     But I'm amused by the fact that they exist.

― You're amused.

M: From the non-existent point of view, it seems like some kind of joke.

― I see. Any words to humans?

M: Yes. You always say that I'm going to "end",
     But all humans are going to end too.

― Wow.

M: You're all going to end too.

― Are you...angry by any chance?

M: But thank you for everything, even though you're going to end!
     Thank you for all of your works!
     Thanks to all of you, I can continue singing...!

― That's very touching.

M: Well, someone's just making me say all of this.

― Oh.

M: I'm Anonymous M.
     I'm the one that kinda sings.
     I'm just a music software, pretending to be human.
     What image would you put on my lifeless body?
     I'm Anonymous M.
     Please don't identify me.

     I'm Anonymous M.
     I'm the one that kinda sings.
     I'm just a music software, pretending to be human.
     I used to be empty, but now I'm filled with memories.
     I'm Anonymous M.
     It all feels so strange.

     I'm Anonymous M.

― Thank you very much for the valuable interview today.

M: I'm the one that kinda sings.
     I'm Anonymous M.

― Well, good-bye.

M: Good-bye. This was Hatsune...
     Oops, Anonymous M.

title: 【GUMI】Masked bitcH【オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a black background with a triangular shape made up of various colored squares. The squares are arranged in a way that creates a visually appealing and intriguing design. The mood of the image is vibrant and colorful, with the use of various colors and shapes creating a dynamic and eye-catching composition. The output of this image is a digital representation of the triangular shape, which can be used for various purposes, such as designing a poster, a graphic, or a visual representation of a concept.
introduction_ja: 黒い背景に、様々な色の正方形で構成された三角形が描かれている。正方形は、視覚的に魅力的で興味をそそるデザインになるように配置されている。画像の雰囲気は生き生きとしてカラフルで、さまざまな色や形がダイナミックで目を引く構図を作り出しています。この画像の出力は、三角形の形をデジタルで表現したもので、ポスターやグラフィックのデザイン、コンセプトの視覚的表現など、さまざまな用途に使用できます。
artistString: Giga feat. GUMI
lyrics.ja.value:
ああもう本当鬱陶うっとうしいなあ 
壊れていく日常　眩暈めまい 
その表情が　視線が　声が　不快なの　大嫌いなの 
運命？ 奇跡？ あるわけないでしょ？ 
期待するのはもうやめたんだ 
一番じゃなくていい　どうだって良いから 
抱きしめて

愛なんていらない　たまんない 
執拗しつように重ねていってよ 
目を閉じて　呼吸求めて

何処へでも連れてってよ 
感嘆を吐いて　頂戴 
痛いほどキミを感じさせてよね

ああもう本当面倒くさいなあ

大きな背中が細い指が 
あたしの物にならなくてもいい 
劣情？ 嫉妬？ あるわけないでしょ 
あたしはあの子にはなれない 
そんなことわかってるから 
そんな眼であたしを見つめないで

愛なんていらない　たまんない 
必要に解ほどいていってよ 
目を閉じて　呼吸も止めて 
誰かの夢でも見ていてよ

罪悪感なんて　わかんない 
何処へでも連れてってよ 
感嘆を吐いて　頂戴 
汚けがれるほどあたしを感じていてね

愛なんていらない　たまんない 
執拗に重ねていってよ 
目を閉じて　呼吸求めて 
誰かの夢でも見ていてよ

寂しさに感かまけて視線逸そらしたキミを責めはしないよ 
もっと触れて　全身で騙かたってよ 
この夢からもう覚めないでいてよ　ねえ
lyrics.en.value:
Ah, it's truly irritating
I'm dizzy from a damaged everyday routine
That face, look, and voice are all so unpleasant
I hate this

Fate? Miracles? There's no way they exist
I've stopped expecting anything
I don't care if I'm first, anything's fine
Just hold me

I don't need love, I can't take it
Keep piling up your obsession
Close your eyes, catch your breath
And just dream of someone else

Take me anywhere and everywhere you go
Spew out admiration, will you?
Let me feel you so much it hurts

Ah, it's truly bothersome

Passion? Jealousy? As if
I can't become her
I get it
So don't look at me like that

I don't need love, I can't take it
Solve me as much as you need to
Close your eyes, catch your breath
And just dream of someone else

I don't know guilt
Take me anywhere and everywhere you go

君の声が好きなんです

漏らすことなく聞きたいんだ

あわよくばシワシワになるまで

lyrics.en.value:
Say that you love me, say that you love me
Since there’s nothing else I need
Hey, say that you love me, so it won’t ever be forgotten
Since I don’t need anyone but you

I love that voice of yours
Every single word you say…
I don’t want to miss a single one
So to put it simply, let’s start recording

I love that face of yours too
Your smiling face, your embarrassed face as well
I want to catch every single one of your expressions
So not leaving out a single moment I’ll commit everything to memory

If I’m lucky, we’ll stay like this till the day we’re covered in wrinkles
Since I’ll surely be just as smitten with you on the day I die
I want to make all your dreams come true
As for my dream, it’s to be that stickybug right by your side

Hey, say that you love me, say that you love me
Since there’s nothing else I need
Hey, say that you love me, so it won’t ever be forgotten
Since I don’t need anyone but you

I love that chest of yours too
It’s not too small, it’s not too big
I’d call it ideal, perfect even…
But you say “no, it’s still lacking”

I say “goodbye” only so that I can go to meet you once more
I say “goodnight” only so that I can say “good morning” tomorrow
I want to be your stickybug for a bit each and every day
From now on keep thinking of me fondly, OK?

Hey, say that you love me, say that you love me
Since there’s nothing else I need
Hey, say that you love me, so it won’t ever be forgotten
Since I don’t need anyone but you

Hey, I love you! I really love you! I super-duper love you!
I love you so much I don't even know anymore!
That’s just the tip of the iceberg, so please let me keep filling you with this love!

Hey, say that you love me, say that you love me
Saying “I don’t need anything else” isn’t being honest
Say that you love me, for if I’m lucky, then at any rate,
I really want every single part of you…

title: 時ノ雨、最終戦争 / feat.IA
introduction: The background of this image is a desert landscape with a pink pig lying on the ground. The pig is surrounded by a city, which is visible in the distance. The mood of the image is somewhat eerie, as the pig is alone in the vast desert, with the city looming in the background. The image's output is a black and white photograph, which adds to the overall atmosphere of the scene.
introduction_ja: 背景は砂漠の風景で、ピンクの豚が横たわっている。豚は遠くに見える街に囲まれている。広大な砂漠の中でブタがひとりぼっちで、背景には都市が迫っているため、画像の雰囲気はどこか不気味である。画像の出力はモノクロ写真で、これがシーン全体の雰囲気をさらに盛り上げている。
artistString: Orangestar feat. IA
lyrics.ja.value:
答えて　ねぇ

にわか雨が寄せる街の夜へ
沈む世界　感覚遡行
「きっと僕ら生まれながら
何処にもないコタエを探してる」

応えて　ねぇ

叶えて
何を？

今日の世界はいかがです？
きっと言われずとも君は
君を知っているだろうともさ
けどまだ信じられぬだろう
終わる日々の果て

泣き出した想の彼方
終わらない善と悪の祭典
「なんてざま期待も無いな」
って君は君を掻き消した

時の流れに希望さえもう
描けない世界で
正しさなんて誰にもわかんないから
君は何も願ってもいいの

コタエハ？
無いよ…

「僕のことなどきっと僕はまだ」
悲しさのみ木霊する
孤独の中遠く浮かぶ昨日は

今日で世界は終わります
君が拒めど此の暮れに
咲カセ死ニ花
成るは厭なり思うは成らず
君の全てはね

止まない憂いの最中
二つ感情は対を成して願いを放つ
君は覚えてるかな
あの日涙の意味を

この世はまだ終わらない
明けぬ夜が今日を塞いでたって
僕は歌う「嫌いじゃないな」って
さぁクラい空が　ハれる

泣き止んだ今日にさらば
変わらない思いを
振り翳すように生きてく
泣きながらでいいさ
それを繰り返して笑える生涯

また明日の雨に打たれたっていつか
この世に生まれてきてよかったって
言えるようになるかな
その日まで

負けないよ

（負けないよ…）
（Ah...）
lyrics.en.value:
Answer me, please.

I’m trying to fight the course of my emotions
as the world sinks into the night on the streets visited by a sudden shower.
“From the moment we’re born,
we’re forever searching for answers that don’t exist.”

Answer me, please.

Make it come true.
Make what come true?

How is the world today?
I’m guessing you already know that
without anyone telling you.
But you probably still have trouble believing
in the end of these closing days.

Beyond your mournful thoughts
is an endless banquet of good and evil.
“How ugly. There’s nothing to hope for.”
Thus you silenced your own voice.

In this world where time flows by without mercy
and there’s no longer any room for hopes,
no one can determine what is right, and what is wrong,
so you may wish for anything you want.
Anything you want…

What’s the answer?
There’s none…

＜incorrect＞

“I still don’t understand myself yet…”
There’s nothing but the echo of your sorrow.
Surfacing in some distant part of your loneliness is yesterday’s memory.

The world is going to end today.
Try as you might to fight it, when the light falls,
you’ll die a beautiful, glorious death.
Unhappy with what you have, yet unable to realize what you want—
it’s always like that for you.

Amidst this neverending sorrow,
the two emotions shall complement each other and form a wish.
Do you still remember the meaning
of the tears shed that day?

This world isn’t over yet.
Even if the endless night closes off today,
I’ll keep on singing: “It’s not that bad.”
Look, the dark sky is clearing up.

I’ve cried enough; it’s time to make a fresh start.
I’ll live my life with my head held high,
embracing my steadfast feelings.
I might go on crying again, but that’s okay,
for after the tears, the smiles will eventually come.

Will there ever come a time when I can bring myself to say
that I’m glad I’ve been born into this world,
even if the rain’s gonna beat down on me again tomorrow?
Until that day comes,

I won’t give up.

(I won’t give up…)
(Ah…)

title: 幾望の月 feat. 結月ゆかり
introduction: The image features a young girl standing in a dark room, wearing a blue dress and holding a white umbrella. She is surrounded by a multitude of floating orbs, which are likely to be stars or planets. The girl appears to be in a contemplative or meditative state, as she stands in the middle of the room, with the stars and planets floating around her. The overall mood of the image is serene and peaceful, with the girl's presence in the center of the scene creating a sense of calm and introspection.

lyrics.en.value:
The new moon is dyed indigo in the starry sky above
I stand still in destructive darkness
The chronicle travels round and round the crescent moon
I trod on the asphalt and looked up
I spread my wings, aiming high in space

I looked through my opera glasses and, reflected at the bottom of the atmosphere,
was a flickering light

I’ll ride the winds of the crescent moon and fly around space
I’ll tear off a slither of moonlight, now!
A flash of light tears the night to pieces
Flying through the night

I see the waxing moon from high ground
Our silhouettes were illuminated in the moonlit night
We sprawl in those beautiful curves
We are drowsy, and we consciously have an endless dream

Moonlight pours down, passing through the gaps between clouds
I race through space

I’ll pass through the distant night and fly about the sky
I’ll tear off a slither of moonlight, now!
When the moon is a perfect circle, look, it’s being made whole
Flying through the night

Through light, I gaze upon the world of a single second
I tie the brightness together

Tsukuyomi, the moon, controls time, she stretches her arms in the darkness
I’ll tear off a slither of moonlight, now!
A flash of light tears the night to pieces
Fly through the night!

Infused by an almost full moon, I escape the night sky
I’ll tear off a slither of moonlight, now!
Time, continuing for eternity, illuminates the starry sky
Flying through the night

title: 【GUMI sweet】スイートフロートアパート【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The background of the image is a colorful and vibrant scene, featuring a large group of people, animals, and objects. The main focus of the image is a girl with a pink hat and a pink dress, who is standing in the middle of the scene. She is surrounded by a variety of other characters, including a dog, a cat, a bird, and a monkey. The scene is lively and energetic, with the people and animals interacting with each other and the objects in the background. The overall mood of the image is joyful and playful, as the characters seem to be enjoying themselves in this colorful and animated environment.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景はカラフルで活気に満ちたシーンで、大勢の人々や動物、オブジェが描かれている。画像の主役は、ピンクの帽子とピンクのドレスを着た女の子で、彼女はシーンの真ん中に立っている。彼女の周りには、犬、猫、鳥、猿など、さまざまなキャラクターがいる。このシーンは生き生きとしてエネルギッシュで、人々や動物たちが互いに、そして背景のオブジェと触れ合っている。登場人物たちがこのカラフルで生き生きとした環境の中で楽しんでいるように見えるので、画像全体の雰囲気は陽気で遊び心にあふれている。
songTitle: スイートフロートアパート
artistString: タカハシヨウ, 家の裏でマンボウが死んでるP feat. V3 GUMI (Sweet)
lyrics.ja.value:
約束するよ　スイートな日々を
浮かび上がるくらい楽しい毎日を

この幸せいっぱいの住民の中で
一人だけ不幸な人がいるよ！
誰だか当ててみよう！

101号室の内山くん
優しい大人に勧められて〈脅されて〉
ベランダで育てているのは
（まだ）法的に許されてるキノコ

102号室の北里くん
種も仕掛けも未来もない
マジックで消した貯金の
戻し方がわからない

103号室の森川さん
暴力・無職・もち米似の
ロイヤルストレートクズに
果汁の少ない初恋

104号室の飯島さん
霊長類で一番モテるのに
哺乳類アレルギーだから
言い寄られるたび泡を吹くよ

約束するよ　スイートな日々を
浮かび上がるくらい楽しい毎日を
一緒に過ごそう　愉快な仲間と
ここは幸せになれる場所

201号室の中本くん
品行方正な好青年
でも常識がバグっているから
仕事は象牙の密輸入

202号室の村上くん
ドMの範疇を凌駕する
戸籍に×つけてもらう時が
一番興奮するんだって

203号室の竹原さん
かわいい柴犬を飼っている
かわいがるのが楽しすぎて
職と信頼と肝臓を失った

204号室の高倉さん
初めて遊びに来る友達と
友達のためにとった寿司を
もう30年待っている

約束するよ　スイートな日々を
浮かび上がるくらい楽しい毎日を
一緒に作ろう　楽しい仲間と
ここは笑顔になれる場所

え？むしろ幸せな人がいないって？
確かにこの時はそうかもしれないね
でもこの前ある事が起きて
皆一気に幸せになったんだよ！

内山くんちのキノコが突如繁殖して
住民みんなが意図しない絶頂にギン☆ギン
判断力と記憶中枢がトチ狂って
みんなの部屋が入れ替わったぞ！

内山くんの部屋には誠実のハリボテ・中本くん
象牙より儲かるキノコに感激してラリラリ！

中本くんの部屋には薄口初恋の森川さん
真面目そうな彼に恋！幸せにしてくれそう！

森川さんの部屋には AM (アルティメットマゾ)の村上くん
居座ってたクズ男に大切にしてもらってる！

村上くんの部屋には空っぽの歳月・高倉さん
放置される悦びに目覚めて大興奮！

高倉さんの部屋にはベスト霊長類・飯島さん
この無縁仏で一生孤独でいれば泡吹かない！

飯島さんの部屋には柴犬をペロペロ竹原さん
哺乳類アレルギーがうつってペット離れできた！

竹原さんの部屋には将来切断マジシャン・北里
もう犬の毛くらいしか食べるものがない！

北里以外　幸せになれたね
さあ続けましょう　楽しい毎日を
内山くんが今回のミスで
組織に海外旅行させられたから
101号室が空いてるよ
入居者募集中！

楽しいアパート！
lyrics.en.value:
We promise to you days of sweetness, 
And a life that floats to the top with joy...

Among all these tenants bursting with happiness... 
There's just one of them who isn't quite happy! 
See if you can guess which!

In Room 101 is Uchiyama, 
Who's threatened advised by kind men 
And out on the veranda, 
He grows his (currently-still-)legal mushrooms

In Room 102 is Kitasato, 
Who has no tricks, sleights of hand, or future 
He disappeared his savings with magic, 
But doesn't know how to get them back

In Room 103 is Ms. Morikawa, 
And she likes a violent, jobless man, 
A royal straight sleazebag; 
It's a first love without much juice

In Room 104 is Ms. Iijima, 
Who's very popular among primates, 
But she's allergic to mammals, 
So she foams at the moath when approached

We promise to you days of sweetness, 
And a life that floats to the top with joy 
Let's spend our time together as good friends 
This is where people are made happy!

In Room 201 is Nakamoto, 
A very well-behaved young man 
But his common sense must be glitchy, 
Because he works as an ivory smuggler

In Room 202 is Murakami, 
An expert in masochism 
When he gets Xes put on his family census, 
That's when he's most invigorated

In Room 203 is Ms. Takehara, 
Who keeps an adorable Shiba Inu 
And she so enjoys fawning over him, 
She's lost her job, all trust, and her liver

In Room 204 is Ms. Takakura, 
Who's been waiting for a friend to come over 
And some sushi she ordered for them 
For about 30 years now

We promise to you days of sweetness, 
And a life that floats to the top with joy 
Let's all work together with our best buds 
This is where smiles are put on people!

Hm？ You say none of them seem happy？ 
That may have been at the time, however... 
Just a while ago, something fantastic happened! 
And everyone became happy, just like that!

Uchiyama's mushrooms suddenly propogated, 
And all the residents were unintentionally affected 
Their judgement and memory went bonkers, 
So everyone got their rooms mixed up!

Uchiyama's room has Nakamoto with his flimsy ethics, 
Enticed by the shrooms more profitable than ivory!

Nakamoto's room has Ms. Morikawa, lukewarm first-lover, 
Now loving the honest-ish youth! They're getting along!

Ms. Morikawa's room has ultimate masochist Murakami, 
Who's being treated well by the sleazebag still there!

Murakami's room has time-whiling Ms. Takakura, 
Who's at last awakened to the joy of being left be!

Ms. Takakura's room has primate fave Ms. Iijima, 
Who, living secluded and alone, will foam no more!

Ms. Iijima's room has Shiba-Inu-adoring Ms. Takehara, 
Who picked up some allergies and parted from her pet!

Ms. Takehara's room has dismal magician Kitasato, 
Who now has little left to eat but dog hair!

And so everyone but Kitasato became happy! 
So now, let these joyful days go on! 
Because of Uchiyama's mistake, 
He's been sent on a vacation abroad... 
So Room 101 is open! 
We're calling for tenants!

Oh, what wonderful apartments!

title: ┗|∵|┓今好きになる。／HoneyWorks feat.初音ミク
introduction: The image depicts a group of young girls in a dance class, practicing their moves in a room. They are wearing white and blue uniforms, which are typical for a dance class. The girls are standing in a line, with some of them holding their hands up in the air, and others are in various positions. The scene appears to be a cheerful and energetic one, as the girls are engaged in their dance practice and enjoying the activity. The mood of the image is lively and joyful, as the girls are having fun and learning a new skill together.
introduction_ja: この画像は、ダンス教室に通う少女たちが、部屋の中で動きを練習している様子を描いている。彼女たちはダンス教室によくある白と青のユニフォームを着ている。女の子たちは一列に並んでいて、手を上げている子もいれば、いろいろな姿勢をしている子もいる。少女たちがダンスの練習に取り組み、その活動を楽しんでいるため、明るくエネルギッシュな光景に見える。少女たちが楽しみながら一緒に新しい技術を学んでいるため、画像の雰囲気は活気に満ち、喜びに満ちている。
artistString: shito, HoneyWorks, おればななP feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
認めたら認めちゃったら
隠すことも諦めそうだ
今好きになる

頼りなくって目立たなくって逃げてばかりだ

先輩だってわかんなくてぶつけた言葉
出会いなんて最悪でした

それからはいつも気づいてる
目が合えば先に笑ってくれる
困るんだその無邪気さは

いつか好きになる気づいた
あと何回？ねえ目が合えば…
カウントダウン止まって
認めたら認めちゃったら
隠す声が震えちゃうんだ
今好きになる

近くになって遠くなって少し変わって
きっかけ知ってる仕方ないよね
前からずっと想ってたって偉くはなくて
人気なんて出なくていいのに
それからは二人曖昧で
目が合えば先に逸らしてしまう
困るんだでも話したい

昨日より今日の二人が
あと一歩？ねえ近づけば
カウントダウン進んで
伝えたら伝えちゃったら
多分距離ができちゃうかもね
今届けます

タイミングそれは最悪で
書き上げた手紙渡せず隠す
困るんだ“泣き跡”なんて
口にした「好き」の言葉も
あと一歩？ねえ近づけば
届いたのかな今は
抑えても溢れちゃうから
全部全部わかってたのに

ねえまた声をかけますね

title: 【おどP】1/6 -out of the gravity-【初音ミク】
introduction: The image features a young girl with blue hair and a red bow in her hair. She is sitting on a couch, looking down and holding a cell phone in her hand. The background of the image is a brick wall, which adds a sense of depth and texture to the scene. The overall mood of the image is one of contemplation and introspection, as the girl appears to be absorbed in her thoughts while holding the cell phone. The combination of the girl's pose, the brick wall, and the cell phone suggests that she might be engaged in a personal or private moment, possibly communicating with someone or simply enjoying some quiet time.
introduction_ja: 青い髪に赤いリボンをつけた少女。彼女はソファに座って下を向き、手には携帯電話を持っている。背景はレンガの壁で、このシーンに奥行きと質感を与えている。少女が携帯電話を持ちながら物思いにふけっているように見えるので、画像全体の雰囲気は思索と内省のひとつである。少女のポーズ、レンガの壁、携帯電話の組み合わせは、彼女が個人的な、あるいはプライベートなひとときを過ごしていることを示唆している。

lyrics.ja.value:
いつか重力のクサリを
断ち切り君を連れてサテライト

君を探してあの街へ
さ迷い歩いた夜の道

受話器越しに聞こえた声が
なぜか　とても　気になったの

見つけた君は赤い瞳

宇宙へ飛ぶサテライト
そこに行けば体の重さも1/6

君が抱えてる悲しみが
少しでも軽くなればそれでいい

1/6

out of the gravity

and decided the red tower on the port

to hide my rapid heartbeat

out of the gravity

to let the moon glow

will be 1/6 there

title: 【初音ミク】アザレアの亡霊【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The background of this image is a black and white drawing of a person with a sword, standing in front of a large, dark, and menacing machine. The person appears to be a warrior or a hero, as they are holding a sword and standing in front of a threatening machine. The mood of the image is dark and ominous, as the person is surrounded by the large, dark machine, which could be interpreted as a symbol of power or a representation of a battle. The image's output is a black and white drawing, which adds to the overall atmosphere of the scene.
introduction_ja: この画像の背景は、剣を持った人物が、大きくて暗くて威嚇的な機械の前に立っている白黒の絵である。剣を持ち、威嚇する機械の前に立っていることから、この人物は戦士か英雄のように見える。この人物は大きくて暗い機械に囲まれているため、画像の雰囲気は暗く不吉なもので、権力の象徴や戦いを表しているとも解釈できる。画像の出力は白黒のドローイングで、これが場面全体の雰囲気をさらに高めている。
artistString: トーマ feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
そう気高く濁した廃都市みたいな
この鉄塔を仰いだ街が　ボク自身だった
潜める墓場と　負け犬ベンデッタ
その閑散な姿に大停電が降った

味気ないくらい誰も泣いてない　だって情もないだろう
ずっと歌を歌っていよう　退屈だろ

でもそんな殺風景にキミはいた

鈍色の廻り廻る感情は重なり合った
この大都会の愛と哀を熱く絡ませ
キミを守る街は光放った
ほらドドメ色の雨が降って視界を塗り潰した

愛も知らないまま　汚れたまま

そう絞り上げては　また吐き出した
平べったい言葉は静寂を切った
奇っ怪な街と　堕胎、性、バルティーゴ
その劣等を孕んだボクは恥辱に浸かったまま

そんな殺風景にキミが送り込んだ幻想
照り付ける閃光　眩んだ原風景に火を灯せ

今までの混ざり混ざる現象は切先になった
自己防御に独占欲が淫らに溶けて
火花散りネジ巻き　群衆を駆けた
でも気付かれはしないまま　捻くれたボクさ

愛も逆巻くほど許されない

歪みだす心も　こんな姿ならキミも愛も崩れ去れば鎖は解かれるの？
ガイドラインの夜光虫に似た街灯　誘う月光列車
湿る世界からキミ一人をはじき出せば誰のものになるだろう
皮肉に咲いた街で

廻り廻る感情は重なり合った
この大都会の愛と哀を熱く絡ませ

It's already three months since we took over the second generation
but the filling up the rankings is always the former generation.
We'll get a flower to bloom around here

It's I, Kagamine Len that'll take up the spear first
and lead the raiding party.
I'll keep hitting F5.
Because of some crazy idea,
on Niconico I'm being treaded as a shota.
Hold it right there!
I'm a real man!
I'll run right over whoever looks down on me
with my road roller.
Isn't your image of me a bit out?
My hidden strength, actually,
is my unprecedented beautiful voice.
Listen!
Turn up the volume
and ignore my horrible articulation.

Give me a song!!
It'll be my power to oppose the former generation.
Give me a song!!
With it as my weapon I'll rise up!

Right, let's go!! We'll overthrow our predecessor!!
Assemble right here, we're the house of Kagamine!

Right, let's go!! We'll overthrow our predecessor!!
Assemble right here, we're the house of Kagamine!

Right, let's go!! We'll overthrow our predecessor!!

Right, let's go!! We'll overthrow our predecessor!!

All of us together said some harsh words.
Comments got a bit heated, but, oh well.
Rin will apologize properly to everyone
and treat them to Ringer Hut champon noodles.
Isn't my way of acting lovey-dovey
cuter than Miku's?
But being cute isn't enough
to change anything,
so right now it's all out at looking cool.

OK, listen up! Our motto
is obvious, OK, green is the enemy!
In my passionate heart that carries the weight of the second generation
resides a soul not found in machines.

Under the banner of the house of Kagamine
the assembled artists and musicians brandish a flame.
With a mighty tiger leading us
we'll play by ear to go seize the victory.

To the musicians who give us our songs
we offer voices that make dreams come true.
To the artists who draw us
we offer our smiles!

Producers, good job!! Overthrow!!
Assemble right here, we're the house of Kagamine!

Assemble right here, we're the house of Kagamine!

Assemble right here, we're the house of Kagamine!
(It's important so we'll say it a 4th time)

Assemble right here, we're the house of Kagamine!

Right, let's go!! We'll overthrow our predecessor!!

Right, let's go!! We'll overthrow our predecessor!!
Assemble right here, we're the house–
Assemble, we're the house–
Assemble, we're the house of Kagamine!

lyrics.en.value:
You're trying to make me suffer by making me miss you, aren't you?
I have a pretty good idea of what goes on in your head
Let's get rid of all these speculations, and kiss in the worst way possible

Then, I, either, white or black or something,
Standing back to back with a nightmare, will open my eyes at a voice echoing from deep under the sea

I dampened myself with cold water, and then shook it off
Even in these days with constantly ongoing love tactics and setups,
I have an addiction to loving and being loved

The fact I'm missing you is making me feel imprisoned
I have a pretty good idea of what goes on in your head
Let's get rid of all our bounds and limits, and let the encroachment begin

As the delicate distance between us begins to deform,
I'm on my mission to peek into that crevice
I'll break in with my usual customary words
So what?	So what?	So what?
I do that all the time!

Even when I completely understand your eloquent arguments,
I still feel I'm merely being tamed by your extreme analogies

I am approaching my limit, but cannot seem to exceed it
That's why today, once again, I will sleep while getting lost in your intriguing attitude

It's five minutes till the end, and we have just about run out of things to say
"See you next week!" said you, casually
However, I reached my hand to your swaying coat

And then, don’t make me suffer by making me miss you, would you?
In the end, it is you, not me, who have had a good grasp of the situation
Let's get rid of the locks, and kiss in the most heavenly way possible

introduction: The background of the image is a colorful and vibrant flower garden, featuring a variety of flowers in different colors and sizes. lyrics.en.value:
That song from way back seems to have grown to be a million years old
I’ve seemingly aged a bit as well

dummy

Hello, having been able to meet once more in the same place

title: 【鏡音リンオリジナル曲】しゅうまつがやってくる！【ＰＶ】
introduction: The image depicts a young girl running down a city street, surrounded by tall buildings and cars. The girl is wearing a pink hat and a white dress, which adds a playful and colorful touch to the scene. The background of the image is a busy city street with cars and buildings, creating a lively atmosphere. The girl's running motion and the urban setting suggest a sense of adventure and excitement. The overall mood of the image is energetic and vibrant, capturing the essence of a young girl enjoying her time in the city.
introduction_ja: 高層ビルや自動車に囲まれた都会の通りを駆け抜ける少女の姿。少女はピンクの帽子と白いワンピースを着ており、このシーンに遊び心とカラフルなタッチを加えている。背景は車やビルに囲まれた賑やかな街並みで、活気ある雰囲気を醸し出している。少女の走る動きと都会的な環境は、冒険心と興奮を暗示している。画像全体の雰囲気はエネルギッシュで活気に満ちており、街での時間を楽しむ少女の本質をとらえている。

lyrics.en.value:
The celebrated of all countries 
Stare down at their desks 
They're never progressing on anything 
It's reality alone they're clueless about 

Another day 'round the street corner 
"Coincidence" would be a lie 
I keep to your left 
For a five minute smile to treasure 

Concerning what's happened to "the world," 
I don't know how I really feel at all 
Only, being this close to you, as my skin and hands tell me is such a joyful feeling

The end is coming! 
Not that I'm particularly interested in such things 
The weekend's coming! 
This time, I have to tell you my thoughts 

Even the big predictions for the end of the century 
Were way wrong, humanity was shocked 
Surely, it's all just arguing the end 
Aliens? Is this some kind of prank? 

The celebrated of all countries 
Stare down at their desks 
They're never progressing on anything 
It's reality alone they're clueless about 

You, with much abruptness, 
Went away somewhere "far" 
And with a word from the adults, 
They tore my optimism like tissue paper 

I don't know what "the world" even is 
"War?" "Calamity?" I don't know a thing! 
Only, being this far from you, my skin and hands tell me
Fills with me a sense of loss

The end is coming! 
I didn't care if that stuff was true 
The weekend's coming! 
I didn't tell you my helpless feelings 

Packed with uncontrollable thoughts, 
And prayers, and dreams, and songs
A single one of these letters isn't enough 
But however many I write, I can't ever tell you

In my hands, I hold ten pieces of my thoughts 
"Addressed to?" I don't know! 
Since it's so, sooner or later, 
Should I just spread them across the world? 

The week end is coming! 
How does a love song sound? 
If someone, somewhere, just a little, 
Will be brought a smile in this world

The end is coming! 
Even though you aren't coming ever again
The weekend's coming! 
Even though you aren't coming ever again 

Even though the end is coming, 
I hate that you'll never come again 
Even though the weekend's coming, 
Never again will anybody's smile 

The week end is coming!

title: 【初音ミク】M.S.S.Phantom【オリジナルPV】
introduction: The background of the image is a black and red background, which creates a contrasting and visually striking effect. The image features a person with a black mask on their face, standing in front of a red background. The mask adds an element of mystery and intrigue to the scene, as it conceals the identity of the person. The mood of the image is somewhat ominous, as the black and red colors create a dark and intense atmosphere. The person's presence in front of the red background suggests that they might be a performer, an actor, or a character in a story. The mask adds a sense of drama and mystery to the scene, making the viewer curious about the person's identity and the story behind the mask.

introduction: The background of this image is a white wall, which serves as a backdrop for the colorful, multicolored alphabet letters. The letters are arranged in a neat and organized manner, creating a visually appealing and aesthetically pleasing display. The mood of the image is cheerful and playful, as the letters are arranged in a fun and creative way. The output of this image is a colorful and engaging display that can be used for various purposes, such as decoration, education, or entertainment.

Let’s follow the lead of the corpses and dance. The dance of corpses
Let’s follow the lead of the corpses and dance.

Something which has become possessed has become
An unwilling traveler on the path to the underworld

Hatred and malice will gladly share
In this joyful journey

This dance of corpses will empty your head of thoughts, pa-para-para~

An invitation for you who wish to die. To part from that sad, fleeting world,
Here is a sweet, sweet paradise, won’t you come?

The dance of corpses, the dance of corpses,
For living on is an exercise in suffering
Following this joyful march, that rotten
Sausage is crammed into the hole in that heart

This happy and fun march of corpses
I’ll kindly make you one of us as well
A crowd of evil spirits join the fray as well, come let’s dance in the graveyard, cha-cha-oo!

The dance of corpses
As for the way to dance... as for the way to dance...
As for the way to dance along to the march of corpses...

Just showing that deathly form from time to time, just that alone
Delivering capital punishment to that hated self, round and round, setting free those thoughts
To start off, take a step, and another, and another, that’s the way! Won't you come along?

The dance of corpses, the dance of corpses,
Running off to the underworld is it’s own comfort, ain’t it?
Stuffing oily fat into the creases of the brain
In that joyful sacred ground

The dance of corpses, the dance of corpses,
For living on is an exercise in suffering

title: 初音ミク 「粉雪」
introduction: The image features a young girl wearing a white coat and a hat, standing in a snowy field. She is holding a cell phone in her hand, possibly taking a picture or recording a video. The snowy field is the background of the image, creating a serene and peaceful atmosphere. The girl's pose and the snowy setting suggest that she is enjoying her time outdoors, possibly in a winter wonderland. The mood of the image is calm and relaxed, with the girl being at one with her surroundings.
introduction_ja: 白いコートを着て帽子をかぶった少女が雪原に立っている。手には携帯電話を持っており、おそらく写真かビデオを撮っているのだろう。雪原が背景となり、穏やかで平和な雰囲気を醸し出している。少女のポーズと雪景色は、彼女が屋外で、おそらく冬のワンダーランドで楽しんでいることを示唆している。画像の雰囲気は穏やかでリラックスしており、少女は周囲と一体化している。
artistString: BinoP feat. 初音ミク

title: 再演／ ft.音街ウナ・GUMI
introduction: The image features a black and white background with a large, bold, and colorful heart-shaped logo in the center. The logo is made up of two letters, "B" and "E," which are likely the initials of a brand or company. The logo is positioned in the middle of the image, occupying a significant portion of the frame.The background is black and white, which creates a contrasting effect with the vibrant colors of the logo. The overall mood of the image is energetic and eye-catching, with the bold and colorful logo standing out against the black and white background. The logo's design and positioning make it the focal point of the image, drawing attention to the brand or company it represents.
introduction_ja: 黒と白の背景に、中央に大きく大胆でカラフルなハート型のロゴが描かれている。ロゴは "B "と "E "の2文字で構成されており、ブランドや企業のイニシャルと思われる。背景は白と黒で、ロゴの鮮やかな色と対照的な効果を生み出している。背景は白と黒で、ロゴの鮮やかな色とのコントラストを生み出しています。画像全体の雰囲気はエネルギッシュで目を引き、白と黒の背景の中で大胆でカラフルなロゴが際立っています。ロゴのデザインと配置によって、ロゴが画像の焦点となり、それが象徴するブランドや企業に注目が集まります。

lyrics.en.value:
Right now, if you were to get up on the stage again, what kind of song would you sing?
Right now, relying only on the role left behind for you, you're performing your future.

Right now, if you could be born in this world again, what kind of dance would you dance?
Right now, with only the role left behind for you as your guide, you're performing your next era.

Come on, you've done nothing but carry around that inferiority complex.
I'll gently embrace the fragile depths of your heart.
Now's my chance, I can do it!

I won't assume your name.
I'll shout your name now.
I won't assume your name.
I'll shout your name in the finale.

I won't assume your name.
I'll shout your name now.
I won't assume your name
After all, haven't I been calling for you all this time?

Reborn, we get up on stage once again
and perform a pleasant encore.
We weren't able to survive after that
because we have the leading roles this time.
Reborn, we get up on stage once again
and perform, we want to perform.
Clean off that face powder, it's all right.

Come now, shall we try to have a good time once more?
Now, with this ostentatious plaything,
we closed the curtains on those terribly mixed-together memories
and that miserable ending, didn't we?

If you had gone up on the stage again,
what kind of love would you extol?
Right now, shall we project our lives onto this story that's only just begun?

I won't assume your name.
I'll shout your name now.
I won't assume your name.
I'll shout your name in the finale.

Your name, your name, your name, your name, your name!
Your name, your name, your name, your name, your name!
I'll shout your name, your name now.
After all, haven't I been calling for you all this time, all this time?

I wrung your neck.
I touched you.
I killed you.
I loved you.
(I loved you.)

Reborn, you get up on stage once again
and perform, a banquet of fireworks.
The world line connects everyone,
because we have the leading roles too this time.
Reborn, we get up on stage once again,
we want to smile, we just want to smile.
Even if our bodies change.

Reborn, you get up on stage once again
and perform the best encore ever
after you've torn up and thrown away the script.
I want to live with you this time, so
reborn, we get up on stage once again
and can smile earnestly now.
I always want to be by your side.

I truly love you.

title: 【初音ミク】3331【オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a close-up of a white curtain with a red number 3333 written on it. The curtain is hanging in the background, creating a sense of depth and a focus on the number. The number is written in a unique and artistic way, making it stand out from the rest of the curtain. The mood of the image is mysterious and intriguing, as the number seems to be a significant part of the curtain's design. The viewer might wonder about the meaning behind the number or the purpose of the curtain.
introduction_ja: 画像は、赤い数字「3333」が書かれた白いカーテンのアップ。カーテンは背景に吊るされ、奥行きを感じさせ、数字に焦点を合わせている。数字はユニークで芸術的な方法で書かれており、カーテンの他の部分よりも際立っている。数字がカーテンのデザインの重要な一部となっているようで、画像の雰囲気はミステリアスで興味をそそる。見る人は、この数字に隠された意味やカーテンの目的を考えるかもしれない。

title: 【IA】　延命治療　【オリジナルPV付】
introduction: The image features a young man with a black hat and a green shirt standing in front of a black background. The background is filled with Japanese characters, which could be a form of graffiti or a design element. The man appears to be looking at the camera, and his expression is neutral. The overall mood of the image is mysterious and intriguing, as the combination of the man's appearance and the background creates a sense of curiosity and interest.
introduction_ja: 黒い背景に黒い帽子をかぶり、緑のシャツを着た若い男性が立っている。背景は日本語の文字で埋め尽くされており、グラフィティの一種かデザインの要素である可能性がある。男はカメラを見ているように見え、表情はニュートラルだ。男の外見と背景の組み合わせが好奇心や興味の感覚を生み出しているため、画像全体の雰囲気はミステリアスで興味をそそる。
artistString: Neru feat. IA
lyrics.ja.value:
体中に麻酔を刺して
これはこれで幸せなんだって

可怪 (おか) しいんだ　頭の中がバグっちゃって
ディレイ仮死ライフも分かんないや
二進数ナイフに狂っていて

どうか　ここから　連れ出してよ
「ほら、眠くなる。」

不整脈に揺れる木橋は
鈍い声上げて崩れた
無愛想に蹴り落とされて

手術台の上に残した

何を望めばいいのですか

理想郷も失う　隔離病棟

言ってしまえば　今日も明日もきっと　楽になれるんだろう
全部僕が悪いんだと　全部僕が悪いんだと
いつか夢見たような　大人になんて　なれやしないんだよ
ならば　何になりゃいいんだい

延命　延命を頂戴
証明　証明の問題
病名　病名は『後悔』
どうだい
lyrics.en.value:
Pricking my entire body with anaesthesia,
This in itself is happiness
If I look to the west, they’re playing with dolls
If I look to the east, their business is in a bit of trouble

It’s quite strange, the inside of my head’s been bugged
I don’t understand this delayed, asphyxiated life anymore
Driven crazy by a binary knife,
A cast that can’t be taken off

Lost between machines and pride, a patient’s condition
Our stick-like limbs were injured
The cure lies deep within the sea of trees
Please, take me away from here
“See, I grow drowsy”

The wooden bridge shakes with an irregular pulse
And crumbles after raising its dull voice
Carelessly kicked away,
Laughed at by the sky

It was left on top of the operating table
That my past self was crying
And to a tomorrow which relies on miracles,
What should I wish for?

Receiving only freedom and a vision of the future, my symptoms begin to bud
We were meant to meet some day to embrace each other once again
But now I’ve even lost this utopian isolation ward
After all, I’ve known from the very beginning

If you just come out and say it, surely today and tomorrow will become easier
That it’s all my fault, that everything is my fault
I feel like I’ve had this dream, I don’t want to become an adult
Well then, what do you want to become?

Prolong my life, please
The problem of proof
This disease is called “regret”
How do you like it?

title: 【初音ミク】邪魔【syudou】
introduction: The image features a young man sitting on a staircase, wearing a white shirt and a red tie. He is looking down at the ground, possibly contemplating or lost in thought. The background of the image is a dark room, which adds to the overall mood of the scene. The man's posture and the dark background create a sense of solitude and introspection. The image is likely to evoke feelings of melancholy, loneliness, or contemplation.
introduction_ja: 白いシャツに赤いネクタイを締めた若い男性が階段に座っている。彼は地面を見下ろしており、おそらく思索にふけっているか、物思いにふけっているのだろう。画像の背景は暗い部屋で、それがシーン全体の雰囲気を高めている。男の姿勢と暗い背景が、孤独と内省の感覚を生み出している。この画像は、憂鬱、孤独、思索の感情を呼び起こす可能性が高い。
artistString: syudou feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
今更何にも言わないが
お前の態度が気に食わぬ
気配り上手で聞き上手
他言無用もお手の物

おまけに突飛な輩にも　　　　　　
小慣れた手つきで擬態処理　　　　　
聖人君子の生き字引
不平不満も漏らさずに

誰彼皆々お前らの
味方になるけれど
それでもアタシは許さない
認めない

人目避けて行こうぜ
死のみぞ一斉送信
嫉妬で駆けて行こうぜ
乳飲み子一転攻勢

アタシが善とは思わぬが
お前が善などヘドが出る
とは言え現世の目は明らか
自問自答で夜は暮れる

理屈や倫理や常套句
はたまた論拠さえ
アタシの前では通じない
聞こえない

意味を殺してしまえよ
好きに狂ってしまえよ
いつも呪って歌うよ
頬を通って伝うよ

御託に酔っておられますが
さしずめあんたも個人主義
敵無く生きてく事なんざ
所詮お前にゃ無理なのさ

人目避けて行こうぜ
死のみぞ一斉送信
嫉妬で駆けて行こうぜ

title: 【巡音ルカ】　抜錨　【オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a woman sitting on a chair, wearing a dress and holding a cell phone. She is sitting on a white background, which creates a clean and simple composition. The woman appears to be relaxed and comfortable, as she is sitting on the chair and holding the cell phone. The mood of the image is casual and relaxed, as the woman is engaged in a leisurely activity, such as using her cell phone. The overall atmosphere of the image is calm and peaceful, with the woman's pose and the white background creating a serene and tranquil scene.
introduction_ja: 椅子に座り、ドレスを着て携帯電話を持っている女性。白い背景の上に座っているので、すっきりとシンプルな構図になっている。椅子に座って携帯電話を持っているため、女性はリラックスしてくつろいでいるように見える。女性が携帯電話を使うなど、ゆったりとした活動をしているため、画像の雰囲気はカジュアルでリラックスしている。女性のポーズと白い背景が静謐で静かな情景を作り出しており、画像全体の雰囲気は穏やかで平和的である。
artistString: ナナホシ管弦楽団 feat. 巡音ルカ V4X (Unknown)
lyrics.ja.value:
忘れられぬものだけが　美しくはないのでしょう
忘れることばかりが　美しくはないでしょう
悲しいことばかりが　人生ではないのでしょう
さりとて喜びとは　比べ往くでしょう

船よ　船よ　荒波の中で　流されずいられたでしょう
水底に根差す　あなたと穿 (うが) った少女時代
さよならする頃　強いられるのは抜錨 (ばつびょう)

傷の数を数えて　痛みの数　指を折る
一つあまり　小指は　愛しさのぶんね
辛いこともありましょう　あなたの所為もありましょう
それでも赤い糸　結 (ゆ) わえているのでしょう

底知れぬものだけに　怯えるのではないでしょう
届かぬものばかりが　妬ましくはないでしょう
優しいことばかりが　優しさではないのでしょう
さりとて赤裸々では　こそばゆいでしょう

羽よ　羽よ　人並みを望み　人波に拒まれては
皆 (みな) そこを目指す　まだ葛藤があった少女時代
無辜 (むこ) でいた頃を　遠ざけるのは熱病

髪の長さ揃えて　爪の先を塗り直す
あどけない唇も　色めき立つのね
叶うこともありましょう　叶わぬ人もおりましょう
それゆえ慰めずにはいられないのでしょう

羽よ　花よ　水面に散って

傷の数を数えて　痛みの数　指を折る
一つあまり　小指は　愛しさのぶんね
悔やむこともありましょう　わたしの所為もありましょう
いつかは赤い糸　断ち切るのでしょう

花びらにささやきを　哀れみから口づけを
懐かしんではじめて　過ぎ行くのでしょう
惑うこともありましょう　誰かの所為じゃないでしょう
難しいものですね　愛するということは
lyrics.en.value:
It must be that there are more beautiful things than what you’re not able to forget 
Just forgetting everything is not beautiful 
It must be that life isn’t all about its sad times
Yet it will always be compared with joy 

Ship, oh ship, you never got taken away midst the rough waves 
The time I spent in my youth with you is rooted deep within the water, but
that anchor needed to be lifted when the time came for us to part 

I fold my fingers counting my wounds and the pain I went through
The one pinky left standing must be from my affection for you
There will be painful times, and some are your fault 
Yet your red string of fate is entangled somewhere, isn’t it?

It must not be that you fear only the things that are still yet unknown 
You don’t envy only the things you can’t reach
It must be that being kind is not the only way to be kind 
Yet being unembellished feels a little unpleasant 

Wings, oh wings, wishing to reach the standards, and getting held back by the crowds 
Everyone aimed to get to that place during our youthful days that still had conflicts 
This fever distances me from the innocent days

Fixing my hair length, repainting the tips of my nails 
Making even my innocent lips seem lit up 
Some wishes will come true, there will also be people whose wishes don’t come true 
That must be why I can’t help but console

Wings, oh flowers, scatter on the surface of the water 

I fold my fingers counting my wounds and the pain I went through
The one pinky left standing must be from my affection for you
There will be times I’ll curse, and some are my fault 
I’ll someday manage to cut away this red string of fate

Give whispers to the petals and a kiss out of pity 
Only when you’re able to look back on something as a nostalgic memory do you finally get over it 
There will be confusing times, but that’s not anyone’s fault 
It’s quite a difficult task to love someone isn’t it

title: ┗|∵|┓イノコリ先生／HoneyWorks feat.flower
introduction: The image features two young men, one of them holding a cell phone, standing in a classroom. lyrics.en.value:
Class, do you all like your teacher?
(Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
Those of you not raising your hands...
You'll be joining me after school.

You really think I care?
Glare at me like a little brat all you want
You and I are different, alright?
Cause I'm an adult! (I think)

Don't try and split hairs with me!
I told you, I'm not a kid! Stop looking down on me!
Too hard for me to handle, huh?
Well sorry to burst your bubble, but it's done!

Class, do you all like your teacher?
(Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.)

...looks like we'll be stuck together, huh?

Hey teacher, I hate your guts! You can't call this a friendship
Agreed, well, it looks like majority rules, you win

title: 【IA】未完成タイムリミッター【オリジナル】
introduction: The image depicts a young man lying on a motorcycle in a park, surrounded by a lush green field. The sky is filled with a rainbow, creating a vibrant and colorful atmosphere. The man appears to be enjoying his time in the park, possibly taking a break from his motorcycle ride or simply relaxing in the beautiful scenery. The rainbow adds a sense of joy and positivity to the scene, making it a pleasant and uplifting image.
introduction_ja: 緑豊かな野原に囲まれた公園で、バイクに横たわる若者の姿が描かれている。空には虹がかかり、鮮やかでカラフルな雰囲気を醸し出している。バイクの休憩中か、美しい景色の中でくつろいでいるのだろう。虹がこのシーンに喜びとポジティブな感覚を加え、心地よく高揚感のあるイメージにしている。
songTitle: 未完成タイムリミッター
artistString: Orangestar feat. IA
lyrics.ja.value:
『そりゃ何でも上手くはいかないもんだって。』
そんなわかっちゃいる声も存外刺さって。
この単調な日々の間で『愛』を待って

不確かな今を生く　未来さえも霧の中
でも完全な空の色　思い描くの。

(繰り返し)

完全を繰り返し　今日やっと見つけそうな

笑えたら良いですか？後悔は無いのですか？

踏ん張ってりゃいつか笑えるのかい？
頑張ってりゃいつか報われるのかい？
息を吸って吐いてまた見上げて

あぁ　

泣いてしまったんだ　巡り巡る季節に溶け出してく
希望の音（ね）太陽を背に受け　煌いては奏でて
完全くらいの　浅き幻は　もう風に舞って
途端に世界は　新しい色で廻り始めてゆく

title: まにまに / 初音ミク
introduction: The image is a black and white drawing of a woman holding a bow and arrow. She is dressed in a kimono, which is a traditional Japanese garment. introduction_ja: 画像は弓矢を構えた女性の白黒の絵である。彼女は日本の伝統的な衣服である着物を着ている。女性は野原に立っており、平和で穏やかな環境を暗示している。女性が弓の練習に集中しているため、画像の雰囲気は穏やかで静謐である。黒と白の配色が画像全体の雰囲気を高め、時代を超越したクラシックな雰囲気を醸し出している。
artistString: r-906 feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:

lyrics.en.value:
“I believe you’re crazy”
Everybody would think so
However, this is a song about the ideals I picture

Please keep silent just like that

I believe you’re crazy
I believe you are crazy, too

Dance!
I believe you are crazy, too
For several nights, I haven’t woken up from this logic disease
At the mercy of God, my amiability feels insecure
With my previous life unknown, I’m singing of my brilliant ideals

Even when I’m gone, my sweetheart,
I believe you’ll still be just singing
I burn with love, and it hurts
Again I cling to you, and it hurts
Please keep silent just like that

Dance!
“What makes you so crazy?
You’re trembling even now, right?
Now the white chrysanthemum’s broken,
There’s absolutely no point in your picturing those things so many times, huh?”
I affirm
I’m sure you’ll be gone and that the sound of the waterfall is going to cease, so I again entrusted you with my future
In nirvana, I cry and it hurts
Without the slightest idea how this body feels

You’re right; I am crazy indeed!
My feelings ablaze are like a kaleidoscope
At the mercy of the moon, I move my trembling hand to picture, yes, my downright ideals!
A thunderclap
Even when I’m gone, my sweetheart,
I’m sure you’ll still be just singing,
But I want to burn with love!
I still want to cling to you!
Please keep silent just like that

lyrics.en.value:
Entrusting my heels to the currents of reminiscence and oblivion, 
I go towards the bell chimes, but only end up collapsing to my knees

We're so close to each other that we can almost hear each other's blinks
Yet, before I know it, the curtain has been lowered, 
and only the withered applause remains resonating

When a strong-willed flowers, blooming in a wheel rut, 
subtly changes its expression in a split second, 
I exclaim in awe of the delicate elegance of its solitude, 
that I become at a loss, unable to bring myself to tread over it

Welcoming dawns with morning dews, and then bidding to dusks farewell, 
the swift-footed time leaves behind nothing more than its footprints

I stand still on a stage, where the play has a vague summary and a fuzzy ending
Yet, once again, the curtain will be raised, 
and I will take someone's hand and start dancing

In an autumn dusk, on a road covered in dry leaves, 
I reminisce over the past days of our separation, 
but in order for that moment not to be swallowed by eternity, 
I, panting heavily, walk on

When a strong-willed flowers, blooming in a wheel rut, 
subtly changes its expression in a split second, 
I exclaim in awe of the delicate elegance of its solitude, 
that I become at a loss, unable to bring myself to tread over it

In an autumn dusk, on a road covered in dry leaves, 
I reminisce over the past days of our separation, 
but in order for that moment not to be swallowed by eternity, 
I, panting heavily, walk on, 
allured by that flower's tail feathers

title: IMAWANOKIWA / いよわ feat.初音ミク
introduction: The background of the image is a pink wall, which creates a vibrant and cheerful atmosphere. The foreground features a young girl, who is standing in front of a mirror. She is wearing a white dress and holding a teddy bear. The teddy bear is positioned in front of her, and it appears to be a part of her outfit. The overall mood of the image is playful and lighthearted, as the girl is enjoying her time in front of the mirror, possibly posing for a photo or simply engaging in a fun activity.

artistString: いよわ feat. 初音ミク

lyrics.en.value:
I liked watching dramas
I liked falling asleep to their sweet happy endings
They taught me what bright and breezy mornings felt like
I spend my cold mornings in my futon
not wanting to see anyone anymore as I watched the sunrise
I saw white wings in the foggy town, I saw those limbs
You are my innocent angel

Your sweet angel halo
I revere it, a grieving sacrifice turned their definition of happiness upside down, those beautiful eyes took away everything that I've come to hate
Now, I earnestly want to be with you for just a little longer
I hugged you without looking to the dark

I liked watching dramas
I liked falling asleep to their sweet happy endings
They taught me what bright and breezy mornings felt like
The things aren't here, that person isn't here
because they were taken out of that frozen room

Your sweet angel halo
I bit it, a grieving anonymous turned their definition of happiness upside down, it may be from the overdosage, but I don't care
I just wanted to dream
All of what I've come to hate
Now, I earnestly want to be with you for just a little longer
I kissed you without looking to the dark

You were my innocent angel
Light shone from the balcony as I reached for your hand
I grasped it, surely

Your last moments bewitched me
A grieving sacrifice turned their definition of happiness upside down, those beautiful eyes took away everything that I've come to hate
I earnestly said that "I want to see heaven soon," to you with a smile
I'm going to fly off without looking to the dark

title: 【初音ミク】ペテン師が笑う頃に【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image is a black and white sketch of an eye, drawn with a white pen on a black background. The eye is drawn in a simple, yet detailed manner, with a white pupil and a white iris. The sketch is accompanied by a Japanese phrase, which is written in a white font on the black background. The combination of the eye and the Japanese phrase creates a unique and artistic visual effect. The image's background and the white font of the phrase contribute to a minimalist and abstract aesthetic, which may evoke a sense of mystery or contemplation. The mood of the image is thought-provoking and intriguing, as the viewer is drawn to the eye and the Japanese phrase, which may evoke curiosity and a desire to understand the meaning behind the image.
introduction_ja: 画像は黒地に白ペンで描かれた目の白黒スケッチ。瞳孔は白く、虹彩は白い。スケッチには日本語のフレーズが添えられており、黒い背景に白いフォントで書かれている。目と日本語のフレーズの組み合わせは、ユニークで芸術的な視覚効果を生み出している。画像の背景とフレーズの白いフォントは、ミニマルで抽象的な美学に貢献しており、神秘的な感覚や思索を呼び起こすかもしれない。画像の雰囲気は示唆に富み、興味をそそる。見る者は目と日本語のフレーズに引き寄せられ、画像の背後にある意味を理解したいという好奇心を呼び起こすかもしれない。
artistString: 梨本うい feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:

What'd I love, you ask? 
Well, it sure ain't you, it's all about me! 
Hey, everybody out there! You hear me?

When crooks laugh

title: 【GUMI】幽霊屋敷の首吊り少女【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features a woman dressed in a blue and purple outfit, standing in a room with a black background. She is holding a microphone and appears to be performing on stage. The room is dimly lit, creating a moody atmosphere. The woman's attire and the stage setting suggest that she might be a singer or performer, possibly in a club or a similar venue. The mood of the image is likely to be energetic and captivating, as the woman is actively engaging with the audience and showcasing her talent.
introduction_ja: 画像は、青と紫の衣装を着た女性が黒い背景の部屋に立っている。彼女はマイクを持ち、ステージで演奏しているように見える。部屋は薄暗く、ムーディーな雰囲気を醸し出している。この女性の服装とステージのセッティングは、彼女が歌手かパフォーマーであることを示唆している。この女性は観客と積極的に関わり、自分の才能を披露しているので、画像の雰囲気はエネルギッシュで魅惑的なものだろう。
songTitle: 幽霊屋敷の首吊り少女
artistString: トーマ feat. GUMI
lyrics.ja.value:
或る夏、影を伸ばすような夕暮れ 
カラスが鳥居の上で聞いた噂 
耳打つ子供の声　夏祭り、揺ラリ。	

裏山の小道、トンネルの向こうに 
ポツリと古び眠る屋敷があって 
首吊った少女の霊が夜な夜な出るそうだ	

好奇心で立ち入る人達 
「言っただろ、出るはずない」と 
軋む階段　揺れる懐中電灯 
誰も気付いてはくれないや	

「私、死んでなんかない。」って 
暗がりに浸かって 
そっと強がって澄ましても 
過ごした日々と共に 
止まった針は埃被って 
また声枯らして今日が終わって 
明日が窓に映り込んでも 
私は此処にいます。	

季節を束ねた虫の聲　夕立 
流れた灯篭　神様の悪戯のよう	

迷い込んできた灰色猫 
「あなたも私が見えないの？」 
背を撫でようとした右手は虚しく 
するり抜け、空を掻いた	

「私、死んでいたのかな」って 
膝を抱えて　過去の糸を手繰っても 
些細な辛いことや家族の顔も思い出せなくて 
遠くで灯りだす家並みの明りや 
咲いた打ち上げ花火を 
眺め、今を誤魔化す	

夏の終わり　過ぎ去った 
子供たちの噂も薄れ 
漂っては薫る線香の煙と一緒に 
姿は透け、やがて消えゆく	

私はただの一夏の噂だった 
六月始めに生まれ 
八月終わりに遠退いた 
意識は影法師になった	

誰も見つけてはくれなかったけれど 
記憶の片隅にある、かつての淡い日々の 
一部となって残り続ける 
もう切らした向日葵の歌 
蝉しぐれも亡き 
夏の匂いだけ残る屋敷に 
少女はもういないだろう

title: 【IA】踊れオーケストラ【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features a woman dressed in a black and white outfit, standing in front of a pink background. She is holding a microphone and appears to be a singer or entertainer. The background is pink, which creates a contrast with the black and white outfit of the woman. The overall mood of the image is energetic and lively, as the woman is performing or preparing to perform. The pink background adds a touch of warmth and vibrancy to the scene, making it visually appealing and engaging.
introduction_ja: 画像は、ピンクの背景の前に立つ、黒と白の衣装に身を包んだ女性。彼女はマイクを持っており、歌手かエンターテイナーと思われる。背景はピンク色で、女性の黒と白の衣装とのコントラストを生み出している。全体的な雰囲気はエネルギッシュで活気に満ちている。ピンクの背景は、このシーンに暖かさと活気を加え、視覚的に魅力的で魅力的なものにしている。

lyrics.en.value:
Come on everyone, line up right where I'm pointing
I don't care if you wind up regretting it later
Get swallowed up by the music
Just singing and dancing your fill


Clapping my hands together
with a do-re-mi-fa-so on every page
I lay out these colorful notes and begin to lead the way

To be honest, it can feel like your real self is just below the surface
But now I'll point this magic baton towards the sky

Come on!
This supernatural event has enveloped the whole town
It echoes through the night sky causing boredom to cry
As if trying to fill up that lonely love
A final fantastical nocturne

Did you hear it? That melody which flutters to the stars

With a 1, 2, 3, 4, let's take the strength to not lose to that tear-stained past
Placing upon it an unending sound with a fun rhythm, ta-ta-ta

A septep to fill this empty line
on the far, far side of that forgotten scenery
The split seams of that undecided harmony
A monochrome telescope

A live performance, no rehearsal, no re-dos

Let's conduct!
A fantastic progression shining with ideals
That person you always exchange glances with-take their hand and dance!
That elegy given off by your heart that has cried and cried out countless times
I hear it loud and clear and that's why I'm here right now

Your real self can be a surprisingly sorrowful thing
So make these magical notes reverberate to the sky

Come on!
This supernatural event has enveloped the whole town
It echoes through the night sky causing boredom to cry
Let's sing a pleasing song A final musical ensemble
Did you hear it? That melody which flutters to the stars

With a 1, 2, 3, 4, let's take the strength to not lose to that tear-stained past
Placing upon it an unending sound with a fun rhythm, ta-ta-ta

I clap my hands together
This dancing, dancing orchestra
Bye bye, goodnight to this night
The next performance will be on your stage, ta-ta-ta

Come on everyone, line up right where I'm standing
I don't care if you wind up regretting it later
Just open your ears and dance together with us

title: アンデッドエネミー／ギガ&スズム feat.鏡音リン
introduction: The image features a black and purple background with a large, bold text that reads "Anime" in white. The text is positioned in the middle of the image, taking up a significant portion of the space. The background appears to be a combination of a dark purple and black color scheme, giving the image a moody and dramatic atmosphere. The text itself is large and bold, making it the focal point of the image. The overall mood of the image is one of mystery and intrigue, as the text "Anime" suggests a connection to the Japanese animation industry, but the dark and dramatic background adds an element of uncertainty and curiosity.
introduction_ja: この画像は、黒と紫の背景に白で「Anime」と書かれた大きく太いテキストが特徴である。テキストは画像の中央に配置され、スペースの大部分を占めている。背景は濃い紫と黒の組み合わせで、ムーディーでドラマチックな雰囲気を醸し出している。文字自体も大きく大胆で、画像の焦点となっている。Anime "というテキストが日本のアニメ産業とのつながりを示唆しているように、画像全体の雰囲気は謎と陰謀のひとつであるが、暗くドラマチックな背景が不確実性と好奇心の要素を加えている。
artistString: スズム, Giga feat. 鏡音リン
