1点?100点?10点? ――キミは?

踊れ 踊れ ダンスナンバー
愛想尽かしては 愛想笑い
外れ 外れ 発明者も
うんざりなんだ まやかしそそのかし

(Do Do Do Do Do Do) 努力じゃもう何も報わりゃしない
崩壊寸前スリリング どうもこうも

『もしも明日の天気が分かったら、人生が1%だけつまらなくなるんだろうな。』

誰か頼みの 飯事信託
不協和音は 今日も止まずに
どこからか 休み方を忘れ
漏電気味 クチャクチャのカタカタ

1点?100点?10点? あららあらあら
1点?11点? あれれあれあれ
1点?もう1点? 1.11?
1000(いっせん)11000(じゅういっせん) ――ボクは?

遠く 遠く 聞こえるんだ
怒号に塗(まみ)れた咽び泣きが
やめて やめて みんなみんな
ボクをひとりぼっちにしないでよ

笑え 笑え 囚人達
ママの言うことは 聞けたのかな?
踊れ 踊れ 大人達の
手の平ダンサーなんだ キミもボクも

(Da Da Da Da Da Da) 打算的悲劇 奇跡も疎(おろ)か
刺激的なチキンレース どうでしょうね?
それの解答は?
lyrics.en.value:
For whatever reason, he put on a mask symbolizing
the leading role he had yearned for in the past. And from the next day onward,
the unhappy boy's smile did not falter,
he was even loved by someone.

A tin plate heart mechanized by chance.
Perhaps if I dizzily wait as much as one thousand years,
I'll forget how to smile along the way.
An equation on the abacus, connections rattle and clatter.

1 mark? 100 marks? 10 marks? Oh my, a failing mark?
1 mark? 100 marks? 10 marks? ...and how about you?

Laugh and sneer, you prisoners,
at the good fortune that came to those who smiled, and its messengers too.
Slander and criticize,and then,
I won't need anyone else. Just leave me alone.

(Da Da Da Da Da Da) Forces of habits won't save anything anymore.
It's thrilling to be on the verge of your limits. How do you like it?

For whatever reason, he put on a mask symbolizing
the leading role he had yearned for in the past. And from the net day onwards,
the kind boy's smile did not falter,
he loved everyone.

Emotions with unknown whereabouts make rattling sounds.
If I sulk around and walk a long, long distance,
I'll forget how to love along the way.
An equation on the abacus, I calculate it in my head, click clack.

1 mark? 100 marks? 10 marks? That's the falling point.
1 mark? 100 marks? 10 marks? ...and how about you?

Dance, dance, it's a dance number.
I act spitefully in disgust and force a smile.
Even an inventor at wit's end
is tedious, deceiving and instigating.

(Do Do Do Do Do Do) Great efforts aren't rewarded with anything.
It's thrilling to be on the brink of collapse. There's no other way.

Someone requested I play house and trust them.
The dissonance not stopping today either,
I forgot how to rest along the way.
It feels like short circuiting, crunching and rattling.

1 mark? 100 marks? 10 marks? Oh, wow, oh.
1 mark? 100 marks? 10 marks? Oh my, oh my, oh my.
1 mark? 11 marks? Oh my, oh my, oh my.
1 mark? Ugh, 1 mark? ――me?

I can hear it from far away,
sobbing choked up tears stained by angry roars.
Just stop it everybody.
Don't leave me alone.

Laugh and sneer, you prisoners.
I wonder, could you hear what mama said?
Dance, you and I,
we're just dancers in the palms of adults' hands.

(Da Da Da Da Da Da) A calculated tragedy, miracles are foolish.
it's a stimulating chicken race, how do you like it?
And the solution to this is?

title: 【GUMI】チェックメイト【オリジナルPV】
introduction: The image is a black and white video game screenshot featuring a young woman wearing a black dress and a white shirt. She is standing in a room, possibly a living room, and appears to be playing a video game. The room is decorated with a checkered pattern on the floor, which adds a unique touch to the scene.The mood of the image is casual and relaxed, as the woman is enjoying her time playing the video game. The black and white color scheme adds a nostalgic and classic feel to the image, reminiscent of old-school gaming experiences. Overall, the image conveys a sense of leisure and fun, as the woman engages in her favorite pastime.
introduction_ja: 画像は、黒いドレスに白いシャツを着た若い女性が登場する白黒のビデオゲームのスクリーンショット。彼女はおそらくリビングルームと思われる部屋に立っており、ビデオゲームをしているように見える。部屋の床には市松模様が施されており、このシーンにユニークなタッチを加えている。画像の雰囲気はカジュアルでリラックスしており、女性がビデオゲームを楽しんでいるように見える。白と黒の配色は、昔ながらのゲーム体験を彷彿とさせる、ノスタルジックでクラシックな雰囲気を画像に添えている。全体的に、この画像は、女性が好きな娯楽に没頭するレジャー感と楽しさを伝えている。
artistString: ゆちゃP feat. GUMI
lyrics.ja.value:
手に負えない程妬んで　誰と戦ってるんだキャパオーバー 
削ぎ落ちナイトを嗤って　当の本人は見て見ぬふり	

報われない程痛んで　だめだこれは待った無しのゲームオーバー 
白黒つけた盤上で　追いつめられたのに気付かずに	

勝ち目など見えない　言い訳はできない 
底はもう果てない　ああ	

チェックメイト　もうおしまいった　まいった 
それで終わるなら　神様なんて　いらないのです	

さあ　戦って　辞書を引いて　理論武装のプログラム 
いつ終わる?　それじゃ困る!　痛いほど解ってる 
ねえ悔しくて　夢になれず　君になりたいと望んでる 
前にしか進めない　歩兵 (ポーン) でも	

最後の駒も失って　そろそろ茶番はもう終わろうか 
裸のキング蔑んで「君はもういらないものだ」と	

やり切れない程悔やんで　負けた気持ち募りまたキャリーオーバー 
一体何度繰り返す　シナリオはもう崩壊寸前	

チェックメイト　指さすのはもうやめて 
さよなら私　それすら　許さないのです	

でも笑ってる？楽しんでる？理解不能の白昼夢 
君は誰？私の何？言いたい事　詰まってる 
苦しくて　夢は覚めず　でもまだ君に挑んでる 
それがきっと叶わない　理想でも	

戦って　果てに見えた　ずっと待ち望んだエピローグ 
もう終わる　これで勝てる？甘くはない　わかってる	

あと少し　また届かない　それでも君を望んでる 
前にしか進めない　歩兵 (ポーン) でも 
それがきっと遠くない　理想なら
lyrics.en.value:
Getting uncontrollably jealous,
Who's making you fight beyond your capacity?
With a sneer at the knight chipped away,
The foe at hand pretends he didn't see

Hurting so much it won't be worth the effort.
No good, time's up, it's game over
On the black and white checkerboard,
He cornered me and I didn't even notice

I see no opening for me, no excuse will do
Going down an endless well

Checkmate, it’s done, I'm beat
It it all ends there, then God, for me, is out of question

Now, come on and fight, pull out the dictionary,
Crack open a program loaded for this ideological match
When's it gonna end? Well, that's not going to do
I understand so hard it hurts
You know, it's frustration, it's futile,
But I desire so much to be like you
Down to the pawn that can only march forward

With the loss of this last piece,
Shall we put an end to our little chit chat?
And forsake the bare naked king,
Declaring "I don't want you anymore"

Unbearably crushed with frustration,
Wallowing in defeatism, another carry over
How many more times will this scenario repeat?
Already, it's seconds away from breakdown

Checkmate, would you stop pointing it out every time?
Goodbye to myself, even that is not permissible

But are you grinning? Are you enjoying this?
In this incomprehensible daydream
Who are you? What are you to me?
I'm struggling for the words
Still in its throes, the dream doesn't end
But I still challenge you
Even if it's an ideal to never come true

Fought to the end, at last I see
Here's the epilogue I've waited for so long
It's almost over, does this mean I win?
Not so simple, I knew that

Just one more push, I'm not there yet
Even so, I have desire for you
Down to the pawn that can only march forward
If it's an ideal surely not too far away, then

title: 【初音ミク】　パケットヒーロー　【オリジナル】
introduction: The background of this image is a black and white photo of a brick wall with a heart-shaped hole in it. The heart-shaped hole is filled with a variety of different letters and symbols, creating a unique and artistic composition. The image is likely a creative and artistic representation of love, with the heart-shaped hole representing the heart of the person or object being loved. The black and white color scheme adds a sense of nostalgia and timelessness to the image, making it a visually appealing and thought-provoking piece.
introduction_ja: この画像の背景は、ハート型の穴が開いたレンガの壁の白黒写真です。ハート型の穴はさまざまな文字や記号で埋められ、ユニークで芸術的な構図を作り出している。このイメージは、おそらく創造的で芸術的な愛の表現であり、ハート型の穴は愛されている人や物の心を表している。白と黒の配色は、このイメージにノスタルジーと時代を超越した感覚を加え、視覚的に魅力的で考えさせられる作品となっている。
artistString: MARETU feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
つたう温もり、焼き付いた夢心地
噛み付くように触れ合って！
誰も信じない当ても無い未来
死んじゃうまで強く感じたいな…ってさあ、
おかしーな、
きみの怖さに触れたいよ。
張り裂ける想い、恋と貼り替えていけ！

くだらない「タカラモノ」だからこそ
素直には手放せないんだな。　
布団の中 ありったけの鼓動、
今日もゴミにしていた？

だいたい変わらない、浅い繰り返し
本能的にしくじって！
誰も帰れない当てもない未来
泣いちゃうまで深く感じたいな…ってさあ、
かわいーな、
きみの弱さが愛でたいよ。
「いっそのこと…」と諦めるきみが好き！
　
止まりそうだ息の音 聞き取れない
何がしたいのか わかれないんだな、
思い出すと疲れちゃうのだ
手を離さないでね？

たったひとつだけ守っていた証をすぱっと切って
見返り目掛けて こじ開けていた？
つまらない今日日、詰まる距離見張ってないで
今、やっと気づいたんだ、
ぱっくりあいた傷口に！

メイキング動画追っかけて　拙い言葉を吐きかけよう
…で、キックオフだ後半戦　くたびれた帆をはりますと、

まさかまさかの干上がった不定期航路
あいた傷口がふさがらないなあ…

本性わからない！
痛いとこばっか 感動的にいじくって。
長続きしない生ぬるい眩暈
壊れるまで漬かり浸かりたいな…ってさあ、
うれしーな。
嫌われたって幸せだ、
「大好きだよ…」とうつむく、きみが好き…でさあ、　どうしよう？　…こうしようか！

そこに ねっとりあふれた無邪気さだってさ
ぐったり破れて消え失せるなら、
こっそり心を きつく縛ってみせる！

セッセッセッセッセ…と、れでぃーふぉーゆあーらぶ

涙目掃き溜め 代わり映えの理由、
聞きたくない。痛い痛い泣いていたい
甘ったるい声、匂いに夢中

ちゅっちゅっちゅっちゅっちゅっ…で、れでぃーふぉーゆあーらぶ

たったひとつだけ黙っていた秘密を切り開いて
生傷だらけの愛を生むんだ？
つまらない今日日、詰まる距離見張ってないで
今、やっと気づいたんだ、
ざっくり裂けた左胸！

愛とかいうもの追っかけて どぎつい痛みに酔いしれよう、
誰彼構わず声かけて　地に着く足を探している

こじれきった夢 削ぎ取って空っぽだった私、
あの日から、おとなになったみたい。

いつまで泣いていたい…？
「何もわかっていない！」
lyrics.en.value:
The warmth following along, the dreamy daze burnt into my mind,
They touch in a way that feels like biting!
An aimless future that no one believes in
I want to feel it so strongly that I'll drop dead, but you know, it’s so weird
I want to touch your scariness
Reupholster these bursting feelings with this romance!

It's because this "treasure" is worthless
That I honestly just can't part with it
All of the heartbeats in my futon,
Did I throw them in the trash again today?

It's generally constant, repeating superficially,
Failing by instinct!
An aimless future that no one can return to
I want to feel it so deeply that I'll be in tears, but you know, it’s so cute,
I want to cherish your joyous weakness.
I like you when you say "let's just get this over with” and give up!

I can’t make out the sound of breathing that appears to be about to stop
I have no way of knowing what you want to do,
And whenever I remember that, it exhausts me
Don't let go of my hand, got it?

Cleanly cutting the sole piece of evidence we were protecting,
Did we pry it open, aiming for a reward?
Life's boring nowadays, don't look out at a shrinking distance
Now we've finally noticed
All our painful gaping wounds!

Let's chase after the behind the scenes of this movie and spit out shoddy words
and, in the second half, the kickoff, when we put up the worn sail,

Unexpectedly, unexpectedly, we sail a dried-up, irregular route
These painful wounds aren't going to close up

I don't know the real you!
Messing with my emotions, only in the spots where it hurts
This tepid dizziness won't last long
I want to soak and immerse myself in it so much that I'll break apart, but you know, it’s so delightful.
Even if people hate us, we're happy,
And I like you when you say "I love you so much” and cast your eyes down
so come on,
What should we do?
Should we do this?

So, you know the innocence that stickily overflowed there?
Well, if it wearily breaks and disappears,
I'll secretly try to tightly tie down your heart!

Se-Se-Se-Se-Se...t, ready for your love

A garbage dump of teary eyes, a reason to change for the better,
I don't want to hear about any of that. It hurts, it hurts, I want to cry
I'm obsessed with that saccharine voice, that smell

Mwah Mwah Mwah Mwah Mwah... and ready for your love

Cutting open the sole secret that was being silent,
Will we yield a love covered in fresh wounds?
Life's boring nowadays, don't look out at a shrinking distance
Now we've finally noticed
The deeply split left sides of our chests!

Let's chase after this thing called "love" and get infatuated with this harsh pain,
Approaching anyone and everyone, searching for a way to keep ourselves grounded

Shaving off my soured dreams, I was empty,
And it seems that, ever since that day, I've grown up.

How long do you want to cry for?
"I have no freaking idea!!"

title: 【初音ミク】てんしょう　しょうてんしょう【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features a woman standing in a room with a large, colorful, and abstract painting on the wall behind her. The painting is a mix of different colors and shapes, creating a visually striking and vibrant backdrop. The woman is looking at the painting, possibly admiring its beauty or contemplating its meaning. The mood of the image is one of curiosity and appreciation for the artwork, as the woman is drawn to the painting and its unique composition. The output of the image is a high-quality digital photograph, capturing the essence of the scene and the woman's interaction with the painting.
introduction_ja: 画像は、部屋の中に立つ女性の背後の壁に描かれた、大きくてカラフルな抽象画。絵はさまざまな色と形が混ざり合い、視覚的に印象的で鮮やかな背景を作り出している。女性は絵を見ており、おそらくその美しさに感嘆しているか、意味を考えているのだろう。女性が絵とそのユニークな構図に惹きつけられているように、画像の雰囲気は作品に対する好奇心と鑑賞のひとつです。画像の出力は高品質のデジタル写真で、シーンのエッセンスと女性と絵の対話をとらえている。
songTitle: てんしょう　しょうてんしょう
artistString: きくお feat. 初音ミク

You always laugh at me and ridicule; 
Ahh, ahh, what's so funny? 
Tonight, tonight, a secret revenge 
It's my turn... 

Hah... 

(Reincarnation, ascensation - until becoming another being; 
Reincarnation, recombination - heal again and again...) 

When the dawn comes, when the ropes are untied, 
I'll be no more come tomorrow evening... 
So if you keep on strangling... 

Hah... 

Even if I stop breathing, I'm having so much fun 
A curse, a curse: with a forbidden spell of rebirth, 
Resurrect, resurrect, like always... 

Reincarnation, ascensation - until becoming another being; 
Reincarnation, recombination - heal again and again... 
Reincarnation, ascensation - until we're both monstrous, 
Reincarnation, recombination - destroy it, heal it... 

Forbidden spell... Like we always do, 
Until we're both monstrous...

title: 【GUMI】 心做し 【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features a couple of young people, a man and a woman, embracing each other in a warm and affectionate manner. They are standing in a room, with a pink background, and are surrounded by a multitude of stars. The scene is set in a dreamy and romantic atmosphere, with the couple's embrace creating a sense of intimacy and love. The background of stars adds a touch of fantasy and magic to the scene, making it feel like a fairytale or a dream come true. The mood of the image is warm and tender, conveying a sense of love and connection between the two people.
introduction_ja: 男女の若いカップルが、暖かく愛情深い態度で抱き合っている。ふたりはピンクの背景の部屋に立ち、たくさんの星に囲まれている。夢のようなロマンチックな雰囲気の中で、二人の抱擁が親密さと愛の感覚を生み出している。背景の星がファンタジーと魔法のタッチを加え、おとぎ話や夢が実現したようなシーンに仕上がっている。画像のムードは暖かく優しく、2人の間の愛とつながりの感覚を伝えている。

こんなの知らないよ　独りにしないで

酷いよ　酷いよ、もういっそ僕の体を
壊して　引き裂いて　好きなようにしてよ
叫んで　藻掻いて　瞼を腫らしても
まだ君は僕の事を抱きしめて離さない
もういいよ

ねぇ、もしも僕に心があるなら
どうやってそれを見つければいいの？
少し微笑んで君が言う
「それはね、ここにあるよ」
lyrics.en.value:
Say, if everything was thrown away,
Would living with a smile be easier?
Because my chest is hurting again,
Don’t say anything more

Say, if everything was forgotten,
Would living without crying also be easier?
But I can’t do things like that,
So don’t show me anything more

No matter how close I get to you, my heart is just the one

It’s awful, it’s awful, I’d rather you destroy my body, tear it to sheds, do as you please
Even if I scream, squirm and cause my eyelids to swell,
You still hold me tight, you won’t let go, so it’s okay

Say, if my wish is granted, I’d want the same thing as you
But because I don’t exist, well, at least come over here

No matter how much I’m loved by you, my heart is just the one

Stop, stop, don’t be so kind
Whatever I do, I can’t understand
It hurts, it hurts, teach me with words
I don’t know this, don’t leave me alone

It’s awful, it’s awful, I’d rather you destroy my body, tear it to sheds, do as you please
Even if I scream, squirm and cause my eyelids to swell,
You still hold me tight, you won’t let go, so it’s okay

Say, if I had a heart, how would I find it?
Smiling a little, you say, “well, about that, it’s right here”

lyrics.en.source: Translation by S Tashiro, Y.T., and フリスクチャンネル, Chung Seiker
lyrics.en.value:
"Onee-chan~​ I bought some snacks~​"
"Yay​"
"Let eat them together~​"
"What did you buy?​"

★Chocomint ice★​
What else?​
★Chocomint ice★
What else?​
★Chocomint ice★​
What else?​
Chocomint,–​
Also Chocomint ice~​
Aoi...​
Chocomint ice~!

Breakfast and Chocomint​
As lunch's dessert as well​
Adding one to dinner​
Eating them every day makes me happy!

They're so delicious, but
Why won't she eat them?​
I'm going to show you
Just how wonderful they are!​

A holy treat that takes you to heaven​
With its green, refreshing aroma,
Truly is​
The best of the best​

Such a wonderful world
But why–​ Only me?
Ah, I know!
To show the world just how wonderful they are​
Why don't we create a political party~​
"Hey, Aoi–​"

Chocomint Ice! Ice! Ice! (YES!)
They're so refreshing​
Chocomint Ice! Ice! Ice! (YES!)​
And delicious!​
Chocomint Ice! Ice! Ice! (YES!)
Only I can give you a perfect love​
Chocomint Ice! Ice! Ice! (YES!)​
Wouldn't you like to–​
Chocomint Ice! Ice! Ice! (YES!)
Have another one?​
Chocomint Ice! Ice! Ice! (YES!)
Everything would be better if we share them​

"Aoi– Onee–​"

Chocomint Cake! Cake! Cake! (YES!)
They're so adorable
Chocomint Cake! Cake! Cake! (YES!)
And delicious!
Chocomint Cake! Cake! Cake! (YES!)
I'm going to take you to a bright future​
Chocomint Cake! Cake! Cake! (YES!)
Wouldn't you like to–​
Chocomint Cake! Cake! Cake! (YES!)
Have another one?​
Chocomint Cake! Cake! Cake! (YES!)
You had eaten so much, so you must be happy, right?​

​​"Heck yeah!​"
​
Don't be fooled
By its perfect blue form​
This cleverly crafted, to make the Chocomint party- Trap!​

So you wanted to be exterminated?!​
This is war!​
May mercy be upon the believer​
And punishment upon the traitor​

​​"Anything that's not Chocomint is evil!​"
​​"Only Chocomint is justice!​"

(Chocomint Ice!)
"Aoi~​"
(Chocomint Ice!)
"There's this new recipe, which is getting popular​"
(Chocomint Ice!)
"I thought you'd love it, so I made it for you​"
(Chocomint Ice!)
​​"You​-Will-​​Eat​-​​It-Right​?"
"Itadakimasu​."

Chocomint Ice! Ice! Ice! (sooi!)
It tastes great, right?​
Chocomint Ice! Ice! Ice! (sooi!)
Don't you love it?​
Chocomint Ice! Ice! Ice! (sooi!)
You're so impressed that you're speechless?!​
So glad I made more​
AHHHHHHHHHHH!!!
You must be happy!​
Have some more​
AHHHHHHHHHHH!!!
Please have mercy!
Chocomint Ice! Ice! Ice! (orrrrrrrr!)
I have finally realized–​
That people are free–​
To make the right choice​
We are-
​​Closing this party!​
EIYAAAAAAAAAAA!!!

"Onee-chan~​ I bought some snacks~​"
"Is that so...​"
"Let eat them together~​"

Chocolate Ice…

"Yes!"

"Finally, something that's not Chocomint​"
"Hehe, I'm sorry Onee-chan​"
"Huh, why is it so tough to open?​"

title: 【初音ミク】ドルアーガの塔より「おなかすいたうた」
introduction: The image features a young girl playing a video game on a Nintendo Wii console. She is dressed in a blue dress and has a pink bow in her hair. The game she is playing is called "Dora" and is a popular children's game. The girl is smiling and appears to be enjoying herself while playing the game. The background of the image is a black wall, which adds a contrasting element to the scene. The overall mood of the image is joyful and playful, as the girl is having fun and engaging in a popular game.
introduction_ja: 画像は、任天堂のWiiコンソールでビデオゲームをしている少女。青いドレスに身を包み、髪にはピンクのリボンをつけている。彼女がプレイしているゲームは「ドラ」と呼ばれ、子供たちに人気のあるゲームだ。少女は笑顔で、ゲームを楽しんでいるように見える。画像の背景は黒い壁で、シーンにコントラストを加えている。女の子は楽しみながら人気のゲームに夢中になっているので、画像全体の雰囲気は陽気で遊び心にあふれている。
artistString: ドンフライP feat. 初音ミク

title: 【IA】「Ib」【オリジナルPV】
introduction: The image is a black and white painting of a colorful flower garden. The flowers are arranged in a variety of shapes and sizes, creating a visually appealing and vibrant scene. The flowers are scattered across the canvas, with some closer to the foreground and others further back. The overall mood of the image is serene and peaceful, as the contrast between the black and white background and the vibrant colors of the flowers creates a sense of harmony and balance. The painting is likely to evoke feelings of tranquility and relaxation, making it a suitable choice for decorating a living space or office.
introduction_ja: この画像は、色とりどりの花畑を描いたモノクロの絵である。花はさまざまな形や大きさで配置され、視覚に訴える鮮やかな光景を作り出している。花はキャンバス全体に散らばっており、手前に寄っているものと奥に寄っているものがある。黒と白の背景と花の鮮やかな色のコントラストが調和とバランスの感覚を生み出し、全体的な雰囲気は穏やかで平和的だ。この絵は、静寂とリラクゼーションの感情を呼び起こしそうなので、リビングスペースやオフィスに飾るのに適している。
artistString: コウ, Diarays feat. IA
lyrics.ja.value:
彩りの壊れた世界の中で 
まだ幼い眼窩（がんか）に刺した　一輪の赤い薔薇 
揺蕩（たゆた）うこの痛みも　静を隠す眩暈（めまい）も 
歪んだこの絶望も　あなたは消してくれた

夢の央（なか）刻んだ愛を　この風景画に溶かしたい

空虚な蜜を贈ろう　爆（は）ぜた存在は何処？ 
優しさを忘れた　一輪の黄色い薔薇 
いつまでも繋ごう 
この生を閉じ込めるよ

孤独、虚無、裏、光ったキャンディ 
笑った兔を贄にさざめく 
存在に舞った花占い後、 
日々割れた今日を赤く染めるの？ 
独占欲、毒腺獄、直線目、 
見つけ次第薔薇薔薇来な来な 
「愛されたいそれ頂戴。 
誰か見つけてタスケテ私ヲ。」

誰も救えないなら　どうか消えないままで 
あなたの心の額（まど）　私のことを描いてね

気付いたの　刻んだ愛を 
彩るための　”奇跡”（はなことば） 
この記憶は　消えない色彩（えのぐ）で 
描かれてるわ　ねぇ、そうでしょう 
「Ib」

素敵な美術展　綺麗な肖像画 
何故か知らない声が　優しく微笑んだ
lyrics.en.value:
Inside a world of broken colors
there, stabbed inside a still young eye socket,
was a single red rose
Even this swaying pain,
Even this dizziness that hides peace
Even this warped despair
you erased them all for me

This love we etched inside this dream
I want to melt it in this landscape painting

Let's send empty honey
Where is the existence that has split?
A single yellow flower
that forgot kindness

Let's stay together forever
Lock in your life

Loneliness, nothingness, hidden, a shining piece of candy
a laughing rabbit is noisily sacrificed
After a flower dancing in existence divinates,
will you drench this today split from day to day in red?
Desire to monopolize, a prison of poison, a straight sight
When we find it it, will break apart and fall to pieces
"I want to be loved, I want that,
someone find and save me"

If I can't save anyone
somehow without disappearing
The window to your heart,
Draw me on it, okay?

I realized
the love that we etched
the thing we needed to color it, the
"language of flowers"

This memory will not fade away, with a paintbrush, it is drawn
Hey, isn't that right,
“Ib”

A wonderful art exhibition, a beautiful portrait
A voice I don't know for some reason kindly smiled

title: 【初音ミク】高音厨音域テスト【オリジナルPV】
introduction: The background of the image is a black and white background, which creates a contrasting effect with the colorful character in the foreground. The character is a cute girl with a pink hair bow, wearing a blue dress and holding a microphone. She is smiling and appears to be enjoying herself. The mood of the image is cheerful and playful, as the girl seems to be having fun and engaging in an activity that involves singing or performing.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景は白と黒で、手前のカラフルなキャラクターとのコントラスト効果を生み出している。キャラクターは、ピンクのヘアリボンをつけたかわいい女の子で、青いドレスを着てマイクを持っている。笑顔で楽しそうだ。女の子は楽しそうに歌ったり演奏したりしているので、画像の雰囲気は陽気で遊び心にあふれている。
artistString: 木村わいP feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
こんにちわ　初音ミクだよ 
音域テストを　始めるよ

hiA hiB hiC hiD hiC

すこしだけ音を上げるよ

hiG hihiA hihiA# hihiC hihiD

ギブアップしてもいいのよ？

最後は一気にあげちゃうよ

hihiC　hihiD hihiD# hihiF hihiG

hihihiA hihihiB hihihiC hihihiD hihihiE

ここまで出たなら 
合格
lyrics.en.value:
Hello there it's Miku Hatsune!
Lets start the range test
if you're high pitch addicts
you'll be able to hit the notes.

hiA hiB hiC hiD hiC

This is really low for you, isn't it?

I'll give you some more notes
If you're average people you won't be able to hit them though.
But if you're high pitch addicts
Even if you catch colds you'll be able to sing it.

hiD hiE hiF hiG hiF

That's still your mid range right?

I'll give you another set of notes
Is your falsetto up to the challenge?
If you're high pitch addicts
This'll be a piece of cake right?

hiG hihiA hihiA# hihiC hihiD

You can give up if you want

I'll give you much higher set of notes
The lyrics are too high to hear them, huh?
Show me the true power
of high pitch addicts.

hihiC　hihiD hihiD# hihiF hihiG

Thats the end
Nope, I lied

hihihiA hihihiB hihihiC hihihiD hihihiE

If you were able to make it this far
You pass.

The object itself is the main focus of the image, drawing attention to its intricate details and sparkling appearance. title: ストラトステラ / 初音ミク
introduction: The background of the image is a black and white background, which creates a contrasting effect with the colorful character in the foreground. The character is a person wearing a blue jacket and a white hat, standing in front of a black background. The mood of the image is cheerful and playful, as the character appears to be enjoying their time in the scene. The output of the image is a black and white version of the original colorful image, which emphasizes the contrast between the character and the background.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景は白と黒で、手前のカラフルなキャラクターとのコントラスト効果を生み出している。キャラクターは青いジャケットに白い帽子をかぶった人物で、黒い背景の前に立っている。画像の雰囲気は陽気で遊び心があり、キャラクターはそのシーンで自分の時間を楽しんでいるように見えます。画像の出力は、元のカラフルな画像の白黒バージョンで、キャラクターと背景のコントラストを強調している。
artistString: ナユタン星人 feat. 初音ミク

全ての光が　なくなってしまいますように」

「ステラ、君は多分　気づいてないだろうけどさ―」

Stella cast a single spell
Making sure she wouldn’t be noticed, by anyone in the world

“If perhaps, tomorrow, I were to die

This world you hated, I loved it, you know

She smiled, faintly

The black and white color scheme adds a classic and timeless feel to the scene, emphasizing the elegance and grace of the couple's dance. introduction: The image features a young girl with a red hair bow, sitting in a chair and holding a cell phone. She is wearing a black shirt and appears to be in a relaxed and comfortable position. The background of the image is a red wall, which adds a vibrant and energetic touch to the scene. introduction_ja: 赤い髪のリボンをつけた少女が椅子に座り、携帯電話を持っている。彼女は黒いシャツを着ており、リラックスした心地よい姿勢に見える。画像の背景は赤い壁で、シーンに活気とエネルギッシュなタッチを加えている。画像全体の雰囲気はカジュアルでリラックスしており、少女は携帯電話を楽しんでいる。

lyrics.ja.value:

何よりも嫌い　キライ ライ。

真っ赤に爛れた　心　きつく閉じて　誰か僕に上手な　生き方　教えてよ


首のわっかに縋って　目をつむって逃げたくて
タスケテ　のサインも　置き去りにまどろんで

真っ赤な嘘が　こわくて　くるしくて　ここにぽっかり開いた　傷口かきむしって
真っ赤に染まった　心　きつく閉じて　どうか僕に上手な　●に方　教えてよ


痛みが消せなくて
lyrics.en.value:
My pains, my pains, my pains, they’re coming nonstop—stinging pains, prickling pains.
I can’t see anything—neither this, nor that. Everything is distorted into a wobbly blob.

No one, no one, no one, I can trust no one—my ideas are the only things that matter.
Everywhere I look, there’s a plethora of tragedies of the type one may find here, there, anywhere.

Frightened of people, I withdrew into myself. If it’s such a superficial friendship,
then I have no need for it, no need, nuh-uh.

Ridiculed and betrayed by such obvious lies, I don’t know how to stop these pains that’ve soaked so deep into my heart.
Even if my painfully swollen heart were to wear down to almost nothing, it’ll still continue to get hurt like always, with a fresh wound here and there.

No one, no one, no one, there’s no one I can cling on to. My tears are rolling down my cheeks
as I desperately search for the kind of ideals and ideas one may find here, there, anywhere.

I hate people, but in truth, the one I hate the most
is my own self, and my weakness. I hate it, hate it, hate it.

My heart’s been tied up within this web of such obvious lies, I don’t know how to stop these pains that’ve stuck so fast to it.
So I’ve locked up my painfully inflamed heart, as tightly as I could. Would someone please show me an easy way to live?

Clinging to this loop around my neck, I closed my eyes. I just want to run away.
But my SOS sign has fallen asleep in some forgotten corner.

Those obvious lies give me so much fear, so much pain. I can’t stop scratching at these gaping wounds.
So I’ve locked up my painfully red heart, as tightly as I could. Please, show me an easy way to die.

I can’t make my pains go away.

ドアを開ける勇気だ

ダメなぼくだけど　今日は
がんばってみようかな
昨日よりも　ちょっとだけ
自分を好きになれるように
lyrics.en.value:
Help me, Doraemon. *
I think it’s hopeless for me now.
Come and help me, Doraemon,
and leave Sewashi alone. **

Every day is nothing but failure,
where I'm ignored by the girl I like.
Yesterday, at my part-time job,
I was yelled at by my boss 55 times.

Take out your Anywhere Door. ***
I want to go somewhere far away.
Ah, but you’re not
here anymore.

Help me, Doraemon.
I think it’s hopeless for me now.
Coz more and more
I'm getting to hate myself.

I thought that when I grew up,
I would know the right answers.
But that's
not necessarily true, is it?

At least in as much as my dreams
I want to be a hero.
If I can't even become a god in online games,
I can't save the world.

Take out your time machine.
I want to go back to the old days.
I was pretty hopeless then, but
I could smile from my heart.

Help me, Doraemon.
I can't do anything.
I have nothing to write
in the skills column of my resume.

I thought I've been doing
the best I can, but
of course, without futuristic gadgets,
I can't get to be the main character.

To Nobita
Every day may be nothing but failure,
where you're ignored by the girl you like,
and also at your part-time job
you may get yelled at 55 times and such.

But when those things happen,
people don't begin to hate other people.
Isn't a hero meant to be
someone strong?

So long, Nobita.
I'm sure you'll be fine.
In a world where it's all win and lose,
it's OK to lose every now and then.

So long, Nobita.
Even if people laugh at you,
you're not the kind of guy to laugh at others.
That says something great about you.

So long, Doraemon.
What I need now
isn't the Anywhere Door,
it's the courage to open the door.

I might be hopeless but, today
maybe I'll try my hardest.
So that, a bit more than I did yesterday,
I'll get to like who I am,
so that I'll get to like who I am.

*Doraemon is a robot cat that travels back in time to help Nobita.
**Sewashi was Doraemon's original owner.
***One of Doraemon's futuristic gadgets that can take the user anywhere.

title: 初音ミクアレンジ「般若心経ロック」
introduction: The image features a young woman with long hair, dressed in a green outfit, and holding a cell phone. She is sitting on a cloud, which is a common setting for comic book characters. The background of the image is filled with white clouds, creating a dreamy and surreal atmosphere. The woman appears to be enjoying her time on the cloud, possibly taking a break from her phone or simply enjoying the view. The mood of the image is lighthearted and playful, as the woman is in a relaxed and carefree state, surrounded by the clouds and her cell phone.
introduction_ja: 画像には、緑の服を着て携帯電話を持っている髪の長い若い女性が描かれている。彼女は雲の上に座っているが、これはコミックブックのキャラクターがよく使う設定だ。背景は白い雲で埋め尽くされ、夢のようなシュールな雰囲気を醸し出している。女性は雲の上での時間を楽しんでいるように見えるが、おそらく携帯電話で一息ついているか、単に景色を楽しんでいるのだろう。女性は雲と携帯電話に囲まれ、リラックスした気ままな状態にある。
artistString: クワガタP feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
般若心経ポップ

仏説摩訶般若波羅蜜多心経
観自在菩薩　行深般若波羅蜜多時　照見五蘊皆空
度一切苦厄　舎利子　色不異空　空不異色　色即是空
空即是色　受想行識亦復如是　舎利子　是諸法空相
不生不滅　不垢不浄　不増不減　是故空中
無色　無受想行識　無眼耳鼻舌身意　無色声香味触法
無眼界　乃至無意識界　無無明亦　無無明尽
乃至無老死　亦無老死尽　無苦集滅道　無智亦無得
以無所得故　菩提薩埵　依般若波羅蜜多故
心無罣礙　無罣礙故　無有恐怖　遠離一切顛倒夢想
究竟涅槃　三世諸仏　依般若波羅蜜多故
得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提　故知般若波羅蜜多
是大神呪　是大明呪　是無上呪　是無等等呪
能\除一切苦　真実不虚　故説般若波羅蜜多呪
即説呪曰　羯諦　羯諦　波羅羯諦　波羅僧羯諦
菩提薩婆訶　般若心経

introduction_ja: 画像の背景はピンクの壁で、画像の白と黒の要素と対照的な配色になっている。黒と白でデザインされた人物の顔のアップ。人物の口は開いており、叫んでいるか、強い感情を表現しているように見える。人物の表情と対照的な色彩がダイナミックで魅力的なシーンを作り出しているので、画像のムードはエネルギッシュで強烈だ。
artistString: 煮ル果実 feat. v flower
lyrics.ja.value:
横縞纏う 囚人ファム・ファタール 
有象無象搾り Juiceを呷る 
夜な夜な酔な 火遊びで 縊死する 
女児の蝋が溶ける頃

違和感が残業している 
空空が寂寂している 
淡々とさ こうべ垂れた末に 
はい論破って 
乾坤一擲 サレンダー 
御利口 離合 利己的に 
ポジよりネガを誑す

上っ面な愛を愛と呼べんなら 
如何せん僕はフールみたい 
『話したいこともない』って言うから 
そこで護身だと気付いたの 
上っ面な君を肯定したんなら 
僕の立つ瀬とは何処へやら 
焦れったい玻璃とファンデーション 
舌を曝け出してさ まるで犬

邪 纏う衆人ファム・ファタール 
有象無象絞り Deuceを煽る 
様な夜な夜な 火遊びで 意志スルー 
情事の牢が解ける頃

自称・天秤はお頭が軽い方に軍杯を上げた 
デキャンタに移した程度にしか思ってない 
布石をいけず石のように置いた馬鹿

上っ面な愛を愛と呼べんなら 
如何せん僕はフールみたい 
『離したいワケがない』って言うけど 
気付かないワケも無いんだよな 
上っ面な僕の存在理由はさ 
お誂え向きな隘路 贄 
ブランデー肌で吸ったなら 
しどろもどろになって戯れて

上っ面な愛を愛と呼べんなら 
如何せん僕はフールみたい 
『話せないこともない』って言うから 
そこで誤審だと気付いたの 
上っ面な愛を愛と呼ぶんなら 
如何せん僕がヒールみたい 
お別れのキスも何杯目 
邪 見透かされて まるで犬

まるで犬さ
lyrics.en.value:
A femme fatale prisoner dressed in stripes
Gulps down the juice squeezed from the crowd
Every night, drunkenly, she plays with fire, and hangs herself
When the wax figure of a little girl melts

My discomfort is working overtime
The emptiness is lonely*
A refutation that comes dispassionately
After I’ve hung my head
Is an all-or-nothing surrender
A well-behaved meeting and parting, selfishly
Cajoling a negative out of a positive

If this shallow love is what you call love
Unfortunately, like a fool,
I realized I’d been acting out of self-preservation
Only after saying “I don’t even want to talk to you”
If you affirm your shallowness
Then where’s my ground to stand on?
An annoying glass and foundation
Hang your tongue out, just like a dog

A femme fatale of the public, dressed in wickedness
Seems to fan the flames of the deuce squeezed out of the crowd
As nightly she plays with fire, ignoring intent
When released from the prison of this love affair

On the scales of self-proclamation, my head was lighter; the military cup was raised
I can only think to the extent that it’s been transferred to the decanter
When arranging my pieces, I placed my stupidity like a guardrail**

If this shallow love is what you call love
Unfortunately, like a fool,
I said “It’s not like I want to let you go”
Though it also wasn’t like I hadn’t noticed
My shallow self’s raison d’etre
Is the sacrifice of a perfect narrow path
If you’d drunk brandy off my skin
I would get flustered and be laughed at

If this shallow love is what you call love
Unfortunately, like a fool,
I realized I’d misjudged the situation
Only after saying “It’s not that I can’t talk to you”
If this shallow love is what you call love
Unfortunately, like a heel,
I’d kiss you goodbye countless times
See through my wickedness, just like a dog

Just like a dog

---
T/N:

* 空空寂寂 is a Japanese translation of the Buddhist saying generally rendered in English as “All is void.” This refers to the concept of Sunyata. This line is structured differently grammatically, so I’ve translated it literally, but the target audience is probably intended to catch the reference.

** An いけず/ikezuishi (literally a “can’t-go stone”) is a stone placed on a street corner to prevent cars from getting too close to a building. 布石/Fuseki, which refers to strategically arranging game pieces in Go or more figuratively to making preparations of any kind, literally means “placing stones.”

title: 【初音ミク】戯言スピーカー【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image shows a blackboard with a white chalkboard marker on it, and the word "Japan" written in Japanese characters. The background of the image is a black wall, which adds a sense of depth and contrast to the scene. The presence of the Japanese characters on the blackboard suggests that the image might be related to Japanese language or culture, or it could be a foreign language classroom. The mood of the image is calm and focused, as the blackboard is the main focus of the scene. The output of the image is a clear and legible representation of the Japanese characters, which can be used for educational or cultural purposes.
introduction_ja: 画像は、白い黒板マーカーが引かれた黒板と、日本語の文字で書かれた「日本」の文字。画像の背景は黒い壁で、シーンに奥行きとコントラストを与えている。黒板に日本語の文字があることから、この画像は日本語や日本文化に関連しているのかもしれないし、外国語の教室なのかもしれない。黒板がシーンの主役であるため、画像の雰囲気は穏やかで集中している。この画像のアウトプットは、教育的または文化的な目的で使用できる、明確で読みやすい日本語の文字の表現である。
artistString: ササノマリイ feat. 初音ミク Append (Soft)
lyrics.ja.value:
詰め込んだ感情を　ひとつ　ひとつ　殺して
生み出した笑顔は　嫌い　嫌い　の涙。

飲み込んだ傷痕　痛い　痛い　言わない
そうすればあなたは　気付かないから。

君の言葉が　私を殺すの
君は知らないの　私の心を
消した灯りは　灯る事は無い
「私」は「嘘」でできた「わたし」

日が明ければあなたは　いない　いない　それでいい
でもあなたが残した　傷は　傷は　癒えない

いつものように　笑うあなたさえ
許せはしないの　心の奥では
「つらい」だなんて　言える訳無いの
「私」は「道化」のよに　笑う　笑う

いま　消えた　わたし　嘘だよ　嘘だよ
？

君の言葉が　私を殺すの
許せはしないの　そんな私も
あなたがいいなら　私を殺して
「私」は「嘘」でできた「わたし」だから。
lyrics.en.value:
One by one, I stamped out all the feelings packed in my heart.
The smile I contrived is the end result of many tears of hatred.

All the scars I’ve swallowed are throbbing, aching, but I won’t say it,
So that you wouldn’t notice.

Your words kill me.
Don’t you understand my heart?

Once extinguished, the light won’t come back on,
Just as “I” am “me,” an incarnation of my “lies.”

When the day breaks, you will be gone.
You will be gone, and that’s all right.
But you left me with scars, scars that won’t heal.

You just smile like you always do,
But I can’t even forgive that, deep in my heart.
There’s no possible way for me to say, “it hurts.”
And so I just laugh, and laugh, like a “clown.”

I’ve just vanished, no, that’s a lie, it’s a lie.
?

Your words kill me.
I can’t forgive even myself.
If you want to, please just kill me, for “I” am just “me,” an incarnation of my “lies.”

title: 【KAITO】悪徳のジャッジメント【法廷物語風オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a young man with a black suit and tie, smiling and holding a hand out. He is standing in front of a brick wall, which adds a sense of depth and texture to the scene. The man's smile and outstretched hand create a sense of warmth and friendliness, while the brick wall behind him adds a sense of stability and solidity to the image. The overall mood of the image is positive and inviting, with the man's smile and outstretched hand conveying a welcoming and approachable demeanor.
introduction_ja: 黒いスーツにネクタイを締め、笑顔で手を差し出す青年。彼はレンガの壁の前に立っており、それがシーンに奥行きと質感を加えている。男性の笑顔と差し伸べられた手は温かさと親しみやすさを醸し出し、背後のレンガの壁は安定感と堅実さをイメージに与えている。男性の笑顔と伸ばした手が、歓迎と親しみやすさを伝えている。
songTitle: 悪徳のジャッジメント
artistString: mothy feat. KAITO
lyrics.ja.value:

目が覚めた時に一人いた場所は

(master of the hellish yard)

極悪人でも金さえ払えば救ってやるさ

冥界の主にそっと耳打ち

「私の財産　貴様なんぞには決して渡さない」

扉に飛び込んだこの身体
地獄の底へ落ちて行く

そう罪は私のさじ加減ひとつ
悪徳のジャッジメント
たとえ誰だろうと私のこの罪
裁くことは認めない

そういつか再びこの手に集めよう
大罪のフラグメント
その時に地獄は私と娘の
理想郷へと変わるだろう
lyrics.en.value:
The judiciary system is so tainted here, 
that a defendant's charges are based solely on the level of his wealth
I, the master of the court, seek after not justice or righteousness, but money

Even if it's the most atrocious scoundrel, 
as long as he pays up, I will gladly spare him
After all, money makes the mare go

I couldn't care less about their looks, age, ethnicity, or gender
What's important is whether or not they have enough money
That's all that matters

Your life is in my hands
If you wish to be spared, then cough up the coins!

That's right, your charges are at my discretion, 
at the mercy of my judgment of corruption
If you truly wish to be saved from the swamp of false charges, then hand over more of that money!

I need money to cure my daughter's handicapped legs
Once I have assembled seven vessels of deadly sins, my wish will surely be granted

At today's court, too, where misgivings unfold, 
the evildoers snicker while the innocent weep

That's right, your charges are at my discretion, 
at the mercy of my judgment of corruption
In order for my own long cherished wish to come true, 
I must continue wielding my gavel of injustice

A vicious general who slaughtered countless innocent people 
of course should be sentenced to death
However, I was bribed into proclaiming him innocent

The people's outrage brought forth an uprising
That general was killed anyway, and his dead body left in the wilderness to rot

The brunt of the rage, however, is directed at me, and the people set my house ablaze
Oh, my beloved "daughter", as long as we're together, there's nothing to fear

In the remains of my burned-down house, you'll probably find the lonely corpses of a parent and his child

When I have come back to my senses, I find myself alone at the gate to the netherworld
Am I going to heaven or hell? The one deciding that will be the master of the hellish yard

Even if it's the most atrocious scoundrel, 
as long as he pays up, he will be spared
After all, money makes the mare go, even in hell

Smiling, I whisper into the master’s ear

"I'll never hand over my money to the likes of you."

Immediately, my body is plunged through the gate, and falls towards the bottom of the abyss

That's right, your charges are at my discretion, 
at the mercy of my judgment of corruption
Therefore, I will not allow anyone to judge my sins, I will not approve any judgment against me

That's right, some time in the future, I will once again 
gather the fragments of the deadly sins into my hands
By that time, hell will probably have become 
a utopia for my daughter and me

lyrics.en.value:
You're eating a day-old hamburger with a munch-munch
You own twelve used G-Shock watches that go tick-tock

Waiting for people who are already long gone for no reason
Fooling yourself, and then regretting it
Ultimate Senpai

I won't drink the kool-aid just for the sake of those type-A's

Ultimate Senpai, Ultimate Senpai
Afraid of well-adjusted people, retreating into your shell
Ultimate Senpai, you want to work up the courage to say that you're in a one-sided romance
Oh? It didn’t reach, the number of words decreased
Another failure, and sure enough, an honorable surrender
Ultimate Senpai, but don't you cry!
Clumsily drawing out your dreams
Ul-ti-mate Sen-pai

Senpai senpai, senpai senpai senpai

Looking inside yourself, feeling worse and worse
Making a face like this world is ending
Looking inside yourself, feeling worse and worse
You're faking it, you're faking it
But your head broke through the clouds long ago

Ultimate Senpai
What on earth are you thinking about, Ultimate Senpai?
The limitations of this world
There's so many little tricks hidden up, down, here and there
It's so exhausting

Again, Ultimate Senpai, Ultimate Senpai
Writhing on the ground every day without making a sound
Ultimate Senpai, your future's hanging in the balance
Who exactly is the crazy one here?

Ah

title: きみも悪い人でよかった / 初音ミク
introduction: The background of the image is a dark, cloudy sky with a moon. The foreground features a woman with wings, standing in the middle of the scene. She is accompanied by three dogs, two of which are standing on the left side of the woman, and the third dog is on the right side. The woman appears to be a guardian angel, protecting the dogs from the dark and stormy sky. The overall mood of the image is one of serenity and protection, as the woman and her winged form provide a sense of security and guidance for the dogs.
introduction_ja: 背景は暗く曇った空に月。前景には翼を持った女性が中央に立っている。そのうちの2匹は女性の左側に、3匹目は右側に立っている。女性は守護天使のように見え、暗く荒れ狂う空から犬たちを守っている。女性とその翼のある姿が犬たちに安心感と導きを与えているように、この絵の全体的な雰囲気は穏やかさと保護のひとつである。
songTitle: きみも悪い人でよかった
artistString: ピノキオピー feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
真夜中　街灯を見つめながら 
楽しかった会話を　思い出してる 
心を開くことは　とても怖いはずなのに 
きみの前では無邪気に笑えた

くだらない感傷を抱えたまま 
煤けた路地裏を歩きつづけた 
冷たい雨に打たれ　陽だまりを避けてたのに 
きみの手のひらは温かかった

周りには滑稽に見える　青臭い幸せ 
瓦礫の中で　強く抱きしめた 
まるで初恋のように

夕焼けがきれいで　犬はかわいくて 
野暮なニュースに　一緒にむかついて 
ダメ映画で笑って　バラエティ見て泣いて 
はしゃぎまわる　少し寂しい二人がいた 
きみもぼくと同じくらい悪い人でよかった

小さな心臓の鼓動が二つ 
あてどない革命を夢見ていた 
同じ言葉を重ねて　同じ時間を過ごした 
違う生き物同士の淡い夢

暗がりで呼吸してる　ささやかな幸せ 
ぬかるみで転んでも　追いかけてく 
少年と少女のように

花火がきれいで　夕飯はおいしくて 
駄作のストーリー　一緒に紐解いて 
罰ゲームで笑って　変な歌で泣いて 
くすぐりあう　少し寂しい二人がいた 
きみもぼくと同じくらい悪い人でよかった 
悪い人でよかった

真面目な顔をしたって 
なんか嘘くさくなってさ 
いい人になんかなれず 
ただ抱きしめた 
まるで初恋のように

夕焼けがきれいで　犬はかわいくて 
野暮なニュースに　一緒にムカついて 
ダメ映画で笑って　バラエティ見て泣いて 
はしゃぎまわる　少し寂しい二人がいた

時間は有限で　永遠みたいな嘘で 
儚い人生を一緒に　きみがいて 
つまらない世界を　「つまらないね。」て笑って 
肩を寄せ合う　少し寂しい二人がいた 
きみもぼくと同じくらい悪い人でよかった 
明日もまた　生きていたい　君を好きでよかった
lyrics.en.value:
Whilst looking up at a streetlight at midnight
Remembering a fun conversation we had
Even though, opening up my heart should have been such a scary thing
In front of you I was able to smile innocently
While carrying good for nothing sentiments
I kept on walking, through a stained back alley
Struck by the cold rain, even though I had avoided sunny places
The palm of your hand was warm
We look laughable to our surroundings, an inexperienced happiness
We held each other tightly in the midst of the rubble
As though it was our first love

The sunset is pretty, and dogs are cute
Getting offended together, at the boorish news
Laughing at a bad movie, watching variety shows and crying
going round in high spirits, was a slightly lonely pair 
I’m glad the two of us, I and you, are just as evil as each other

There were two tiny heartbeats
Aimlessly dreaming of revolutions
Piling up the same words and spending the same time together
Two mutual different being’s faint dream
Breathing in the darkness, a meagre happiness
Even if I fall down in the mud, I’ll chase after it
Like a little boy and girl

Fireworks are pretty, and dinner is tasty
Perusing together, through a crappy story
Laughing at a punishment game, crying at strange songs
Messing around together, was a slightly lonely pair
I’m glad the two of us, I and you, are just as evil as each other
I’m glad you’re evil

Putting on an earnest face, 
Just ended up stinking of lies
Without becoming a good person, or anything like that
We just held each other close 
As though it was our first love

The sunset is pretty, and dogs are cute
Getting offended together, at the boorish news
Laughing at a bad movie, watching variety shows and crying
going round in high spirits, was a slightly lonely pair 
I’m glad the two of us, I and you, are just as evil as each other
Time is limited, with a lie like “eternity”
In that fleeting instant of human life, you were there
Laughing “how boring” at this boring world
Leaning their heads together, was a slightly lonely pair 
I’m glad the two of us, I and you, are just as evil as each other
Tomorrow and again onwards, I want to keep on living, I’m glad I like you

title: flos/初音ミク
introduction: The image features a black chalkboard with the word "Floss" written in white chalk. The word is written in a cursive style, making it visually appealing and easy to read. The background of the image is a green wall, which adds a natural and calming touch to the scene. The mood of the image is casual and relaxed, as the word "Floss" is written in a simple and unassuming manner. The overall atmosphere of the image is one of simplicity and focus on the word "Floss," which could be a reminder or a message for someone to practice flossing.
introduction_ja: 画像は黒い黒板に白いチョークで書かれた「Floss」の文字。筆記体で書かれているため、視覚に訴えるものがあり、読みやすい。画像の背景は緑の壁で、このシーンに自然で落ち着きのあるタッチを加えている。Floss "の文字がシンプルで控えめに書かれているため、画像の雰囲気はカジュアルでリラックスしている。画像全体の雰囲気はシンプルで、"Floss "という文字に焦点が当てられており、フロスを練習することを誰かに思い出させる、またはメッセージのようなものでしょう。
artistString: R Sound Design feat. 初音ミク

title: ミュージックミュージック / とあ feat. 初音ミク
introduction: The image is a black and white painting of a woman with a bird on her head. The woman is wearing a black dress and is standing in a grassy field. The painting is abstract and has a vibrant color scheme, with the woman's dress being the only color visible. The mood of the image is mysterious and intriguing, as the woman's presence and the bird on her head create an enigmatic atmosphere. The output of the image is a black and white photograph of the painting, capturing the essence of the original artwork.

songTitle: ミュージックミュージック

title: ラストダンス / 初音ミク
introduction: The image features a man with a green shirt and a black tie, holding up his hand with a finger pointing. The background is a green and black color, which creates a contrasting and visually appealing effect. The man's gesture suggests a sense of authority or direction, which could be interpreted as a command or a direction to follow. The mood of the image is somewhat serious, as the man's hand gesture and the background color suggest a sense of purpose or importance. The overall tone of the image is likely to evoke a sense of focus and direction.

The paper is old and has a vintage feel, which adds to the overall mood of the image. The mood of the image is serene and peaceful, as the drawing of the rose conveys a sense of tranquility and beauty. The output of the image is a black and white photograph of the drawing, which captures the essence of the original artwork and preserves its timeless quality.

lyrics.en.value:
From the mirror a voice says “hello, it’s morning, huh”
As always my expression looks terrible,
My stiff smile, my bed head, even my mannerisms
I’m getting so sick of just about everything
It’s just so unfair

I have just as many things I wanna convey as anyone else,
But I can’t seem to change a single one of them into actual words
In a staring at the ground mood, today too, I’m hesitating over what to say
“You can’t even say hello?”
“Aw, how pitiful”

The dogwood blooming in my garden is so beautiful,
I just gazed at it feeling jealous
In comparison, I’m such a no good child
If only I could disappear, just like this

Mysteriously, in this world, 
“normal things” are the hardest of all,
Not being able to return a single word, just feels so stupid, tears start to run
Repeating and repeating blinding mistakes,
I grew so sick and tired
I wither away, still a bud
Unable to find any words in the future
I wear a strange, awkward scared-looking face
My habit of running away, all of it is no good no good.
Embarrassed and ashamed I simply, hold my tongue.
I’m really, really getting sick of it all

There was a person who could laugh with a voice that bloomed so dignifiedly,
Exchanging words that seemed almost like flowers.
As they did, from the mirror came the voice to scold me,
“I just can’t do that” 
“I’m sorry”

That was a picture-painted like world,
I simply gazed at it, feeling jealous
So that I won’t disturb any of it, I
What should I do? I want to be lost of myself
But I can’t, ah

My “self” gushing forth was horribly miserable, and dirty,
So that no one will know
I’m crying in a corner of my room
“You don’t need to be lost of yourself”
Suddenly, a voice reaches my ears
For some reason I can find no words to reply
To that magic-like noise
Don’t be afraid, let’s put it all into speech
All the things you want to say “speak them, speak them”
A mistaken “cry” came out
This is really just so stupid

What I eventually struggled onto was the “future”
Yes, in a world that seems as though it might just be brightening up,
I, who am slowly becoming an adult, continue to change, carefully holding close my unchanging feelings

Mysteriously in this world, 
“Remembering things” is the hardest of all,
So that I won’t lose the words I don’t want to forget,
I tell them to the world
I’d be just great if one day,
I could smile and laugh around with someone in this world
Thinking about these things, 
I feel like I’m gonna find my reason in the future
Fixing my bed head, I’ll go outside once I’ve replied “good morning” to the flower blooming inside my mirror
Today again, one flower shines

title: 【重音テト】右に曲ガール【オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a young woman wearing a white dress and holding a red cup. She is standing in front of a red background, which creates a contrasting and vibrant atmosphere. The woman appears to be enjoying her drink, as she is smiling and holding the cup with both hands. The background color and the woman's expression suggest a positive and cheerful mood. The image could be interpreted as a casual, relaxed moment captured during a social gathering or a leisurely outing.
introduction_ja: 白いドレスを着た若い女性が赤いカップを持っている。彼女は赤い背景の前に立っており、対照的で鮮やかな雰囲気を作り出している。女性は微笑みながら両手でカップを持ち、飲み物を楽しんでいるように見える。背景の色と女性の表情は、前向きで明るい気分を暗示している。この写真は、社交的な集まりや、のんびりとした外出中に撮影された、カジュアルでリラックスした瞬間と解釈できるだろう。
artistString: はるふり feat. 重音テト

title: 濫觴生命 / feat.IA
introduction: The background of the image features a beautiful landscape with a large, open sky and a clear blue sky. The main focus of the image is a young girl standing in the middle of the scene, surrounded by a lush green field. She is wearing a white dress and appears to be in a peaceful and serene environment. The overall mood of the image is one of tranquility and harmony, as the girl stands in the middle of the vast landscape, surrounded by the natural beauty of the environment.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景には、大きく開けた空と澄み切った青空が広がる美しい風景が描かれている。画像のメイン・フォーカスは、緑豊かな野原に囲まれたシーンの中央に立つ少女である。彼女は白いドレスを着ており、平和で穏やかな環境にいるように見える。少女が広大な風景の真ん中に立ち、自然の美しさに囲まれていることから、画像全体の雰囲気は静けさと調和のひとつである。
artistString: Orangestar feat. IA

title: 週刊少年バイバイ / 初音ミク
introduction: The background of this image features a large, colorful, and detailed mural depicting a cartoon character, possibly a cat, with a bow on its head. The mural is painted on a brick wall, adding to its vibrant and eye-catching appearance. The mural is accompanied by a book, which is placed on the ground, and a cup, which is also on the ground. The mural and the objects create a visually appealing and engaging scene, likely in a public space or an artistic setting. The mood of the image is lively and colorful, with the mural and the objects creating a sense of whimsy and playfulness.
introduction_ja: この画像の背景には、頭にリボンをつけた漫画のキャラクター（おそらく猫）が描かれた、大きくカラフルで詳細な壁画がある。壁画はレンガの壁に描かれ、その鮮やかで人目を引く外観をさらに引き立てている。壁画には、地面に置かれた本と、同じく地面に置かれたコップが添えられている。壁画とオブジェは、公共空間や芸術的な環境にありそうな、視覚に訴える魅力的な場面を作り出している。画像の雰囲気は生き生きとしてカラフルで、壁画とオブジェが気まぐれで遊び心のある感覚を生み出している。
artistString: ピノキオピー feat. 初音ミク Append (Dark)

lyrics.en.value:
To grab everyone's hearts, I use psychic powers 
For questionnaire postcards, I battle desperately 
I train, I fall in love, I join hands with my rival, 
But the end in a few days' time seems already a certainty

I was born pushing through the popular and out of fashion
I've been folded, I've been read through, 
But I'll still stand tall, won't I? 

The fast-forwarding of time, life so easily discarded, 
Is it all, is it all so the story can be concluded? 
As I vomit out my ink-black blood

A shouting of my honest feelings, 
a lineup of stale symbols, 
It's wrong, it's wrong, it's wrong, it's wrong, 
it's wrong, it's wrong, it's wrong, ain't it? 
Thinking about my reason for being born, 
an unknown comic book character
It hurts, it hurts, it hurts, it hurts, it hurts, it hurts, 
it hurts, it hurts, it hurts, it hurts, it hurts, it hurts

Bye bye

A name that goes nowhere dries out people's lips 
Backgrounds which no one sees lean heavy on sketch lines 
Unremarkable throwaway characters look this way silently 
Caught in a square quagmire, my feet are stuck, I'm sinking

Tracks scurrying every which way, plots polished to a sheen, 
No one needs them, there's no need for them anymore; 
Fellowship, effort, victory, where did they go? 

The mass-produced aspiration, 
the violence that kills with numbers, 
It's great, it's great, it's great, it's great, 
it's great, it's great, it's great, ain't it! 
An "I protected the one I love," 
an incomplete conclusion, 
It's bitter, it's bitter, it's bitter, it's bitter, it's bitter, it's bitter, 
It's bitter, it's bitter, it's bitter, it's bitter, it's bitter, it's bitter

The story that was meant to be drawn is twisting beyond the deadline
Cold-hearted voices, reluctant voices, 
Fading away at low altitude, in a monochrome hierarchy

Beginning at page one and going to meet the final page, 
That journey, my journey is meeting its end 
But will it remain in anyone's memory? 
Will it remain? 

The miracles that happen in comics, 
the realities, the comedies, 
I hate, I hate, I hate, I hate, 
I hate, I hate, I hate, jump! 
A shout for someone to help, 
A lineup of stale symbols, 
It's wrong, it's wrong, it's wrong, 
It's wrong, it's wrong, it's wrong
The character in that discontinued comic 
Looks a lot like you
It hurts, it hurts, it hurts, it hurts, it hurts, 
It hurts, it hurts, it hurts, it hurts, it hurts

Please look forward to the master's next production,

title: 【鏡音リン】リグレットメッセージ【オリジナル】
introduction: The image depicts a beautiful beach scene with a blue sky and a calm ocean. The sky is filled with clouds, creating a serene atmosphere. The beach is empty, with no people or other objects visible. The overall mood of the image is peaceful and tranquil, inviting viewers to imagine themselves relaxing on the sandy shore, taking in the calming sights and sounds of the ocean.
introduction_ja: 青い空と穏やかな海が織りなす美しいビーチの風景。空には雲が広がり、穏やかな雰囲気を醸し出している。ビーチには誰もおらず、人や他のものは見えない。全体的に平和で穏やかなムードが漂い、見る人を砂浜でリラックスし、穏やかな光景と海の音に浸っている自分を想像させる。
songTitle: リグレットメッセージ
artistString: mothy feat. 鏡音リン
lyrics.ja.value:
街はずれの小さな港　一人たたずむ少女 
この海に昔からある　ひそかな言い伝え

「願いを書いた羊皮紙を　小瓶に入れて 
　海に流せばいつの日か　想いは実るでしょう」

流れていく　ガラスの小瓶 
願いを込めたメッセージ 
水平線の彼方に　静かに消えていく

君はいつも私のために　なんでもしてくれたのに 
私はいつもわがままばかり　君を困らせてた

願いをかなえてくれる君　もういないから 
この海に私の想い　届けてもらうの

流れていく　小さな願い 
涙と少しのリグレット 
罪に気付くのはいつも　全て終わった後

流れていく　ガラスの小瓶 
願いを込めたメッセージ 
水平線の彼方に　静かに消えていく

流れていく　小さな願い 
涙と少しのリグレット 
「もしも生まれ変われるならば 
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　 」
lyrics.en.value:
In a little port on the outskirts of a town, 
A young girl stands alone. 
By this sea, there existed 
An old tradition from before.

"Write your wish on a piece of parchment 
And place it in a little bottle. 
If you let it flow with the sea, someday 
Your wish will come true."

Flow along, little glass bottle 
With a message containing a wish. 
On the other side of the horizon, 
There, it quietly disappears.

You always did everything for my sake 
All that I wanted, and yet 
I was always so selfish 
And troublesome to you.

You, who grant my wishes, 
Are no longer here. 
Will my thoughts, on this sea 
Arrive at their destination?

Flow along, little wish 
Tears and a little bit of regret. 
When I had realized my sins, 
It was always after everything was already over.

Flow along, little glass bottle 
With a message containing a wish. 
On the other side of the horizon, 
There, it quietly disappears.

Flow along, little wish 
Tears and a little bit of regret. 
If we were to be reborn...

title: 【初音ミク】　古書屋敷殺人事件　【女学生探偵シリーズ】
introduction: The image features two people standing in a doorway, with one person holding a cell phone. The background of the image is a red wall, which creates a contrasting and vibrant atmosphere. The mood of the image is somewhat mysterious, as the people's expressions and the presence of the cell phone suggest that they might be engaged in a secretive or private conversation. The red wall adds a sense of intrigue and curiosity to the scene, as it could be a part of a larger setting or a unique architectural feature.
introduction_ja: 画像は玄関に立つ2人の人物で、1人は携帯電話を持っている。背景は赤い壁で、対照的で鮮やかな雰囲気を醸し出している。人々の表情や携帯電話の存在から、彼らが秘密めいた会話やプライベートな会話をしているのではないかと思われ、画像の雰囲気はややミステリアスだ。赤い壁は、より大きな舞台の一部であるか、ユニークな建築的特徴である可能性があるため、このシーンに陰謀と好奇心の感覚を加えている。

title: セカイはまだ始まってすらいない / 初音ミク
introduction: The background of this image is a cityscape, with a large building in the foreground and a skyline in the background. The image is a black and white photograph, which adds a sense of nostalgia and timelessness to the scene. The mood of the image is calm and serene, as the cityscape appears to be peaceful and well-organized. The presence of the large building and the skyline suggests a sense of grandeur and architectural achievement, while the black and white color scheme adds a touch of artistic expression to the scene. Overall, the image conveys a sense of balance and harmony between the city's architecture and the natural elements of the sky.
introduction_ja: このイメージの背景は街並みで、手前には大きなビルがあり、背景にはスカイラインが広がっている。画像はモノクロ写真で、この光景にノスタルジーと時代性を加えている。街並みが平和で整然としているように見えるため、画像の雰囲気は穏やかで落ち着いている。大きなビルとスカイラインの存在は、壮大さと建築の達成感を暗示し、モノクロの色調はこのシーンに芸術的な表現を加えている。全体として、街の建築物と空の自然要素とのバランスと調和の感覚が伝わってくる。

title: 【初音ミク・鏡音リン】　クノイチでも恋がしたい　【オリジナルPV】
introduction: The background of the image is a black and white checkered pattern, which creates a contrasting and visually appealing effect. The main focus of the image is a group of people, including a man and a woman, who are dressed in costumes and performing a dance routine. They are standing in front of a large crowd, which is watching them intently. The mood of the image is energetic and lively, as the dancers are actively engaged in their performance, and the audience is captivated by their movements. The overall atmosphere is one of excitement and entertainment, as the dancers and the audience share a mutual appreciation for the performance.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景は黒と白の市松模様で、コントラストと視覚に訴える効果を生み出している。画像のメイン・フォーカスは、衣装を着てダンスを披露する男女のグループである。彼らは大勢の観衆の前に立ち、熱心に見入っている。ダンサーたちが積極的にパフォーマンスに取り組み、観客がその動きに魅了されているため、画像の雰囲気はエネルギッシュで活気に満ちている。全体的な雰囲気は興奮と娯楽に満ちており、ダンサーと観客はパフォーマンスに対する相互評価を共有している。

lyrics.en.value:
Cutting class at the dojo, bye bye!
I'm a new female ninja, only fifteen
Haven't learned a thing my master's taught me

Yeah yeah, and mother told me
"To be a female ninja, you have to give up on being a girl”
When I was young, that was fine, no problem!

But when I saw that pretty boy at the festival
A bright red fruit burst open in front of me

You can't love, you can't want, no no no
Forget that, let me be free
Don't do that, don't do this, blah blah blah
I can't stand your rules!

How can I let you know how I feel?
I was watching you through a hole in the ceiling
Secret, secret, maybe I can keep it
Even female ninjas need love!

Na na na

I'm no good at disguises
Anyone can see I'm a female ninja, only fifteen
I won't get any work like this

Hey there, gatekeeper, how are you?
"Would you kindly let me in the mansion?"
"No? Why not?" I can't even use womanly wiles right

There's the dango seller's girl
Hey, she came skipping and running over
Furtive whispers, and to my surprise
Hey, are you my rival too?

I love, I want, but everyone's against me
I just want to cut them down
Don't do that, don't do this, blah blah blah
I can't stand your rules!

Is there no way they'll let me love?
I watched you from the shadow of a bonsai
Secret, secret, maybe I can keep it
Even female ninjas need love!

I want to love!

It was written on a secret note one day
I trembled at the words inside
My next target is him
Why? How? I'm in a panic
I've never had to make a choice like this
There's no hesitation or mercy in killing
Daddy, mommy, I've finally found
What I was meant to do

You can't love, you can't want, no no no
Those are the rules I live by
Don't do that, don't do this, blah blah blah
I cant stand your rules!

The time has come under the light of the full moon
I spin the wall around right in front of you
My heart inside this hidden blade
Even female ninjas need love!

I want to love! I want to love!
Hey, I'm a female ninja, I can do this!

The photo is placed in the middle of the wall, and the wall itself is covered with numbers and text. The numbers and text are written in Japanese, which adds to the overall mood of the image. The presence of the photo and the numbers and text on the wall create a unique and intriguing atmosphere. The image is likely meant to evoke curiosity and interest in the viewer, as it showcases a different culture and language.

title: 【VY2】粘着系男子の１５年ネチネチ【オリジナルPV】
introduction: The image is a hand-drawn sketch of a heart with the number 15 written inside it. The heart is drawn in pink, and the number is written in black. The sketch is simple and minimalistic, with no other elements or background.The mood of the image is lighthearted and playful, as the heart shape and the number 15 are both symbols of love and affection. The sketchy nature of the drawing adds a sense of creativity and spontaneity to the image, making it feel more personal and intimate. The output of the image is a digital representation of the sketch, which can be shared or used as a personal reminder of love and affection.
introduction_ja: 画像は手描きのハートのスケッチで、その中に数字の15が書かれている。ハートはピンクで描かれ、数字は黒で書かれている。ハートの形と数字の15はどちらも愛と愛情のシンボルであるため、このイメージのムードは明るく遊び心にあふれている。スケッチ風であるため、創造性と自発性が加わり、より個人的で親密なイメージに仕上がっている。画像の出力は、スケッチをデジタルで表現したもので、共有したり、愛と愛情を個人的に思い出させるものとして使うことができる。
songTitle: 粘着系男子の15年ネチネチ
artistString: タカハシヨウ, 家の裏でマンボウが死んでるP feat. VY2

title: 【めぐっぽいどオリジナル曲】カムパネルラ【PV】
introduction: The background of this image is a starry night sky, which creates a serene and romantic atmosphere. The two people in the foreground are holding hands, standing close together, and looking up at the sky. They appear to be in a moment of connection and intimacy, enjoying the beauty of the night sky. The image conveys a sense of warmth, love, and appreciation for nature's beauty.
introduction_ja: この画像の背景は星空で、静謐でロマンチックな雰囲気を醸し出している。手前の2人は手をつなぎ、近くに立って空を見上げている。彼らは、夜空の美しさを楽しみながら、つながりと親密さの瞬間にいるように見える。このイメージは、温かさ、愛、自然の美しさへの感謝の気持ちを伝えている。
artistString: sasakure.UK feat. GUMI

届くはずないこと知ってたんだ 
『それだけ遠く　それだけ遠く 
君が行つてしまつただけさ』

それだけなんだ。 
それだけなんだ。

銀河のさかな　あいたいよ・・・ 
届かぬ想い届けたくて 
サーカトーヴォの　おさない気球に 
ありったけの想いのせて　放つ

ひさひさと浮かぶそれは、まるでイツカの-

はじめからね　気球（こんなもの）じゃ 
届くはずないこと知ってたんだ 
『それだけ遠く、それだけ遠く 
君が行つてしまつただけさ』

はじめからね　気球（こんなもの）じゃ 
届くはずないこと知ってたんだ 
『それだけ遠く、それだけ遠く 
君が行つてしまつただけさ』

それだけなのに。 
それだけなのに。

「ナルメリウスの　宇宙の舟。 
ありったけの想いのせて、今、あいにいくから。」

はじめからね　宇宙舟（こんなもの）じゃ 
届くはずないこと知ってたんだ 
『それだけ遠く、それだけ遠く 
君は行ってしまったのです』

はじめからね　宇宙舟（こんなもの）じゃ 
あえるはずないこと知ってたのに。

それでも僕は-。 
それでも僕は-。
lyrics.en.value:

(The things I cannot tell you
I want to tell you now)

So I'll make a plane, made of paper and tape

(I'll take all of my emotions and I'll pile them on it)

I watch it fly for a little while before it falls back down towards the ground

Right from the beginning, I knew all along it's
Impossible to reach you with a paper airplane
But it only means that, but it only means that
You're only just that further away from me now
That's all it means, after all, that's all it means, after all

(The things I cannot tell you
I wanna tell you now)

I'll make a hovercraft, a basket and some balloons

(I'll take all of my emotions and I'll pile them in it)

Right from the beginning, I knew all along it's

But it only means that, but it only means that
You're only just that further away from me now
Right from the beginning, I knew all along it's
Impossible to reach you with a floating basket

You're only just that further away from me now
That's all it means, after all, that's all it means, after all
