title: ┗|∵|┓金曜日のおはよう／HoneyWorks feat.GUMI
introduction: The image features a young man wearing a white shirt and holding a controller in his hands. He is standing in front of a TV screen, which is displaying a game. The scene appears to be a casual gaming environment, with the man enjoying his time playing a video game. The mood of the image is relaxed and leisurely, as the man is focused on the game and appears to be having fun.
introduction_ja: 白いシャツを着て、手にコントローラーを持った若い男性が写っている。テレビ画面の前に立ち、ゲームを表示している。このシーンはカジュアルなゲーム環境のように見え、男性はビデオゲームを楽しんでいる。男性がゲームに集中し、楽しんでいるように見えるので、画像の雰囲気はリラックスしてのんびりしている。
artistString: shito, 黒須克彦, HoneyWorks feat. V3 GUMI (Power)
lyrics.ja.value:
おはようのオーディションして
髪型もバッチリOK
金曜日は頑張らなくちゃ
だって2日会えないからね

8:00 2車両目お気に入りの特等席
隣の人眠そうですね　そんな日常
8:07 開くのは向かいのドア息を呑む
言いかけてた“その言葉”は今日も逃げた

きっかけシンプルでいいのに意気地ないな
勇気のテスト乗り越えなきゃ　逃げるなって…

おはようのオーディションして
弱虫な自分に勝って
金曜日は頑張らなくちゃ
だって2日会えないからね
眠そうな君を見てる
それだけで満足しちゃって
ダメだって「頑張らなくちゃ」
そっと声に出してみた

8:00 2車両目座られてた特等席
ついてないな　空模様まで泣きそうです
8:07 準備まだ、ちょっと待ってドキドキが…
震え混じり“その言葉”はかき消された

雨宿り立ち尽くす僕に「傘をどうぞ」
君は少し恥ずかしそうに下を向いた

「ありがとう」震えていた
練習してない言葉言えたから頑張らなくちゃ
だって2日会えないからね
大好きな君を見てる
それだけじゃ満足しなくて
月曜日頑張らなくちゃ
そっと声に出してみた

夢では自然に話せるのに
勇気のテスト乗り越えるから少し待ってて

おはようのオーディションして
髪型もバッチリOK
8:07に君を待ってる
だって今日は言えるから
おやすみも言いたいけれど　ちょっと待って
大好きな言葉なんだ
だって君に会えるからね

title: Orangestar - Surges (feat. IA & 初音ミク)
introduction: The image depicts a young girl standing on a rocky shore, looking out at the ocean. The ocean is vast and turbulent, with waves crashing against the rocks. The girl appears to be mesmerized by the beauty and power of the ocean, as she stands in awe of the vast expanse of water. The image conveys a sense of serenity and tranquility, as the girl is surrounded by the calming sounds of the waves and the vastness of the ocean. The mood of the image is one of contemplation and appreciation for nature's beauty.
introduction_ja: 岩場に立って海を眺める少女が描かれている。海は広大で乱れ、波が岩に打ち寄せている。少女は、広大な海に畏敬の念を抱きながら、海の美しさと力強さに魅了されているように見える。静謐な波の音と広大な海に囲まれている少女の姿からは、静寂と静けさが伝わってくる。イメージの雰囲気は、瞑想と自然の美しさへの感謝のひとつである。
artistString: Orangestar feat. IA, 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
流れ続く空と日々の狭間に
形のない今日をそれでも進む
何も知らぬ朝と清かな風に
息を繋ぐ僕らの声は何を望む？
迷っていた君に届かない
言葉はいつだって単純で
目指していた明日に届かない
心が僕らには最高で

わかっていたって諦め切れない
心の奥がまだ燃えていて
何もないなんて謂えない僕ら
大人になる前の延長戦
足を踏み出したその先の空を
駆け上がる僕らの日常が
願った未来を越える未来まで
止まらぬ僕たちの最高を目指して征く

君に届かない
言葉はいつだって単純で
目指していた明日に届かない
心がいつまでも燃えていて
描いた未来が昨日になるまで
止まらぬ僕たちの熱情が
「踠いていたって何も掴めない光が
僕らには上等！」なんて歌っている

形のない今日をそれでも進む
行方のない朝の穏やかな風に
涙滲む僕らの声は何を望む？
迷っていた君に届かない
(誰も何もかも知り得ない)
言葉はいつだって単純で
(願っていた明日に届かない心は)
君も知らぬ君はいつだってそこに
いつだってその先を目指している

わかっていたって諦め切れない
心の奥がまだ燃えていて
望まぬ未来がそこにあったって進む
僕たちは最高を目指して征ける

言葉にならない心の全部を燃やしてゆけ
踠いていたって何も掴めない光が
僕らには上等だ！って
目指していた 誰も知り得ない
夜明けを僕たちは越えてゆけ
描いた未来のその先の空を貫く
僕たちの"最高"を目指して征け
lyrics.en.value:
In the space between the flowing sky and every day
Even if today is shapeless, we still move forward
The unknown tomorrow and the refreshing wind
With connected breaths, what do our voices wish from them?
The words which don’t reach you who was hesitating
Are always so simple
The hearts which don’t reach the morning we were aiming for
Are the best for us

Our hearts which knew not to give up
Are still burning deep inside
We who can’t say that it’s nothing
Are still in the playing in the overtime before becoming adults
The daily lives of we who
Stepped forward and ran up the sky ahead of us
Won’t stop until we reach a future which exceeds the future we wished for
We’re aiming for our best

The words which don’t reach you
Are always so simple
The hearts which don’t reach the morning we were aiming for
Are forever burning
Our passion which won’t stop
Until the future we imagined becomes yesterday
Is singing “Even if it’s a light which we can’t grasp by struggling
That’s just fine for us!”

In the space between the flowing sky and every day
Even if today is shapeless, we still move forward
Towards the gentle morning wind which has no destination
What do our tear-stained voices wish for?
The words which don’t reach you who was hesitating
(Nobody can know everything)
Are always so simple
(Our hearts which don’t reach the morning we were aiming for)
The you who even you don’t know about is always there
Always aiming for what lies ahead

Our hearts which knew not to give up
Are still burning deep inside
We who move forward even if it’s an undesirable future
Are still aiming for the best

Let’s burn all of our hearts which can’t be put into words
“Even if it’s a light which we can’t grasp by struggling
That’s just fine for us!”
Let’s go beyond the dawn
Which we were aiming for and which nobody knows about
Let’s aim for our “best”
Which pierces the sky ahead of the future we imagined

title: 【初音ミク】　朝焼け、君の唄。　【オリジナル】
introduction: The background of this image is a beautiful sunset, with a silhouette of a person standing in the foreground. The person is wearing a dress and appears to be enjoying the serene atmosphere of the sunset. The image captures a moment of tranquility and peace, as the person stands still and takes in the beauty of the sky. The mood of the image is serene and contemplative, with the person's silhouette emphasizing the vastness of the sky and the sunset's majestic colors. The output of this image is a black and white photograph, which enhances the contrast and emphasizes the beauty of the sunset and the person's silhouette.
introduction_ja: この画像の背景は美しい夕日で、手前に人物のシルエットが立っている。人物はドレスを着ており、夕日の穏やかな雰囲気を楽しんでいるように見える。静止して空の美しさに見入っている。人物のシルエットが空の広さと夕日の荘厳な色彩を強調しており、画像の雰囲気は静謐で瞑想的である。この画像の出力はモノクロ写真で、コントラストを強調し、夕日と人物のシルエットの美しさを強調している。
artistString: ナノウ feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
窓の外はもう　朝焼けが滲む
ああ　綺麗だな
私とは　大違い

何も気にせずに　隣に居た
それでいいと思ってた
友達の相談も　街に流れる恋歌も
別の世界の出来事だった

見慣れてた筈の笑顔が
眩しくて胸が痛むよ
他の娘にも同じように
笑うんだろうな

一晩中泣いて　枯れるほど泣いて
痛いほど腫れた　私の赤い眼
優しい君はきっと　心配するだろうな
私がね　泣いた事は
知らなくていい
それでいいよ

オリオン星を見つけた夜
祈って　すぐにやめた
この気持ちはね　君との間にあるの
星の上なんかじゃないんだ　きっと

たった一言で　それだけでいいのよ
言い終えたら　走って逃げればいいの
それだけなのに

春夏秋冬　気付けば側にいた
あと一歩の距離が　近くて　遠いよ
あの日のオリオン　君も見てたかな
知らぬ間に積もっていた　君への唄

バカみたいだな
勝手に期待して
諦めて
勝手に傷付いて

どうしようもないな
つたない　でも愛おしい
私の恋歌
響け

一晩中泣いて　涙枯れる頃
やっと気付いたの　君が　好きだと
窓の外はもう　朝焼けが滲む
ああ　綺麗だな
わたしも　なれるかな
lyrics.en.value:
The morning glow is already spreading out beyond my window
Ah, how beautiful,
And how different it is from me

I stayed by your side without any worry,
And I thought that was enough
My friends’ romantic problems, as well as the love songs they play in the streets
Used to belong to another world for me

But now, your familiar smile suddenly seems so radiant, it makes my chest hurt
Though you probably show the same smile to other girls as well

I cried for a whole night, I cried until all my tears dried up
My red eyes are painfully swollen
Since you’re so kind, you’ll probably worry about me
That’s why you don’t have to know that I cried
That’s fine with me

On the night I found the Orion,
I made a wish to it, but then I gave up right away
Because this feeling I have is just between you and me
It’s not somewhere up above among the stars, I’m sure

Just one single word is enough
Once I’ve said it, I’ll just have to run away
That’s all it is, and yet

Spring, summer, fall, winter, I didn’t realize I’ve been by your side all this time
The final step I need to take is so close, yet so far away
I wonder if you also looked at the Orion on that day
This song that I’ve been compiling in my subconscious is for you

I’m such a fool,
Getting my hopes up all by myself,
Only to give up and get hurt all by myself

This feeling is so hopeless,
So clumsy, yet so dear to me
I hope my love song will echo on and on

After crying for a whole night, and by the time all my tears have dried up,
I finally realized that I’m in love with you
The morning glow is already spreading beyond my window
Ah, how beautiful
I wonder if I can also become that beautiful

title: 【初音ミク】僕をそんな目で見ないで【オリジナル曲手書きＰＶ】
introduction: The background of this image is a wall with a pattern of flowers and a boy standing in front of it. The boy is wearing a hat and appears to be smiling. The overall mood of the image is cheerful and playful, as the boy is enjoying his time in front of the colorful wall. The wall itself adds a sense of whimsy and creativity to the scene, making it a visually appealing and engaging image.
introduction_ja: 背景は花の模様が描かれた壁と、その前に立つ少年。少年は帽子をかぶり、微笑んでいるように見える。少年はカラフルな壁の前で楽しく過ごしている。壁自体がこのシーンに気まぐれさと創造性を加え、視覚的に魅力的で魅力的な画像になっている。
songTitle: 僕をそんな目で見ないで
artistString: きくお feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
僕をそんな目で見ないでまま　死んだのが恥ずかしくなるだろ　（まーまー）
ぐにゅぐにゅのほっぺが　ポップコーンのように吹っ飛んだ僕を

そんな目で見ないでぱぱ　死んだのが情けなくなるだろ　（ぱーぱー）
迎いのパレードは　魂をピンセットでひょいと抜いて
放り投げて　ちんとんしゃん　しゃばだばだば　
とれろ　とれろ　トレモロ　ラレルラ　トレモロル　ラリラ
トロトロにむけたぼくは　どこにいくんだろ？

お空を飛び越えて　オルゴールの櫛歯（くしば）に挟まる
櫛歯（くしば）の震えが気持ちいいので　ぴゅっぴゅっと小刻みに僕は弾けちゃう
体が小さく　飛び散って僕はたくさんになる　（にゃんにゃかにゃかにゃかにゃか）
空っぽの脳みそが　トロトロにとろけてお星様になる
（トーロリトロリトロル）　（トーロリトロリトケル）

兵隊の銃声は　なりやまない　演奏は　なりやまない
オルゴールは　いつまでも止まらない
遠い国の果てで　オルゴールは鳴り続ける
大丈夫みんな　星になれば仲間さ

虹のように光る　魂の最期は
（タン　タン　タン　タン　タカタカ･･･）
ぷるんとグミのように　砕けて溶けて消える
（マン　マン　マン　マン　マカマカ　ﾅﾅﾅﾅﾅﾅ　ﾅﾗﾗﾅﾗﾗﾅﾗﾗ　ﾗﾗﾗﾗﾗﾗ）
だから

僕をそんな目で見ないでまま　死んだのが恥ずかしくなるだろ　（まーまー）
かわいいじぶんを　きもちよさに負けて捨てちゃった僕を

そんな目で見ないでぱぱ　死んだとこ見ないでおくれよ　（ぱーぱー）
だって死ぬの気持ちよかった僕は　恥ずかしくって
じゃんじゃんぱっ　じゃんじゃんぽっ　しゃんしゃんぱらドロリトロル
とれろ　とれろ　トレモロ　ラレルラ　トレモロル　ラリラ
白くトロトロに　パラパラ　ハララララ･･･

お昼の帰り道　自転車で下り道くだるくだる
補助輪つけて狭いおうちの　狭いスキマの間を抜けて
初めて風になる　僕の心は風に壊される
こんなに気持ちいいなんて　僕が風に壊されてくのは

いつまでも下る下る　終わらない坂道
人の姿は　どこにも見つけれない
家は消滅して　電線は歪みくねる
風に削られて　体が赤く溶ける

そして僕は消える　魂を残したまま
（タン　タン　タン　タン　タカタカ･･･）
あるはずのない　自転車と一緒に
（マン　マン　マン　マン　マカマカ　ﾅﾅﾅﾅﾅﾅ　ﾅﾗﾗﾅﾗﾗﾅﾗﾗ　ﾗﾗﾗﾗﾗﾗ）
いつまでも　どこまでも　

僕をそんな目で見ないでまま　僕はもうどこにもいないんだから
ままはミニカーやまんがを　いっぱい買ってくれたよね

そんな目で見ないでぱぱ　僕は消えるのが気持ちよかったんだ
ぱぱはオルゴールやおもちゃの兵隊を　いっぱい作ってくれたけど

僕はもうどこにもいない　僕の魂は夢の世界へ消えた
ままのいっぱいのおもちゃも　一緒に仲良く溶けて消えたんだね　

僕はもうどこにもいない　また夢で会うまでさようなら
ぱぱの兵隊さんは　オルゴールの隙間から手を振っていた

（ぱ　ぱ　ぱ　ぱ　ぱ　ぱらぱら）
（ま　ま　ま　ま　ま　ばらばららららら　ラルレロルリレロラルロ）

ホー･･･
lyrics.en.value:
Don’t look at me in that way, mama
It makes me embarrassed to have died
Don’t look at me,
Whose soft cheeks blew up like popcorn

Don’t look at me in that way, papa
It makes me ashamed to have died
The parade to receive me
Lightly pulled out my soul with tweezers and

Tossed it away…
Chin Ton Shan shabadabadaba
Torero Torero Toremolo lalelula Toremoloru Lalia
Whither will I, peeled into pulp, go?

I jump over the sky and get caught in the comb of a music box
The vibration of the comb feels pleasant,
So little by little I pop.
My body scatters into little pieces and I become many.
My empty brain melts like stew and becomes the stars

The gunshots of the soldiers keep on going. The music keeps on going
The music will never stop
In a far off country, the music box will keep on playing
Don’t worry, once we become the stars, we’ll all be the same

The death of a soul shines like the rainbow
Crumbles, melts and disappears like jelly

So,

Don’t look at me in that way, mama
It makes me embarrassed to have died
Don’t look at me, whom you threw away because you chose your precious self’s pleasure over me

Don’t look at me in that way, papa
Don’t look at my death,
because I am embarrassed to having felt it pleasant to die

Jan jan pa shan shan para Dolori Toloru
Torelo Torelo Toremolo lalelula toremololu lalila
White and syrupy para para hararara…

Daytime, on the way home, I race downhill on my bicycle, down, down
With training wheels I go through the narrow opening between the small houses
For the first time, I become the wind. The wind destroys my heart
To think that being broken by the wind is this pleasant

Indefinitely down, down. The never ending slope
I cannot see people anywhere
The houses disappear and electric wires twist and turn
Hipped away by the breeze, my body melts into red.

And I disappear, left with my soul
With my bicycle, which never existed

Forever, to anywhere

Don’t look at me in that way, mama
I no longer exist.
Mama bought me lots of toy cars and comics

Don’t look at me in that way, Papa
It felt good to die
Papa made me lots of music boxes and toy soldiers

But I no longer exist
My soul vanished into the world of dreams
Mama’s toys melted happily together and disappeared along with me

I no longer exist
So goodbye until we meet again in dreams.
Papa’s soldiers were waving their hands to me through the gap of the music box

(Pa pa pa pa pa para para
Ma ma ma ma ma bara bararararara
Lalulelo lulilelo lalulo)

title: 【初音ミク】 秘密警察 【オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a group of five people dressed in black and white clothing, standing in a grassy field. They are all wearing black and white suits, which gives the scene a formal and elegant appearance. The background of the image is a forest, which adds a natural and serene atmosphere to the scene. The mood of the image is one of sophistication and elegance, with the group of people dressed in formal attire standing in a picturesque setting. The overall impression is one of refinement and style.
introduction_ja: 白と黒の服を着た5人のグループが草原に立っている。全員が黒と白のスーツを着ており、フォーマルでエレガントな印象を与えている。背景は森で、自然で穏やかな雰囲気を醸し出している。正装した人々が絵のような風景の中に佇んでおり、洗練されたエレガントなムードが漂っている。全体的な印象は、洗練されたスタイルである。
artistString: ぶりるP feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
GO!

無駄だぞ！　オマエは見張られてる　どこへ逃げようとも 
国家の転覆　企む輩を　決して　我らは　逃しはしない 
オマエの　すべての　行動パターン　把握している　何もかもをな！

オマエが　のうのうと　暮らしてる間に　協力者は　増えてる 
オマエの　周りの　すべての者たち　例えば隣人、同僚 
さらには　恋人、家族までもが　オマエを　監視してる

我ら　秘密警察　政府直属　国家保安部なのだ！ 
秘密警察　闇に紛れる　スパイ活動　取り締まり

朝から　晩まで　オマエを　監視する（みる）


オマエを　自白に　追い込むため　あらゆる手段使う 
繰り返される　拷問　或いは　静脈注射の薬物 
或いは　オマエの　大事な者を　人質　容赦はしない！

だから　秘密警察　政府直属　国家保安部なのだ！ 
秘密警察　思想弾圧　不満分子を　取調べ

来る日も　来る日も　オマエを　調査する（みる）

我ら　秘密警察　政府直属　国家保安部なのだ！ 
秘密警察　闇に紛れる　スパイ活動　取り締まり

朝から　晩まで　オマエを　監視する（みる）
lyrics.en.value:
GO!

It's useless! You're being watched, no matter where you try to run.
We won't let any party plotting to take down the country go.
We know all of your behavior patterns, all of them!

While you're living without a worry, our collaborators are increasing.
Everyone around you, for example, your neighbors, coworkers,
Furthermore, your lover, even your family, all are observing you.

We're the secret police, the government direct supervision, the country's security department!
Secret police, slipping into darkness, controlling spy activities.

From morning, until night, we're watching you.

We'll use every method to force you to confess.
Repeated torture, or perhaps intravenous drug injection.
Or maybe take an important person as a hostage. No mercy!

After all, we're the secret police, the government direct supervision, the country's security department!
Secret police, suppressing thoughts, investigating complaints.

Every day, we're watching you.

We're the secret police, the government direct supervision, the country's security department!
Secret police, slipping into darkness, controlling spy activities.

From morning, until night, we're watching you.

title: アダルトチルドレン/鏡音リン
introduction: The image features a pink background with a series of white letters arranged in a grid pattern. The letters are arranged in a way that they form a word or phrase, but it is not clear what the word or phrase is. The background is a solid pink color, which creates a contrast with the white letters. The overall mood of the image is minimalistic and simple, with the focus on the white letters and the pink background. The output of the image is a digital representation of the letters and the pink background, which can be used for various purposes, such as design, typography, or artistic expression.
introduction_ja: ピンクの背景に白い文字が格子状に並んでいる。文字は単語やフレーズを形成するように配置されているが、その単語やフレーズが何であるかは明らかではない。背景はピンク一色で、白い文字とのコントラストを生み出している。画像全体の雰囲気はミニマルでシンプルで、白い文字とピンクの背景に焦点が当てられている。この画像の出力は、文字とピンクの背景をデジタルで表現したもので、デザイン、タイポグラフィ、芸術的表現など、さまざまな用途に使用できます。
artistString: カンザキイオリ feat. 鏡音リン
lyrics.ja.value:
愛されたかっただけなんです。
まぎれもないパパとママに
殴られようが蹴られようが
僕は愛されたかったんです。

笑顔でいつも隠しました。
あなたに褒めてもらうために。
「あなたが私のすべて」だと
言ってくれる日を待っていた。

自分だけ違う気がした。
それじゃ今日も優しいふりを。

愛されたい今日にすがるようにぼくは
生きたい死にたいを繰り返してさ
曖昧にすすんでく
したり顔で醜い顔を隠す。
変われない今日も一人なんだろう
誰も彼も何も信じれないからさ。
目的はただ一つ。
「あなただけが全て」と言われたいだけだ。

嫌われないように繕った笑顔で友達ができた
繕う相手は違ったが心から嬉しかったんだ。
それから少しずつ自分が汚く黒く思えてきて
うまくしゃべれなくなっていた。気づけば皆離れてった。

自分だけ違うだなんて、
なんか羨ましくなっていて

死んじゃえもう大嫌いだぼくはもう
周りと違う、化け物に思えてきて。
正直しんどいけど、助けてなんてただ迷惑だろう。
辛いやって叫んでしまえたら、どれほど気が楽にいきられるんだろう
そんなことしたってさ
誰もが素通り自分のことばっかり。

僕だって、同じように愛のある家に生まれて
笑いあって、生きててよかったねって素直に言い合えて。
変われない今日よ終わって
変わらない今日よ終わって

愛されたいなんて笑えないけど
何もできないままで大人になってゆく。
曖昧に気付いてく。
したり顔もできなくなってゆく。
変われない今日が苦しくってもう
誰も彼も何も信じられなくてさ。
とうとう言っちゃうのさ
「愛されてるくせに」
「ずるいよ」

愛されたかっただけなんです。
まぎれもないパパとママに
殴られようが蹴られようが
愛されたかっただけなんです。

もう戻れない気がしますが
大人になってしまいますが
僕は一人で生きてくから。
どうかせめて笑って生きて。

title: [初音ミク]　橙ゲノム　[オリジナル]
introduction: The image features a young woman lying on a bed, wearing a black dress and a black hat. She is looking at the camera with a smile on her face, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The background of the image is a black wall, which adds a sense of depth and contrast to the scene. The overall mood of the image is one of relaxation and contentment, as the woman appears to be enjoying her time in the bedroom.
introduction_ja: 黒いドレスを着て、黒い帽子をかぶった若い女性がベッドに横たわっている。彼女は微笑みを浮かべてカメラを見つめており、温かく魅力的な雰囲気を醸し出している。背景は黒い壁で、シーンに奥行きとコントラストを与えている。寝室での時間を楽しんでいるように見える。
artistString: つなまる feat. 初音ミク Append (Soft)
lyrics.ja.value:
立って夢が空に跳ねた 
べつに一人でも帰れるけど 
パッとしないのはね 
傍に 多分君がいないからでしょう

相対なんてしないで 
君なんか嫌いです 
居場所がないな

もういいかい　君の傍で 
私は小さく　息をするの 
「なんでもない」　滲む空に 
覗いた心　かくれんぼした

だってまだ まだ　あの人が 
多分君の中で生きていて 
降って　その度　横顔に 
ここが　ここが　苦しくなるよ

会いたい、なんて縋って 
ばかみたいに泣いて 
あたまのなかで　回る君の言葉

触れたら　壊れそうだ 
君がいまにも　なくなりそうで 
夕焼けに　染まる街が 
未来も願いも　連れ去ってよ

言えるわけないなぁ 
「君が好きです」

もういいかい　わかってたよ 
いつかこんな日がくることなんて 
もういいよ　さよならしよう 
思いも全ていま返すから

君に返そう

夕焼けが　染める街で 
塞いだ君と　かくれんぼした

title: わたしのアール / 初音ミク
introduction: The image is a digital painting of two girls standing on a wooden fence, with one girl on the left side and the other on the right side. The girls are dressed in white, and they are holding hands. The background is a bright orange, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The mood of the image is cheerful and playful, as the girls are enjoying their time together on the fence. The digital painting style adds a unique and artistic touch to the scene, making it visually appealing and engaging.
introduction_ja: 画像は、木製のフェンスの上に立つ2人の少女のデジタルペイントで、1人の少女が左側に、もう1人の少女が右側にいる。女の子は白い服を着て、手をつないでいる。背景は明るいオレンジ色で、暖かく魅力的な雰囲気を醸し出している。女の子たちがフェンスの上で一緒にいる時間を楽しんでいるように、画像の雰囲気は陽気で遊び心にあふれている。デジタルペインティングのスタイルが、このシーンにユニークで芸術的なタッチを加え、視覚的に魅力的で魅力的なものにしている。
artistString: 和田たけあき feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
わたし、屋上で靴を脱ぎかけた時に
三つ編みの先客に、声をかけてしまった。
「ねえ、やめなよ」

口をついて出ただけ。
ホントはどうでもよかった。
先を越されるのが、なんとなく癪だった。
三つ編みの子は、語る。
どっかで聞いたようなこと
「運命の人だった。
どうしても愛されたかった」

ふざけんな！そんなことくらいで
わたしの先を越そうだなんて！
欲しいものが手に入らないなんて
奪われたことすらないくせに！
「話したら楽になった」って
三つ編みの子は、消えてった。

さぁ、今日こそは　と　靴を
脱ぎかけたらそこに
背の低い女の子
また声をかけてしまった。
背の低い子は、語る。クラスでの孤独を
「無視されて、奪われて、
居場所がないんだ」って

ふざけんな！そんなことくらいで
私の先を越そうだなんて！
それでも、うちでは愛されて
あたたかいごはんもあるんでしょ？
「おなかがすいた」と　泣いて
背の低い子は、消えてった。

そうやって、何人かに声をかけて
追い返して
わたし自身の痛みは誰にも言えないまま

初めて見つけたんだ。
似たような悩みの子
何人目かにあったんだ
黄色いカーディガンの子
「うちに帰るたびに、増え続ける痣を
消し去ってしまうため
ここに来たの」と　言った。

口をついて出ただけ。
ホントはどうでもよかった。
思ってもいないこと
でも、声をかけてしまった。
「ねぇ、やめてよ」

ああ、どうしよう
この子は止められない
わたしには止める資格が無い。
それでも、ここからは消えてよ。
君を見ていると苦しいんだ。
「じゃあ今日はやめておくよ」って
目を伏せたまま消えてった。

今日こそは、誰もいない。
わたしひとりだけ
誰にも邪魔されない
邪魔してはくれない。
カーディガンは脱いで
三つ編みをほどいて
背の低いわたしは
今から飛びます。
lyrics.en.value:
When I was just about to take off my shoes on the rooftop,
I found someone already there before me, a girl with braided hair
Despite myself, I called out to her
“Hey, don’t do it.”

The words just kind of slipped from my mouth.
It didn’t really matter to me either way
It just didn’t sit right with me that someone got there ahead of me
The girl with braided hair told me her story
the kind of story one probably has heard before
“I thought we were meant for each other, I just really wanted him to like me back.”

Are you kidding me?! The nerve you have to get here before me for such a tame reason!
You’re upset because you can’t have what you want?
You’re lucky enough that you’ve never had anything stolen from you!
“I feel better now that I’ve talked about it,” the girl with braided hair said, and disappeared

“All right, I’m gonna do it today,” I thought, but just when I was about to take off my shoes,
I found a short girl there, and I ended up calling out to her again
The short girl told me, about how lonely she feels
in her class
“Everyone ignores me, everything’s stolen from me, I don’t belong anywhere,” she said

Are you kidding me?! The nerve you have to get here before me for such a tame reason!
Despite all that, you’re still loved at home, and there’s always dinner waiting for you, right?
“I’m hungry,” the short girl cried, and disappeared

Just like that, I spoke to a few of them and talked them out of it, while I myself can’t share my pains with anyone

For the first time, I’ve found a girl who has the same kind of problems as me
I met this girl wearing a yellow cardigan after I’ve seen a few of them
“I came here, hoping to erase the bruises that keep increasing every time I come home,” she said

The words just kind of slipped from my mouth
It didn’t really matter to me either way
But I ended up saying to her something even I myself didn’t quite believe in
“Hey, just don’t do it.”

Ah, what should I do?
I can’t stop this girl
I don’t have the right to stop her
But even so, just go away from here
It’s too painful for me to look at you
“I won’t do it today, then,” she said as she dropped her gaze, and disappeared

There’s no one here today
It’s just me, myself and I
No one can get in my way
No one would get in my way for me
Taking off my cardigan, unbraiding my hair, this short girl is going to jump now

title: 【GUMI】 Just a game 【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features a young woman with long black hair, dressed in a green dress, standing in front of a black and white striped wall. The background is a black and white photo of a woman with long black hair, dressed in a green dress, standing in front of a black and white striped wall. The overall mood of the image is mysterious and intriguing, as the two women's appearances and poses are similar, yet the backgrounds are different. The image could be interpreted as a creative representation of a woman's journey through life, with the two women representing different stages or aspects of her life.
introduction_ja: イメージは、黒と白のストライプの壁の前に立つ、緑のドレスを着た長い黒髪の若い女性。背景は、黒と白のストライプの壁の前に立つ、緑のドレスを着た長い黒髪の女性の白黒写真。2人の女性の外見とポーズが似ているにもかかわらず、背景が異なっているため、画像全体の雰囲気はミステリアスで興味をそそる。このイメージは、2人の女性が人生のさまざまな段階や側面を表しており、女性の人生の旅を創造的に表現していると解釈できるだろう。
artistString: takamatt feat. GUMI
lyrics.ja.value:
夜な夜な集まる　宇田川町の Beauty & Rudy 
悲しく小雨が　横顔を霞ませ 
二人最後のダンスホール・ランデヴー

Just a game 
今夜だけ二人フロア揺らすはずなのに 
見つめあうその瞳はもう逸らせない 
Just a game 
愛でも恋でもただのゲームなのだから 
せめて夜が明けるまでキミと踊り続ける

あの日助手席から見た夕日の色思い出した 
二人を照らすスポットライトと同じだ 
イルなサウンドマン達がワイニーダンス煽っていたのは 
カーステレオから流れてたキラーチューン

大切に持っていたパズルが (Stand by me, Darling)
解けないことは知っていたけど

Just a game 
お互いのことを散々オモチャにしたよね 
そんな愚かな二人をもう救えない 
Just a game 
アダムとイヴが昔犯した過ち 
幾年幾世代超えて二人また繰り返す

シェイカー振るはバーテンダー　心の中で Love me tender 
ラムコーク差し出すその手にまだなんだかんだトキメくの 
朝がくる前にキミと逃げだしたい 
傘なんて持たずにずぶ濡れでもいいから

アデニンチミングアニンシトシン　遺伝子レベルで働く引力 
今更何様 Load have mercy 運命という名の斥力 
押して引いて引いて押して　それでも抗えない何か 
踊り踊らされ踊る踊り　弾けるのは汗か涙なのか

なぜ素直に好きと言えないの 
なぜ素直に好きと言ってくれないの 
結局意固地に格好付けて 
くだらない　つまらない　泣きたい 
キミを傷つけただけ

Just a game 
今夜だけ二人フロア揺らすはずなのに 
見つめあうその瞳はもう逸らせない 
Just a game 
愛でも恋でもただのゲームなのだから 
せめて夜が明けるまでキミと踊り続ける

Just a game 
お互いのことを散々オモチャにしたよね 
そんな愚かな二人をもう救えない 
Just a game 
アダムとイヴが昔犯した過ち 
幾年幾世代超えて二人また繰り返す
lyrics.en.value:
We meet every night at the Beauty and Rudy in Udagawa-cho
While the drizzle heartlessly blurs your face, 
let's make this our final dancehall rendezvous

Just a game 
Although we're supposed to rock the floor just for tonight, 
we can no longer take our eyes off each other
Just a game
You can call it love or affection, but it's still a mere game, 
so at least until the day breaks, I will keep dancing with you

I remember the color of the setting sun I saw from the passenger seat on that day
it was the same color as the spotlight that we were standing in
The badass audio men were firing us up for some Dutty Wine dance 
with the killer tune transmitted from the car stereo

At that time, I already knew (Stand by me, darling) 
that the puzzle I treasured was unsolvable

Just a game 
We were both being awful and toyed with each other, didn't we? 
The degree of our stupidity has rendered us hopeless 
Just a game
Adam and Eve committed a sin a long time ago 
Generations later, the two of us are repeating that same mistake

That bartender who's shaking his shaker loves me tender in his heart 
My heart still throbs at his hand that's handing me a rum and coke
Before morning comes, I want to run away together with you
I don't care if I don't have an umbrella and become completely soake

Adenine, thymine, guanine, cytosine, there’s an attractive force between us at the genomic level
Who do you think you are at this point? Lord have mercy, there’s now a repulsive force called "fate"
I push away and pull closer, pull closer and push away, but there's still something unopposable
I dance, you make me dance, and I dance more
Are these drops of sweat or tears that are dripping off me?

Why can't I be honest and say I love you? 
Why won't you be honest and say you love me? 
In the end, we're just both being obstinately prideful
How stupid! How boring! How it makes me want to cry! 
I've only been hurting you

Just a game
Although we're supposed to rock the floor just for tonight, 
we can no longer take our eyes off each other
Just a game
You can call it love or affection, but it's still a mere game, 
so at least until the day breaks, I will keep dancing with you

Just a game
We were both being awful and toyed with each other, didn't we? 
The degree of our stupidity has rendered us hopeless
Just a game
Adam and Eve committed a sin a long time ago
Generations later, the two of us are repeating that same mistake

Just a game

title: 「celluloid」baker feat.初音ミク
introduction: The image features a large tree with a canopy of leaves, which is situated in a park. The tree is surrounded by a forest, and the sky is visible in the background. The overall mood of the image is serene and peaceful, as the tree and its surroundings create a sense of tranquility and calmness. The image is captured in black and white, which adds to the timeless and classic feel of the scene.
introduction_ja: この画像は、公園の一角にある、葉で天蓋を覆われた大きな木が描かれている。木は森に囲まれ、背景には空が見える。木とその周囲が静けさと穏やかさを醸し出しているため、画像全体の雰囲気は穏やかで平和的である。この画像はモノクロで撮影されており、時代を超越したクラシックな雰囲気を醸し出している。
artistString: baker feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
いつまでも　遠い過去でも 
君がいて　僕がいて 
道の果て　見えない不安も 
小さな声　押し殺して

冷たい空気も　止まない雨も 
重い心も　言葉も 
光が差し込んで　歩き出せるのは 
いつだろう

色褪せたこの色も　君に伝えたい 
何の意味もないけれど 
夜明けは来ないよと　聞こえない振りして 
いつの日にか　笑っていられるかな

騒ぎ出す　微かな予感を 
溢れ出す　期待を 
少しずつ　探し続けても 
虚しいだけ　いらない

つまらない一日が終わり 
長い夜は恐くて 
また朝が来るけど　何も見えないのは 
何故だろう

何一つ変わらない　待ち続けてても 
誰も救われないけれど 
希望なんてなくても　僕は生きてくから 
そんな強がり　虚しく響いていた

呼吸さえ　覚束ず 
全て僕のせいだけど 
聴きたい音があるよ　知りたい事もあるよ 
前だけ見つめているよ

色褪せたこの色も　君に伝えたい 
何の意味もないけれど 
夜明けは来ないよと　聞こえない振りして 
いつの日にか　笑っていられるかな
lyrics.en.value:
Always, even in the past
There was you, and there was me
At the end of the road, there was invisible uneasiness
suppressing a small voice

The cold air and the rain that doesn't stop
The heavy heart and words
When the light shows, I will start to walk,
but when is that?

I want to tell you about the fading colors
but there is no meaning
When daybreak comes, I pretend not to hear
the day that you finally laugh

After feeling so dim, an excited feeling
will someday overflow
Even if little by little, I continue to look for it
I don't need it to be empty

The first day of pain is over
But a long night of fear is awaiting
I don't see how I could live through another morning,
why is that?

Nothing is changing, I continue to wait
nobody is saved
"Even if there isn't hope, I still live"
such a bluff sounded so empty

Breath is getting hard
Everything is my fault
There is a sound I want to hear, there is something I want to know
But I'm only looking forward

I want to tell you about the fading colors
but there is no meaning
When daybreak comes, I pretend not to hear
the day that you finally laugh

title: 【鏡音レン】悪ノ召使【手書きＰＶ】
introduction: The image depicts a couple of people, a man and a woman, standing together in a field of flowers. They are holding hands and smiling, creating a warm and joyful atmosphere. The background of the image is a yellow sky, which adds a sense of brightness and optimism to the scene. The couple's embrace and the presence of flowers in the background suggest a romantic and loving moment between the two individuals. The mood of the image is positive and uplifting, conveying a sense of happiness and togetherness.
introduction_ja: 花畑の中にたたずむ男女のカップル。ふたりは手をつないで微笑み、温かく楽しい雰囲気を醸し出している。背景は黄色い空で、このシーンに明るさと楽観的な雰囲気を加えている。カップルの抱擁と背景の花の存在は、2人のロマンチックで愛情に満ちた瞬間を暗示している。画像のムードはポジティブで高揚感があり、幸福感と一体感を伝えている。
artistString: 月蟲 feat. 鏡音レン

title: 【初音ミク】BadBye【オリジナル曲PV付き】
introduction: The image features a black and white scene with a man and a woman standing in the foreground. The man is wearing a black shirt and the woman is wearing a white shirt. They are both looking at the camera, creating a sense of intimacy and connection between the two. The background of the image is a dark, cloudy sky, which adds a sense of mystery and depth to the scene. The overall mood of the image is one of introspection and connection between the two individuals.
introduction_ja: 画像は手前に立っている男女の白黒のシーン。男は黒いシャツを着ており、女は白いシャツを着ている。2人ともカメラ目線で、2人の間に親密さとつながりが感じられる。背景は暗い曇り空で、このシーンに神秘性と奥行きを与えている。画像全体の雰囲気は、2人の内観とつながりの1つである。
artistString: koma'n feat. 初音ミク

lyrics.en.value:
Holding hands with a sadistic past
Walking down a path filled with tragic beauty
Couples walking on in the other direction keep on always changing

"Why do you seem to enjoy this life?"
"I have always enjoyed this life because, because I'm earnest about it”
"Well, isn't that all so goddamn great?"

The forgotten feeling of any achievement and a dear love that disappeared,
while I'm still depending upon memories of the past

The knife sings to me a song that seems to stop the past, while I, while I use it to slit own my left wrist
A blood red, a blood red song I sing, while tears of some broken, crying heart drop like the body of this once great star

Becoming a person who slices up the past,
"How many more memories will you cut with your bloody knife?"
Although I'll never seem to ever let go, don't say such a damn thing

Loneliness has consumed my life
Though I'm still not satisfied, but now, but now, I'm positive that I have been completely convinced

Because changing this life seems like a damned sin
I'll go on forever being just the same way
But everyone around keeps changing, why am I the only one that is different?

I look out at this beautifully hateful world
with my own, with my own two accursed, dark stained eyes
A sad blue, a sad blue song I sing
while my all too real tears seem to fall just like raindrop

But ironically, I still hate it all
The life I had wish for seemed to be born somewhere else amongst all time and space

I sing out this song filled with all my hatred
from within, from within my own black and icy throat
A pitch black, a pitch black song I sing, as the lyrics seem to come back at me, sharply piercing my dark soul

I want run away, run away and just be free from my own, from my own one and only body and life
A blood red, a blood red song I cry out
My true self, that was cut by an accursed knife, disappears into this world, into this earth, and all alone

title: シニカルナイトプラン / 初音ミク
introduction: The image features a woman wearing a pink jacket and a blue dress, standing in a room with a blue background. She is holding a controller in her hand, which suggests that she is playing a video game. The room is filled with various electronic devices, such as a TV, a computer, and a cell phone. The presence of these devices indicates that the woman is likely engaging in a digital activity, such as gaming or browsing the internet. The mood of the image is casual and relaxed, as the woman is enjoying her leisure time in the room. The overall atmosphere is that of a comfortable and cozy environment, where the woman can unwind and engage in her favorite pastime.

title: ミラーリング／初音ミク
introduction: The image features a black and white photograph of a building with a large, open window. The window is positioned in the middle of the building, and it is surrounded by a dark, empty space. The overall mood of the image is somewhat eerie and mysterious, as the open window seems to invite curiosity about what lies beyond it. The black and white color scheme adds to the atmosphere, creating a sense of timelessness and a focus on the architectural elements of the building.
introduction_ja: 大きな窓の開いた建物の白黒写真。窓は建物の中央に位置し、周囲には何もない暗い空間が広がっている。開け放たれた窓は、その向こうに何があるのかという好奇心を誘うようで、画像全体の雰囲気はどこか不気味で神秘的だ。黒と白の配色が雰囲気を盛り上げ、時代を超越した感覚と建物の建築要素への集中を生み出している。
artistString: バルーン feat. 初音ミク

銘々の見解を見据えておくれ
退屈な夜に染まっていく
lyrics.en.value:
You know what? The sound of your laughter, and the littlest of your actions,
are always relayed, quietly, to someone’s ears, somewhere.
I mean, isn’t that right? Even this stupid conversation we’re having
must surely end up comforting someone’s sadness, somewhere.

Please, tell me of some simple emotions,
‘cos I can’t really get into those half-baked fictions.
Please, look closely at each and everyone’s opinions,
before they are steeped in the boring night.

Finally, the color connecting the two of us has become so clear.
But hold on. How long have you been there for? Hmm?

“What kind of voice do you want to hear?”
“What kind of song do you want to listen to?”
“What kind of dream are you having?”
Show me everything.

Please, forget all about those unremarkable lives,
and don’t be swayed by such incomplete information.
I can see it clearly written on your face,
how you’re drowning in a sea of brightly lit noise.

Then again, seeing as I myself am dreaming
of breaking out of this turbid bubble one day
and laugh with a pure, clear voice,
I guess I shouldn’t tell others what to do.

I had the vague, vague feeling that you smiled
as you brushed against me, while I was unsteady, unsteady on my feet.

Your presence will be overshadowed with gray,
now that you’ve let yourself be stained with a single moment’s compassion.
See, it’s so clearly showing
how you’re drowning in a sea of brightly lit noise.

Please, tell me of some simple emotions,
and don’t get lost within such a typical maze.
Please, look closely at each and everyone’s opinions,
before they are steeped in the boring night.

title: からっぽのまにまに / 初音ミク
introduction: The image is a creative representation of a computer keyboard and mouse, made up of various objects and elements. The keyboard is composed of a variety of items, including a car, a clock, a heart, a hand, a bird, a person, and a dog. The mouse is made up of a person, a heart, a hand, a bird, and a dog. The objects are arranged in a way that resembles the shape of a keyboard and mouse, creating a visually appealing and unique composition.The image's background is white, which provides a clean and simple backdrop for the creative design. The mood of the image is playful and imaginative, showcasing the artist's creativity and skill in creating a visually engaging and thought-provoking piece of art.
introduction_ja: このイメージは、コンピュータのキーボードとマウスを独創的に表現したもので、さまざまなオブジェクトや要素で構成されている。キーボードは、車、時計、ハート、手、鳥、人、犬などさまざまなアイテムで構成されている。マウスは、人、ハート、手、鳥、犬で構成されている。キーボードとマウスの形を模したオブジェが配置され、視覚的に魅力的でユニークな構図を作り出しています。画像の背景は白で、クリエイティブなデザインのためのクリーンでシンプルな背景となっています。画像の雰囲気は遊び心と想像力に富んでおり、視覚的に魅力的で示唆に富む作品を制作したアーティストの創造性と技術を示している。
artistString: ピノキオピー feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:

lyrics.en.value:
Because I'll come to forget things like the fact that I lived here one day
I change my important things into medicine and laugh deeply
Someday, here, I'll forget the weakness I faked as well, won't I?
Reeking of liquor, I'll cry the seasons' scents into a bar performance

In a car that's jam packed full of cargo
I'm headed for the pitch black last stop
Swinging an idiotic face from side to side, I get the OK to go

At, at, at the mercy of emptiness, I have an unending illusion
Because more than making my mind float along with the moon
Just like that, I'll die!
Today I'm going to meet you, who I like so much

Since one day, I'll come to forget even the warm rays of the sun
I gently grasp your shaking, cold hand

Tiding over an emergency, I paste together an unsteady serif of teeth
Even a completely pickled, grotesque dream
Can't be dyed into something sweet, it won't reach the brain

In, in, in an empty love song, I recklessly sing
I want to hide my feelings since no one's honest anyway!
A sad, slight red is adding sound

I try repainting everything in my vision into a "miracle",
And even try making everything my heart changes into "nonsense",
Because I'll come to forget things like the fact I lived here one day, won't I?
I'll take a good look at the ephemeral days that instantly drove me mad

At, at, at, at, at, at, at...

At, at, at the mercy of emptiness I doubt an unending illusion
Noticing the gap in the magic
And just like that, it disappears!
Good afternoon! I'm gonna go play somewhere

We existed in the space between the past and the future
Now, sensing that,
There are many things, or there might not be many at all
For some reason or other, simply, for some reason
I want to laugh with you

title: マッシュルームマザー / 初音ミク
introduction: The background of the image is a colorful, psychedelic design, which creates a vibrant and energetic atmosphere. The main focus of the image is a man and a woman dancing together in a circle, surrounded by a rainbow-colored background. The man and woman are dressed in formal attire, which adds a touch of elegance to the scene. The man is wearing a suit and tie, while the woman is wearing a dress. The man and woman are dancing in a circle, which suggests a sense of unity and togetherness. The mood of the image is joyful and celebratory, as the couple is enjoying their time together and expressing their love for each other through dance.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景はカラフルでサイケデリックなデザインで、活気に満ちたエネルギッシュな雰囲気を醸し出している。画像の主役は、虹色の背景に囲まれて輪になって踊る男女。男女は正装しており、シーンにエレガントさを添えている。男性はスーツにネクタイ、女性はドレスを着ている。男女が輪になって踊っていることから、一体感と一体感が感じられる。カップルが一緒にいる時間を楽しみ、ダンスを通して互いへの愛を表現しているため、画像の雰囲気は陽気で祝賀的である。

title: 【転がる先には】ローリンガール、オリジナルＰＶ【何がある？】
introduction: The background of this image is a black and white photo of a person standing in front of a white wall. The person is wearing a black shirt and appears to be standing in a room. The image is a black and white photo, which adds to the overall mood and aesthetic of the scene. The person's presence in the image creates a sense of isolation and loneliness, as they are the only visible subject in the scene. The black and white color scheme further emphasizes the contrast between the person and the white wall, creating a visually striking and thought-provoking image.

artistString: yama_ko feat. 初音ミク

騒ぐ頭の中を掻き回して、掻き回して。

間違い探しに終われば、また、回るの！

と

私をどうか転がしてと
少女は言う　少女は言う

と
めるの、今。」

少女は言う　少女は言う

息を 止
や
めるの、今。
lyrics.en.value:
For lonely girls, it's always the same, dreaming dreams that don't come true
And churning, churning through the clamor in their heads

A lonely girl mutters "I'm fine", have words failed her?
A failure, a failure.
Obsessing over her mistakes makes everything spin again!

One more time, one more time
"I'll roll along again today"
The girl said, the girl said
Breathing life into the words!

"How about now?"

"Not yet, we still can't see what's ahead. Hold your breath, now."

This is how it ends for a Rolling Girl, unable to reach the colors on the other side
The overlapping voices, they blend together, blend together

She mutters, "I'm fine.", but the words fail her
Not caring how it ends
An upward climb that invites mistakes

One more time, one more time
Please, get me rolling
The girl said, the girl said
With her intense silence!

"How about now?"

"Just a little more, we should see something soon. Hold your breath, now."

One more time, one more time
"I'll roll along again today"
The girl said, the girl said
Breathing laughter into the words!

"How about now? OK, you can look. You must be exhausted too, right?"

Stop breathing, now.

title: 巡音ルカ　『 それがあなたの幸せとしても 』　オリジナル曲
introduction: The image depicts a beautiful sunset over a city, with a view of a rooftop and a cityscape in the background. The sun is setting, casting a warm glow on the buildings and creating a serene atmosphere. The image is captured from a rooftop, providing a unique perspective of the cityscape and the sunset. The mood of the image is peaceful and tranquil, with the warm colors of the sunset and the serene view of the city below. The image is likely to evoke feelings of calmness and relaxation, as the viewer can appreciate the beauty of the sunset and the cityscape from a unique vantage point.
introduction_ja: 屋上や街並みを背景に、都市に沈む美しい夕日が描かれている。太陽は沈んでいき、建物に暖かい光を投げかけ、落ち着いた雰囲気を作り出している。この画像は屋上から撮影されており、街並みと夕日をユニークな視点で見ることができる。夕日の暖色と眼下に広がる街の穏やかな景色が、画像の雰囲気を平和で穏やかなものにしている。この画像は、独特の視点から夕日と街並みの美しさを鑑賞できるため、穏やかでリラックスした感情を呼び起こす可能性が高い。
songTitle: それがあなたの幸せとしても
artistString: Heavenz feat. 巡音ルカ
lyrics.ja.value:
素足を晒して駆け出した　少年少女の期待 
この先は水に濡れてもいいから 
めくるめく議論はトートロジーに　ああ　また日が暮れてった

あと数日後の未来だったのなら

lyrics.en.value:
The expectations of boys and girls who exposed their bare feet and broke into a run
Since it is fine too to be wet with water after this
A blinding argument tautologically, oh, another day was closing
An altogether fabricated sensation

The emotions that were pressing against our chests at that time
And the tears we shed, what is the expiration date for tears that one was lured by?
A certain future, the future we are laughing together about
If it had been the future of several days later

Is tomorrow that you harbor not bitter?
Draw one line on the letters that are squirming in me
Can the today that you harbor not be saved at all?
Even so, if I loaded kindness onto those shoulders, would you be able to feel love again?

Did I have magic be cast on me that was leniently omitted, you think?
Can it not be undone by anyone, you think?
In the case of a situation that grew unforgivable for things also that were forgivable, it is not like only words will become words

Even if those several seconds are destined, even if those several steps are destined,
Is stopping that determination being selfish?
Don't go, don’t go, don’t go, now

Is the spot that you were aiming for not dark?
If I assume that it is the mere shadow of a big light,
I do not want to make you go to the place where you begin your trip
For example, even if you sleep quietly beyond that point,
Even if you assume that it is your happiness

Is your tomorrow not bitter?
Draw one line on the letters that are squirming in me
Can the today that you harbor not be saved at all?
Even so, if I loaded kindness onto those shoulders, would you be able to feel love again?

title: 【弱音ハク】白ノ娘【中世物語風オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a young woman dressed in a white dress, kneeling down and praying. She is surrounded by a dark background, which creates a contrasting effect. The woman's posture and the dark background together create a sense of solemnity and reverence. The image is likely depicting a moment of reflection, prayer, or meditation, as the woman appears to be focused on her spiritual connection with the divine. The mood of the image is contemplative and peaceful, as the woman is engaging in a personal and intimate act of prayer.
introduction_ja: 白いドレスに身を包み、ひざまずいて祈る若い女性が描かれている。彼女は暗い背景に囲まれており、それが対照的な効果を生み出している。女性の姿勢と暗い背景が相まって、厳粛さと畏敬の念を醸し出している。女性は神との精神的なつながりに集中しているように見えるので、この画像は内省、祈り、瞑想の瞬間を描いているのだろう。女性が個人的で親密な祈りの行為に従事しているため、画像の雰囲気は瞑想的で平和的である。
artistString: mothy feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:

あの少年はいったい
誰だったのかしら？
lyrics.en.value:
“I’m sorry for being alive” was my catchphrase before I knew it
All I did was whining in my life that was nothing but dull

All of the people of the village had beautiful green hair
I, the outcast, different from other people, have white hair

Deep in the forest, the millennial tree towered in secret
Alone here, I made a wish to God

‘Continuing to live in loneliness, it’s very lonely
Anyone will do, I just want someone to be my friend’

When I met her, it was right next to the millennial tree
Helping her while she’d collapsed was the beginning of things

Before I knew it, the two of us were getting along very well
But just about everything between her and me was different

Her green hair was more beautiful than anyone else’s in the village
Her tender voice and smile were loved by everyone

‘Why are you being kind to someone like me?
Are you pitying this girl inferior to yourself?’

Hugging the abject me, she whispered
“You’re someone more wonderful than anyone else,” and my tears spilled

Even if all of the people in the world scorned and laughed at me
There was someone who needed me, and just by that, I was happy

Together, we got out of the village and started living in the city
Even if it was a life we weren’t accustomed to, if we were together, we were fine

We were servants to the wife of a wealthy merchant
It was the job we chose for living

One day in the mansion, we caught a glimpse of a nice guy with blue hair
The encounter between him and her turned everything upside down

The king of the kingdom across the sea, he loved her deeply
And rejected the marriage proposal from the princess of the neighboring kingdom

The kingdom was engulfed in the flames of war, by the orders the princess gave
“You may kill all girls with green hair”

Everyone, everyone was gone
Besides me with my white hair
Yet I would’ve preferred it if I died in her place
Why, oh why

“I’m sorry for being alive” was my catchphrase before I knew it
All I did was whining in my life that was nothing but dull

At a church in a port town, I began a new life
I heard rumors on the wind that the princess died in the revolution

When I met her, it was right next to the church
Helping her while she’d collapsed was the beginning of things

Before I knew it, the two of us were getting along very well
But just about everything between her and me was different

At the confessional at night, void of anyone
By chance, I heard her confession
Ah, what do you call this?
She was truly the daughter of evil

In the little harbor at the outskirts of the town, that girl stood still all alone
Approaching her from the back, I took out a knife from my bosom
Pointed it at the princess’ back, and raised it

There’s something I must apologize to you for
In the end, I couldn’t take revenge for you

‘That girl is who I was in the past, a very, very lonesome person
Continuing to live all alone, it’s very lonely’

That girl, who couldn’t do anything, got a bit better at cooking
She’s doing a really good job with baking today’s snack, brioche

At that moment, at that seaside, I could see an illusion for an instant
Who in the world was that boy?

title: 【鏡音リンの】トラッシュ・アンド・トラッシュ！
introduction: The image features a black and white drawing of a girl with a ponytail, sitting on a chair and holding a pencil. She is drawing on a piece of paper, which is placed on a table. The scene is set in a classroom, as evidenced by the presence of a desk and a chair. The overall mood of the image is that of a creative and focused atmosphere, as the girl is actively engaged in her drawing activity. The black and white color scheme adds a sense of simplicity and timelessness to the scene, emphasizing the focus on the girl's artistic endeavors.

lyrics.en.value:
Bring everything you don’t need over here
Right now, I’m a garbage collecting intern
Isn’t it the ideal to lead a minimalistic lifestyle?
Do you really need that thing you’re holding so dear?

All the things you’re keeping are binding you hand and foot, robbing you of your freedom!

That’s why
Trash, trash, everything, just throw everything away!
Trash, trash, decluttering is good for your health!
If you’re not using it, let’s throw it away
Even if it seems wasteful, let’s throw it away
That treasure of yours, full of memories?
Let’s throw it away

You don’t need that right? Here, I’ll throw it away for you
Do you really need all that troublesome interpersonal relationship stuff?

Come on, throw it away
That’s right, throw it away
No one’s going to help you

That’s why
Trash, trash, everyone, everyone, let’s throw it away
Trash, trash, the majority of humanity is completely rotten!
The smell is terrible, so let’s throw them all away
Even if you still have feelings for them, let’s throw them away
That person who won’t return your love?
Let’s throw them away, too!

That hero of justice who always tattles on everyone is seriously annoying, so let’s throw her away
That delusional idiot who thinks she’s the number one special snowflake, let’s throw her away, too!
That mentally ill girl who does crazy things to get noticed should be thrown away, too!
And then the girl who’s negative toward everyone like that should be thrown away, too

And then
Trash, trash, I, too, I, too, am turning into trash
Trash, trash, I’m unneeded
I’m full of crap myself
I’ve realized that all along, but I don’t feel like improving myself, so let’s throw myself away,
since there’s absolutely nothing lovable about me

Trash, trash, goodbye
Goodbye, yes, goodbye
The things I’ve thrown away are too heavy,
I can’t move a finger
But it’s already too late to realize that
There’s nothing to do now, right? So goodbye
I’m the most unneeded in this world
Let’s throw myself away

I’m unneeded!

introduction: The image features a young woman dressed in a school uniform, holding a deck of cards in her hands. She is standing in front of a backdrop of a Japanese-style building, which adds a unique and visually appealing element to the scene. The woman appears to be posing for a photo, possibly at a photo booth or a special event. The background of the image, the Japanese-style building, and the woman's attire create a sense of cultural diversity and intrigue. The mood of the image is playful and lighthearted, as the woman is holding cards and posing for a photo.

title: オルターエゴ / 初音ミク
introduction: The image depicts a scene of three people sitting on a red bench, with one person in the middle and two others on either side. The bench is located in a graffiti-covered alley, which adds a sense of urban grittiness to the scene. The presence of graffiti and the dark background create a moody atmosphere, suggesting a sense of isolation and loneliness. The three people seem to be lost in their thoughts, possibly contemplating their lives or the world around them. The overall mood of the image is one of introspection and solitude.

title: 【重音テト】命短し恋せよ乙女【オリジナルPV】
introduction: The background of the image is a colorful and patterned wallpaper, featuring a cat with a hat and a bow on its head. The cat is sitting on a chair, and the chair is placed in front of a window. The cat appears to be looking out the window, possibly observing its surroundings or waiting for someone to come home.The mood of the image is cheerful and playful, as the cat is wearing a hat and a bow, which adds a touch of cuteness and humor to the scene. The presence of the window suggests that the cat might be enjoying the view outside, or perhaps waiting for someone to come home. The overall atmosphere of the image is lighthearted and inviting, making it a pleasant and engaging visual experience.
introduction_ja: 背景はカラフルな模様の壁紙で、頭に帽子とリボンをつけた猫が描かれている。猫は椅子に座っており、椅子は窓の前に置かれている。猫は窓の外を眺めているように見え、おそらく周囲を観察しているか、誰かが帰ってくるのを待っているのだろう。猫が帽子とリボンをかぶっているため、画像の雰囲気は陽気で遊び心があり、シーンにかわいらしさとユーモアを添えている。窓があることから、猫は外の景色を楽しんでいるのかもしれないし、誰かの帰りを待っているのかもしれない。画像全体の雰囲気は明るく、心地よく、魅力的な視覚体験となっている。

title: 【初音ミク】ストロボラスト【オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a young girl wearing a white dress and holding a black umbrella. She is standing in a room with a white background, which gives the scene a clean and minimalistic appearance. The girl appears to be in a playful mood, as she is holding a bunch of balloons, which adds a playful and lively atmosphere to the scene. The balloons are scattered around her, creating a sense of fun and excitement. The overall mood of the image is lighthearted and joyful, as the girl is enjoying her time with the balloons.

artistString: 椎名もた feat. 初音ミク Append (Sweet)

title: 【初音ミク】火葬曲【ＰＶ付オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features a young woman, possibly a singer or anime character, standing in front of a black background. She is wearing a white dress and has her hand on her hip, creating a dynamic and confident pose. The background is filled with various symbols, including a heart, a star, and a triangle. The symbols are arranged in a way that suggests a sense of depth and complexity, creating an intriguing and visually appealing composition. The mood of the image is mysterious and captivating, with the woman's confident stance and the intricate symbols adding to the overall atmosphere.
introduction_ja: このイメージは、おそらく歌手かアニメのキャラクターであろう若い女性が黒い背景の前に立っている。白いドレスを着て腰に手を当て、ダイナミックで自信に満ちたポーズをとっている。背景はハート、星、三角形などさまざまなシンボルで埋め尽くされている。シンボルは奥行きと複雑さを感じさせるように配置され、興味をそそる視覚的に魅力的な構図を作り出している。女性の自信に満ちた姿勢と複雑なシンボルが全体の雰囲気を高めており、画像の雰囲気は神秘的で魅惑的である。
artistString: No.D feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
壊れてゆく喜びも
やがて哀しみも
思い描くすべてを抱いて
いま焔を闇に浮かべる

楽譜 (スコア) の焼き場はここですか？
棄てられ音のないカナシイ歌が
声を　私の声が欲しい？
尽き果て消える宿命 (さだめ) だけれど

燃え上がれ　哀しみよ
最期に輝かせてあげるわ
歌われぬ　悲歌 (うた) のため
火をくべ　荼毘 (だび) に付せ

きらめいては消えてゆく
今際 (いまわ) のことばの綴じ目
美しく映える音景に
あれはカゲロウ? 未来 (まえ) が見えない……

燃えては灰に消えゆく
新たに熱を燈される
何度も何度も繰り返す
私にはどんな意味があるの？

「娯楽などそんなもの」
虚しいなんて思いたくない
仮初の明かりでも
意味など見えなくても

燃え広がる紅の
火の手は空まで伸びる
私が飲み込まれる前に
新しい音をちょうだい

燃え尽き果てた亡骸
積み上げられた塵埃
焼き場で歌う私の
声の逝き場はこんなもの

きらめいては消えてゆく
今際(いまわ)のことばの綴じ目
美しく響く音景は
すべてカゲロウ? 何も聞こえない……

壊れてゆく哀しみも
やがて消える喜びも
思い描くすべてを抱いて
いま焔の海に溶け逝く
lyrics.en.value:
The joy of the pending destruction and the sadness of the looming disappearance,
Holding them along with everything I have imagined, I set a fire floating in the darkness now

Is this the crematory for music scores?
The sad and abandoned songs with no sound
Voice, does it want my voice?
Even thought its fate is to be used up and vanish

Flare up your sadness, I will let you shine at the end
For the sake of the sad songs that never were sung
I will throw you into the fire and cremate you

As the sparkle fades away
At the end of the dying words
In the beautiful musical scenery
Is that a mirage? I cannot see the future ahead

Melodies that turn into ash once you burn them
Harmonies that get heated up again and again
These keep happening over and over
What do these all mean for me?

"This is what entertainment is like"
I don’t want to thing that these are futile
Even if this is just a transient light
Even if I cannot see the meaning in it

The spreading crimson flames
Are reaching up into the sky
Before I get swallowed by it
Please give me a new sound

The carcass left over after the fire the pilling up dusts
This is the dying field for the voice of me whp sings at the crematory

As the sparkle fades away
At the end of the dying words
In the beautiful musical scenery
Is everything a mirage? I cannot hear anything

The sadness of the looming destruction
And the happiness of the pending disappearance
Holding them along with everything I have imagined
I melt into the sea of fire now

title: 『 ハナタバ 』/ 可不
introduction: The background of the image is a blue sky, which creates a serene and peaceful atmosphere. The main focus of the image is a couple of people, a man and a woman, who are kissing each other. They are standing close together, with the man's arm around the woman's waist. The scene is intimate and affectionate, conveying a sense of love and connection between the two individuals. The mood of the image is warm and romantic, with the blue sky providing a calming backdrop to the tender moment captured between the couple.

artistString: MIMI feat. 可不

このまま少しだけ君と踊る時間にハナタバを

どうしたの？って問いかけるの 君の君の無邪気な声が
響く響く星空の奥いつかいつか言わせてくれよ

すっかり余計なことばっか
汚れた心にじゃあバイバイ
きっかり悩んだ今日だって
それでも眠れない

さようならって言わせてよ昨日の寂しさに
いつしか空っぽな心だけが夜空に咲いたんだ
ほらまたすっからかんに生きたいな何にもないからさ

でもいまだけは夜よ隣で

すっからかんに生きたいな何にもないからさ

title: 【初音ミク】 ショットガン・ラヴァーズ 【のぼる↑・オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a heart-shaped design with the word "Shotgun Lovers" written inside it. The heart is made up of a series of bullet holes, which gives it a unique and artistic appearance. The background of the image is a black and white color scheme, which adds to the overall mood of the image. The heart design and the word "Shotgun Lovers" suggest a sense of love and passion, as well as a connection to the world of guns and shooting. The image could be interpreted as a creative and artistic representation of the bond between two people who share a love for guns and shooting.

title: 【手書きMAD】ぼかおん!【けいおん!OPパロ】
introduction: The image features a group of three people, two of them being girls, standing in front of a microphone and a guitar. They are dressed in costumes, which suggests that they might be part of a performance or a cosplay event. The background of the image is a dark room, which adds a mysterious and dramatic atmosphere to the scene. The mood of the image is energetic and engaging, as the three people are actively involved in their performance or rehearsal. The output of the image is a black and white photo, which emphasizes the contrast between the dark background and the vibrant costumes of the performers.
introduction_ja: この画像には、マイクとギターの前に立つ3人のグループ（うち2人は女の子）が写っている。彼らはコスチュームに身を包んでおり、パフォーマンスかコスプレイベントの一部であることを示唆している。背景は暗い部屋で、ミステリアスでドラマチックな雰囲気を醸し出している。3人がパフォーマンスやリハーサルに積極的に参加しているため、画像の雰囲気はエネルギッシュで魅力的だ。画像の出力はモノクロ写真で、暗い背景と出演者の鮮やかな衣装のコントラストを強調している。

title: 【巡音ルカ】 トエト 【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image is a close-up of a cat wearing a hat, sitting on a white background. The cat appears to be a Japanese cat, as it is wearing a traditional Japanese hat called a "bunny hat." The cat's expression is calm and relaxed, giving off a sense of tranquility and peace. The background is white, which helps to emphasize the cat's features and the overall mood of the image. The image is aesthetically pleasing and evokes a sense of warmth and comfort.
introduction_ja: 画像は、白い背景に座っている帽子をかぶった猫のアップである。日本の伝統的な帽子である "うさぎ帽子 "をかぶっているので、この猫は日本猫のようだ。猫の表情は穏やかでリラックスしており、静けさと平和を感じさせる。背景は白で、猫の特徴と画像全体の雰囲気を強調している。この画像は美的に美しく、暖かさと安らぎを感じさせる。
artistString: トラボルタ feat. 巡音ルカ
lyrics.ja.value:
あなたの事が好きです。　ウソです。
だけどほんとは　んんんんん～
あなたの事が嫌いです。　ウソです。
だってほんとは　んんんんん～

素直になれない　勇気が足りなくて
ウソついてばっか　猫かぶり
いつの間にか　私の中にいる
えっと、えっとね　エットエト

大事な事伝えるのが苦手な　トエト
おとなしくて　恥ずかしがり屋さんな　トエト
隠れているの

ほんとの気持ちを伝えたいけど
もじもじトエトがそれを拒む
ここぞと言う時　いざと言う時
えっとえっと、あのえっと、アノエットエト

顔真っ赤　トエト
えっとえっとせとら

ゴメンネとナミダ流し
私のせいでと　トエト

そんな事無いよ　泣かないでトエト
そんなあなたが大好きよ

ほんとの気持ちを伝えたいけど
もじもじトエトがそれを拒む
ここぞと言う時　いざと言う時
えっとえっと、あのえっと、アノエットエト

ほんとにほんとに伝えたい時
もじもじトエトも勇気を出す
ここぞと言う時　いざと言う時
えっとえっと、あのえっと、頑張るトエト

私の中の　頑張るトエト
lyrics.en.value:
I like who you are
That is a lie
Though, the truth is
Mmmmm

I hate who you are
That is a lie
But the truth is
Mmmmm

I can't be honest
I don't have enough courage,
And I just lie a lot,
Wearing a cat hat

Before I know it,
They're within me
Eh, um, eh, hey
Eh, toeto

Bad at conveying important things, is Toeto
Mild-mannered and a shy person, is Toeto
They're hiding

Toeto bashfully rejects that

Eh, um, eh, um, uh, eh, uh, eh Toeto

title: 『KAITO v3』上弦の月『オリジナル曲PV』
introduction: The image features a nighttime scene with a large, brightly lit sign in the background. The sign is written in Japanese, which adds to the overall atmosphere of the image. The sign is illuminated by a bright light, creating a striking contrast against the dark night sky. The presence of the sign and the lighting create a sense of mystery and intrigue, as it is not clear what the sign is advertising or what it represents. The mood of the image is somewhat mysterious and captivating, as the viewer is drawn to the brightly lit sign in the background.
introduction_ja: 明るく照らされた大きな看板を背景に、夜の風景が描かれている。看板は日本語で書かれており、それが画像全体の雰囲気を高めている。看板は明るい光に照らされ、暗い夜空との印象的なコントラストを生み出している。この看板が何を宣伝しているのか、何を表しているのかがはっきりしないため、看板の存在と照明が謎めいた雰囲気を醸し出している。背景の明るく照らされた看板に引き寄せられるように、画像の雰囲気はどこか神秘的で魅惑的である。
artistString: 黒うさP feat. KAITO V3 (Soft)
lyrics.ja.value:
花道を薄く照らして 
寄せ木細工　音を奏でた 
艶やかな　上弦の月 
雲に消えた　傘もないのに

朝がきてそれが春の霜解 (しもど) けの様に 
凍てついた恋がいつか　熱く流れるならば

終わらない雨の中で抱きしめて 
貴方が答えを隠しているのなら 
変わらない声でどうか囁いて 
壊れた心をせめて包んで

傾いた気持ちはやがて 
秘密ばかり増やしてたこと　 
また一つ「変わらないで」と 
頬の紅を崩してたこと

降り続く雨がやがて洗い流した 
鮮やかな色を付けた雪の椿の様に

仮初 (かりそめ) の夢がいつか覚めたなら 
貴方を探して何処へと進むだろう 
ささやかな願い事をしたことも 
見渡す景色も忘れてくだろう

遥か遠く離れて　それはとても儚く 
過去も現在 (いま) も全てを　託していくなら

終わらない雨の中で抱きしめて 
貴方が答えを探しているのなら 
雪椿　紅く染まる花びらに 
今宵を預けて迷い続けた
lyrics.en.value:
Dimly illuminating the wooden platform of the stage
I played notes on the parquetry
The beautiful crescent moon disappears into the clouds, and I don’t have an umbrella

Morning comes, as if it were the thawing of spring
If our frozen love someday flows hot,

Then I’ll embrace you in the endless rain.
If you are hiding away your answer,
Then I’ll somehow whisper to you with my unchanging voice
And at the very least, I’ll wrap up your broken heart

My waning feelings having at last
Grown in size with all the secrets
Saying once again, “don’t change”
And breaking up the rouge on my cheek

But the rain, continuing to fall, at last washed it away,
As if it were a brilliantly coloured camellia flower in the snow

If I someday awaken from this transient dream,
I would search for you, I wonder where I’d head to
The modest wish I’ve made
The scenery I look out on, it seems I’m forgetting them

Far off into the distance, you leave me, that is very fleeting
The past, the present, if I trust in them all,

Then I’ll embrace you in the endless rain
If you are searching for your answer,
Then on the crimson dyed petals of the snow camellias,
I’ll entrust tonight and keep giving in to this temptation

title: 【鏡音リンレン】ぼうけんのしょがきえました！【オリジナル/ワンオポ】
introduction: The background of the image is a green field with trees in the distance. The foreground features two anime characters, one of which is a girl and the other a boy, standing next to each other. They are holding hands and appear to be in a playful mood. The overall mood of the image is lighthearted and joyful, as the characters seem to be enjoying their time together in the green field.
introduction_ja: 背景は緑の野原で、遠くに木々が見える。前景には2人のアニメキャラクターが描かれており、1人は女の子、もう1人は男の子で、隣り合って立っている。ふたりは手をつないでおり、楽しげな雰囲気に見える。キャラクターたちが緑の野原で一緒にいる時間を楽しんでいるように見えるので、画像全体の雰囲気は明るく楽しげだ。
songTitle: ぼうけんのしょがきえました！
artistString: じーざすP feat. 鏡音リン Append (Power), 鏡音レン Append (Power)
lyrics.ja.value:
ぼうけんのしょがきえました！

てくてく歩いてマモノと遭遇
そこそこ強い俺に皆（so good）
世界で一番勇者っぽいぜ　(yeah! yeah!)
余裕じゃんね？

ちょこまか動くな　このゲル野郎
わしとて魔法くらい使えるわ！(えるわ!)
ほれほれ火あぶりの刑じゃ！(ぼう! ぼう!)
燃えてるぜぃ！

教えて王様　あなたはさ、将棋でいうところの王将で
どうしてパーティの一員になる必要があるんですか！

細かいことをきにしすぎ！

おお、神様、今僕に、お告げをください　ください　くださいな
ついでにあのおバカさんの頭をよくして！
世界の平和を求め我らは旅してる
でも、やりましたついに
ぼうけんのしょがきえました！(テヘ)

おいおいなにしてんの？何やった？
何やった？どうしてくれんの？
ノープロブレム　I'm KING　3.2.1..

ホリット　ホリット　ホリットじゃ！

なかなかどうして僕らの旅は
一筋縄ではいかない様子
ある朝起きたら牢屋の中に!? (ろう! や!)
何があった？!

どうやら敵につかまったようじゃ
何かの罠にはめられたようじゃ
ここからでるのは至難の技じゃ！(じゃあ?!じゃあ?!)
どうするよ？

教えて王様　もしかして
ものすごくエンジョイしていますね？
この状況でワクワクできるのはマジ羨ましいかぎりです

あたりまえだぜ！
ハートの導火線に火をつけてくぜ
KING OF ROCK!!

oh..あり得ない展開はまさに想像超える魔法だ
強大な悪に打ち勝てる、そんな力を今！
13の魔法をすべて今、使いこなし
魔王のいるフロアへとすすめ！

おお、神様、今僕に力をください　ください　くださいな
勇者じゃなくてもいいから　立ち向かう勇気を！
世界の平和まであと少しというとこで
またまた、やらかしたよ
ぼうけんのしょがきえました！

oh..信じられない（わしも）
僕の（わしらの）
心は折れそう
lyrics.en.value:
Our adventure log has vanished!

Trudging ahead, fighting monsters up to no good,
I'm pretty strong, so everyone says I'm (so good!)
I'm the most heroish person in the world! (Yeah! Yeah!)
Not exactly hard, right?

Stop fidgeting about, you darn gels!
Myself, I can at least use magic on you! (Can too!)
Come now, I'll punish you by flames! (Boom! Boom!)
Let's burn it up!

Tell me, your majesty, in a game of shogi, you'd be, well, the king piece
So is it really necessary for you to be a party member?!

Hero, you ask too many questions!

Oh, God, give me a revelation now, please, please, oh please,
And while you're at it, there's an idiot here whose head needs fixing!
We're adventuring to assure peace for the world!
But just as we've done it
Your adventure log has vanished (Teehee!)

Whoa, what're you doing? What did you do?
Huh?
What happened? How could this happen?
No problem, I'm king, 3, 2, 1

Holit, holit, holit time!

Far from being easy, our adventure
Looks to need some special effort
Wake up one morning, and we're in prison (Pri! Son!)
What happened?!

Got caught by the enemy, it seems,
Fell for some kind of trap, it seems
Getting out of here will be tough to the extreme! (Yah! Yah!)
What do we do?

Tell me, your majesty, could it be
Are you enjoying all this tremendously?
I'm seriously jealous if you can get excited at a time like this

Hell yeah, of course!
It gets me pumped!
Lights a fuse in my heart, alright!
King of rock!!

In an outrageous twist, there come spells beyond imagination
The power to strike down great evil, give me it right now!
Now let's master all thirteen magic spells
And head onward to the floor where the Dark Lord waits!

Oh, God, give me strength now, please, please, oh please,
Never mind that I'm not a hero, just give me the courage to fight!
Just as we're moments from attaining peace,
It happens once again
Our adventure log has vanished!

Oh, I can't believe it
Me neither
My, our hearts are, going to break

title: 【ボカロ10人】怪盗Fの台本（シナリオ）〜消えたダイヤの謎〜
introduction: The background of this image is a stage with a group of people dressed in black and white costumes, standing in a line. They are all wearing sunglasses, which adds a stylish and mysterious touch to their appearance. The stage is lit by spotlights, creating a dramatic atmosphere. The image is likely taken during a performance or a rehearsal, as the group of people is posing and standing in a line, possibly preparing for a show or a photo shoot. The mood of the image is energetic and exciting, as the performers are dressed in costumes and are posing for the camera.
introduction_ja: 背景はステージで、黒と白の衣装に身を包んだ人々が一列に並んでいる。全員がサングラスをかけており、スタイリッシュでミステリアスな雰囲気を醸し出している。ステージはスポットライトに照らされ、ドラマチックな雰囲気を醸し出している。この画像は、おそらく公演中かリハーサル中に撮影されたもので、ポーズを決めたり一列に並んだりしている。出演者が衣装を着てカメラに向かってポーズをとっているので、画像の雰囲気はエネルギッシュでエキサイティングだ。
songTitle: 怪盗Fの台本 ～消えたダイヤの謎～
artistString: ひとしずくP, やま△ feat. various
lyrics.ja.value:
偶然届いた手紙は　なんと Fantastic!!
大胆不敵な怪盗からの予告状
新米記者は　搭乗ゲートを盗み見ながら
犯人探しに奔走している

オークショニアが忘れものをして？降りていくと
遅刻ぎりぎり？　マイペースな整備士到着
警官同伴？　具合の悪そうなサラリーマンは
通りでマフィアに絡まれてたらしい？

豪華な客船で秘密のオークション
幸福をもたらす伝説のダイヤ
厳重警備の網を鮮やかに掻き乱して
Fantastic な怪盗ショーを　はじめようか

（Are you Ready?）

豪華な Fake に包（くる）んだ Joker が動き出す
完全犯罪迷宮入りのサイは投げられた
全てのカードを揃え　感動の Finale には
Finder 越しの真実を暴いて

マジシャンの余興は　縁起を担いだ？パフォーマンス
開始時刻が僅かに押している？
厳重警戒　ピリピリしている？警官は
荒くれマフィアを睨みつけている？

ワインを零した政治家は　どうやら寝不足気味･･･？
隣の医者が「お薬をどうぞ」と･･･？
おっとりウェイトレス　ワインにシャンパン勧めるも･･･？
女優はウィスキーロックを頼んだ？

今宵の主役がようやくご登場
魅惑の輝きに会場は大興奮
厳重警戒の網は　一分の隙もない
ああ、どう考えても不可能犯罪　はじめようか

（Are you Ready？）

Bid を 8 で刻んで　ハンマーが踊り出す
強欲　財力　醜態痴態　ぶちまけパーティー？
突然、ライトが消えて　停電？　真っ暗な闇の中
ショー開幕の銃声が響いた

10 秒ほどで停電が回復　偶然のトラブル？
銃声はどこから聞こえてきた･･･？　手荷物検査は通れない！
窓ガラスが壊れているみたい･･･？　人が通れるくらい･･･
「誰かが倒れている！」　キャー！
3、2、1、Action!

真紅に染まり倒れふした政治家を介抱している医者の
背後に座る女優がふいに落としたグラスの片付けに
追われるウェイトレスにぶつかったはずみで暴れた鳩を
割れた窓から逃がしてしまい悲しんで取り乱すマジシャンに
ヤジをとばしてからかうマフィアを注意する警官に
ブレーカーのトラブル報告書を持って来た整備士の脇で
虎視眈々とスクープのネタを探す記者の
足下に転がっている弾丸は誰が何のために何を撃ったのか？
とダレカがつぶやいたその時
終幕を告げるオークショニアの悲鳴が轟いた

（OH REALLY）

幸福のダイヤが消えて　会場は大混乱
厳戒態勢　犯人探し　1人行方不明　なんだってー？！
窓を壊して甲板へ？　海へ飛び込んだのか？
不気味に漂うシルクハット･･･

容疑者もダイヤも消えて　真実は闇の中
完全犯罪迷宮入りのショーはこれで終わり
さあ、もうカードは揃った　感動の Finale には
最前列で全てを見てた君が　導いて？
lyrics.en.value:
A letter that arrived by chance - how Fantastic!!
A preliminary notice from an audacious phantom thief
As the newbie journalist spies the boarding gate,
She runs about in search of the criminal...

Did the auctioneer forget something? When he steps off board -
Just barely on time? The mechanic arrives at her own pace
The police are coming aboard? And that sick-looking businessman...
It seems he got involved with the mafia behind him?

A secret auction aboard a gorgeous passenger ship,
For a legendary diamond that brings happiness
Let the tight web of security be brilliantly disrupted
Onto the Fantastic phantom's show - shall we begin?

(Are you Ready?)

Concealed in extravagant Fakes, the Joker sets into motion
The die of a perfect, unsolved crime is cast
Get all the cards in order, and in the moving Finale,
Let the truth be exposed through my Finder!

The magician's sideshow; does her performance carry an omen?
Is the starting time being slightly pressed?
The police - is she tense with rigorous caution?
Is she glaring at that rowdy mafia?

The politician spills his wine - might he be lacking sleep...?
The doctor beside him says "Have your medicine"...?
The gentle waitress recommends wine with champagne, and...?
The actress asked for whiskey on the rocks?

The star of the night finally debuts
The hall is in uproar over the fascinating sparkle
The net of security has not a single gap;
Ahh, by all means, an impossible crime - shall we begin?

(Are you Ready?)

Eight place their Bids, the hammer dancing
Greed, assets, disgraceful foolishness - a party where all is laid bare?
Suddenly, the lights go out - power outage? In the total darkness,
A gunshot echoed to raise the curtain on the show...

In ten seconds, the power's back - just a random accident?
Where did that gunshot come from...? That wasn't in luggage inspection!
It seems the window glass is broken...? Wide enough for a person...
"Someone's fainted!" Yaaah!
3, 2, 1, Action!

Tending to the fallen politician dyed scarlet is the doctor,
Behind her the actress suddenly drops a glass, cleaned up
By the waitress who in the spur of the moment, sends flapping doves
Fleeing out the cracked window, away from the mourning, distracted magician,
At whom the teasing mafia jeers, under the police's watchful eye,
To which the mechanic holding a report for the breaker trouble comes,
And beside her, the journalist stands on alert for info for a scoop,
With a bullet at her feet - now who shot it, at what, and for what?
Just as someone whispered the question,
The auctioneer's shriek roared to tell the end -

(OH REALLY)

The Diamond of Happiness gone, the hall is chaos
The guards search for the culprit, one person unaccounted for - Say what?!
Broke the window, jumped out on the deck? Dove into the sea?
An eeriely-drifting silk hat...

The suspect and diamond gone, the truth is in darkness
This ends the show of the perfect, unsolved crime
Now, the cards are all in order, so to the moving Finale,
Will you who saw it with a front row seat show the way?

title: 【初音ミク】 セイデンキニンゲン 【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features a young girl with a pink dress and a blue bow in her hair. She is standing in front of a black background, which creates a contrasting effect. The girl is holding a cell phone in her hand, which is a common sight in today's society. The background and the girl's pose create a sense of mystery and intrigue, as the viewer is left wondering about the girl's intentions or the context of the scene. The mood of the image is somewhat ambiguous, as it could be interpreted as a casual or artistic snapshot, or it could be part of a larger narrative or story.
introduction_ja: ピンクのドレスに青いリボンをつけた少女。彼女は黒い背景の前に立っており、コントラスト効果を生み出している。少女は手に携帯電話を持っているが、これは現代社会ではよく見られる光景である。背景と少女のポーズが謎と陰謀を醸し出し、見る者は少女の意図やこの場面の背景を想像することになる。何気ない、あるいは芸術的なスナップショットと解釈することもできるし、より大きな物語やストーリーの一部と解釈することもできる。
artistString: かいりきベア feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
ぐるぐるりって渦巻いた　罵声　多勢　無勢になって
ぐちゃぐちゃ言って汚してく　ぱっぱっぱーのぱっぱっぱぱ
キズつくるのが怖くて　多分　身分　自分守って
バチバチ鳴って突き離す　僕に入って来ないでって

ぞろぞろりって群がった　威勢　加勢　怒声になって
ケラケラ言って貶してく　ぱっぱっぱーのぱっぱっぱぱ
笑われるのが怖くて　意見　危険　世間に病んで　
バチバチ鳴って振り解く　気安く触らないでよって

猫もカラスも　一斉　遠のいて
暗がりの中　お望み通りのヒトリキリ

つよがって　つよがって　つよがっちゃって痛いんだ
接する度に　チクチクと痺れる指先　
触れたくて　触れたくて　触れたくたって触れられない
弱虫毛虫の僕には　資格も○（まる）もない　ない　ない


ふらふらりって背伸びして　危害　阻害　被害にあって
逃げたいなって震えてる　ぱっぱっぱーのぱっぱっぱぱ
嫌われるのが怖くて　眩暈　仕舞い　病になって
バチバチ鳴ってやり過ごす　僕に構わないでよって

どれもこれも　全般　嫌になったって
救いも無くて　ご覧の通りのヒトリキリ


つよがって　つよがって　つよがっちゃって笑うんだ
触れ合う度に　チクチクと痛んだ指先　
消えたくて　消えたくて　消えたくたって消えられない
未来（あす）切り捨てた僕には　資格も×（ばつ）もない　ない　ない


つよがって　つよがって　つよがっちゃって　泣いてんだ
離れる度に　チクチクと胸が痛いよ
生きたくて　生きたくて　生きたくたって息できない
涙もマヒした僕には　居場所も何もない　ない　ない

ヒトリが好きな僕には　心も何もない　ない　ない
lyrics.en.value:
Within this hodgepodge of jeering,
it’s me against the whole world.
They just whine and whine, spoiling everything.
Pa pa pa pa pa pa pa
I’m terrified of getting hurt.
I guess I’m just trying to protect myself.
Thus I bristle, as if with electric, to push everyone away.
“Don’t get close to me,” I seem to say.

One after another, they flock together—
a great force, reinforced. There’s much anger and shouting.
In their shrill voices, they laugh and make fun of everything.
Pa pa pa pa pa pa pa
I’m terrified of being laughed at.
Opinions are dangerous. This whole world makes me ill at ease.
Thus I bristle, as if with electric, to shake free of everything.
“Don’t touch me like you know me,” I seem to say.

The cats and the crows,
they all stay away from me.
In the dark,
I’m completely by myself, just as I wanted.

I try to be strong, try to be strong,
try to be strong, but it just hurts.
Whenever I come in contact with something,
there’d be a prickling numbness at my fingertips.
I want to touch, want to touch,
want to touch others, but I can’t.
I’m just a coward, a pest. For me,
there’s no accomplishment, no “right answer,” nothing.

Unsteadily, I try to push myself to the limit,
only to find myself endangered, hindered, injured.
I just want to flee, I think as I shake in fear.
Pa pa pa pa pa pa pa
I’m terrified of being disliked.
It clouds my eyes, and in the end, it turns into a malady.
Thus I bristle, as if with electric, to get through life.
“Just don’t mind me,” I seem to say.

Even if I become fed up
with anything and everything,
there’s simply no hope for me.
As you can see, I’ve ended up all on my own.

I try to be strong, try to be strong,
try to be strong, and I try to laugh.
But whenever I touch someone,
there’d be a prickling pain at my fingertips.
I just want to disappear, to disappear,
to disappear, but I can’t.
I’ve thrown away my future. For me,
there’s no accomplishment, no “wrong answer,” nothing.

I try to be strong, try to be strong,
try to be strong, but I’m crying.
Whenever someone leaves me,
there’d be a prickling pain in my heart.
I want to live, want to live,
want to live, but I can’t breathe.
I’ve grown numb, even to tears.
There’s no place I belong, nowhere, nothing.

I just love being on my own;
I have no heart, nothing, absolutely nothing.

lyrics.en.value:
The Crispiness. The sweet fragrance. 
The meringue. The foot. 
In its ruffled dress grown out of it, 
it dances seductively. 
When rose and chocolate are mixed 
into the batter, they melt into an angel. 
Glittering and sparkling! Ding-dong! 
It's a march of marbles! 
Enclosed in a small box with all kinds of colors, 
they're shaped round and plump. 
Your excitement will start to elevate, 
and your heart will race in this paradise of perfect circles.

I will take a dip in your mouth, 
as my egg white sways in the moonlit night. 
To complete the finale of my life, 
please chew me up with your teeth. 
With zero regret, 
I fly towards the tens of thousands of your taste buds, 
to reach that paradise. 
So tonight, too, please eat as much as you want.

lyrics.en.value:
Lines intersect, I dress up with all the things I love
That’s right, as always, this is an identity I’ll never yield

Circles overlap and deepen, perhaps more face to face
Hey, since when have I been unable to overcome this minority?

I can’t proceed, but even faced with this dead end,
If I want to connect with you, then I can’t part with my secret

If we had made this world that composes our existence of being charmed by each other ring out,
Hey, could we stay this way, just like this?
Obstructed by faint expectations, I plug my ears and make a vague face of feigned indifference
If we could've stayed connected, just like this

Would it have hurt, or would I have wanted to stay?

Even if I fumble around for them and reel them close,
Once again, the threads of my feelings tangle up
You know, having given up, I've always kept this distance

Even though this is a starting point with no end,
I want to connect with you, so I won’t part with my secret

If we had made this world that pictures our existence of fatefully meeting each other ring out,
Hey, could we stay this way, just like this?
At a loss, we play hide and seek, a melancholy of losing our way and intermingling
If we could've stayed connected, just like this

I stitch it, I knit it, and patch it back together, what can I do?
I can cut myself off, smile, put distance between us,
and I'll still be able to smile. I'll be able to smile, but

The boundaries have begun to blur, the future uncertain
If I had conveyed that, then we wouldn't, we wouldn't have been able to

If we had made this world that reflects our existence of feeling for each other ring out,
Hey, could we stay this way, just like this?
Obstructed by faint expectations, I plug my ears and make a vague face of feigned indifference
If we could stay connected, just like this

Would it hurt, or would I want to stay?

title: 【鏡音リン・レン】 レッド・パージ！！！ 【オリジナルMV】
introduction: The image depicts a dining room with a long table and chairs, which is decorated with various objects, such as candles, vases, and a clock. The room is dimly lit, creating a mysterious and intriguing atmosphere. The presence of candles and vases suggests that the room might be used for special occasions or events, such as a dinner party or a romantic evening. The dim lighting and the arrangement of the objects create a sense of mystery and intrigue, inviting the viewer to explore the room and its contents further. The mood of the image is one of curiosity and intrigue, as the viewer is drawn to the objects and the dimly lit room.
introduction_ja: 長いテーブルと椅子が置かれ、キャンドルや花瓶、時計などさまざまなオブジェが飾られたダイニングルーム。部屋は薄暗く、神秘的で興味をそそる雰囲気を醸し出している。キャンドルや花瓶があることから、この部屋はディナーパーティーやロマンチックな夜など、特別な日やイベントに使われるのかもしれない。薄暗い照明とオブジェの配置が謎めいた雰囲気を醸し出し、見る者を部屋とその中身をさらに探検するように誘う。見る人がオブジェと薄暗い部屋に引き寄せられるように、画像のムードは好奇心と陰謀のひとつである。

lyrics.en.value:
Shoot the red possessed by illusion!
The view of people acting paranoid is painful to watch
Even if the falling flowers pretend to be cherry blossoms

Fanatics without own will, logic without knowledge
The new heretics refuted by reality

They live and die by the agitation

Marching with no doubts, accelerating with no clutch
Insanity is colored in ultramarine
Their futures are bleak, but look bright in their heads
You can tell how educated they are

(Democracy of the lower classes)
Will fall apart when the wind blows

title: 金星のダンス / 初音ミク
introduction: The background of this image is a green screen, which is a popular choice for creating special effects and backgrounds in video and film production. The image features a young man standing in front of the green screen, holding a sign that says "Konichiwa" in Japanese. The mood of the image is lighthearted and playful, as the man is smiling and holding the sign, which suggests a friendly and welcoming atmosphere. The green screen background allows for easy editing and manipulation of the image, making it suitable for various creative projects.
introduction_ja: この画像の背景はグリーン・スクリーンである。グリーン・スクリーンは、ビデオや映画の制作において、特殊効果や背景を作り出すためによく使われる。グリーンスクリーンの前に立つ若い男性が、日本語で「コンニチハ」と書かれた看板を持っている。男性が笑顔で看板を持っていることから、画像の雰囲気は明るく遊び心があり、親しみやすく歓迎的な雰囲気を暗示しています。背景がグリーンスクリーンなので、画像の編集や加工が簡単にでき、さまざまなクリエイティブなプロジェクトに適しています。
artistString: ナユタン星人 feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:

introduction: The background of the image is a blue sky with clouds, creating a serene and peaceful atmosphere. The foreground features a young girl walking down a path, possibly in a park or a similar outdoor setting. The girl is wearing a blue dress, which adds to the overall blue and white color scheme of the image. The mood of the image is calm and tranquil, with the girl walking down the path and the blue sky above.
