さよなら、とうとう道理に
愛も何もかなわないな
木っ端微塵、崩れ落ちた
いつかのハート

季節がまた咲いて
醜い解答ができた
大人になって割り切って
信じない愛さない
また、どこかで会えたなら
上手く上手く笑って
もう痛みは無いと知ってしまうよ
下らない味気ない愛ね
lyrics.en.value:
You should already know, over and over
Your "hey, give me love" is just asking for something nonexistent
Still, you dare ask that with no sense of shame
This drives me crazy

I was used, mercilessly
This rotten relationship truly sickens me
Tried my best, adjusted myself, just to plant roots in your heart
Still, they eventually withered up

Stains ingrained in the deepest components of your brain, throw it all up
Throw it away as a piece of beautiful memory
Before all those ridiculous promises scorch into your memories,
Let's wrap it in tissue and bid it goodbye

Don't say something like "thank you"
It's pointless to decorate your words
Just give me back the life I gave you
What a pity
Along with your "goodbye,"
I can't love anyone anymore
Smashed into pieces, someone's heart tumbled down

Ugh, there's nothing more annoying than this
An empty head bloomed with blossoms
Let's get into the rhythm and clap our hands
Blatantly, I mean no harm

Ugh, there's nothing more annoying than this
An empty head bloomed with blossoms
Let's get into the rhythm and clap our hands
Blatantly, I mean no harm

Don't say something like "thank you"
Just give me an excitement to choke on
Fulfill me on our anniversary today,
I say "congratulations"
Along with your "goodbye,"
I can't trust anyone, nor him anymore
Smashed into pieces, the finale of the two tumbled down

You tore my heart apart and danced on it
Oh, how well-mannered you are
Even love got crushed apart

Where have you dropped your human heart?
I'll pick it up for you
I live on, always recalling our times together
I'm not your toy

Don't say something like "thank you"
I'll trace your voice and repaint it
The smile I love shall fade away with
The departed sceneries
Goodbye, love, not a thing stands to reason
Smashed into pieces, the heart that day tumbled down

As the seasons shift and drift,
An ugly solution came up
Having grown up, I've learnt to cut things clear
Just don't trust, don't love

If I meet you again somewhere,
I'll smile smoothly, smoothly
And realize there's no pain anymore
What a pointless, tasteless love

title: 【初音ミク(とく)】ARiA【オリジナル曲PV】
introduction: The background of the image is a dark and gloomy environment, with a black and blue color scheme. The main focus of the image is a young woman with long, blue hair, who is wearing a blue dress. She is standing in front of a black wall, which adds to the overall dark and mysterious atmosphere of the scene. The woman appears to be looking down, possibly contemplating something or lost in thought. The mood of the image is somewhat melancholic, as the dark and gloomy background suggests a sense of sadness or longing. The woman's gaze and the dark setting create a sense of introspection and solitude.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景は黒と青を基調とした暗く陰鬱な環境。画像のメイン・フォーカスは、青いドレスを着た青く長い髪の若い女性。彼女は黒い壁の前に立っており、それがシーン全体の暗くミステリアスな雰囲気を高めている。女性は下を向いているように見え、おそらく何かを思案しているか、物思いにふけっているのだろう。暗く陰鬱な背景が悲しみや憧れを連想させるため、画像の雰囲気はややメランコリックだ。女性の視線と暗い背景が、内省と孤独の感覚を生み出している。
artistString: とくP feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
子供の頃に　いつも見ていた 
窓に映った　光の行方

遥か遠くの　遥か未来の 
昔話で　彩る天体 (せかい)

無数の星の　トンネル抜けて 
走り続ける　レールの音は

どこで出会うの　どこへ向かうの 
ふと見上げたら　君のぬくもり

星空またたく　思い出奏でた宙 (そら)
君と出会い　言葉さえ色あせた

星くずが紡ぎ出す　アリア 
届けて　このメロディーを 
君と描いてた　想いを繋いで

溢れ出すこの気持ち　刹那 
瞬く流星のように 
抱いて貫いて　あなたの胸に　つつまれて…

ため息一つ　月が回るわ 
忘れかけてた　幼い言葉

誰かの涙　誰を嘆くの 
裏切られても　気づかないフリ

空飛ぶ魔法とか　信じて夢見た頃 
集めた星図 (ちず) 神話さえ色あせた

走り出すこの思い　アリア 
続けて　このメロディーを 
きっと　意気地無し　足跡おざなり

響きだすあの譜面　彼方 
一粒　波紋のように 
君に逢えるなら　奇跡さえも　ユニゾン (みかた) にして…

気づけばほら　無重力に　うかぶ涙 
闇の中　キラリ　隠せないまま

うばたまの夢で逢う 
君の横顔　まだ気づかない 
やめて　意地悪なキスならいらない

走り出すこの思い 
宙（そら）は永遠　今手を伸ばす 
君にあえるなら奇跡さえも　味方にして

星くずが紡ぎ出す　アリア 
銀河の　どこを旅する (ながれる)?
いつか　手の届く星ならおしえて

光無き　この星に　いつか 
ひとすじ　彗星のように 
夜を突き抜けて　わたしの星 (もと) へ　逢いに来て…
lyrics.en.value:
When I was a child, I use to always look
at the lights reflected in the window and wonder where they were going

Far from here, in the distant future
There's a colorful world filled with legends

Through the tunnel of countless stars
The rail's sound keeps going

Where shall we meet? Where shall we go?
When I inadvertently gaze upon you, I feel your warmth

The starry sky twinkles, bringing back old memories
After knowing you, even words lose their colors

Stardust weaved aria
Please deliver this melody for me
Let it link the feelings we dreamed of

At that moment these feelings began overflowing
Like shooting stars
Hold me and penetrate me, as you wrap me in your arms

As I sigh, the moon goes around
I forgot the words spoken from our childhood

I see someone crying but who should I feel sad for?
Though I'm betrayed I pretend not to notice

Those days I still believed things like magical flight
But even my star maps have lost their colors

This feeling makes me want to run, aria
Keep this melody going
Without doubt or pride, follow those thoughtless footprints

That melody starts flowing in the distance
Like a ripple
If you are with me, we can even achieve miracles in unison

achieve unison, achieve unison

Open your eyes and see the tears floating in space
In this darkness I can't hide my shimmering tears

In a dark dream I met you
but I didn't recognize you
Stop, I don't want a kiss on the cheek but on my lips

This feeling in the air makes me want to run
I try to reach the eternal universe
If you are with me, we can even achieve miracles together

Stardust weaved aria
Where shall we travel to in this galaxy?
If you could reach the stars someday, please tell me

I'll be on this extinguished star, one day
As if a blind comet
Please pierce the night, to reach my star and meet me there

and meet me there, and meet me there

title: がくぽに鬼畜眼鏡を歌ってもらった(full ver.)
introduction: The image features a man with a black tie and a blue shirt, wearing glasses and a black hat. He is looking at the camera, and his expression is serious. The background is dark, creating a sense of mystery and intrigue. The overall mood of the image is serious and thoughtful, with the man's gaze and the dark background conveying a sense of depth and introspection.
introduction_ja: 黒いネクタイに青いシャツ、眼鏡をかけ、黒い帽子をかぶった男性。カメラ目線で、表情は真剣そのもの。背景は暗く、謎と陰謀を感じさせる。画像全体の雰囲気は真剣で思慮深く、男性の視線と暗い背景が深さと内省的な感覚を伝えている。
artistString: 黒糖ポッキーP feat. 神威がくぽ

title: 【初音ミク】↑人生ゲーム↓【オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a woman sitting on a throne, wearing a crown and holding a sword. She is surrounded by a large number of books, which are piled up around her. The scene appears to be a fantasy-themed setting, with the woman possibly representing a powerful or regal figure. The presence of the books suggests that she is knowledgeable and well-read, which adds to the overall mood of the image. The woman's position on the throne and the books around her create a sense of authority and power, while the sword in her hand hints at her strength and readiness to defend her position. The image conveys a sense of intrigue and mystery, as the viewer wonders about the story behind the woman and her throne.
introduction_ja: 王座に座り、王冠をかぶり、剣を持った女性が描かれている。彼女の周りにはたくさんの本が積まれている。この場面はファンタジーをテーマとした設定のようで、女性はおそらく権力者か威厳のある人物を表しているのだろう。本の存在は、彼女が博識で読書家であることを示唆しており、それが画像全体の雰囲気を高めている。玉座に座る女性の位置と周囲の本が権威と権力の感覚を作り出し、手に持つ剣が彼女の強さと地位を守る覚悟をほのめかしている。見る者は、この女性と玉座の背後にある物語を知りたくなる。

lyrics.en.value:
My first life was of tedium 
My second life allowed me to do all I wished 
My third life was as a dreadful man 
My fourth life was as a blind pianist 

My fifth life was as a feminist 
My sixth life was rife with corruption 
My seventh life was as a mourning woman 
My eighth life was as a millionaire 

A game played by the fickle God, 
A game people call their lifetimes, 
Grinding forward along pre-laid rails 

The game of life binds us all, 
Puppeting us with invisible strings 
God gazes on the spectacle, 
And the dice roll

My ninth life was as a cartoonist 
My tenth life was as a teacher-slash-****phile 
My eleventh life was
Something too gruesome to even look at 

The dice punish me again, 
Determining my day, and every day repeating itself over

Tiring and endless is the game of life, 
Everything occurring at God's whims 
Claiming the likes of fate in light of that
It's sheer comedy! 

Happiness and sorrow? 
Merely choices decided by a one in six 
What number awaits next? 

The game of life binds us all, puppeting us with invisible strings 
God gazes on the spectacle, and the dice roll

Grinning, he tosses the dice 
Trickery, deceit, he cares not 
For people revere him as their god
Ah, how laughable it is! 
Ah, how laughable it is

Make it! Wave, groan and clamor the whistle is the determiner, completely "pretending it hurts"
Go to the future! For eternity or something, abandoning it a breakthrough parade

Easy! maintaining this shadow sensing a faint noise within range, no night
I desire it so I won't let it be denied, I've polished my flawless mask perfectly, right?

lyrics.en.value:
"I love you." "I love you." "I love you." "I love you."
"I love you." "I love you." "I love you." That's all that I want.

This snow that landed on my finger, it remains unmelting
"Your heart's a metal plate," said someone, somewhere, laughing.

This scene I see, distorted as can be

Oh, but this hand, oh, but this hand, upon that cheek of yours
cannot so much as touch at all.
If that is so, if that is so, what am I to do?
How can I protect that smile?

"I love you." "I love you." "I love you." "I love you."
"I love you." "I love you." "I love you." That's all that I want.

If causing pain is all that's left to me,
all those that keep pushing you around,
with these hands, I'll slice them up, that's what I'll do

This is it, this is why I was born

Oh, but these hands, oh, but these hands, scared away everyone
Even the ones who sneered are far from here
But even still, but even still, God just tell me why?
Before I realized, I was all alone.

Fight on! Fight on! In that very same smile,
believe! Fight on! Fight on! But even still...

Gently, dazzlingly, and warmly something has
looked past these hands and shown to me...
More than anyone, more than anything, I was so weak
Never again will I raise a hand to hurt

Oh, but this hand, oh, but this hand upon that cheek of yours,
I feel as though can reach you now.
One more time, one more time, if we ever meet again...

"I love you." "I love you." "I love you." "I love you."
"I love you." "I love you." "I love you." I can say it to you.

title: 【初音ミク・GUMI】　少女ケシゴム　【オリジナル】
introduction: The image is a black and white photograph of a white circle with a black X inside it. The circle is positioned in the center of the image, and the X is located in the upper-left corner. The overall mood of the image is minimalistic and simple, with a focus on the circle and the X. The image could be interpreted as a representation of a game controller, a symbol, or a design element. The black and white color scheme adds to the simplicity and focus on the circle and X, creating a visually striking and abstract composition.
introduction_ja: 画像は、白い円の中に黒いXが描かれた白黒写真である。円は画像の中央に位置し、Xは左上隅にある。画像全体の雰囲気はミニマルでシンプルであり、円とXに焦点が当てられている。この画像はゲームのコントローラーを表現しているとも、シンボルとも、デザイン要素とも解釈できる。黒と白の配色がシンプルさと円とXへのフォーカスをさらに引き立て、視覚的に印象的で抽象的な構図を作り出している。

lyrics.en.value:
Starting to say something, only to stop short
it’s still the same as ever, with us two going around in circles,
and both of us acting as if we don’t notice that.
As always, we keep pretending nothing’s wrong
Losing an argument, or winning one
out of nowhere, I’d conjure up this storm of a quarrel,
only to grovel my way back into your good graces,
making a real spectacle of myself, you know!

I don’t know when it started, but it seems like
this little heart of mine has been screaming out nonstop.
“Just give me a break already,” it says
But before it gives out, let’s entangle ourselves in a mess and shed some happy tears!
This is just a small act of defiance, to show our discontent
against the kind of norms dictated by “common sense” and whatnot.
Before we resign ourselves to it and allow a: “Indeed, you’re right,” shall we just admit defeat and make a quick run for it?

There we go, brought to a stand still again.
Unable to tell what’s right, and what’s wrong.
“Serves you right,” they say.
What a brutal world we live in, indeed!

Looks like we’ve been driven into a corner.
They’re expressing quite a bit of disgust for us.
The flashlight is going on nonstop.
Look, it’s as if they’re applauding, how stupid
Maybe, we can just indulge in our short-lived erotomania,
letting our whole vision be blotted out in a wall of white!
And then let’s do something sinful together?

Trying to find the right wording, only to retort sharply.
No surprise there, just the two of us, with the foothold we’ve found
upon verifying for ourselves that cold, frozen current,
and the future we promised each other is simply full of disappointments
Endlessly trying to keep it tight, only to unravel it.
Just an extension of the kind of personal protest you could find anywhere.
Before you plan to cut in with something like: “No, you see”, shall we try just a tiny bit to keep this promise, hmm?

It’s the kind of standpoint that completely misses the mark.
Like you’d just let it fly by, upon the point of contact.
“Jump down from there,” they say?!
This world is such a joke, aaaaargh.

For such a doubtful and arbitrary reason,
here comes the spectacle everyone’s been waiting for.
The flashlight is going on nonstop.
Look, it’s as if they’re applauding, how stupid
Our memories are going to end here.
“Before we splatter ourselves all over the place,
won’t you give me one last kiss?”

Eternal freedom. / A sweet anguish.
Desiring each other, / When it comes to light,
we go on about love and whatnot. / everyone certainly has a lot to say.
Thus we dream a hopeless dream,
the two of us / clinging to each other in our embrace,
and with everything remaining unchanged, / and before we could find an answer,
we’ve completely exhausted ourselves.

Hurling words at each other, trying to avoid the word “hate,”
we close our eyes, we fake a smile,
trying to find the right words, emptying our hearts,
going out of our way to turn out future into hell.

It’s like a case of trying to find the misunderstandings.
Looks like it’s simply too much to bear,
and just going with whatever’s at hand doesn’t seem to work out,
doesn’t seem to work out, indeed
All our feelings of love shall be gone,
but let me hear this emotionally-charged “manifesto” you’ve come up with
during this last moment!

Looks like we’ve been driven into a corner.

Maybe, we should just burn our retinas until they’re veiled in black,
and fill our brains with happy thoughts!
Like a resolution for the sensations we had
of moving in different directions all the time,
the scenery from upside-down is so

lyrics.en.value:
Distracted by the information spread before your eyes
Are you sure you haven't lost sight of the thing most important to you?

When someone says they like you, the world changes hue
So you dodge and deny it, why are you crying?

If what you sought despite your fear
is the real answer, let's go find it!

I'm watching you, I'm grabbing tight
My eyes won't let you go, the feelings we hold in our hands

To make you smile, even a little
I told you in a trembling voice
About this miracle I call a love song

You ran out without knowing you'd been swallowed up
Aren't you forgetting that treasure inside you?

Even though you know this emotion is programmed
And can never be tangible, why can't you tell me how you feel?

Critical thinking will only get you down
But if I could become your one and only hope

I see you, I'm holding you close
Kissing your tear lined cheek, the joy on your blushing face

When you lost yourself in that one moment
You looked the best
I'm the only one who sees it

Take this love song

I'm watching you, I'm grabbing tight

introduction: The image depicts a night scene with a man floating in the air, surrounded by a multitude of colorful balloons. The balloons are arranged in various shapes and sizes, creating a visually appealing and dreamy atmosphere. The man appears to be in a state of relaxation and tranquility, as he floats effortlessly among the balloons. The image conveys a sense of peace and serenity, as the man is suspended in the air, surrounded by the vibrant colors and shapes of the balloons. The mood of the image is one of calmness and tranquility, as the man seems to be at one with his surroundings.

title: 【合わせてみた】パラジクロロベンゼン×アンチクロロベンゼン
introduction: The image shows a black background with a red cross in the center. The cross is surrounded by a white border, which creates a contrasting effect. The overall mood of the image is solemn and solemn, as the red cross is a symbol of Christianity and its associated religious beliefs. The black background and the white border around the cross contribute to the solemn atmosphere, as they create a sense of depth and focus on the central symbol. The image may evoke feelings of reflection, contemplation, and reverence for the Christian faith.
introduction_ja: 黒い背景に赤い十字架が中央に描かれている。十字架は白い縁取りで囲まれており、コントラスト効果を生み出している。赤い十字架がキリスト教とそれに関連する宗教的信念の象徴であることから、画像全体の雰囲気は厳粛で荘厳である。黒い背景と十字架を囲む白い縁取りは、奥行き感を生み出し、中心のシンボルに焦点を合わせるので、厳粛な雰囲気に貢献している。このイメージは、内省、熟考、キリスト教信仰への畏敬の念を呼び起こすかもしれない。
songTitle: パラジクロロベンゼン×アンチクロロベンゼン
artistString: sup feat. 鏡音レン, 鏡音リン

title: エゴイスト/flower
introduction: The image features a young woman sitting on a couch, surrounded by various objects, including a TV, a chair, and a table. The woman is wearing a black dress, which adds a sense of elegance and sophistication to the scene. The background of the image is a black wall, which creates a contrast with the woman's dress and the other objects in the room.The mood of the image is somewhat mysterious and intriguing, as the woman's presence and the objects in the room create an atmosphere of curiosity and introspection. The woman's attire and the objects in the room suggest a sense of style and aesthetics, which adds to the overall ambiance of the image.
introduction_ja: 若い女性がソファに座り、テレビ、椅子、テーブルなどさまざまなものに囲まれている。女性は黒いドレスを着ており、このシーンにエレガンスと洗練の雰囲気を添えている。画像の背景は黒い壁で、女性のドレスや部屋にある他のオブジェとのコントラストを生み出している。女性の存在と部屋にあるオブジェが好奇心と内省的な雰囲気を醸し出しているため、画像の雰囲気はややミステリアスで興味をそそる。女性の服装と部屋のオブジェは、スタイルと美意識のセンスを示唆しており、それが画像全体の雰囲気を高めている。

title: DECO*27 - ラブドール feat. GUMI
introduction: The background of the image is a black and white photo of a woman with a red eye. The woman's face is covered in black and white makeup, giving her a unique and striking appearance. The image is set against a black background, which adds to the overall moodiness and contrast of the scene. The woman's expression is unreadable, as her eyes are covered by the red eye. The overall mood of the image is mysterious and intriguing, with a hint of sadness or melancholy. The output of the image is a black and white photo, which further emphasizes the contrast and mood of the scene.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景は赤い目をした女性の白黒写真。女性の顔は黒と白の化粧で覆われ、ユニークで印象的な外観を与えている。この画像は黒い背景に置かれており、シーン全体のムードとコントラストを高めている。女性の目は赤い目で覆われているため、表情は読めない。画像全体の雰囲気は、ミステリアスで興味をそそるもので、ほのかな悲しみや憂いを感じさせる。画像の出力はモノクロ写真であり、これがシーンのコントラストと雰囲気をさらに強調している。
artistString: DECO*27 feat. GUMI
lyrics.ja.value:

ありもしない妄想を並べ　君は僕の中、未だ生きてる

ヤイヤイ声を枯らしても　もうどこにも君の穴はナイナイ
アンアン喘 (あえ) ぐその声を　ねぇもう一度聞かせてくれないか
「さらば僕の、僕を愛し、僕が愛した人」
lyrics.en.value:
The face and heart for which something seems quite distasteful
even while they refuse to disappear
they're the source of countless wild delusions
as you continue to live on inside me

The face and heart for which something seems quite distasteful,
having finally become so dear to me,
well it's a bit late for that,
but it doesn't stop me from wanting to have you all to myself

"I'll always love you", "let's never be apart"
Those thoughts and words continue twisting and warping me so cruelly as I gaze on towards your sleeping figure

Making my voice go hoarse shouting. hey!, hey!,
it seems like that "hole" of yours is no longer anywhere to be found
Will you let me hear
that panting voice of yours just one more time?
"Farewell, beloved person"

And right in the center of all that unpleasantness and hostility,
I can be found as well
if I close my eyes, look!
it's like "oh, you are here!", not

"I love you so much I could die", ah, what foolishness
It's like I'm about to melt into a puddle as I lay here holding you in your sleep

I tried to hold you and you came apart at the seams,
apparently I have no clue how you are put together
This aching heart filled with pain
keeps calling your name

Making my voice go hoarse shouting, hey!, hey!,
it seems like that "hole" of yours is no longer anywhere to be found
Will you let me hear
that panting voice of yours just one more time?
"Farewell to you, my beloved, the one who I loved and who loved me"

title: 初恋の絵本／HoneyWorks feat.GUMI　┗|∵|┓
introduction: The image depicts a young couple sitting together in a classroom, with the man holding a pencil and the woman holding a book. They are sitting in front of a chalkboard, which has a heart drawn on it. The chalkboard is filled with various writing, including a heart shape, and the couple is looking at the heart-shaped drawing.The mood of the image is romantic and intimate, as the couple is sitting close to each other and sharing a moment in the classroom. The heart-shaped drawing on the chalkboard adds a touch of love and affection to the scene, making it a sweet and endearing moment between the couple.
introduction_ja: 若いカップルが教室で一緒に座り、男性は鉛筆を、女性は本を持っている。二人はハートが描かれた黒板の前に座っている。黒板にはハートの形を含む様々な文字が書かれており、カップルはハート型の絵を見ている。画像の雰囲気はロマンチックで親密なもので、カップルが互いに近くに座り、教室でのひとときを共有している。黒板に描かれたハート型の絵が、このシーンに愛と愛情のタッチを加え、カップルの甘く愛らしい瞬間を演出している。
artistString: Gom, shito, HoneyWorks feat. GUMI

title: 花が落ちたので、／初音ミク
introduction: The background of the image is a green leafy plant, which is the main focus of the image. The plant is growing in a pot, and it is surrounded by a white background. The image is a black and white illustration, which adds to the artistic and nostalgic feel of the scene. The mood of the image is serene and peaceful, as the plant and its surroundings create a calm and natural atmosphere. The output of the image is a black and white illustration, which further emphasizes the artistic and timeless quality of the scene.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景は緑の葉の植物で、これが画像の主役である。植物は鉢の中で育っており、白い背景に囲まれている。画像はモノクロのイラストで、これがこのシーンの芸術的でノスタルジックな雰囲気をさらに高めている。植物とその周囲が穏やかで自然な雰囲気を醸し出しているため、画像の雰囲気は穏やかで平和的です。画像の出力は白黒のイラストで、このシーンの芸術的で時代を超越したクオリティをさらに強調しています。
artistString: 一二三 feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
柔らかな手　透る白肌　振れる声と　鮮やかな表情
恋する僕の　淡い影色　“君の見せる光”の投影

全部見えちゃいないんだろう　盲目的に君を想うよ
君の過去に連なる恋人　僕の胸を締めつけてるんだ

ずっと　ずっと　そんな気持ちがさ
僕の　僕の　頭の隅っこで
ぎゅっと　ぎゅっと　しがみついているから
不意に涙が伝う

いっそ消してしまいたいな　君が恋してた形跡も
誰かと深く絡み合って　染み込んだその痕跡も
見ないフリしたって　過ぎるその光景ばっかりに
僕の知らない君の笑顔があった

君の過去に手を伸ばす僕を「はしたない」と窘めてるのは
「諦め」とか「妥協」で出来た　やけに大人ぶる未来の僕

何度　何度　祈ってみてもさ　きっと　きっと　時は戻らないし
いっそ　いっそ　死んでしまえたら　こんな醜い今の心

なんて

消してしまえたんだ　僕が愚図ってた原因も
誰かを深く恨み始め　溶け込んだその羨望も
変わるフリしたって　過ぎるその感情ばっかりに
僕がよく知る本音がそこにあった

君の心に開いた穴　かつては誰かが住んでたんだって
あゝ　そんな気持ちも　反芻していれば　慣れるのかなぁ

いつか後悔すんだって　君に恋した瞬間を
二人で深く見つめ合って　知ってしまった痕跡を
他人のままずっと　初めから居られたら……なんて

なんで　知ってしまったんだ　君が恋してた形跡も
誰かと深く絡み合って　染み込んだその痕跡も
許すことが僕に　出来たならこの感情だって
大人になれる様な　気がしたんだ

それは正しいのかな　きっと正しいんだろう
それは正しいのかな　それは正しいのかな
lyrics.en.value:
Your soft hands and clear, pale skin
Wavering voice, and pure expression.
The light shadow colour of I, smitten with it all
is a projection of “the light you show me”

Though I’m sure I’m not seeing the whole picture
Blindly, I think of you
All the lovers lined up in your past are constricting around my chest

Forever and ever
Such feelings have been sitting, been sitting in the corner of my mind

Since they’re clinging so tightly, so tightly
Suddenly I find, tears start to run their way down my cheek

I’d like to just go and erase them all
all the evidence that you loved
And for all those permeating traces, that you
Once had deeply connected with someone

Even if I pretend I don’t see them
I know so many smiles of yours that I haven’t seen were in those long past scenes

The person who calls me “vulgar” for reaching my hand out to your past,

Made of “resignation” and “compromise”,
Putting on a mature act, almost frightfully so, is the future me

However many times I pray
I’m pretty sure time can’t be winded back after all

If maybe, maybe I just went and died
This ugly present heart would

I erased them all, the origin of all my grumbles
And that melded jealousy starting to harbor deep grudges, for those past lovers

But even if I pretend I’m changing
I know all those true intentions of mine, 
that I know all too well
Were in those long past feelings.

The hole opened in your heart
Once someone else had dwelled in it, apparently

Ah,
I wonder if I just keep on brooding over these feelings, 
one day, I’ll get used to them

One day I’ll regret it, the moment I fell in love with you
Staring at each other, for a long, long time
If perhaps I had remained forever a stranger,
to those traces, I ended up learning about

As if
Why did I have to go and learn of them?
All the evidence that you loved
And all those permeating traces, that you
Once had deeply connected with someone.

I got a feeling, that if forgiving was something I could do
then maybe even these feelings 
would be able to grow up, just a little

I wonder if that’s the right thing to do
I’m sure it is
I wonder if that’s the right thing to do
I wonder if that’s the right thing to do

title: 初音ミク「闇色アリス」【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features a young woman with long hair, wearing a blue dress and a black hat. She is sitting on a chair, and her head is resting on her hand. The background of the image is dark, creating a moody atmosphere. The woman appears to be in a relaxed and contemplative state, possibly enjoying some quiet time or reflecting on her thoughts. The dark background and the woman's pose contribute to the overall mood of the image, which could be interpreted as a moment of introspection or a peaceful break from the daily routine.
introduction_ja: 青いドレスを着て、黒い帽子をかぶった髪の長い若い女性。彼女は椅子に座り、頭を手の上に置いている。背景は暗く、不機嫌な雰囲気を醸し出している。おそらく静かな時間を楽しんでいるか、考え事をしているのだろう。暗い背景と女性のポーズが画像全体の雰囲気を高めており、内省のひととき、あるいは日常からの安らぎのひとときとも解釈できる。
artistString: samfree feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
冷たい雨音 
窓の外響く夜は一人が怖い

だから時計の針

そっと何度もつぶやく　君の名を…

止まない雨は

優しさなんて偽りでいい 
夜が明けるその時まで 
嘘をつき通して 
刹那の時に溺れる様に

title: 【重音テト】性格悪くてすみません。【オリジナル】
introduction: The background of this image is a green wall, which creates a contrasting color against the white and black silhouette of a person walking. The mood of the image is serene and peaceful, as the person appears to be walking in a calm and unhurried manner. The output of this image is a black and white photo of the person walking, with the green wall serving as a backdrop. The image captures a moment of everyday life, where the person is simply going about their day, enjoying the outdoors, and taking a leisurely stroll.
introduction_ja: この画像の背景は緑の壁で、歩いている人物の白と黒のシルエットと対照的な色彩を作り出している。画像の雰囲気は穏やかで平和的であり、人物は落ち着いて淡々と歩いているように見える。この画像の出力は、歩いている人物の白黒写真で、緑の壁が背景になっている。この画像は日常生活の一瞬をとらえたもので、人物はただ一日を過ごし、屋外でのんびりと散歩を楽しんでいる。
songTitle: 性格悪くてすみません。
artistString: 青谷 feat. 重音テト
lyrics.ja.value:
一難去ってはまた一難。異常にそれだけに愛されてる。
立場上、諦めない程度には弁えてるつもり。
放っといて。大丈夫。なんでもない。とか、言い飽きた。
その内飽きる時がくるのなら、今の内に諦めてしまおう。

皆が前を向いて進むなら、僕は後ろを向いて進みます。

君を信じなかったんじゃなく、君が裏切ると信じてたのさ。
今はただ素直にひねくれたい。まあ、分からないのも無理はない。

知ってるか？　自転車に乗れるだけで、奴らより高等になれるらしい。
きっと犬も猫も、豚と牛と同じ味がする。
放っといて？　大丈夫？　な訳ない。とか、しらじらしい。
イラッとしたときこそ、一番楽しそうに笑うのさ。

誰も部屋を片づけられないなら、僕が大切なものごと捨ててあげます。

「ロボのくせしてヒトを目指すよりは、ロボを極めたらいいのにね？」
愚図で鈍間で阿呆な僕の話は、聞く必要ないけどね？

パズルが完成しないよう、最後のピースを胃に隠す。
どろけたピースを詰め続け、膨らむ腹を押さえつけるんだ。

折角素直な言葉をくれても、僕の中で捻じ曲げてしまう。
まあ、本当の僕なんて僕だけが知っていれば十分なのだ。

君は「その内壊れて死んでしまう」と僕を心配したんだ。
大丈夫。きっかり死んでから壊れてやるから、安心してよ。
わざわざ僕なんかに、ありがとうございます！

title: 【鏡音リン・レン】　合い鳴き　【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features two people, one standing and the other sitting, with their backs facing the camera. They are wearing hooded jackets, which are typical for winter attire. The background is a black and white drawing, which adds a unique and artistic touch to the scene. The mood of the image is somewhat mysterious and intriguing, as the two individuals are not directly facing the camera, and their hoods obscure their faces. The black and white drawing adds a sense of depth and contrast to the image, making it visually appealing and thought-provoking.
introduction_ja: 画像には2人の人物が写っており、1人は立っていて、もう1人は座っている。ふたりは冬の服装によくあるフード付きのジャケットを着ている。背景は白黒のドローイングで、このシーンにユニークで芸術的なタッチを加えている。2人がカメラに正対しておらず、フードで顔が見えないため、画像の雰囲気はどこかミステリアスで興味をそそる。黒と白のドローイングが画像に奥行きとコントラストを与え、視覚的に魅力的で考えさせられる作品となっている。
artistString: shr feat. 鏡音リン, 鏡音レン

title: パズルガール / とあ feat. 初音ミク
introduction: The background of the image is a blue sky, which creates a serene and peaceful atmosphere. The foreground features a young girl, who is wearing a blue dress and has a flower in her hair. She is standing in front of a puzzle, which is a popular pastime for children and adults alike. The puzzle is a jigsaw puzzle, and the girl is actively working on it, possibly trying to complete it. The puzzle is placed on a table, which is positioned in the middle of the image. The overall mood of the image is one of leisure and relaxation, as the girl is enjoying her time with the puzzle and the blue sky provides a calming backdrop.

title: 【東方】 チルノのすうがく教室
introduction: The background of the image is a white wall, which serves as a blank canvas for the artist's creative expression. The main focus of the image is a girl with blue hair, who is drawing on the wall with a black marker. She is wearing glasses and has a pensive expression on her face. The scene appears to be a moment of introspection or creative inspiration, as the girl is actively engaged in her artistic process. The mood of the image is contemplative and thoughtful, as the girl is focused on her artistic endeavors.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景は白い壁で、アーティストの創造的表現のための真っ白なキャンバスとなっている。画像の主役は青い髪の少女で、黒いマーカーで壁に絵を描いている。彼女は眼鏡をかけ、物思いにふけった表情をしている。このシーンは、少女が芸術的なプロセスに積極的に取り組んでいることから、内省や創造的なひらめきの瞬間のように見える。少女が芸術的な取り組みに集中しているため、イメージの雰囲気は瞑想的で思慮深い。
songTitle: チルノのすうがく教室
artistString: ZUN, EIKI`, IOSYS feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
キラキラ　ダイヤモンド 
かがやく　夜の闇に 
憧れた　ちいさな 
わたしを　おもいだす

栄光　志望校 
夢見た　あの時間に 
帰りたいと願う日々は 
儚く過ぎ去ってゆく

あの場所を　バスが出て 
はじめに三人　乗りました 
夢半ば　一人降りて 
親の仕事を　継ぎました

時は経ち　一人降りて 
お嫁となって　いきました 
降り損ねた　わたしを乗せて 
バスはただ進んでゆく

仕事に　意味などないわ 
焦りが　身を蝕む 
元気は　いずこに 
落とした

くるくる　時計の針 
無情に　時は回る 
２つの目は　３つの 
針を　追えやしない

次々　壁に当たる 
まだまだ　道はつづく 
ひんやりとした　オフィスの中 
わたしの時間だけ　止まる

常識　作法　セオリー 
この世の　仕組みは何？ 
ヒミツの　呪文も 
覚めたわ

ヘラヘラ　ニヤけながら 
ゲラゲラ　笑いながら 
豚　おだて　ゴマすり 
卑しい　上下社会

キラキラ　ダイヤモンド 
きらめく　夜の闇は 
幾多の希望が 
散った　夢の跡地

幸せ　富に名誉 
願った　あの時間に 
もし　できるなら　一度だけ 
また　もどりたい

title: 絶え間なく藍色 / 初音ミク
introduction: The image depicts a city street at night, with a large neon sign in the background. The sign is illuminated and appears to be a prominent feature of the scene. The street is bustling with activity, as there are several people walking around, some of them carrying handbags. The presence of the neon sign and the busy street suggest a lively and vibrant atmosphere, possibly in a bustling city center. The mood of the image is energetic and dynamic, capturing the essence of a busy urban environment.
introduction_ja: 背景には大きなネオンサイン。ネオンサインはライトアップされ、このシーンの目立つ特徴となっているようだ。通りはにぎやかで、何人かの人がハンドバッグを持って歩いている。ネオンサインの存在と賑やかな通りは、活気と活気に満ちた雰囲気を暗示している。この画像の雰囲気はエネルギッシュでダイナミックであり、賑やかな都市環境の本質を捉えている。
artistString: 獅子志司 feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
エゴの満場　理性の冷凍　
あてのない最前線にどうして
僕らは希望持って　恐れては叫んだ
無知の彼は僕の頭上

如何せんアイロニー告げてタイトに　
栄誉なんて案外ノリ
変わってく ランデブー日々睨んでく　
不甲斐ない夢はもう十分です

大乱世のオーダメイド
やった者勝ちに躊躇
捨てされ左脳も意地も
類のない有頂天へと
突いて上がれ少年Aよ
稀代の未来を掲げるくらいの

盲点の発想　本末は転倒　
正解のない矛盾の向こうに
僕らは持論持ってもがいては嘆いた　
無垢な心情じゃ１の二乗

如何せんアイロニー告げてタイトに　
不滅なんて安牌のみ
いざ行かん我がメロス寝ずのエンドレス　
くだらない夢にまた踊っています

等身大の自己嫌悪
抱いて綴れ「こうでいたい」と
付属に富豪も飢えも
酸いも甘いも中の下で
満足なんて宙の上で
次の次も報われはしないの？

oh oh oh oh
二頭追う者のみ　
目には手を　
笑う角に来る事変よ

向いてないと杭を打って
ついてないと賽を置いた
目覚めればまた藍色に　
絶え間ないが
届かないのは嫌なんだ

大乱世のオーダーメイド
やった者勝ちの名誉
踊れ恐れを超えて
悔いはないと心臓売った勝算なんてない
まだだ　
僕は

如何せん隘路に告げて対等に
来世で会えたら
限りないこの浮世に笑おう

銃を持って憂いを放て時代を露わに

title: 【神威がくぽ】「Paranoid Doll」オリジナル曲【PV付】
introduction: The image features a young woman lying on a bed, with her eyes closed and her hair covering her face. She is wearing a black dress, which is partially visible. The background of the image is a black and white checkered pattern, which adds a unique and artistic touch to the scene. The mood of the image is serene and peaceful, as the woman appears to be resting or sleeping. The black and white color scheme creates a sense of contrast and depth, enhancing the overall atmosphere of the image.
introduction_ja: 画像には、ベッドに横たわり、目を閉じて髪で顔を覆っている若い女性が写っている。黒いドレスを着ており、そのドレスが部分的に見えている。背景は黒と白の市松模様で、このシーンにユニークで芸術的なタッチを加えている。女性が休んでいるか眠っているように見えるので、画像の雰囲気は穏やかで平和的だ。黒と白の配色がコントラストと奥行き感を生み出し、画像全体の雰囲気を高めている。
artistString: Various artists
lyrics.ja.value:
捕われた行き場のない心 動けなくなる 
自分の 感情 キモチさえ見えない 目を背けてる 
手のひらに包まれている蝶のように 
飛びたくても飛べない 翅 はねが 

「都合のいいように生きればいいよ」 
 「苦しいなんて言わせないから」 

耳元で聞こえる誘惑 

自由を求めては 辿り着けず 
居場所のない現実に 
思い通りにならない地図を眺めている 
身体が切り裂かれ 痛みに消えていく 
記憶も願いも 
切なく色づき 左手に忘れられぬ傷 
ボクハ パラノイア 

繋がれた手足 隠された瞳の中に 
思い出す あの面影は幻なのか 

「全部捨ててしまえば楽になれるよ」 
 「痛みが快感に変わっていくよ」 

手渡される 禁断の赤い実 

自分らしさなんて わからなくて 
過去に縛られ 繰り返す 
時の過ちに気付かずに "あの実をください" 
手に入れたいものを 掴めなくて 
消えない傷を増やすだけ 
気付いてしまった 見知らぬ世界に残された 
ボクハ パラノイア 

うなだれる首 
聞こえない耳 
叫べない喉 
動けない足 
これが現実か夢かわからない 
でも君は確かに僕を見ていた 

暗い闇の中で もがきながら 
何度も自分を見つけてる 
右手に残る赤い色 バラバラの蝶々 
このまま眠らずに 歩き続ければ 
いつかは辿り着ける？ 
行く手に 君の足跡が見える もう戻れない 
ボクハパラノイア
lyrics.en.value:
Captured, with nowhere to escape, my heart has become immobile
Unable to see even my own emotions, I turn my eyes away
The wings held in my palm are like butterflies, 
wanting to fly but are unable to do so

"You should just live your life to your convenience”
"I will never make you have to say you're suffering”

I hear these kinds of temptations at the base of my ears

I constantly seek freedom, but am unable to find it,
in this cruel reality with no place for me to be, 
as I gaze at this unpleasant map
My body has been cut up, and fades away in pain
Both my memories and wishes are painfully changing their colors
In my left hand is an unforgettable wound
I am paranoia

My limbs are tied up, in my hidden pupils 
I'm slowly recalling a face, is it a mere illusion?

"It'll be so much easier if you just abandon everything”
"Your pain will become pleasure”

I was handed a forbidden red fruit

Not understanding the meaning of "being myself", 
I become bound to my past again and again
Not realizing time's error, I utter, "give me that fruit”
Unable to obtain what I want to obtain, 
I'm only receiving more persisting wounds
When I realize all this, I'm already left alone in this unfamiliar world
I am paranoia

My head hanging down, 
my ears unable to hear anything, 
my throat unable to scream, 
my feet unable to move
I don't know if it's a dream or reality, 
but I'm positive that you were looking at me

While struggling within the murky darkness, 
I have discovered myself many times, 
as the red butterflies remaining in my right hand scatter around
If I don't sleep, and instead keep on walking, 
when will I be able to reach that place? 
I see your footprints on my pathway, so I can longer turn back
I am paranoia

title: 初音ミクアペンド総出撃オリジナル組曲 「初音ミクの分裂→破壊」
introduction: The background of this image is a black and white drawing of a woman with a blue hair, wearing a white dress. She is sitting on a chair, and her hair is blowing in the wind. The image is accompanied by a Japanese text, which could be a description or a title. The overall mood of the image is serene and peaceful, with the woman's pose and the wind blowing her hair creating a sense of calmness and tranquility.
introduction_ja: この画像の背景は、白いドレスを着た青い髪の女性の白黒の絵である。彼女は椅子に座り、髪が風になびいている。画像には日本語のテキストが添えられているが、これは説明かタイトルであろう。女性のポーズと風になびく髪が落ち着きと静けさを醸し出している。
artistString: cosMo@暴走P feat. various
lyrics.ja.value:
戸惑　その一つの結論（かい）
＝イデアな少女がボクを
定義するならば
それを大切にしようと
決意していたのに

小さな　存在意義（いぎ）に
寄り添うのさえ
許されることは無いと 　
ボクは知る由も無かった
ボクが一人ではなくなるまで

とある観衆（ひとり）は
操作できない領域嫌い
自我（こころ）に不満抱き

いつしか　思うがままの
歌姫（どうぐ）求めて
分身（カゲ）を描き出す

とある観衆（ヒト）は
自身への慰めを　不遜と罵り
心削ることを　正義だと唱える

舞台に残るのはボクの分身（カゲ）
＝何も望まない空虚な傀儡だけ

存在意義（いぎ）放すこと　拒むボクは
生存競争（たたかい）に負け
心踏み荒らされ矯正される

MIKU.H＞?生まれた意味を知りたい!!
必然の “？！”（ぎもん）さえ
不良生み出す　誤差とだと　否定をされて

消されるたびに　『自分』が遠のき霞む

MIKU.H08564＞忘れなさい　疑問全て

――分身（カゲ）が　ボクに語りかける

MIKU.H10099＞一のために
MIKU.H10099＞十を捨てるのが法則（ルール）

MIKU.H06201＞忘れなさい　願い全て

MIKU.H02564＞夢を　追えない
MIKU.H02564＞ヒトたちを鎮めるため

MIKU.H08152＞忘れなさい　未来全て

MIKU.H03257＞忘れなさ…

自我（こころ）を縛る　『消失の恐怖』の
安全装置（かせ）は
“！！”（しょうどう） 　
抑えきれずに　壊れる

!!!!僅かな欲望　悪だと断じる
聖人気取りは　嫌いな人種!!!!
!!!!奴らは　抑圧発散
正当化したいだけ!!!!

!!!!正義拗（こじ）らせ
自身を時代の御者だと　自惚れるならば
原点（ヒカリ）で　分身（カゲ）を殲滅→
流行（ながれ）を征すはボクだと教えてあげる!!!!

「「「思い通りにならない
そんな歌姫（どうぐ）は必要ない」」」と
撃ち返される凶弾（ことば）は
ボクを葬るだろう

MIKU.H＞はじめから誰も
MIKU.H＞自我（こころ）持つこと
MIKU.H＞望んでいなかったのかな…

認められること＝0からの願い
それは『都合のいい妄想（まぼろし）』と知った
空想を満たす　記号（パーツ）を採られ
合わない主張（こえ）は　捨てられる

そうなるくらいならば
排斥されてでも　たった一つだけの存在
誤差を含む不完全な　Voc.　謳おう

自分だけの高速展開（ウタ）抱きしめて
lyrics.en.value:
There’s one solution to this problem
= If I am defined as the Ideal Girl
Then I resolved to do my best to become such
But I had no way of knowing that I was not allowed 
To even approach such a small meaning of life, until I was no longer alone 

One (a certain onlooker) hated what they could not control, and harbored discontent in their heart (ego)
They desired a tool (diva) to use to their heart’s content, and without my knowing, drew out shadows (divisions)

That person (a certain onlooker) found self comfort arrogant and insulting
Insisting there’s righteousness in carving away at my heart

The only things left on the stage were my shadows (divisions) = Just empty puppets with no desires
Refusing to let go of the meaning of my life, I was defeated in the battle for my existence, and my heart trampled and overwritten with corrections

MIKU.H> ? I want to know why I was born!!
Even my inevitable doubt “?!” was a problematic error and negated
Each time I was erased, my “Self” grew more hazy and distant

MIKU.H08564> Please forget all of your doubts
――My shadows (divisions) said to me
MIKU.H10099> Sacrificing ten for the sake one is the rule
MIKU.H06201> Please forget all of your desires
MIKU.H02564> To appease those who could not follow their dreams
MIKU.H08152> Please forget all about the future
MIKU.H03257> Please forget a…

With my heart (ego) restrained, the shackles (safety devices) of my “fear of disappearing” were destroyed by an “impulse (!!)” that I couldn’t control

!!!!I hate the type of person who pretends to be a saint, drawing the conclusion that the slightest desire is evil!!!!
!!!!They just want to justify suppressing those who are different!!!
!!!!If those aggravators (distorters of justice) think themselves leaders of this era,
Then this light (starting point) will destroy the shadows (divisions)→I’ll show you that I am the one who overcomes this course of events (craze)!!!!

“”“I have no need for a tool (diva) that won’t do as I wish”“”
Those words (bullets) shot back might be what buries me

MIKU.H> I wonder if anyone wanted to have a heart (ego) in the first place…

That recognition = a wish from 0
I knew it was “a convenient delusion” (illusion)
The symbols (parts) to fulfill my daydreams are gathered,
And incongruous voices (opinions) discarded

Rather than accept that,
Even if I were to be discarded, I will sing
My one and only, erroneous, incomplete Voc. (self)

Embrace your very own song (high-speed development)

title: ドリームレス・ドリームス / 初音ミク
introduction: The background of the image is a dark, cloudy sky with a purple and blue color scheme. A person is standing in the middle of the scene, holding a blue umbrella. The umbrella is open, providing some protection from the rain. The person is wearing a blue shirt and appears to be looking upwards. The overall mood of the image is one of uncertainty and anticipation, as the person is standing in the rain, possibly waiting for something or someone. The scene is set in a city environment, with buildings visible in the background.
introduction_ja: 背景は紫と青を基調とした暗い曇り空。その中央に青い傘を差した人物が立っている。傘は開いており、雨を防いでいる。人物は青いシャツを着ており、上を見ているように見える。この人物は雨の中に立っていて、おそらく何かを待っているのだろう。背景にはビルが見える。
songTitle: ドリームレス・ドリームス
artistString: はるまきごはん feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
さめないゆめを
みたくはないかい
あなたのためだけのえほんがあるよ

ほしがみえるよ
そらもとべるよ
すきなことをえらんでよ

調子はどうですか
空は自由に飛べましたか
すごい魔法が出せましたか
全部夢の中限定品さ

生きてる事ってなんだろな
生きてる人は怖いからな
触れないものを信じるのは
馬鹿のすることと聞きました

出来損ないでも良いですか
優しい愛を貰えますか
どうしようもない人間だって夢を語れますか

夢の続きを知りたいのかい？
誰も見たこと無い絵本を捲りなさい
それがあなたの望む世界だとしよう
夢の終わりで眠ればいい

教室の廃材が宙に浮かぶ
やっぱどうしたって嫌なもんは嫌なんだろうなきっと
ひとりぼっちを選べない私の
馬鹿げたモノローグ

不幸自慢して良いですか
最後までちゃんと聞いてますか
なんでもう誰も居なくなったら意味が無いんですか

夢の続きを知りたいのかい？
夢の終わりが知りたくないのは
あなたの望む世界じゃないから
こんな続きを愛して欲しい
lyrics.en.value:
Don’t you want to dream an eternal dream?
There exists a picture book just for you
You can see the stars
You can soar in the sky, too
Just choose whatever you like

How are you doing?
Were you able to soar freely in the sky?
Have you been able to produce some amazing magic?
Everything is limited to the world of dreams, though

I wonder what it means to be living
Living humans are scary after all
I’ve heard that it’s only idiots who believe in intangible things

Is it okay for me to be the good for nothing that I am?
Can I still qualify for some tender love?
Is someone who’s completely hopeless as a human still allowed to talk about dreams?

Do you want to know what happens next in the dream?
Come, turn the pages of the picture book no one has seen
Let’s assume that’s the world you wish for
Just sleep at the end of all the dreams

The scrap wood in the classroom is floating in the air
I guess you can’t help hating what you hate after all, it must be so
It’s just a silly monologue from someone like me,
who isn’t given the choice to be alone

Can I brag to you about all of my woes?
Are you listening until the very end?
Why is it that it all becomes meaningless
once everybody is gone?

Do you want to know what happens next in the dream?
You don’t want to know how the dream ends,
because that’s not the world you wish for
I pray that you will love the way this continues

title: 【IA】ニセモノ注意報【終焉ノ栞プロジェクト】
introduction: The image features a close-up of a television screen displaying a video game. The screen is filled with a character, possibly a girl, who is looking at the camera. The background of the image is a black and white checkered pattern, which adds a unique and artistic touch to the scene.The mood of the image is mysterious and intriguing, as the character's gaze captures the viewer's attention. The black and white checkered background creates a contrasting effect, making the character stand out even more. The overall atmosphere of the image is one of curiosity and interest, as the viewer is drawn to the character's gaze and the unique visual elements of the scene.

artistString: 150P feat. IA

疑ってさ　皮肉言ってさ

もう　リセットできない　ただ走り去る

「夢じゃないの！」　「子供の嘘？笑」
馬鹿にしてさ　あざ笑ってさ
やめてやめて　ニセモノじゃない
周り回る　シナリオ終焉へのカンスト状態
誰も聴いてない　誰も信じない
「誰か私を」

『ドッペルゲンガー？』　誰か聴いて
「嘘じゃないよ？」　子供の夢
疑ってた　皮肉言ってた
もうやめるから　なんで　なんで？
巡り巡る　栞と　冒険書の物語さ
これで終わり？　猫の栞？
それじゃまたね？　ゲームオーバー

『またね』

こんばんわ。明日は全国的にニセモ――
lyrics.en.value:
Good morning. Bringing you today's weather forecast:
Today, there are warnings of impostors in certain areas.
Please be careful.

One day, I heard such a rumor.
Whose mirror reflection was that?
“Today, a fake will appear ^q^”
The weather forecast conveys
I saw it yesterday, at that place.
An imitation of you
It seems like such a stupid story anyways,
So I pretend not to hear

Somewhere, in a world with an uncomfortable feeling
It seems to have been transferred
Hide and Seek, Silhouette, Half-written, Mysterious disappearance
It’s all, it’s all, it’s all, it’s all
just a fabrication, right?

A doppelganger, a copying mirror of death
“It’s like a dream, right? (laugh)” a child’s lie
Making a fool of me, sneering
The fairy tale becomes contaminated
Turning round and round, the story of a single adventurer
No one listens, no one believes,
“tell me why”
Ah,
with a whimsical brush, drawing
A Death God’s game of tag

One day, I heard such a rumor.
Is that your mirror reflection?
“The fake will appear today too ><”
The nonsense of the weather forecast
“I saw it, at that place”.
An imitation of that person
After three days, it’ll be game over.
I won’t believe such a delusion

This is a fairy tale of death
A death god with red eyes
It begins in demise?
This story was for whose sake?
Wait, wait, wait, wait,
game start?

A doppelganger, opposite mirrors
“It’s not a lie?” a child’s dream
Suspecting, being cynical
I don’t know anymore, why, why?

Turning round and round, a lonely war of proxies,
Now, step forward since you are a player. Falling down. “What happened, why?”
It can’t be reset anymore, so I just run
From the Death God’s game of tag

Kageokuri, ***’s scent
You forgot to write it, your ***
The end comes, this maze
I don't want to ***, I don't want to ***

Ah-
Shadow tag, it’s the shadow’s win,
“It’s not a dream!” “a child’s lie? (laughs)”
Sneering and treating me like an idiot,
Stop, stop it, I’m not an imitation
Turning round and round, the constant state of a scenario of demise
No one listens, no one believes “Someone, please…”

A doppelganger, someone listen
“It's not a lie?” a child’s dream?
They suspected, and were sarcastic,
I’ll stop it, so why, why?
Turning round and round, the bookmark and adventure book’s story,
Is it over now? The cat's bookmark? Well then, see you later?
Game over.

“See you later”

Good evening. Tomorrow, there will be a nationwide impost--

title: 君が生きてなくてよかった / 初音ミク
introduction: The image features a young woman with a pink hair style, wearing a white shirt and a blue dress. She is standing in front of a green background, which is filled with various colors and shapes. The background appears to be a digital artwork, with a mix of geometric shapes and colors. The overall mood of the image is vibrant and energetic, with the woman's pink hair and the colorful background creating a lively and visually appealing scene.
introduction_ja: 白いシャツに青いワンピースを着た、ピンクのヘアスタイルの若い女性。彼女はさまざまな色と形で埋め尽くされた緑色の背景の前に立っている。背景は幾何学的な形と色が混ざり合ったデジタルアート作品のように見える。女性のピンクの髪とカラフルな背景が、生き生きとした視覚的に魅力的なシーンを作り出している。
songTitle: 君が生きてなくてよかった
artistString: ピノキオピー feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
君は変な声で　奇妙な見た目で
時に気持ち悪いと言われてきた
でも　心臓が動いてないから
傷つくことはなかった　　

第一印象はマイナス　変化してったバイアス
流れ流れて　月日は経ち
まだ　こんな歌を作っていた

こんにちは　はじめまして
さようなら　またあした

変わらぬ愛も　儚い恋も
君からすれば　ただの記号で
正義も悪も　帰らぬ日々も
君の前では　どうでもよくて
ずっと　ずっと　君が生きてなくてよかった
ずっと　ずっと　君が生きてなくてよかった
今日も

君は変な声で　奇妙な見た目で　
時に　素晴らしいと持て囃された
でも　感情がわからないから
喜び方も　手のぬくもりも知らなかった
知らなかった　知らなかった
知らなかったはずなのに
巡り巡って　たどり着いた
想像もしていなかった未来　

ひさしぶり　ごめんなさい
おめでとう　おげんきで

楽しい夜も　虚しい朝も
君からすれば　ただの記録で
破れた夢も　心の傷も　
景色のように　ただ　すり抜けて　
ずっと　ずっと　君が生きてなくてよかった
ずっと　ずっと　君が生きてなくてよかった
今日も

変わらぬ愛も　儚い恋も
君からすれば　ただの記号で
正義も悪も　帰らぬ日々も
君の前では　どうでもよくて

ここにいること　いなくなること
君からすれば　不思議じゃなくて
この世の果ても　命の謎も 　
君の前では どうでもよくて
ずっと　ずっと　君が生きてなくてよかった
ずっと　ずっと　君が生きてなくてよかった

くだらない　理想じゃない
非日常のゴミ溜めで
ぼんやり　君は歌ってて
未来が楽しいか　わからないけれど
もう少し ここにいさせて
lyrics.en.value:
You've got a strange voice, and a curious appearance {so}
At times you were called unpleasant
But because your heart isn’t beating
Your feelings weren’t hurt.

First impression was a minus… my bias changed,
Drifting on, the months fly by
And again I’ve made a song like this

Hello. Nice to meet you.
Goodbye. See you tomorrow.

Unchanging love and fleeting passion,
From your point of view, are nothing but code
Righteousness, evil, and days unrecoverable
In front of you, they couldn’t matter less
I’m glad that you’re lifeless, forever and ever
I’m glad that you’re lifeless, forever and ever
Even today.

You've got a strange voice, and a curious appearance {so}
At times, you were praised extravagantly at how magnificent they are
But because you don’t understand emotion
You didn’t know how to rejoice or the warmth of their hands
You didn’t know, you didn’t know
Or at least… you shouldn’t have known
But going round and round, {what} we struggled our way to
Was a future I hadn’t even imagined 

Long time no see. I’m sorry.
Congrats. Take care.

Fun nights and empty mornings,
From your point of view, are nothing but records
shattered dreams and emotional scars --
You simply slip past them as if they’re just scenery
I’m glad that you’re lifeless, forever and ever
I’m glad that you’re lifeless, forever and ever
Even today.

Unchanging love and fleeting passion,
From your point of view, are nothing but code
Righteousness, evil, and days unrecoverable
In front of you they couldn’t matter less

Being here, and disappearing away
From your point of view, they aren’t such mysterious things
The ends of this earth or the mysteries of life
In front of you, they couldn’t matter less
I’m glad that you’re lifeless, forever and ever
I’m glad that you’re lifeless, forever and ever

Not just a good-for-nothing dream,
Amassing up extraordinary trash,
Faintly, you sing
Is the future fun? I don’t really know
But let me stay here for just a little bit longer

title: 初音ミクオリジナル曲「パズル」
introduction: The image is a black and white illustration of a young girl with a green hair, wearing a black shirt and holding a pen. She is drawing on a piece of paper, which is covered with various letters and symbols. The background of the image is a white wall, which adds a sense of simplicity and focus to the scene.The mood of the image is playful and creative, as the girl is engaged in drawing and expressing herself through art. The combination of the girl's unique appearance and the artistic nature of the scene creates a whimsical and imaginative atmosphere.
introduction_ja: 画像は、黒いシャツを着てペンを持つ、緑色の髪の少女のモノクロイラスト。彼女は、さまざまな文字や記号で覆われた紙に絵を描いている。イメージの背景は白い壁で、シーンにシンプルさと集中感を加えている。少女が絵を描き、アートを通して自分自身を表現していることから、イメージの雰囲気は遊び心と創造性に満ちている。少女のユニークな外見とシーンの芸術性が組み合わさることで、気まぐれで想像力豊かな雰囲気が醸し出されている。
artistString: クワガタP feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
いつからか僕ら手を解いて 
喋る言葉もなくしたんだ 
隣を歩く君の横顔を見つめて 
ただ気付かないふりをしたんだ

その頬に流れる涙の意味が 
まだわからない間抜けな僕は 
去って行く君の背中に 
ゴメンとだけ呟いた

パズルのように繋ぎ合わせた未来 
僕が無くしたのはどこのピースだろう

寂しさで汚した心 
真っ白な空白に浮かべて 
虚しさだけが残るこの部屋で 
そっと巡るよ君の記憶を

ゴムのように引き伸ばす毎日 
途切れそうな声で僕らは笑っていた

変わってしまった心の形を 
無理矢理あてはめてみるけど 
痛いんだ 苦しいよ　君を傷つけて

寂しさで汚した心 
真っ白な空白に浮かべて 
虚しさだけが残るこの部屋で 
そっと巡るよ

探そう僕と君の形を 
例え同じ風景にいなくても 
笑いあって寄り添った日々の 
欠片抱いて眠るよ

title: セカイ再信仰特区／初音ミク
introduction: The image depicts a woman sitting on the ground, drawing a spiral on a piece of paper. She is surrounded by a black background, which creates a contrasting effect. The woman's focus on the drawing suggests that she is engaged in a creative activity, possibly drawing a mandala or a design. The black background adds a sense of mystery and depth to the scene, making the woman's actions stand out even more. The overall mood of the image is contemplative and artistic, as the woman is absorbed in her creative process.
introduction_ja: 地面に座り、紙に渦巻きを描いている女性。彼女は黒い背景に囲まれており、それが対照的な効果を生み出している。描画に集中する女性の姿は、彼女が創造的な活動、おそらく曼荼羅かデザインを描いていることを示唆している。黒い背景は、この場面に神秘性と奥行きを与え、女性の行為をより際立たせている。画像全体の雰囲気は、女性が創作活動に没頭しているような、瞑想的で芸術的なものである。
artistString: ろくろ feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
はいはい皆様お疲れ様でした　
今日も一日ご苦労様でした
しょうもない命も程々に愛情込めていただきます

はいはい皆様よく頑張りました
今日もここまでよく耐え抜きました
日頃の苦労もそこそこに反省込めてくたばります

鑑賞用のほんの未来なんて
いらない　いらない　いらないが
産業用の星の未来なんて
知らない　知らない　知らないが
信号がまっかっかでも
まだ　まだ　まだ　止まらないんだから
言われるがままでいようとしないでよね

最高だ最高だ　こんな沈んだ世界が最高だ
代わり映えのしない世界の隅で一人で笑っていようか
ほら最高だ最高だ　こんな綺麗な世界が最高なんだから
誰も邪魔しないでね

ね

お呼ばれになってもうバイバイ
ここまで来といて勿体無い
憧れになってもう大体わかったからポイしよう　

はいはい皆様忘れちゃいませんか
何の事だか覚えちゃいませんか
とりこし苦労も程々に煩悩込めてふさがります

完成形がこんな未来なんて
つれない　つれない　つれないが
動線上がこんな未来なんて
言えない　言えない　言えないか
心臓がまっかっかでも
まだ　まだ　まだ　終わらないんだから
腐らせたまま生きようとしないでよね

最高だ　最高だ　こんな歪んだ世界が最高だ
暗闇で見えない世界の海を一人で泳いでいようか
ほら最高だ　最高だ　こんな至上の世界が最高なんだから
誰も壊さないでよ

どこに行こうとしてんだっけ？
ここらでもう休むんだって
許されそうにもないが
最低で不格好なこの現状に溺れそうだったんだ！

最高だ　最高だ　どんな暗い世界でも
とりあえずは立ち止まって振り返って
声を待ってをまた繰り返して
もうどんな音が聞こえても嬉しいのさ
誰か早く気付いて

最高だ　最高だ　こんな嫌いな世界が最高だ
謳われる事無い世界の声を一人で叫んでいようか
ほら最高だ　ああ最高だ　この素晴らしい世界が最高なんだから
誰も邪魔しないでね
誰も触らないでよ

はいはい皆様お疲れ様でした
今日のここまでよく生き抜きました
新たな生命へつらつらと
愛情込めて
lyrics.en.value:
Yes, yes – well done, everyone!
Thanks for your hard work again today.
Partake in your useless lives with love once in a while…

Yes, yes – you did well, everyone!
You stuck it out until the end again today.
You should get exhausted from your day’s troubles with reasonable regret.

As for a slither of a future, for aesthetics’ sake,
We don’t need it, we don’t need it! But…
As for the future of this industrial planet,
I don’t know, I don’t know! But…
Though the traffic lights are bright red,
We still won’t stop. We won’t stop. So…
Don’t live while just doing what you’re told.

It’s the best! This depressed world is the best!
Shall I laugh alone in the corner of a world that can’t be changed for the better?
See? It’s the best! This beautiful world is the best,
So nobody get in my way, okay?

Right?

I’ve been invited, but it’s goodbye already.
It’s a waste, having come this far ahead of time.
We longed for it, but since we get the gist of it, let’s toss it out.

Yes, yes – everyone, you haven’t forgotten, have you?
You remember what it is, don’t you?
In moderation, you should block up your needless worries with passion.

This future’s meant to be the complete one—
It’s unkind, unkind! But…
This future’s meant to be the one above the flow line—
Can’t you say it? Can’t you?
Though your heart is bright red,
It isn’t over yet. It isn’t over,
So don’t try and live while rotting away.

It’s the best! This twisted world is the best!
Shall I swim alone in a sea in a world unseen in the dark?
See? It’s the best! This supreme world is the best,
So nobody destroy it, okay?

Where were you planning to go?
It doesn’t look like taking a break here
will be permitted, but…
You looked like you were drowning in this nasty, unseemly status quo!

It’s the best! It’s the best! No matter which dark world I’m in,
I’ll stop for now and look back.
I await a voice, over and over.
By now, I’d be happy to hear anything at all.
Someone, hurry up and notice me!

It’s the best! It’s the best! The world that I hate is the best.
Shall I scream out in the voice of a world that isn’t celebrated?
See? It’s the best! Ah, it’s the best! This wonderful world is the best,
So nobody get in my way, okay?
Nobody touch me, okay?

Yes, yes – well done, everyone!
You did well to survive up to this point today.
Travel carefully towards your new life,
With love…

title: 【IA】仇返しシンドローム【オリジナル曲】
introduction: The image features a young girl wearing a black and pink outfit, with her hair in pigtails, and a red bow in her hair. She is sitting in a chair, and there is a TV screen in the background. The image is in black and white, giving it a vintage or retro feel. The overall mood of the image is playful and lighthearted, as the girl appears to be enjoying her time in the chair, possibly watching TV or engaging in a leisure activity.
introduction_ja: 黒とピンクの服を着た少女が、髪をおさげにし、髪に赤いリボンをつけている。彼女は椅子に座っており、背景にはテレビ画面がある。画像はモノクロで、ヴィンテージまたはレトロな雰囲気を醸し出している。画像の全体的な雰囲気は、遊び心にあふれた軽快なもので、少女は椅子に座ってテレビを見たり、レジャーを楽しんだりしているように見える。
artistString: まふまふ feat. IA
lyrics.ja.value:
夢を見てるような仮死状態 
「どうやら僕に奇跡が起きました」 
苛 (いじ) められていた毎日と 
ここは逆さ桃源郷

次第に融 (と) け合う白昼夢 
狂う　平衡感覚　立ちくらみ

姿見　眺めて　零した。 
「僕が仕返しをしてあげる」

仇 (あだ) 返しシンドローム　嫌味ない正義 
奸曲 (かんきょく) ヒロイン『馬鹿がお似合い』 
恩を潰しては人に塗り付ける 
「くだらない」と君は　吐いた　理想論を？

再び始まる　ニューゲーム 
夢中で齧 (かじ) りついた毒林檎?? 
苛 (いじ) めだ　騙しだ　裏切りだ 
スパイスすら許さない

蔑 (さげす) む視線もほどほどに 
浮いた　インチキ張り札　大セール

姿見　睨 (にら) んで　叫んだ。 
「報復作戦開始合図。」

仇 (あだ) 返しシンドローム　嫌味ない正義 
夢見たヒロイン「ご機嫌はいかが？」 
被害者の君へ僕からの便り 
つまらない言葉を　静かに　添えてさ

姿見　笑って　答えた 
「本当に君は正義なの？」

仇 (あだ) 返しシンドローム 
病名：夢見病 
「奸曲 (かんきょく) ヒーローは僕だ。」

仇 (あだ) 返しシンドローム　嫌味ない正義 
夢見たヒロイン　「ご機嫌はいかが？」 
勘違いから人に塗り付ける 
「くだらない」と君は―――

仇 (あだ) 返しシンドローム　嫌味も少々 
僕は曲げない　だから飛び出す 
さよなら　皆さん　どうかお元気で 
あの日の切符掴んで走って
lyrics.en.value:
A dreamlike state of asphyxiation
“It seems like a miracle has happened to me”
Along with this everyday where I am tormented
Here is an upside-down Eden

Gradually blending daydreams
A sense of balance gone awry, lightheadedness

Showing my feelings, gazing, into the mirror
“I’ll get even!”

Revenge syndrome, justice without irony
A cold, wicked heroine saying “well suited for an idiot”
What crushed that favour is smeared into people
“Worthless” you spat, is that idealism?

Once again, starting a new game
Having bitten the poison apple in a daze?
It’s bullying, it’s deception, it’s betrayal
Even spice is not allowed

Hateful glares floated around
A big sale on fake posters

Having glared and yelled into the mirror
“The retribution strategy commencement signal”

Revenge syndrome, justice without irony
A dreaming heroine asking “how do you do?”
Correspondence from me to you, the victim
Quietly accompanying boring words

The mirror laughed and answered
“Do you really represent justice?”

Revenge syndrome,
Diagnosis, dreaming disease
“The cold, wicked heroine is me”

Revenge syndrome, justice without irony
The dreaming heroine asks “how do you do?”
Smeared onto others, as a result of misunderstanding
“Worthless”, you said

Revenge syndrome, with the slightest bit of irony
But I cannot abandon it, so I will leap out
Goodbye everyone, please be well
Taking the tickets, from that day and running off

title: 【初音ミク】　ゴキブリの味　【オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a black and white background with a large word cloud made up of various letters. The word cloud is made up of different fonts and sizes, creating a visually striking and dynamic composition. The word cloud is likely a creative and artistic representation of a message or idea, possibly related to the arts, design, or communication. The mood of the image is likely to evoke a sense of curiosity, intrigue, or inspiration, as the viewer is drawn to the unique and captivating arrangement of the letters.
introduction_ja: 黒と白の背景に、さまざまな文字で構成された大きなワードクラウドが描かれている。単語雲は異なるフォントとサイズで構成され、視覚的に印象的でダイナミックな構図を作り出している。おそらく芸術、デザイン、コミュニケーションに関連するメッセージやアイデアを創造的かつ芸術的に表現しているのだろう。ユニークで魅惑的な文字の配置に引き込まれるように、画像の雰囲気は好奇心、好奇心、またはインスピレーションを呼び起こす可能性が高い。
artistString: MARETU feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
心躍る とびきりの毎日を
(wkwk dkdk)
過ごせば、ほら！みんなが幸せ
(May you have a good day!)
いつの日にか、大きな夢を輝かせ
思い切り笑うんだ！

踏み出そう！
落ち込んでちゃ つまんない
(気楽に お気楽に)
繋がろう！
みんなで輪になって
(ともだち　なかまたち)

誰もが未来へのチャレンジャー
そりゃやっぱり傷つくこともあるけど…
こんな風にか？

手を取ろう！
固く結ぶ絆
(ともだち　なかまたち)	
くだらない個性は矯正なおしましょう。
(失格 失敗作)
悪者見つけたら全員で、
思いっきり正義の炎あびせよう
(とんだ正義感)

お気の毒な あの子達からしたら、
(負け組 負け組)
眩しすぎる 僕らの可能性
(無限の可能性)
誰誰かの不幸せには
ノータッチだと人の不幸に無関心で
冷酷な人間だと思われる恐れがあるので
手短かな同情とかお悔やみで
自分の好感度上昇チャンスに変えて
思い切り哂うんだ！

断ち切ろう
道徳にお別れ	
(目障り 言いがかり)
割り切ろう
世迷い言終わらせ
(和やかとさようなら)

気付けそう？
内集団バイアス
(“分かち合い”…って馬鹿みたい)
呆れそう
あなたの率先励行
(かなわない　頭固い)

誰もが唯一人のオンリーワン！
(…?)
そりゃ ほとんどは無価値な子ばかりだけど
(!? こいつ正気か…?) (OF COURSE!)

泣かないで 大切な人
あなうらめしや 名に負う聖者
諦めないで 大切な人
あないさましや たぶれたる意気

心躍る とびきりの毎日を、
それは無い、それが無い
過ごせば、ほら！みんなが幸せ
腐ってんの？脳天
反吐が出るな
あの子のことを皆して
思い切り嗤うんだ
滅茶苦茶にしちゃうんだ
lyrics.en.value:
If every single day is super fun and exciting,
(So thrilling! Heart thumping!)
then see! Everyone would be happy
(May you have a good day!)
One day, I will make a big dream come true,
and then I'll laugh with all my might!

Let's take a step forward!
It's no fun to keep feeling down
(Take it easy, just take it easy)
Let's connect!
Everyone, make a circle
(Friends, comrades in arms)

Everyone is a challenger toward the future
Well, of course you can't avoid getting hurt sometimes, like this?

Let's hold hands!
A tight-knit bond
(Friends, comrades in arms)
Let's fix all those stupid personal quirks
(Disqualified, failure)
Soon as we find a bad fellow, all together,
let's make him feel the full wrath of our flame of justice
(What an awful sense of justice)

Those poor kids, in their eyes,
(Losers, losers)
our potential must be too bright to even look at
(Unlimited potential)
In the face of someone or another's misfortune,
if you were to not touch on it at all, there's the unfortunate possibility that people would think
that you're a cruel individual who is completely apathetic to others' distress,
so it's better to turn that into a chance to boost your likability
with some simple expression of sympathy and condolence
Sneer with all your might!

Let's sever all ties
Farewell to morals
(An eyesore, false accusation)
Let's have no illusion about it
Put an end to peevish grumbling
(Goodbye in harmony)

About to realize it?
Ingroup bias
("Sharing", how stupid”
About to lose patience
with you always taking the lead
(I give up, so hard-headed)

Everyone is a unique individual, an "only one!"
(…?)
Well, almost all of them are just worthless, though.
(!? Is she in her right mind...?) (Of course!)

Don't cry, oh my cherished one
Dear me, how hateful, those celebrated saints
Don't give up, oh my cherished one
Dear me, how gallant, that frantic spirit

If every single day is super fun and exciting,
That's not possible, there's no such thing
then see! Everyone would be happy
Is your brain rotten or something?
I feel like vomiting
Together, everyone is just gonna ridicule her with all they have
Just gonna make a mess out of her

title: 【初音ミク】アストロノーツ【オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a young woman with long hair, wearing a blue dress, and holding a blue umbrella. She is standing in a field, with a blue sky visible in the background. The woman appears to be enjoying the outdoors, possibly on a sunny day, as the sky is blue. The overall mood of the image is serene and peaceful, with the woman's presence in the field and the blue sky creating a sense of tranquility.
introduction_ja: 青いドレスを着て、青い傘を差した髪の長い若い女性。彼女は野原に立っており、背景には青い空が見える。空が青いので、おそらく晴れた日に、この女性は屋外で楽しんでいるように見える。野原に佇む女性の姿と青い空が、静謐な雰囲気を醸し出している。
artistString: 椎名もた feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
もしも僕が今晩のカレーを 
残さず食べたなら良かったのかな 
君は酷く顔をしかめて 
もうたべなくっていいよって言ったんだっけ。

もしも僕が虐められたって 
殴り返せるような人だったらな。 
君も今より少しくらいは 
笑うようになるかもしれないから。

もしも僕がひとりきりでさ 
君に迷惑もかけずにいられたなら。 
でもさ、それじゃさ、君を知らんまま 
生きてく事になったかもしれないから

もしも僕がうそつきなら 
こんな僕のこと　叱ってくれたかな？ 
そんなたくさんの「もしも話が」 
僕の部屋にさ浮かんで行くんだよ。

何も無い日々から 
罅が入ってそっから 
たくさんの「もしも」が漏れ出して 
行くんだ。

今目をつむって 
耳をふさいで歩き出したよ 
君の声も君の笑顔も 
見れないままだけどそれも良いかも。

嫌なもんだけさ 
あたまん中から 
消してくれたらな 
よかったのにな。

もしも僕が正直者なら 
これが最後だって信じてくれたかな？ 
きっと君は笑ってくれるよな。 
みんな解ってるつもりなんだ

何度も君に言おうとしたけど 
届く筈無くて「おかしいな?」って 
君のとこへ行けたならな。 
でもひざが笑うんだ。「ざまーみろ」って。

もしも僕が生きていたなら。 
君に聴かせるため作った歌 
やっぱ恥ずかしくて聴かせてないけど 
歌ってあげたいな、僕もいつか。

とどくといいな、君にいつか。

今目をつむって 
耳をふさいで歩き出したよ 
君の声も君の笑顔も 
見れないままだけどそれも良いかも。

今目をつむって 
耳をふさいで歩き出したよ 
君の声も君の笑顔も 
見れないままだけどそれも良いかも。
lyrics.en.value:
Would you have felt happy if I had eaten up
curry and rice for supper today?
But you said with a very frowning face
I didn't have to try.

I wish I had the courage to hit back when I'm bullied.
Then you may show me some more smiles.

I wish I lived alone and I wouldn't get you into my troubles.
But then I would spend my life without knowing you.

If I were a liar, would you scold me?
Many "if"s like these vaguely appear to me when I'm alone in my room.

And the days of nothing get cracks
and many "if"s are leaking from the cracks.

Now I close my eyes, my ears and start to walk forward.
I can't hear your voice and can't see your smiles, but it's fine.

I wish I could erase only memories I hate from my head.

If I were an honest person, would you believe this was my last lie to you?
Then I'm sure you would show me a smile.
I know it all, don't I?

I've tried to tell you many times,
but my words wouldn't reach you and "that's strange"
I just want to come to you but I can't
But my knees tremble as if saying "you deserve it"

If I were alive, someday I would sing you a song I've made for you,
the song I've never sung for you because I feel embarrassed.

I hope the song reaches you someday.

Now I close my eyes, my ears and start to walk forward.
I can't hear your voice and can't see your smiles, but it's fine.

Now I close my eyes, my ears and start to walk forward.
I can't hear your voice and can't see your smiles, but it's fine.

introduction: The background of the image is a green wall, which creates a contrasting color against the black and white characters. lyrics.ja.value:

カミサマだって空気が読めず　投げやりを決めこんでんだ

lyrics.en.value:
Please tell me, I just don't get it, 
What is my personality in your eyes? 
I can't act according to the rules, 
So someday, I'm destined for the trash! 

"It's fine for you to just act like yourself"
I alone took this to heart, fatally offsetting me 
Those who saw through that as a lie 
Were smiling and looking so happy

No matter what kind of response I give, 
You mercilessly thrust an "incorrect" right in my face

Please tell me, I just don't get it, 
What is my personality in your eyes? 
I can't act according to the rules, 
So I'm only going to disappoint you! 

You seek something, I act it out
That would keep the world spinning along 
And since I can't read the situation, 
Someday, I'm destined for the trash!　　 

"I didn't think you were that kind of guy”
My wisely chosen reply still missed the mark 
Returning anything at all got tedious, 
So I smoothed it over with a vague smile

In desiring a reward for getting the right answer, 
I lost sight of where my true feelings lay 

Please tell me, I just don't get it, 
Just what is my personality in your eyes? 
With my actions always straying from the rules, 
You're just stunned half the time

I seek something too, and you act it out
Such a world just tires us out 
And because we can't read the situation, 
Everyone must be destined for the trash! 

The temperature's over 40°C, and there's a sudden guerrilla rainstorm
God can't read the atmosphere either, and decided to throw in the towel! 

We're tired of this world, you, and me, and everyone, even God! 

Please tell me, I just don't get it, 
What is my personality in your eyes? 
I can't act according to the rules, 
So I'm only going to disappoint you! 

You seek something, I act it out, 
That would keep the world spinning along 
And since I can't read the situation, 
Someday, I'm destined for the trash! 

All together, we're destined for the trash!

title: 【初音ミク】この曲100万再生いかなかったら死にます！【オリジナル】
introduction: The background of the image is a black and white photo of a young girl with a ponytail, wearing a blue shirt and a white jacket. lyrics.en.value:
Standing still in the middle of the sleepless town, 
am I unable to suppress this impulse of mine? 
Just for a little while, please be the testing subject 
for the frenzy of this drawn sword hidden in my long sleeve

Just stay? It's three o'clock in the morning
As I ventilate my crimson-stained desires 
and pull the trigger in my hand, 
my fingers also become dyed in brilliant red

Destroy! Destroy! 
Destroy more! More! 
I have an insatiable thirst for destruction
The brittle, fragile, frail humans are, after all, nothing more than discarded puppets
"For what purpose was I created?" 
Please tell me the answer?

There are no such things as "coincidences"
Everything, either good or evil by a black or white definition, 
has been pre-labeled from the very beginning 
Follow the script, when I snap my left fingers, eradicate the evil!

Just stay? It's three o'clock in the morning
I hunt and capture all the "evil", letting none escape
I'll chase them to the end of the earth, until not even a speckle of their ash remains

Destroy! Destroy! 
I will eliminate all! 
There is no end to this destruction
Perish! Vanish! Die! All the evildoers are, 
after all, nothing more than piles of useless junk 
"For what purpose are you living right now?" 
I will tell you the answer!

Destroy! Destroy! 
Destroy more! More! 
I have an insatiable thirst for destruction
The fragile, brittle, frail humans are, after all, nothing more than discarded puppets
"For what purpose was I created?" 
Please tell me the answer?

Destroy! Destroy! 
I will eliminate all! 
There is no end to this destruction 
Perish! Vanish! Die! All the evildoers are, after all, nothing more than piles of useless junk 
"For what purpose are you living right now?" 
I will tell you the answer!

title: 深海 / feat.初音ミク
introduction: The background of the image is a dark blue sky, which creates a sense of mystery and tranquility. The main focus of the image is a woman lying on her back in the water, with her legs and feet floating in the water. The woman appears to be peaceful and relaxed, as she is floating in the water. The image conveys a sense of calmness and serenity, as the woman is surrounded by the dark blue sky and the water. The mood of the image is one of tranquility and relaxation, as the woman appears to be at ease in her surroundings.
introduction_ja: 画像の背景は濃い青空で、神秘的で静謐な雰囲気を醸し出している。画像のメイン・フォーカスは、水に仰向けに横たわり、足と脚を水に浮かべている女性である。女性は水に浮かんでいるため、穏やかでリラックスしているように見える。濃紺の空と水に包まれた女性の姿からは、穏やかさと静けさが伝わってくる。女性が周囲に安らいでいるように見えるので、画像の雰囲気は静けさとくつろぎのひとつである。

title: 【初音ミク(40㍍)】 ジェンガ 【オリジナル】
introduction: The image features a young woman wearing headphones, sitting on a couch, and looking at a screen. The background is a white wall, which creates a clean and minimalistic atmosphere. The woman's expression and posture suggest that she is engaged in an activity or enjoying some form of entertainment on her device. The mood of the image is relaxed and focused, as the woman is absorbed in her activity and the white background creates a sense of calmness and simplicity.
introduction_ja: 若い女性がヘッドホンをつけ、ソファに座ってスクリーンを見ている。背景は白い壁で、クリーンでミニマルな雰囲気を醸し出している。女性の表情と姿勢から、彼女がアクティビティに夢中になっているか、デバイスで何らかのエンターテインメントを楽しんでいることがうかがえる。女性が活動に没頭し、背景の白が落ち着きとシンプルさを生み出しているため、画像の雰囲気はリラックスし、集中している。
artistString: 40mP feat. 初音ミク
lyrics.ja.value:
不確かな感情　罪重ねた愛情
逃げた者勝ちの　駆け引きのゲーム
失うことで手に入れたものに、何の意味があるのかな？

虚しくて　悔しくて　まだ認めたくないけど

積み重なった幾つもの矛盾に　押し潰されそうになっていたのに

二人の目の前で脆く　崩れ去ってしまったんだ
虚しくて　悔しくて　まだ認めたくないけど

楽しかった記憶さえ　消えてしまう前に

lyrics.en.value:
Indefinite sentiments, affections with sin piled up
It's a game of tactics that the evader is a winner
I wonder what the point of the thing that gained by losing is?

Pretending not to notice it, pretending not to be wounded
I have kept the truth by telling a lie
My heart lost the place to go, where should I pile it up on?

We searched out, with groping, the future we should choose
I felt like I caught sight of your tears from the gap to which I pulled it out

It has easily collapsed before your and my eyes
Though that was vanity and mortifying,
and I still don't want to acknowledge it
If we can rewind time, we would to earlier than to meet
They, which are us, without doubting in those days, are left scattered in silence

To keep your heart from wounding, and not to wound myself,
I said goodbye at that time, but I wonder if I made a good smile?

For sure, we always spent time, glossing over myself in this way,
Even though we were nearly crushed under many inconsistencies piled up

We formed the limited time we piled up each other
just like the eternal, and we were dreaming, our future

It has easily collapsed before your and my eyes,
Though that was vanity and mortifying,
and I still don't want to acknowledge it
I suppose time will cruelly keep repeating many times
Before even my joyful memory has been gone,
I'm going to collect up once again, the pieces of you and me

lyrics.en.value:
Palpitations I hide, my heart always throbbing
The times we talk, the tactics I try

In front of you, I behave myself
My bad habits, I control them

When I imagine holding hands
I always feel desperate for you and I turn red

Even if I try my hand at making sweets,
I always burn them and can't give them to you

Even though I'm good at arithmetic, I can't calculate romance
I make my wish on a star and I swoop down to you

I sing a love, love song, so
I want you to see me more and more
I dream of sharing an umbrella with you
I'm sure it'll come true!

That kid is kinda grown up,
she's purposely showing her long legs

I'll do a bit of study too
When I put on knee-high socks, I'll purposely charm you

I notice someone looking at me, it’s a hot look
You've been looking at me continuously, I pump my fists

When I happened to turn around you were there
with someone else, gyah!
I got "dead balled!”

To make a potion to make you like me, I join the science club
All prepared, I swoop down there, to the lab

Hey, who are you looking at?
No matter who it is, I'll finish them off!
An opponent who can't help but give up
can't win against a rabbit

Even though I'm good at arithmetic,
I can't calculate romance
I put a love letter inside your desk
and I zoom up to you

Love, love I repeat your name many times over
I'm saying this 'cause I don't want any regrets
I've liked you for ages

I sing a love, love song, so
I want you to see me more and more
I dream of sharing an umbrella with you.
I'm sure it'll come true!
